original: kecid vācām sthitam aviṣaye tattvam ūcus tadīyaṃ tena brūmaḥ sahṛdaya-manaḥ-prītaye tat-svarūpam // DhvK_1.1 //
analyzed: kecid vācām sthitam aviṣaye tattvam ūcuḥ tadīyam tena brūmaḥ sahṛdaya manaḥ prītaye tad svarūpam

analyzed: budhaiḥ kāvya tattva vidbhiḥ kāvyasya ātmā dhvaniḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ

original: paramparayā yaḥ samāmnāta-pūrvaḥ samyak āsamantāt mnātaḥ prakaṭitaḥ /
analyzed: paramparayā yaḥ samāmnāta pūrvaḥ samyak ā samantāt mnātaḥ prakaṭitaḥ

original: tasya sahṛdaya-jana-manaḥ-prakāśamānasyāpy abhāvam anye jagaduḥ /
analyzed: tasya sahṛdaya jana manaḥ prakāśamānasya api abhāvam anye jagaduḥ

original: tad-abhāva-vādināṃ cāmī vikalpāḥ sambhavanti /
analyzed: tad abhāva vādinām ca amī vikalpāḥ sambhavanti

original: tatra kecid ācakṣīran-śabdārtha-śarīraṃ tāvat kāvyam /
analyzed: tatra kecid ācakṣīran śabda artha śarīram tāvat kāvyam

original: tatra ca śabda-gatāś cārutva-hetavo 'nuprāsādayaḥ prasiddhā eva /
analyzed: tatra ca śabda gatāḥ cāru tva hetavaḥ nuprāsa ādayaḥ prasiddhāḥ eva

original: artha-gatāś copamādayaḥ /
analyzed: artha gatāḥ ca upama ādayaḥ

original: varṇa-saṅghaṭanādharmāś ca ye mādhuryādayas te 'pi pratīyante /
analyzed: varṇa saṅghaṭana dharmāḥ ca ye mādhurya ādayaḥ te pi pratīyante

original: tad-anatirikta-vṛttayo vṛttayo 'pi yāḥ kaiścid upanāgarikādyāḥ prakāśitāḥ,
analyzed: tad anatirikta vṛttayaḥ vṛttayaḥ yāḥ kaiścid upanāgarika ādyāḥ prakāśitāḥ

original: tā api gatāḥ śravaṇa-gocaram /
analyzed: tāḥ api gatāḥ śravaṇa gocaram

original: rītayaś ca vaidarbhī-prabhṛtayaḥ /
analyzed: rītayaḥ ca vaidarbhī prabhṛtayaḥ

original: tad-vyatiriktaḥ ko 'yam dhvanir nāmeti /
analyzed: tad vyatiriktaḥ kaḥ yam dhvaniḥ nāma iti

original: anye brūyuḥ-nāsty eva dhvaniḥ /
analyzed: anye brūyuḥ na asti eva dhvaniḥ

original: prasiddha-prasthāna-vyatirekiṇaḥ kāvya-prakārasya kāvyatva-hāneḥ sahṛdaya-hṛdayāhlādi-śabdārtha-mayatvam eva kāvya-lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: prasiddha prasthāna vyatirekiṇaḥ kāvya prakārasya kāvya tva hāneḥ sahṛdaya hṛdaya āhlādi śabdārtha maya tvam eva kāvya lakṣaṇam

original: na cokta-prasthānātirekiṇo mārgasya tat sambhavati /
analyzed: na ca ukta prasthāna atirekiṇaḥ mārgasya tat sambhavati

original: na ca tat-samatāntaḥ-pātinaḥ sahṛdayān kāṃścit parikalpya tat-prasiddhyā dhvanau kāvya-vyapadeśaḥ pravartito 'pi sakala-vidvan-mano-grāhitām  #
analyzed: na ca tad samatā antaḥpātinaḥ sahṛdayān kāṃścid parikalpya tad prasiddhyā dhvanau kāvya vyapadeśaḥ sakala vidvas manogrāhitām

original: avalambate /
analyzed: avalambate

original: punar apare tasyābhāvam anyathā kathayeyuḥ-na sambhavaty eva dhvanir nāmāpūrvaḥ kaścit /
analyzed: punar apare tasya abhāvam anyathā kathayeyuḥ na sambhavati eva dhvaniḥ nāma apūrvaḥ kaścid

original: kāmanīyakam anati-vartamānasya tasyokteṣv eva cārutva-hetuṣv antar-bhāvāt /
analyzed: kāmanīyakam an ativartamānasya tasya ukteṣu eva cāru tva hetuṣu antarbhāvāt

original: teṣām anyatamasyaiva vā apūrva-samākhyā-mātra-karaṇe yat kiṃcana kathanaṃ syāt /
analyzed: teṣām anyatamasya eva vā apūrva samākhyā mātra karaṇe yat kiṃcana kathanam syāt

original: kiṃ ca vāg-vikalpānām ānantyāt sambhavaty api vā kasmiṃścit kāvya-lakṣaṇa-vidhāyibhiḥ
analyzed: kim ca vāc vikalpānām ānantyāt sambhavati api vā kasmiṃścid kāvya lakṣaṇa vidhāyibhiḥ

original: prasiddhair apradarśite prakāra-leśe dhvanir dhvanir iti yad etad alīka-sahṛdayatva-bhāvanā-mukulita-locanair nṛtyate,
analyzed: prasiddhaiḥ a pradarśite prakāra leśe dhvaniḥ dhvaniḥ iti yat etat alīka sahṛdaya tva bhāvanā mukulita locanaiḥ nṛtyate

original: tatra hetuṃ na vidmaḥ /
analyzed: tatra hetum na vidmaḥ

original: sahasraśo hi mahātmabhir anyair alaṅkāra-prakārāḥ prakāśitāḥ prakāśyante ca /
analyzed: sahasraśas hi mahātmabhiḥ anyaiḥ alaṅkāra prakārāḥ prakāśitāḥ prakāśyante ca

original: na ca teṣām eṣā daśā śrūyate /
analyzed: na ca teṣām eṣā daśā śrūyate

original: tasmāt pravāda-mātraṃ dhvaniḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt pravāda mātram dhvaniḥ

original: na tv asya kṣoda-kṣamam tattvam kiṃcid api prakāśayituṃ śakyam /
analyzed: na tu asya kṣoda kṣamam tattvam kiṃcid api prakāśayitum śakyam

original: tathā cānyena kṛta evātra ślokaḥ-
analyzed: tathā ca anyena kṛtaḥ eva atra ślokaḥ

original: yasminn asti na vastu kiṃcana manaḥ-prahlādi sālaṃkṛti
analyzed: yasmin asti na vastu kiṃcana manaḥ prahlādi sa alaṃkṛti

original: vyutpannai racitaṃ ca naiva vacanair vakrokti-śūnyaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: vyutpannaiḥ racitam ca nā eva vacanaiḥ vakrokti śūnyam ca yat

original: kāvyaṃ tad-dhvaninā samanvitam iti prītyā praśaṃsañ jaḍo
analyzed: kāvyam tad dhvaninā samanvitam iti prītyā praśaṃsam jaḍo

original: no vidmo 'bhidadhāti kiṃ sumatinā pṛṣṭaḥ svarūpaṃ dhvaneḥ //
analyzed: no vidmaḥ bhidadhāti kim sumatinā pṛṣṭaḥ svarūpam dhvaneḥ

original: bhāktam āhus tam anye /
analyzed: bhāktam āhuḥ tam anye

original: anye taṃ dhvani-saṃjñitam kāvyātmānaṃ guṇa-vṛttir ity āhuḥ /
analyzed: anye tam dhvani saṃjñitam kāvya ātmānam guṇa vṛttiḥ iti āhuḥ

original: yady api ca dhvani-śabda-saṃkīrtanena kāvya-lakṣaṇa-vidhāyibhir guṇa-vṛttir anyo vā na kaścit prakāraḥ prakāśitaḥ,
analyzed: yadi api ca dhvani śabda saṃkīrtanena kāvya lakṣaṇa vidhāyibhiḥ guṇa vṛttiḥ anyaḥ vā na kaścid prakāraḥ prakāśitaḥ

original: tathāpi amukhya-vṛttyā kāvyeṣu vyavahāraṃ darśayatā dhvani-mārgo manāk spṛṣṭo 'pi na lakṣita iti parikalpyaivam uktam-“bhāktam āhus tam anye”  #
analyzed: tathā api amukhya vṛttyā kāvyeṣu vyavahāram darśayatā dhvani mārgaḥ manāk spṛṣṭaḥ api na lakṣitaḥ iti parikalpya evam uktambhāktam āhuḥ tam anye

original: iti /
analyzed: iti

original: kecit punar lakṣaṇa-karaṇa-śālīna-buddhayo dhvanes tattvaṃ girām agocaram sahṛdaya-hṛdaya-saṃvedyam eva samākhyātavantaḥ /
analyzed: kecid punar lakṣaṇa karaṇa śālīna buddhayaḥ dhvaneḥ tattvam girām agocaram sahṛdaya hṛdaya saṃvedyam eva samākhyātavantaḥ

original: tenaivaṃ-vidhāsu vimatiṣu sthitāsu sahṛdaya-manaḥ-prītaye tat-svarūpaṃ brūmaḥ /
analyzed: tena evaṃvidhāsu vimatiṣu sthitāsu sahṛdaya manaḥ prītaye tad svarūpam brūmaḥ

original: tasya hi dhvaneḥ svarūpaṃ sakala-sat-kavi-kāvyopaniṣad-bhūtam atiramaṇīyam aṇīyasībhir api cirantana-kāvya-lakṣaṇa-vidhāyināṃ buddhibhir anunmīlita-pūrvam,
analyzed: tasya hi dhvaneḥ svarūpam sakala sat kavi kāvya upaniṣad bhūtam ati ramaṇīyam aṇīyasībhiḥ api cirantana kāvya lakṣaṇa vidhāyinām buddhibhiḥ an unmīlita pūrvam

original: atha ca rāmāyaṇa-mahābhārata-prabhṛtini lakṣye sarvatra prasiddha-vyavahāraṃ lakṣayatāṃ sahṛdayānām ānando manasi labhatāṃ pratiṣṭhām iti prakāśyate
analyzed: atha ca rāmāyaṇa mahābhārata prabhṛtini lakṣye sarvatra prasiddha vyavahāram lakṣayatām sahṛdayānām ānandaḥ manasi labhatām pratiṣṭhām iti prakāśyate

original: tatra dhvaner eva lakṣayitum ārabdhasya bhūmikāṃ racayitum idam ucyate-
analyzed: tatra dhvaneḥ eva lakṣayitum ārabdhasya bhūmikām racayitum idam ucyate

original: yo 'rthaḥ sahṛdaya-ślāghyaḥ kāvyātmeti vyavasthitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ rthaḥ sahṛdaya ślāghyaḥ kāvya ātmā iti vyavasthitaḥ

original: vācya-pratīyamānākhyau tasya bhedāv ubhau smṛtau // DhvK_1.2 //
analyzed: vācya pratīyamāna ākhyau tasya bhedau ubhau smṛtau

original: kāvyasya hi lalitocita-sanniveśa-cāruṇaḥ śarīrasyevātmā sāra-rūpatayā sthitaḥ sahṛdaya-ślāghyo yo 'rthas tasya vācyaḥ pratīyamānaś ceti dvau  #
analyzed: kāvyasya hi lalita ucita sanniveśa cāruṇaḥ śarīrasya iva ātmā sāra rūpa tayā sthitaḥ sahṛdaya ślāghyaḥ yaḥ rthaḥ tasya vācyaḥ pratīyamānaḥ ca iti dvau  /

original: bhedau /
analyzed: bhedau

original: tatra vācyaḥ prasiddho yaḥ prakārair upamādibhiḥ /
analyzed: tatra vācyaḥ prasiddhaḥ yaḥ prakāraiḥ upamā ādibhiḥ

analyzed: bahudhā vyākṛtaḥ saḥ nyaiḥ kāvya lakṣma vidhāyibhiḥ

original: tato neha pratanyate kevalam anūdyate punar yathopayogam iti // DhvA_1.3 //
analyzed: tatas na iha pratanyate kevalam anūdyate punar yathopayogam iti

original: pratīyamānaṃ punar anyad eva vastv asti vāṇīṣu mahā-kavīnām /
analyzed: pratīyamānam punar anyat eva vastu asti vāṇīṣu mahā kavīnām

analyzed: yat tat prasiddha avayava atiriktam vibhāti lāvaṇyam iva aṅganāsu

analyzed: pratīyamānam punar anyat eva vācyāt vastu asti vāṇīṣu mahā kavīnām

original: yat tat sahṛdaya-suprasiddhaṃ prasiddhebhyo 'laṅkṛtebhyaḥ pratītebhyo vāvayavebhyo vyatiriktatvena prakāśate lāvaṇyam ivāṅganāsu /
analyzed: yat tat sahṛdaya su prasiddham prasiddhebhyaḥ laṅkṛtebhyaḥ pratītebhyaḥ vā avayavebhyaḥ vyatirikta tvena prakāśate lāvaṇyam iva aṅganāsu

original: yathā hy aṅganāsu lāvaṇyaṃ pṛthaṅ-nirvarṇyamānaṃ nikhilāvayava-vyatireki kim apy anyad eva sahṛdaya-locanāmṛtaṃ tattvāntaraṃ tadvad eva so
analyzed: yathā hi aṅganāsu lāvaṇyam pṛthak nirvarṇyamānam nikhila avayava vyatireki kim api anyat eva sahṛdaya locana amṛtam tattva antaram tadvat eva saḥ

original: sa hy artho vācya-sāmarthyākṣiptam vastu-mātram alaṅkāra-rasādayaś cety aneka prabheda-prabhinnau darśayiṣyate /
analyzed: sa hi arthaḥ vācya sāmarthya ākṣiptam vastu mātram alaṅkāra rasa ādayaḥ ca iti darśayiṣyate

analyzed: yatra api asti tat

original: tatrāpi viśiśṭa-vibhāvādi-pratipādana-mukhenaivaiṣāṃ pratītiḥ /
analyzed: tatra api viśiśṭa vibhāva ādi pratipādana mukhena eva eṣām pratītiḥ

original: svaśabdena sā kevalamanūdyate,
analyzed: sva śabdena sā kevalam anūdyate

original: na tu tatkṛtā viṣayāntare tathā tasyā adarśanāt /
analyzed: na tu tad kṛtā viṣaya antare tathā tasyāḥ adarśanāt

original: na hi kevala-śṛṅgārādi-śabda-mātra-bhāji vibhāvādi-pratipādana-rahite kāvye manāg api rasavattva-pratītir asti /
analyzed: na hi kevala śṛṅgāra ādi śabda mātra bhāji vibhāva ādi pratipādana rahite kāvye manāk api rasavat tva pratītiḥ asti

original: yataś ca svābhidhānam antareṇa kevalebhyo 'pi vibhāvādibhyo viśiśṭebhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ /
analyzed: yatas ca sva abhidhānam antareṇa kevalebhyaḥ vibhāva ādibhyaḥ rasa ādīnām pratītiḥ

original: kevalāc ca svābhidhānād apratītiḥ /
analyzed: kevalāt ca sva abhidhānāt apratītiḥ

original: tasmād anvaya-vyatirekābhyām abhidheya-sāmarthyākṣiptatvam eva rasādīnām /
analyzed: tasmāt anvaya vyatirekābhyām abhidheya sāmarthya ākṣipta tvam eva rasa ādīnām

original: na tv abhidheyatvaṃ kathaṃcit,
analyzed: na tu abhidheya tvam kathaṃcid

original: iti tṛtīyo 'pi prabhedo vācyād vibhinna eveti sthitam /
analyzed: iti prabhedaḥ vācyāt vibhinnaḥ evā iti sthitam

original: vācyena tv asya saheva pratītir ity agre darśayiṣyate // DhvA_1.4 //
analyzed: vācyena tu asya saha iva pratītiḥ iti agre darśayiṣyate

original: kāvyasyātmā sa evārthas tathā cādikaveḥ purā /
analyzed: kāvyasya ātmā saḥ evā arthaḥ tathā ca ādi kaveḥ purā

original: krauñca-dvandva-viyogotthaḥ śokaḥ ślokatvam āgataḥ // DhvK_1.5 //
analyzed: krauñca dvandva viyoga utthaḥ śokaḥ śloka tvam āgataḥ

original: vividha-vācya-vācaka-racanā-prapañca-cāruṇaḥ kāvyasya sa evārthaḥ sāra-bhūtaḥ /
analyzed: vividha vācya vācaka racanā prapañca cāruṇaḥ kāvyasya saḥ eva arthaḥ sāra bhūtaḥ

original: cādikaver vālmīkeḥ nihata-sahacarī-viraha-kātara-krauñcākranda-janitaḥ śoka eva ślokatayā pariṇataḥ /
analyzed: ca ādi kaveḥ vālmīkeḥ nihata sahacarī viraha kātara krauñca ākranda janitaḥ śokaḥ eva śloka tayā pariṇataḥ

original: śoko hi karuṇa-sthāyi-bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: śokaḥ hi karuṇa sthāyibhāvaḥ

original: pratīyamānasya cānya-bheda-darśane 'pi rasa-bhāva-mukhenaivopalakṣaṇaṃ prādhānyāt // DhvA_1.5 //
analyzed: pratīyamānasya ca anya bheda darśane rasa bhāva mukhena eva upalakṣaṇam prādhānyāt

original: sarasvatī svādu tad-artha-vastu niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnām /
analyzed: sarasvatī svādu tad artha vastu niḥṣyandamānā mahatām kavīnām

original: aloka-sāmānyam abhivyanakti parisphurantam pratibhā-viśeṣam // DhvK_1.6 //
analyzed: aloka sāmānyam abhivyanakti parisphurantam pratibhā viśeṣam

original: tat vastu-tattvaṃ niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnāṃ bhāratī aloka-sāmānyaṃ pratibhā-viśeṣaṃ parisphurantam abhivyanakti /
analyzed: tat vastu tattvam niḥṣyandamānā mahatām kavīnām bhāratī aloka sāmānyam pratibhā viśeṣam parisphurantam abhivyanakti

original: yenāsminn ativicitra-kavi-paramparā-vāhini saṃsāre kālidāsa-prabhṛtayo dvitrāḥ pañcaṣā vā mahā-kavaya iti gaṇyante // DhvA_1.6 //
analyzed: yena asmin ati vicitra kavi paramparā vāhini saṃsāre kālidāsa prabhṛtayaḥ dvitrāḥ pañcaṣāḥ vā mahā kavayaḥ iti gaṇyante

original: idaṃ cāparaṃ pratīyamānasyārthasya sad-bhāva-sādhanaṃ pramāṇam-
analyzed: idam ca aparam pratīyamānasya arthasya sadbhāva sādhanam pramāṇam

original: śabdārtha-śāsana-jñāna-mātreṇaiva na vedyate /
analyzed: śabda artha śāsana jñāna mātreṇa eva na vedyate

original: vedyate sa tu kāvyārtha-tattvajñair eva kevalam // DhvK_1.7 //
analyzed: vedyate sa tu kāvya artha tattva jñaiḥ eva kevalam

original: so 'rtho yasmāt kevalaṃ kāvyārtha-tattva-jñair eva jñāyate /
analyzed: saḥ ṛthaḥ yasmāt kevalam kāvya artha tattva jñaiḥ eva jñāyate

original: yadi ca vācya-rūpa evāsāv arthaḥ syāt tad-vācya-vācaka-rūpa-parijñānād eva tat-pratītiḥ syāt /
analyzed: yadi ca vācya rūpaḥ eva asau arthaḥ syāt tad vācya vācaka rūpa parijñānāt eva tad pratītiḥ syāt

original: atha ca vācya-vācaka-lakṣaṇa-mātra-kṛta-śramāṇāṃ kāvya-tattvārtha-bhāvanā-vimukhānāṃ
analyzed: atha ca vācya vācaka lakṣaṇa mātra kṛta śramāṇām kāvya tattva artha bhāvanā vimukhānām

original: svara-śruty-ādi-lakṣaṇam ivāpragītānāṃ gāndharva-lakṣaṇa-vidām agocara evāsāv arthaḥ // DhvA_1.7 //
analyzed: svara śruti ādi lakṣaṇam iva apragītānām gāndharva lakṣaṇa vidām agocaraḥ eva asau arthaḥ

original: evaṃ vācya-vyatirekiṇo vyaṅgyasya sad-bhāvaṃ pratipādya prādhānyaṃ tasyaiveti darśayati-
analyzed: evam vācya vyatirekiṇaḥ vyaṅgyasya sadbhāvam pratipādya prādhānyam tasya eva iti darśayati

original: so 'rthas tad-vyakti-sāmarthya-yogī śabdaś ca kaścana /
analyzed: saḥ rthaḥ tad vyakti sāmarthya yogī śabdaḥ ca kaścana

original: yatnataḥ pratyabhijñeyau tau śabdārthau mahākaveḥ // DhvK_1.8 //
analyzed: yatnataḥ pratyabhijñeyau tau śabda arthau mahā kaveḥ

original: vyaṅgyo 'rthas tad-vyakti-sāmarthya-yogī śabdaś ca kaścana,
analyzed: vyaṅgyaḥ rthaḥ tad vyakti sāmarthya yogī śabdaḥ ca kaścana

original: na śabda-mātram /
analyzed: na śabda mātram

original: tāv eva śabdārthau mahākaveḥ pratyabhijñeyau /
analyzed: tau eva śabda arthau mahā kaveḥ pratyabhijñeyau

original: vyaṅgya-vyañjakābhyām eva suprayuktābhyāṃ mahākavitva-lābho mahā-kavīnāṃ,
analyzed: vyaṅgya vyañjakābhyām eva su prayuktābhyām mahā kavi tva lābhaḥ mahā kavīnām

original: na vācya-vācaka-racanā-mātreṇa // DhvA_1.8 //
analyzed: na vācya vācaka racanā mātreṇa

original: idānīṃ vyaṅgya-vyañjakayoḥ prādhānye 'pi yad-vācya-vācakāv eva prathamam upādadate kavayas tad api yuktam evetyāha-
analyzed: idānīm vyaṅgya vyañjakayoḥ prādhānye yat vācya vācakau eva prathamam upādadate kavayaḥ tat api yuktam evā iti āha

original: ālokārthī yathā dīpa-śikhāyāṃ yatnavāñ janaḥ /
analyzed: āloka arthī yathā dīpa śikhāyām yatnavām janaḥ

original: tad-upāyatayā tadvad arthe vācye tad-ādṛtaḥ // DhvK_1.9 //
analyzed: tad upāya tayā tadvat arthe vācye tad ādṛtaḥ

original: yathā hy ālokārthī sann api dīpa-śikhāyāṃ yatnavāñ jano bhavati tad-upāyatayā /
analyzed: yathā hi āloka arthī san api dīpa śikhāyām yatnavān janaḥ bhavati tad upāya tayā

original: na hi dīpa-śikhām antareṇālokaḥ sambhavati /
analyzed: na hi dīpa śikhām antareṇa ālokaḥ sambhavati

original: tad vyaṅgyam arthaṃ pratyādṛto jano vācye 'rthe yatnavān bhavati /
analyzed: tat vyaṅgyam artham pratyādṛtaḥ janaḥ vācye rthe yatnavān bhavati

original: anena pratipādakasya kaver vyaṅgyam arthaṃ prati vyāpāro darśitaḥ // DhvA_1.9 //
analyzed: anena pratipādakasya kaveḥ vyaṅgyam artham prati vyāpāraḥ darśitaḥ

original: pratipādyasyāpi taṃ darśayitum āha-
analyzed: pratipādyasya api tam darśayitum āha

original: yathā padārtha-dvāreṇa vākyārthaḥ sampratīyate /
analyzed: yathā padārtha dvāreṇa vākya arthaḥ sampratīyate

original: vācyārtha-pūrvikā tadvat pratipattasya vastunaḥ // DhvK_1.10 //
analyzed: vācya artha pūrvikā tadvat pratipad tasya vastunaḥ

original: yathā hi padārtha-dvāreṇa vākyārthāvagamas tathā vācyārtha-pratīti-pūrvikā vyaṅgyasyārthasya pratipattiḥ // DhvA_1.10 //
analyzed: yathā hi padārtha dvāreṇa vākya artha avagamaḥ tathā vācya artha pratīti pūrvikā vyaṅgyasya arthasya pratipattiḥ

original: idānīṃ vācyārtha-pratīti-pūrvakatve 'pi tat-pratīter vyaṅgyasyārthasya prādhānyaṃ yathā na vyālupyate tathā darśayati-
analyzed: idānīm vācyārtha pratīti pūrvaka tve tad pratīteḥ vyaṅgyasya arthasya prādhānyam yathā na vyālupyate tathā darśayati

original: sva-sāmarthya-vaśenaiva vākyārthaṃ pratipādayan /
analyzed: sva sāmarthya vaśena eva vākya artham pratipādayan

original: yathā vyāpāra-niṣpattau padārtho na vibhāvyate // DhvK_1.11 //
analyzed: yathā vyāpāra niṣpattau padārthaḥ na vibhāvyate

original: yathā sva-sāmarthya-vaśenaiva vākyārthaṃ prakāśayann api padārtho vyāpāra-niṣpattau na bhāvyate vibhaktatayā // DhvA_1.11 //
analyzed: yathā sva sāmarthya vaśena eva vākya artham prakāśayan api padārthaḥ vyāpāra niṣpattau na bhāvyate vibhakta tayā

original: tadvat sa-cetasāṃ so 'rtho vācyārtha-vimukhātmanām /
analyzed: tadvat sa cetasām saḥ rthaḥ vācya artha vimukha ātmanām

original: buddhau tattvārtha-darśinyāṃ jhaṭity evāvabhāsate // DhvK_1.12 //
analyzed: buddhau tattva artha darśinyām jhaṭiti evā avabhāsate

original: evaṃ vācya-vyatirekiṇo vyaṅgyasyārthasya sad-bhāvaṃ pratipādya prakṛta upayojayann āha-
analyzed: evam vācya vyatirekiṇaḥ vyaṅgyasya arthasya sadbhāvam pratipādya prakṛte upayojayan āha

original: yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā tam artham upasarjanīkṛta-svārthau /
analyzed: yatra arthaḥ śabdaḥ vā tam artham upasarjanīkṛta sva arthau

original: vyaṅktaḥ kāvya-viśeṣaḥ sa dhvanir iti sūribhiḥ kathitaḥ // DhvK_1.13 //
analyzed: vyaṅktaḥ kāvya viśeṣaḥ sa dhvaniḥ iti sūribhiḥ kathitaḥ

original: yatrārtho vācya-viśeṣaḥ vācaka-viśeṣaḥ śabdo vā tam arthaṃ vyaṅktaḥ,
analyzed: yatra arthaḥ vācya viśeṣaḥ vācaka viśeṣaḥ śabdaḥ vā tam artham vyaṅktaḥ

original: sa kāvya-viśeṣo dhvanir iti /
analyzed: sa kāvya viśeṣaḥ dhvaniḥ iti

original: anena vācya-vācaka-cārutva-hetubhya upamādibhyo 'nuprāsādibhyaś ca vibhakta eva dhvaner viṣaya iti darśitam /
analyzed: anena vācya vācaka cāru tva hetubhyaḥ upamā ādibhyaḥ nuprāsa ādibhyaḥ ca vibhaktaḥ eva dhvaneḥ viṣayaḥ iti darśitam

original: yad apy uktam-“prasiddha-prasthānātikramiṇo mārgasya kāvya-hāner dhvanir nāsti” iti,
analyzed: yat api uktam prasiddha prasthāna atikramiṇaḥ mārgasya kāvya hāneḥ dhvaniḥ nā asti iti

original: tad apy ayuktam /
analyzed: tat api ayuktam

original: yato lakṣaṇa-kṛtām eva sa kevalaṃ na prasiddhaḥ,
analyzed: yatas lakṣaṇa kṛtām eva sa kevalam na prasiddhaḥ

original: lakṣye tu parīkṣyamāṇe sa eva sahṛdaya-hṛdayāhlāda-kāri kāvya-tattvam /
analyzed: lakṣye tu parīkṣyamāṇe saḥ eva sahṛdaya hṛdaya āhlāda kāri kāvya tattvam

original: tato 'nyac citram evety agre darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: tatas citram eva iti agre darśayiṣyāmaḥ

original: yad apy uktam-“kāmanīyakam anativartamānasya tasyoktālaṅkārādi-prakāreṣv antar-bhāvaḥ” iti,
analyzed: yat api uktam kāmanīyakam an ativartamānasya tasya ukta alaṅkāra ādi prakāreṣu antarbhāvaḥ iti

original: tad apy asamīcīnam;
analyzed: tat api asamīcīnam

original: vācya-vācaka-mātrāśrayiṇi prasthāne vyaṅgya-vyañjaka-samāśrayeṇa vyavasthitasya dhvaneḥ katham antar-bhāvaḥ,
analyzed: vācya vācaka mātra āśrayiṇi prasthāne vyaṅgya vyañjaka samāśrayeṇa vyavasthitasya dhvaneḥ katham antarbhāvaḥ

original: vācya-vācaka-cārutva-hetavo hi tasyāṅga-bhūtāḥ,
analyzed: vācya vācaka cāru tva hetavaḥ hi tasya aṅga bhūtāḥ

original: sa tv aṅgi-rūpa eveti pratipādayiṣyamāṇatvāt /
analyzed: sa tu aṅgirūpaḥ eva iti pratipādayiṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: parikara-ślokāś cātra-
analyzed: parikara ślokāḥ ca atra

original: vyaṅgya-vyañjaka-sambandha-nibandhanatayā dhvaneḥ /
analyzed: vyaṅgya vyañjaka sambandha nibandhana tayā dhvaneḥ

original: vācya-vācaka-cārutva-hetv-antaḥ-pātitā kutaḥ //
analyzed: vācya vācaka cāru tva hetu antaḥpāti tā kutas

original: nanu yatra pratīyamānasyārthasya vaiśadyenāpratītiḥ sa nāma mā bhūd dhvaner viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: nanu yatra pratīyamānasya arthasya vaiśadyena apratītiḥ sa nāma mā bhūt dhvaneḥ viṣayaḥ

original: yatra tu pratītir asti,
analyzed: yatra tu pratītiḥ asti

original: yathā-samāsoktyākṣepānukta-nimitta-viśeṣokti-paryāyoktāpahnuti-dīpaka-saṅkarālaṅkārādau ,
analyzed: yathā samāsokti ākṣepa anukta nimitta viśeṣa ukti paryāyokta apahnuti dīpaka saṅkara alaṅkāra ādau

original: tatra dhvaner antar-bhāvo bhaviṣyatīty ādi nirākartum abhihitam-“upasarjanī-kṛta-svārthau” iti /
analyzed: tatra dhvaneḥ antarbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ādi nirākartum abhihitam upasarjanīkṛta svārthau iti

original: artho guṇīkṛtātmā,
analyzed: arthaḥ guṇīkṛta ātmā

original: guṇīkṛtābhidheyaḥ śabdo vā yatrārthāntaram abhivyanakti sa dhvanir iti /
analyzed: guṇīkṛta abhidheyaḥ śabdaḥ vā yatra artha antaram abhivyanakti sa dhvaniḥ iti

original: teṣu kathaṃ tasyāntar-bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: teṣu katham tasya antarbhāvaḥ

original: vyaṅgya-prādhānye hi dhvaniḥ /
analyzed: vyaṅgya prādhānye hi dhvaniḥ

original: na caitat samāsoktyādiṣv asti /
analyzed: na ca etat samāsokti ādiṣu asti

original: samāsoktau tāvat-
analyzed: samāsoktau tāvat

original: upoḍha-rāgeṇa vilola-tārakaṃ
analyzed: upoḍha rāgeṇa vilola tārakam

original: tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā niśā-mukham /
analyzed: tathā gṛhītam śaśinā niśā mukham

original: yathā samastaṃ timirāṃśukaṃ tayā
analyzed: yathā samastam timira aṃśukam tayā

original: puro 'pi rāgād galitaṃ na lakṣitam //
analyzed: puras pi rāgāt galitam na lakṣitam

original: ity ādau vyaṅgyenānugataṃ vācyam eva prādhānyena pratīyate samāropita-nāyikā-nāyaka-vyavahārayor niśā-śaśinor eva vākyārthatvāt /
analyzed: iti ādau vyaṅgyena anugatam vācyam eva prādhānyena pratīyate samāropita nāyikā nāyaka vyavahārayoḥ niśā śaśinoḥ eva vākya artha tvāt

original: ākṣepe 'pi vyaṅgya-viśeṣākṣepiṇo 'pi vācyasyaiva cārutvaṃ prādhānyena vākyārtha ākṣepokti-sāmarthyād eva jñāyate /
analyzed: ākṣepe pi vyaṅgya viśeṣa ākṣepiṇaḥ vācyasya eva cāru tvam prādhānyena vākya arthe ākṣepa ukti sāmarthyāt eva jñāyate

original: tathā hi-tatra śabdopārūḍho viśeṣābhidhānecchayā pratiṣedha-rūpo ya ākṣepaḥ sa eva vyaṅgya-viśeṣam ākṣipan mukhyaṃ kāvya-śarīram /
analyzed: tathā hi tatra śabda upārūḍhaḥ viśeṣa abhidhāna icchayā pratiṣedha rūpaḥ yaḥ ākṣepaḥ saḥ eva vyaṅgya viśeṣam ākṣipan mukhyam kāvya śarīram

original: cārutvotkarṣa-nibandhanā hi vācya-vyaṅgyayoḥ prādhānya-vivakṣā / yathā-
analyzed: cāru tva utkarṣa nibandhanā hi vācya vyaṅgyayoḥ prādhānya vivakṣā yathā

original: anurāgavatī sandhyā divasas tat-puraḥsaraḥ /
aho daiva-gatiḥ kīdṛk tathāpi na samāgamaḥ //
analyzed: aho daiva gatiḥ kīdṛṅ tathā api na samāgamaḥ

original: atra satyām api vyaṅgya-pratītau vācyasyaiva cārutvam utkarṣavad iti tasyaiva prādhānya-vivakṣā /
analyzed: atra satyām api vyaṅgya pratītau vācyasya eva cāru tvam utkarṣa vat iti tasya eva prādhānya vivakṣā

original: yathā ca dīpakāpahnuty-ādau vyaṅgyatvenopamāyāḥ pratītāv api prādhānyenāvivakṣitatvān na tayā vyapadeśas tadvad atrāpi draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: yathā ca dīpaka apahnuti ādau vyaṅgya tvena upamāyāḥ pratītau api prādhānyena avivakṣita tvāt na tayā vyapadeśaḥ tadvat atra api draṣṭavyam

original: anukta-nimittāyām api viśeṣoktau-
analyzed: an ukta nimittāyām api viśeṣa uktau

original: āhūto 'pi sahāyair om ity uktvā vimukta-nidro 'pi /
analyzed: āhūtaḥ pi sahāyaiḥ om iti uktvā vimukta nidraḥ pi

original: gantu-manā api pathikaḥ saṅkocaṃ naiva śithilayati //
analyzed: gantu manāḥ api pathikaḥ saṅkocam nā eva śithilayati

original: ity ādau vyaṅgyasya prakaraṇa-sāmarthyāt pratīti-mātraṃ na tu tat-pratīti-nimittā kācic cārutva-niṣpattir iti na prādhānyam /
analyzed: iti ādau vyaṅgyasya prakaraṇa sāmarthyāt pratīti mātram na tu tad pratīti nimittā kācid cāru tva niṣpattiḥ iti na prādhānyam

original: paryāyokte 'pi yadi prādhānyena vyaṅgyatvaṃ tad bhavatu nāma tasya dhvanāv antar-bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: paryāyokte yadi prādhānyena vyaṅgya tvam tat bhavatu nāma tasya dhvanau antarbhāvaḥ

original: na tu dhvanes tatrāntar-bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na tu dhvaneḥ tatra antarbhāvaḥ

original: tasya mahā-viṣayatvenāṅgitvena ca pratipādayiṣyamāṇatvāt /
analyzed: tasya mahā viṣaya tvena aṅgi tvena ca pratipādayiṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: na punaḥ paryāyo bhāmahodāhṛta-sadṛśe vyaṅgyasyaiva prādhānyam /
analyzed: na punar paryāyaḥ bhāmaha udāhṛta sadṛśe vyaṅgyasya eva prādhānyam

original: vācyasya tatropasarjanābhāvenāvivakṣitatvāt /
analyzed: vācyasya tatra upasarjana abhāvena avivakṣita tvāt

original: apahnuti-dīpakayoḥ punar-vācyasya prādhānyaṃ vyaṅgyasya cānuyāyitvaṃ prasiddham eva /
analyzed: apahnuti dīpakayoḥ punar vācyasya prādhānyam vyaṅgyasya ca anuyāyi tvam prasiddham eva

original: saṅkarālaṅkāre 'pi yadālaṅkāro 'laṅkārāntara-cchāyām anugṛhṇāti,
analyzed: saṅkara alaṅkāre pi yadā alaṅkāraḥ laṅkāra antara chāyām anugṛhṇāti

original: tadā vyaṅgyasya prādhānyenāvivakṣitatvān na dhvani-viṣayatvam /
analyzed: tadā vyaṅgyasya prādhānyena avivakṣita tvāt na dhvani viṣayatvam

original: alaṅkāra-dvaya-sambhāvanāyāṃ tu vācya-vyaṅgyayoḥ samaṃ prādhānyam /
analyzed: alaṅkāra dvaya sambhāvanāyām tu vācya vyaṅgyayoḥ samam prādhānyam

original: atha vācyopasarjanī-bhāvena vyaṅgyasya tatrāvasthānaṃ tadā so 'pi dhvani-viṣayo 'stu,
analyzed: atha vācya upasarjanī bhāvena vyaṅgyasya tatra avasthānam tadā saḥ pi dhvani viṣayaḥ stu

original: na tu sa eva dhvanir iti vaktuṃ śakyam /
analyzed: na tu saḥ eva dhvaniḥ iti vaktum śakyam

original: paryāyokta-nirdiṣṭa-nyāyāt /
analyzed: paryāya ukta nirdiṣṭa nyāyāt

original: api ca saṅkarālaṅkāre 'pi ca kvacit saṅkaroktir eva dhvani-sambhāvanāṃ nirākaroti /
analyzed: api ca saṅkara alaṅkāre ca kvacid saṅkara uktiḥ eva dhvani sambhāvanām nirākaroti

original: aprastuta-praśaṃsāyām api yadā sāmānya-viśeṣa-bhāvān nimitta-nimitti-bhāvād vā abhidhīyamānasyāprastutasya
analyzed: aprastuta praśaṃsāyām api yadā sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvāt nimitta nimitti bhāvāt vā abhidhīyamānasya aprastutasya

original: pratīyamānena prastutenābhisambandhas tadābhidhīyamāna-pratīyamānayoḥ samam eva prādhānyam /
analyzed: pratīyamānena prastutena abhisambandhaḥ tadā abhidhīyamāna pratīyamānayoḥ samam eva prādhānyam

original: yadā tāvat sāmānyasyāprastutasyābhidhīyamānasya prākaraṇikena viśeṣeṇa pratīyamānena
analyzed: yadā tāvat sāmānyasya aprastutasya abhidhīyamānasya prākaraṇikena viśeṣeṇa pratīyamānena

original: sambandhas tadā viśeṣa-pratītau satyām api prādhānyena tat-sāmānyenāvinābhāvāt sāmānyasyāpi prādhānyam /
analyzed: sambandhaḥ tadā viśeṣa pratītau satyām api prādhānyena tad sāmānyena avinābhāvāt sāmānyasya api prādhānyam

original: yadāpi viśeṣasya sāmānya-niṣṭhatvaṃ tadāpi sāmānyasya prādhānye sāmānye sarva-viśeṣāṇām antar-bhāvād viśeṣasyāpi prādhānyam /
analyzed: yadā api viśeṣasya sāmānya niṣṭha tvam tadā api sāmānyasya prādhānye sāmānye sarva viśeṣāṇām antarbhāvāt viśeṣasya api prādhānyam

original: nimitta-nimitti-bhāve cāyam eva nyāyaḥ /
analyzed: nimitta nimitti bhāve ca ayam eva nyāyaḥ

original: yadā tu sārūpya-mātra-vaśenāprastuta-praśaṃsāyām aprakṛta-prakṛtayoḥ sambandhas tadāpy aprastutasya sarūpasyābhidhīyamānasya prādhānyenāvivakṣāyāṃ  #
analyzed: yadā tu sārūpya mātra vaśena aprastuta praśaṃsāyām aprakṛta prakṛtayoḥ sambandhaḥ tadā api aprastutasya sarūpasya abhidhīyamānasya prādhānyena avivakṣāyām

original: dhvanāv evāntaḥ-pātaḥ /
analyzed: dhvanau eva antaḥpātaḥ

original: itarathā tv alaṅkārāntaram eva /
analyzed: itarathā tu alaṅkāra antaram eva

original: tad ayam atra saṅkṣepaḥ-
analyzed: tat ayam atra saṅkṣepaḥ

original: vyaṅgyasya yatrāprādhānyaṃ vācya-mātrānuyāyinaḥ /
analyzed: vyaṅgyasya yatra aprādhānyam vācya mātra anuyāyinaḥ

original: samāsoktyādayas tatra vācyālaṅkṛtayaḥ sphuṭāḥ //
analyzed: samāsokti ādayaḥ tatra vācya alaṅkṛtayaḥ sphuṭāḥ

original: vyaṅgyasya pratibhā-mātre vācyārthānugame 'pi vā /
analyzed: vyaṅgyasya pratibhā mātre vācyārtha anugame vā

original: na dhvanir yatra vā tasya prādhānyaṃ na pratīyate //
analyzed: na dhvaniḥ yatra vā tasya prādhānyam na pratīyate

original: tat-parāv eva śabdārthau yatra vyaṅgyaṃ prati sthitau /
analyzed: tad parau eva śabda arthau yatra vyaṅgyam prati sthitau

original: dhvaneḥ sa eva viṣayo mantavyaḥ saṅkarojjhitaḥ //
analyzed: dhvaneḥ saḥ eva viṣayaḥ mantavyaḥ saṅkara ujjhitaḥ

original: tasmān na dhvaner anyatrāntar-bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt na dhvaneḥ anyatra antarbhāvaḥ

original: itaś ca nāntar-bhāvaḥ ;
analyzed: itas ca na antarbhāvaḥ

original: yataḥ kāvya-viśeṣo 'ṅgī dhvanir iti kathitaḥ /
analyzed: yatas kāvya viśeṣaḥ ṅgī dhvaniḥ iti kathitaḥ

original: tasya punar aṅgāni-alaṅkārā guṇā vṛttayaś ceti pratipādayiṣyante /
analyzed: tasya punar aṅgāni alaṅkārāḥ guṇāḥ vṛttayaḥ ca iti pratipādayiṣyante

original: na cāvayava eva pṛthag-bhūto 'vayavīti prasiddhaḥ /
analyzed: na ca avayavaḥ eva pṛthak bhūtaḥ vayavī iti prasiddhaḥ

original: apṛthag-bhāve tu tad-aṅgatvaṃ tasya /
analyzed: apṛthagbhāve tu tad aṅga tvam tasya

original: na tu tattvam eva /
analyzed: na tu tattvam eva

original: yatrāpi vā tattvaṃ tatrāpi dhvaner mahā-viṣayatvān na tan-niṣṭhatvam eva /
analyzed: yatra api vā tattvam tatra api dhvaneḥ mahā viṣaya tvāt na tad niṣṭha tvam eva

original: “sūribhiḥ kathita” iti vidvad-upajñeya-muktiḥ,
analyzed: sūribhiḥ kathitaḥ iti vidvat upajñeya muktiḥ

original: na tu yathā-kathañcit-pravṛtteti pratipādyate /
analyzed: na tu yathā kathañcid pravṛttā iti pratipādyate

original: prathame hi vidvāṃso vaiyākaraṇāḥ,
analyzed: prathame hi vidvāṃsaḥ vaiyākaraṇāḥ

original: vyākaraṇa-mūlatvāt sarva-vidyānām /
analyzed: vyākaraṇa mūla tvāt sarva vidyānām

original: te ca śrūyamāṇeṣu varṇeṣu dhvanir iti vyavaharanti /
analyzed: te ca śrūyamāṇeṣu varṇeṣu dhvaniḥ iti vyavaharanti

original: tathaivānyais tan-matānusāribhiḥ sūribhiḥ kāvya-tattvārtha-darśibhir vācya-vācaka-sammiśraḥ śabdātmā kāvyam iti vyapadeśyo vyañjakatva-sāmyād  #
analyzed: tathā eva anyaiḥ tad mata anusāribhiḥ sūribhiḥ kāvya tattva artha darśibhiḥ vācya vācaka sammiśraḥ śabda ātmā kāvyam iti vyapadeśyaḥ vyañjaka tva sāmyāt

original: dhvanir ity uktaḥ /
analyzed: dhvaniḥ iti uktaḥ

original: na caivaṃ-vidhasya dhvaner vakṣyamāṇa-prabheda-tad-bheda-saṃkalanayā mahā-viṣayasya
analyzed: na ca evaṃvidhasya dhvaneḥ vakṣyamāṇa prabheda tad bheda saṃkalanayā mahā viṣayasya

original: yat-prakāśanaṃ tad-aprasiddhālaṅkāra-viśeṣa-mātra-pratipādanena tulyam iti tad-bhāvita-cetasāṃ
analyzed: yat prakāśanam tad aprasiddha alaṅkāra viśeṣa mātra pratipādanena tulyam iti tad bhāvita cetasām

original: yukta eva saṃrambhaḥ /
analyzed: yuktaḥ eva saṃrambhaḥ

original: na ca teṣu kathañcid īrṣyayā kaluṣita-śemuṣī-katvam āviṣkaraṇīyam /
analyzed: na ca teṣu kathañcid īrṣyayā kaluṣita śemuṣīka tvam āviṣkaraṇīyam

original: tad evaṃ dhvanes tāvad abhāva-vādinaḥ pratyuktāḥ /
analyzed: tat evam dhvaneḥ tāvat abhāva vādinaḥ pratyuktāḥ

original: asti dhvaniḥ /
analyzed: asti dhvaniḥ

original: sa cāsāv avivakṣita-vācyo vivakṣitāny apara-vācyaś ceti dvividhaḥ sāmānyena /
analyzed: sa ca asau avivakṣita vācyaḥ vivakṣitāni apara vācyaḥ ca iti dvividhaḥ sāmānyena

original: tatrādyasyodāharaṇam-
analyzed: tatra ādyasya udāharaṇam

original: suvarṇa-puṣpāṃ pṛthivīṃ cinvanti puruṣās trayaḥ /
analyzed: suvarṇa puṣpām pṛthivīm cinvanti puruṣāḥ trayaḥ

original: śūraś ca kṛta-vidyaś ca yaś ca jānāti sevitum //
analyzed: śūraḥ ca kṛta vidyaḥ ca yaḥ ca jānāti sevitum

original: dvitīyasyāpi-
analyzed: dvitīyasya api

original: śikhariṇi kva nu nāma kiyac ciraṃ
analyzed: śikhariṇi kva nu nāma kiyat ciram

original: kim abhidhānam asāv akarot tapaḥ /
analyzed: kim abhidhānam asau akarot tapaḥ

original: taruṇi yena tavādhara-pāṭalaṃ
analyzed: taruṇi yena tava adhara pāṭalam

original: daśati bimba-phalaṃ śukaśāvakaḥ // DhvA_1.13 //
analyzed: daśati bimba phalam śuka śāvakaḥ

original: yad apy uktaṃ bhaktir dhvanir iti,
analyzed: yat api uktam bhaktiḥ dhvaniḥ iti

original: tat pratisamādhīyate-
analyzed: tat pratisamādhīyate

original: bhaktyā bibharti naikatvam rūpa-bhedād ayaṃ dhvaniḥ // DhvK_1.14a //
analyzed: bhaktyā bibharti na eka tvam rūpa bhedāt ayam dhvaniḥ

original: ayam ukta-prakāro dhvanir bhaktyā naikatvaṃ bibharti bhinna-rūpatvāt /
analyzed: ayam ukta prakāraḥ dhvaniḥ bhaktyā nā ekatvam bibharti bhinna rūpa tvāt

original: vācya-vyatiriktasyārthasya vācya-vācakābhyāṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśanaṃ yatra vyaṅgya-prādhānye sa dhvaniḥ /
analyzed: vācya vyatiriktasya arthasya vācya vācakābhyām tātparyeṇa prakāśanam yatra vyaṅgya prādhānye sa dhvaniḥ

original: upacāra-mātraṃ tu bhaktiḥ /
analyzed: upacāra mātram tu bhaktiḥ

original: mā caitat syād bhaktir lakṣaṇaṃ dhvaner ity āha-
analyzed: mā ca etat syāt bhaktiḥ lakṣaṇam dhvaneḥ iti āha

original: ativyāpter athāvyāpter na cāsau lakṣyate tayā // DhvK_1.14b //
analyzed: ativyāpteḥ atha avyāpteḥ na ca asau lakṣyate tayā

original: naiva bhaktyā dhvanir lakṣyate /
analyzed: na eva bhaktyā dhvaniḥ lakṣyate

original: katham ? ativyāpter avyāpteś ca /
analyzed: katham ativyāpteḥ avyāpteḥ ca

original: tatrātivyāptir dhvani-vyatirikte 'pi viṣaye bhakteḥ sambhavāt /
analyzed: tatra ativyāptiḥ dhvani vyatirikte viṣaye bhakteḥ sambhavāt

original: yatra hi, vyaṅgya-kṛtaṃ mahat-sauṣṭhavaṃ nāsti tatrāpy upacarita-śabda-vṛttyā prasiddhy-anurodha-pravartita-vyavahārāḥ kavayo dṛśyante /
analyzed: yatra hi vyaṅgya kṛtam mahat sauṣṭhavam nā asti tatra api upacarita śabda vṛttyā prasiddhi anurodha pravartita vyavahārāḥ kavayaḥ dṛśyante

original: yathā [ratnāvalī 2.12]-
analyzed: yathā ratnāvalī

original: parimlānaṃ pīna-stana-jaghana-saṅgād ubhayatas
analyzed: parimlānam pīna stana jaghana saṅgāt ubhayatas

original: tanor madhyasyāntaḥ parimalanam aprāpya haritam /
analyzed: tanoḥ madhyasya antar parimalanam a prāpya haritam

original: idaṃ vyasta-nyāsaṃ ślatha-bhuja-latākṣepa-valanaiḥ
analyzed: idam vyasta nyāsam ślatha bhuja latā kṣepa valanaiḥ

original: kṛśāṅgyāḥ santāpaṃ vadati visinī-patra-śayanam //[*8]
analyzed: kṛśa aṅgyāḥ santāpam vadati visinī patra śayanam

original: [*8] Srk 709, Rasārṇava 1.441.
analyzed: rasārṇava

original: tathā-
analyzed: tathā

original: cumbajja{i} saahuttaṃ avarundhijja{i} sahassa-huttaṃ bi /
analyzed: cumbajjai saahuttam avarundhijjai sahassa huttam bi

analyzed: ramia puṇar bi ramijjai pie jaṇe ṇatthi puṇaruttam

original: [cumbyate śata-kṛtvo 'varudhyate sahasra-kṛtvaḥ /
analyzed: cumbyate śata kṛtvas varudhyate sahasra kṛtvas

original: viramya punā ramyate priyo jano nāsti punaruktam //]
analyzed: viramya punar ramyate priyaḥ janaḥ na asti punaruktam

original: tathā-
analyzed: tathā

original: kubiāo pasaṇnāo oraṇṇa-muhīo vihasamāṇāo /
analyzed: kubiāo pasaṇnāo oraṇṇa muhīo vihasamāṇāo

original: jaha gahiā taha hiaaṃ haranti ucchinta-mahilāo //
analyzed: jaha taha hiaam haranti

original: [kupitāḥ prasannā avarudita-vadanā vihasantyaḥ /
analyzed: kupitāḥ prasannāḥ avarudita vadanāḥ vihasantyaḥ

original: yathā gṛhītās tathā hṛdayaṃ haranti svairiṇyo mahilāḥ //]
analyzed: yathā gṛhītāḥ tathā hṛdayam haranti svairiṇyaḥ mahilāḥ

original: tathā-
analyzed: tathā

original: ajjāe pahāro ṇavala-dāe diṇṇo pieṇa thaṇa-baṭṭe /
analyzed: ajjāe pahāraḥ ṇavaladāe diṇṇaḥ pieṇa thaṇabaṭṭe

original: mi{u}o bi dūsaho bbia jāo hiae savattīṇaṃ //
analyzed: miuaḥ bi dūsahaḥ bbia jāo hiae savattīṇam

original: [bhāryāyāḥ prahāro nava-latayā dattaḥ priyeṇa stana-pṛṣṭhe /
analyzed: bhāryāyāḥ prahāraḥ nava latayā dattaḥ priyeṇa stana pṛṣṭhe

original: mṛduko 'pi duḥsaha iva jāto hṛdaye sapatnīnām //]
analyzed: mṛdukaḥ pi duḥsahaḥ iva jātaḥ hṛdaye sapatnīnām

original: tathā-
analyzed: tathā

original: parārthe yaḥ pīḍām anubhavati bhaṅge 'pi madhuro
analyzed: para arthe yaḥ pīḍām anubhavati bhaṅge pi madhuraḥ

original: yadīyaḥ sarveṣām iha khalu vikāro 'py abhimataḥ /
analyzed: yadīyaḥ sarveṣām iha khalu vikāraḥ u pi abhimataḥ

original: na samprāpto vṛddhiṃ yadi sa bhṛśam akṣetra-patitaḥ
analyzed: na samprāptaḥ vṛddhim yadi sa bhṛśam a kṣetra patitaḥ

original: kim ikṣor doṣo 'sau na punar aguṇāyā maru-bhuvaḥ //
analyzed: kim ikṣoḥ doṣaḥ sau na punar aguṇāyāḥ maru bhuvaḥ

original: ity atrekṣu-pakṣe 'nubhavati śabdaḥ /
analyzed: iti atra īkṣu pakṣe nu bhavati śabdaḥ

original: na caivaṃ-vidhaḥ kadācid api dhvaner viṣayaḥ / yataḥ-
analyzed: na ca evaṃvidhaḥ kadācid api dhvaneḥ viṣayaḥ yatas

original: ukty-antareṇāśakyaṃ yat tac cārutvaṃ prakāśayan /
analyzed: ukti antareṇa aśakyam yat tat cāru tvam prakāśayan

original: śabdo vyañjakatāṃ bibhrad dhvany-ukter viṣayībhavet // DhvK_1.15 //
analyzed: śabdaḥ vyañjaka tām bibhrat dhvani ukteḥ viṣayībhavet

original: atra codāhṛte viṣaye nokty-antarā-śakya-cārutva-vyakti-hetuḥ śabdaḥ /
analyzed: atra ca udāhṛte viṣaye na ukti antara aśakya cāru tva vyakti hetuḥ śabdaḥ

original: kiṃ ca-
analyzed: kim ca

original: rūḍhā ye viṣaye 'nyatra śabdāḥ sva-viṣayād api /
analyzed: rūḍhāḥ ye viṣaye nyatra śabdāḥ sva viṣayāt api

original: lāvaṇyādyāḥ prayuktās te na bhavanti padaṃ dhvaneḥ // DhvK_1.16 //
analyzed: lāvaṇya ādyāḥ prayuktāḥ te na bhavanti padam dhvaneḥ

original: teṣu copacarita-śabda-vṛttir astīti /
analyzed: teṣu ca upacarita śabda vṛttiḥ asti iti

original: tathā-vidhe ca viṣaye kvacit sambhavann api dhvani-vyavahāraḥ prakārāntareṇa pravartate /
analyzed: tathāvidhe ca viṣaye kvacid sambhavan api dhvani vyavahāraḥ prakāra antareṇa pravartate

original: na tathā-vidha-śabda-mukhena /
analyzed: na tathāvidha śabda mukhena

original: api ca-
analyzed: api ca

original: mukhyāṃ vṛttiṃ parityajya guṇa-vṛttyārtha-darśanam /
analyzed: mukhyām vṛttim parityajya guṇa vṛttyā artha darśanam

original: yad uddiśya phalaṃ tatra śabdo naiva skhalad-gatiḥ // DhvK_1.17 //
analyzed: yat uddiśya phalam tatra śabdaḥ nā eva skhalat gatiḥ

original: tatra hi cārutvātiśaya-viśiṣṭārtha-prakāśana-lakṣaṇe prayojane kartavye yadi śabdasyāmukhyatā tadā tasya prayoge duṣṭataiva syāt /
analyzed: tatra hi cāru tva atiśaya viśiṣṭa artha prakāśana lakṣaṇe prayojane kartavye yadi śabdasya amukhya tā tadā tasya prayoge duṣṭa tā eva syāt

original: na caivam ; tasmāt-
analyzed: na ca evam tasmāt

original: vācakatvāśrayeṇaiva guṇa-vṛttir vyavasthitā /
analyzed: vācaka tva āśrayeṇa eva guṇa vṛttiḥ vyavasthitā

original: vyañjakatvaika-mūlasya dhvaneḥ syāl lakṣaṇaṃ katham // DhvK_1.18 //
analyzed: vyañjaka tva eka mūlasya dhvaneḥ syāt lakṣaṇam katham

original: tasmād anyo dhvanir anyā ca guṇa-vṛttiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt anyaḥ dhvaniḥ anyā ca guṇa vṛttiḥ

original: avyāptir apy asya lakṣaṇasya /
analyzed: avyāptiḥ api asya lakṣaṇasya

original: na hi dhvani-prabhedo vivakṣitānya-para-vācya-lakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: na hi dhvani prabhedaḥ vivakṣita anya para vācya lakṣaṇaḥ

original: anye ca bahavaḥ prakārā bhaktyā vyāpyantaḥ ;
analyzed: anye ca bahavaḥ prakārāḥ bhaktyā vyāpyantaḥ

original: tasmād bhaktir alakṣaṇam // DhvA_1.18 //
analyzed: tasmāt bhaktiḥ alakṣaṇam

original: kasyacid dhvani-bhedasya sā tu syād upalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: kasyacid dhvani bhedasya sā tu syāt upalakṣaṇam

original: sā punar bhaktir vakṣyamāṇa-prabheda-madhyād anyatamasya bhedasya yadi nāmopalakṣaṇatayā sambhāvyeta ;
analyzed: sā punar bhaktiḥ vakṣyamāṇa prabheda madhyāt anyatamasya bhedasya yadi nāma upalakṣaṇa tayā sambhāvyeta

original: yadi ca guṇa-vṛttyaiva dhvanir lakṣyata ity ucyate tad-abhidhā-vyāpāreṇa tad-itaro
analyzed: yadi ca guṇa vṛttyā eva dhvaniḥ lakṣyate iti ucyate tad abhidhā vyāpāreṇa

original: 'laṅkāra-vargaḥ samagra eva lakṣyata iti pratyekam alaṅkārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇa-karaṇa-vaiyarthya-prasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: laṅkāra vargaḥ samagraḥ eva lakṣyate iti pratyekam alaṅkārāṇām lakṣaṇa karaṇa vaiyarthya prasaṅgaḥ

original: kiṃ ca-
analyzed: kim ca

original: lakṣaṇe 'nyaiḥ kṛte cāsya pakṣa-saṃsiddhir eva naḥ // DhvK_1.19a //
analyzed: lakṣaṇe nyaiḥ kṛte ca asya pakṣa saṃsiddhiḥ eva naḥ

original: kṛte 'pi vā pūrvam evānyair dhvani-lakṣaṇe pakṣa-saṃsiddhir eva naḥ ;
analyzed: kṛte vā pūrvam eva anyaiḥ dhvani lakṣaṇe pakṣa saṃsiddhiḥ eva naḥ

original: yasmād dhvanir astīti naḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt dhvaniḥ asti iti naḥ pakṣaḥ

original: sa ca prāg eva saṃsiddha ity ayatna-sampanna-samīhitārthāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ smaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca prāk eva saṃsiddhaḥ iti ayatna sampanna samīhita arthāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ smaḥ

original: ye 'pi sahṛdaya-hṛdaya-saṃvedyam anākhyeyam eva dhvaner ātmānam āmnāsiṣus te 'pi na parīkṣya vādinaḥ /
analyzed: ye pi sahṛdaya hṛdaya saṃvedyam anākhyeyam eva dhvaneḥ ātmānam te pi na parīkṣya vādinaḥ

original: yata uktayā nītyā vakṣyamāṇayā ca dhvaneḥ sāmānya-viśeṣa-lakṣaṇe pratipādite 'pi yady anākhyeyatvaṃ tat sarveṣām eva vastūnāṃ tat-prasaktam
analyzed: yatas uktayā nītyā vakṣyamāṇayā ca dhvaneḥ sāmānya viśeṣa lakṣaṇe pratipādite yadi anākhyeya tvam tat sarveṣām eva vastūnām tat prasaktam

original: yadi punar dhvaner atiśayoktyānayā kāvyāntarātiśāyi taiḥ svarūpam ākhyāyate tat te 'pi yuktābhidhāyina eva //
analyzed: yadi punar dhvaneḥ atiśayoktyā anayā kāvya antara atiśāyi taiḥ svarūpam ākhyāyate tat te yukta abhidhāyinaḥ eva

original: iti śrī-rājānakānandavardhanācārya-viracite dhvany-āloke prathama uddyotaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī rāja ānaka ānandavardhana ācārya viracite dhvanyāloke prathamaḥ uddyotaḥ

original: // dvitīyoddyotaḥ //
analyzed: dvitīya uddyotaḥ

original: evam avivakṣita-vācya-vivakṣitānya-para-vācyatvena dhvanir dvi-prakāraḥ prakāśitaḥ /
analyzed: evam avivakṣita vācya vivakṣita anya para vācya tvena dhvaniḥ dvi prakāraḥ prakāśitaḥ

original: tatrāvivakṣita-vācyasya prabheda-pratipādanāyedam ucyate-
analyzed: tatra avivakṣita vācyasya prabheda pratipādanāya idam ucyate

original: arthāntare saṅkramitam atyantaṃ vā tiraskṛtam /
analyzed: artha antare saṅkramitam atyantam vā tiraskṛtam

original: avivakṣita-vācyasya dhvaner vācyaṃ dvidhā matam // DhvK_2.1 //
analyzed: avivakṣita vācyasya dhvaneḥ vācyam dvidhā matam

original: tathāvidhābhyāṃ ca tābhyāṃ vyañgyasyaiva viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: tathāvidhābhyām ca tābhyām vyañgyasya eva viśeṣaḥ

original: tatrārthāntara-saṅkramita-vācyo yathā-
analyzed: tatra artha antara saṅkramita vācyaḥ yathā

original: snigdha-śyāmala-kānti-lipta-viyato vellad-balākā ghanā
analyzed: snigdha śyāmala kānti lipta viyataḥ vellat balākā ghanā

original: vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payoda-suhṛdām ānanda-kekāḥ kalāḥ /
analyzed: vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payoda suhṛdām ānanda kekāḥ kalāḥ

original: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhora-hṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe
analyzed: kāmam santu dṛḍham kaṭhora hṛdayaḥ smi sarvam sahe

original: vaidehī tu katham bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava //[*9]
analyzed: vaidehī tu katham bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava

original: [*9] Sad-ukti-karṇāmṛta 978, Sāh.D. 2.17.
analyzed: saduktikarṇāmṛta

original: ity atra rāma-śabdaḥ /
analyzed: iti atra rāma śabdaḥ

original: anena hi vyaṅgya-dharmāntara-pariṇataḥ saṃjñī pratyāyyate,
analyzed: anena hi vyaṅgya dharma antara pariṇataḥ saṃjñī pratyāyyate

original: na saṃjñi-mātram /
analyzed: na saṃjñi mātram

original: yathā ca mamaiva viṣama-bāṇa-līlāyām-
analyzed: yathā ca mama eva viṣama bāṇa līlāyām

original: tālā jāanti guṇā jālā de sahiaehiṃ gheppanti /
analyzed: tālāḥ guṇāḥ jālāḥ de

analyzed: honti kamalāim kamalāim

analyzed: tadā jāyante guṇāḥ yadā te sahṛdayaiḥ gṛhyante

original: ravi-kiraṇānugṛhītāni bhavanti kamalāni kamalāni //]
analyzed: ravi kiraṇa anugṛhītāni bhavanti kamalāni kamalāni

original: ity atra dvitīyaḥ kamala-śabdaḥ /
analyzed: iti atra dvitīyaḥ kamala śabdaḥ

original: atyanta-tiraskṛta-vācyo yathādi-kaver vālmīkeḥ-
analyzed: atyanta tiraskṛta vācyaḥ yathā ādi kaveḥ vālmīkeḥ

original: ravi-saṅkrānta-saubhāgyas tuṣārāvṛta-maṇḍalaḥ /
analyzed: ravi saṅkrānta saubhāgyaḥ tuṣāra āvṛta maṇḍalaḥ

original: niḥśvāsāndha ivādarśaś candramā na prakāśate //iti /
analyzed: niḥśvāsa andhaḥ iva ādarśaḥ candramāḥ na prakāśate iti

original: atrāndha-śabdaḥ / yathā ca-
analyzed: atra andha śabdaḥ yathā ca

original: gaanaṃ ca matta-mehaṃ dhārāluli-ajjunāiṃ a baṇāiṃ /
analyzed: ca matta meham a

original: ṇirahaṅkāra-miaṅkā haranti ṇīlāo nisāo //
analyzed: haranti ṇīlāaḥ nisāaḥ

original: [gaganaṃ ca matta-meghaṃ dhārā-lulitārjunāni ca vanāni /
analyzed: gaganam ca matta megham dhārā lulita arjunāni ca vanāni

original: nirahaṅkāra-mṛgāṅkā haranti nīlā api niśāḥ //]
analyzed: nirahaṅkāra mṛgāṅkāḥ haranti nīlāḥ api niśāḥ

original: atra matta-nirahaṅkāra-śabdau // DhvA_2.1 //
analyzed: atra matta nirahaṅkāra śabdau

original: asaṃlakṣya-kramoddyotaḥ krameṇa dyotitaḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: asaṃlakṣya krama uddyotaḥ krameṇa dyotitaḥ paraḥ

original: vivakṣitābhidheyasya dhvaner ātmā dvidhā mataḥ // DhvK_2.2 //
analyzed: vivakṣita abhidheyasya dhvaneḥ ātmā dvidhā mataḥ

original: mukhyatayā prakāśamāno vyaṅgyo 'rtho dhvaner ātmā /
analyzed: mukhya tayā prakāśamānaḥ vyaṅgyaḥ rthaḥ dhvaneḥ ātmā

original: sa ca vācyārthāpekṣayā kaścid alakṣya-kramatayā prakāśate,
analyzed: sa ca vācyārtha apekṣayā kaścid alakṣya krama tayā prakāśate

original: kaścit krameṇeti dvidhā mataḥ // DhvA_2.2 //
analyzed: kaścid krameṇa iti dvidhā mataḥ

original: tatra-
analyzed: tatra

original: rasa-bhāva-tad-ābhāsa-tat-praśānty-ādir akramaḥ /
dhvaner ātmāṅgi-bhāvena bhāsamāno vyavasthitaḥ // DhvK_2.3 //
analyzed: dhvaneḥ ātma aṅgi bhāvena bhāsamānaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: rasādir artho hi saheva vācyenāvabhāsate /
analyzed: rasa ādiḥ arthaḥ hi saha iva vācyena avabhāsate

original: sa cāṅgitvenāvabhāsamāno dhvaner ātmā /
analyzed: sa ca aṅgi tvena avabhāsamānaḥ dhvaneḥ ātmā

original: idānīṃ rasavad-alaṅkārād alakṣya-krama-dyotanātmano dhvaner vibhakto viṣaya iti pradarśyate-
analyzed: idānīm rasavat alaṅkārāt alakṣya krama dyotana ātmanaḥ dhvaneḥ vibhaktaḥ viṣayaḥ iti pradarśyate

original: vācya-vācaka-cārutva-hetūnāṃ vividhātmanām /
analyzed: vācya vācaka cāru tva hetūnām vividha ātmanām

original: rasādi-paratā yatra sa dhvaner viṣayo mataḥ // DhvK_2.4 //
analyzed: rasa ādi para tā yatra sa dhvaneḥ viṣayaḥ mataḥ

original: rasa-bhāvatad-ābhāsa-tat-praśama-lakṣaṇaṃ mukhyam artham anuvartamānā śabdārthālaṅkārā
analyzed: rasa bhāva tad ābhāsa tad praśama lakṣaṇam mukhyam artham anuvartamānā śabda artha alaṅkārā

original: guṇāś ca parasparaṃ dhvany-apekṣayā vibhinna-rūpā vyavasthitās tatra kāvye dhvanir
analyzed: guṇāḥ ca parasparam dhvani apekṣayā vibhinna rūpāḥ vyavasthitāḥ tatra kāvye dhvaniḥ

original: iti vyapadeśaḥ // DhvA_2.4 //
analyzed: iti vyapadeśaḥ

original: pradhānye 'nyatra vākyārthe yatrāṅgaṃ tu rasādayaḥ /
analyzed: vākya arthe yatra aṅgam tu rasa ādayaḥ

original: kāvye tasminn alaṅkāro rasādir iti me matiḥ // DhvK_2.5 //
analyzed: kāvye tasmin alaṅkāraḥ rasa ādiḥ iti me matiḥ

original: yady api rasavad-alaṅkārasyānyair darśito viṣayas tathāpi yasmin kāvye pradhānatayānyo
analyzed: yadi api rasavat alaṅkārasya anyaiḥ darśitaḥ viṣayaḥ tathā api yasmin kāvye pradhāna tayā anyaḥ

original: 'rtho vākyārthī-bhūtas tasya cāṅga-bhūtā ye rasādayas te rasāder alaṅkārasya viṣayā
analyzed: rthaḥ vākya arthībhūtaḥ tasya ca aṅga bhūtāḥ ye rasa ādayaḥ te rasa ādeḥ alaṅkārasya viṣayāḥ

original: iti māmakīnaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: iti māmakīnaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: tad yathā cāṭuṣu preyo 'laṅkārasya vākyārthatve 'pi rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā dṛśyante /
analyzed: tat yathā cāṭuṣu preyaḥ laṅkārasya vākya artha tve pi rasa ādayaḥ ṅga bhūtāḥ dṛśyante

original: sa ca rasādir alaṅkāraḥ śuddhaḥ saṅkīrṇo vā /
analyzed: sa ca rasa ādiḥ alaṅkāraḥ śuddhaḥ saṅkīrṇaḥ vā

original: tatrādyo yathā-
analyzed: tatra ādyaḥ yathā

original: kiṃ hāsyena na me prayāsyasi punaḥ prāptaś cirād darśanaṃ
analyzed: kim hāsyena na me prayāsyasi punar prāptaḥ cirāt darśanam

original: keyam niṣkaruṇa pravāsa-rucitā kenāsi dūrikṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kā iyam niṣkaruṇa pravāsa ruci tā kena asi dūrikṛtaḥ

original: svapnānteṣv iti te vadan priyatama-vyāsakta-kaṇṭha-graho
analyzed: svapna anteṣu iti te vadan priyatama vyāsakta kaṇṭha graho

original: buddhā roditi rikta-bāhu-valayas tāraṃ ripu-strī-janaḥ //
analyzed: buddhā roditi rikta bāhu valayaḥ tāram ripu strī janaḥ

original: ity atra karuṇa-rasasya śuddhasyāṅga-bhāvāt spaṣṭam eva rasavad-alaṅkāratvam /
analyzed: iti atra karuṇa rasasya śuddhasya aṅga bhāvāt spaṣṭam eva rasavat alaṅkāra tvam

original: evam evaṃ-vidhe viṣaye rasāntarāṇāṃ spaṣṭa evāṅgabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: evam evaṃvidhe viṣaye rasa antarāṇām spaṣṭaḥ eva aṅga bhāvaḥ

original: saṅkīrṇo rasādir aṅga-bhūto yatha-
analyzed: saṅkīrṇaḥ rasa ādiḥ aṅga bhūtaḥ

original: kṣipto hastāvalagnaḥ prasabham abhihato 'py ādadāno 'ṃśukāntaṃ
analyzed: kṣiptaḥ hasta avalagnaḥ prasabham abhihataḥ pi ādadānaḥ ṃśuka antam

original: gṛhṇan keśeṣv apāstaś caraṇa-nipatito nekṣitaḥ sambhrameṇa /
analyzed: gṛhṇan keśeṣu apāstaḥ caraṇa nipatitaḥ na īkṣitaḥ sambhrameṇa

original: āliṅgan yo 'vadhūtas tripura-yuvatibhiḥ sāśru-netrotpalābhiḥ
analyzed: āliṅgan yaḥ vadhūtaḥ tripura yuvatibhiḥ sa aśru netra utpalābhiḥ

original: kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ //
analyzed: kāmī iva ārdra aparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritam śāmbhavaḥ vaḥ śara agniḥ

original: ity atra tripura-ripu-prabhāvātiśayasya vākyārthatve īrṣyā-vipralambhasya śleṣa-sahitasyāṅga-bhāva iti,
analyzed: iti atra tripura ripu prabhāva atiśayasya vākya artha tve īrṣyā vipralambhasya śleṣa sahitasya aṅga bhāvaḥ iti

original: evaṃ-vidha eva rasavad-ādy-alaṅkārasya nyāyyo viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: evaṃvidhaḥ eva rasavat ādi alaṅkārasya nyāyyaḥ viṣayaḥ

original: ata eva cerṣyā-vipralambha-karuṇayor aṅgatvena vyavasthānāt samāveśo na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva ca īrṣyā vipralambha karuṇayoḥ aṅga tvena vyavasthānāt samāveśaḥ na doṣaḥ

original: yatra hi rasasya vākyārthī-bhāvas tatra katham alaṅkāratvam ?
analyzed: yatra hi rasasya vākya arthībhāvaḥ tatra katham alaṅkāra tvam

original: alaṅkāro hi cārutva-hetuḥ prasiddhaḥ ;
analyzed: alaṅkāraḥ hi cāru tva hetuḥ prasiddhaḥ

original: na tv asāv ātmaivātmanaś cārutva-hetuḥ /
analyzed: na tu asau ātmā eva ātmanaḥ cāru tva hetuḥ

original: tathā cāyam atra saṃkṣepaḥ-
analyzed: tathā ca ayam atra saṃkṣepaḥ

original: rasa-bhāvādi-tātparyam āśritya viniveśanam /
analyzed: rasa bhāva ādi tātparyam āśritya viniveśanam

original: alaṅkṛtīnāṃ sarvāsām alaṅkāratva-sādhanam //
analyzed: alaṅkṛtīnām sarvāsām alaṅkāra tva sādhanam

original: tasmād yatra rasādayo vākyārthī-bhūtāḥ sa sarvo na rasāder alaṅkārasya viṣayaḥ ;
analyzed: tasmāt yatra rasa ādayaḥ vākya arthībhūtāḥ sa sarvaḥ na rasa ādeḥ alaṅkārasya viṣayaḥ

original: sa dhvaneḥ prabhedaḥ,
analyzed: sa dhvaneḥ prabhedaḥ

original: tasyopamādayo 'laṅkārāḥ /
analyzed: tasya upama ādayaḥ laṅkārāḥ

original: yatra tu prādhānyenārthāntarasya vākyārthī-bhāve rasādibhiś cārutva-niṣpattiḥ kriyate,
analyzed: yatra tu prādhānyena artha antarasya vākya arthībhāve rasa ādibhiḥ cāru tva niṣpattiḥ kriyate

original: sa rasāder alaṅkāratāyā viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: sa rasa ādeḥ alaṅkāra tāyāḥ viṣayaḥ

original: evaṃ dhvaner upamādīnāṃ rasavad-alaṅkārasya ca vibhakta-viṣayatā bhavati /
analyzed: evam dhvaneḥ upamā ādīnām rasavat alaṅkārasya ca vibhakta viṣaya tā bhavati

original: yadi tu cetanānāṃ vākyārthī-bhāvo rasādy-alaṅkārasya viṣaya ity ucyate tarhy upamādīnāṃ pravirala-viṣayatā nirviṣayatā vābhihitā syāt /
analyzed: yadi tu cetanānām vākya arthībhāvaḥ rasa ādi alaṅkārasya viṣayaḥ iti ucyate tarhi upamā ādīnām pravirala viṣaya tā nirviṣaya tā vā abhihitā syāt

original: yasmād acetana-vastu-vṛtte vākyārthī-bhūte punaś cetana-vastu-vṛttānta-yojanayā yathā-kathañcid bhavitavyam /
analyzed: yasmāt acetana vastu vṛtte vākya arthībhūte punar cetana vastu vṛttānta yojanayā yathā kathañcid bhavitavyam

original: atha satyām api tasyāṃ yatrācetanānāṃ vākyārthī-bhāvo nāsau rasavad-alaṅkārasya viṣaya ity ucyate /
analyzed: atha satyām api tasyām yatra acetanānām vākya arthībhāvaḥ na asau rasavat alaṅkārasya viṣayaḥ iti ucyate

original: tan mahataḥ kāvya-prabandhasya rasanidhānabhūtasya nīrasatvamabhihitaṃ syāt /
analyzed: tat mahataḥ kāvya prabandhasya rasa nidhāna bhūtasya nīrasa tvam abhihitam syāt

original: yathā-
analyzed: yathā

original: taraṅga-bhrū-bhaṅgā kṣubhita-vihaga-śreṇi-raśanā
analyzed: taraṅga bhrū bhaṅgā kṣubhita vihaga śreṇi raśanā

original: vikarṣantī phenaṃ vasanam iva saṃrambha-śithilam /
analyzed: vikarṣantī phenam vasanam iva saṃrambha śithilam

original: yathā-viddhaṃ yāti skhalitam abhisandhāya bahuśo
analyzed: yathāviddham yāti skhalitam abhisandhāya bahuśas

original: nadī-rūpeṇeyaṃ dhruvam asahanā sā pariṇatā //
analyzed: nadī rūpeṇa iyam dhruvam a sahanā sā pariṇatā

original: yathā vā-
analyzed: yathā vā

original: tanvī megha-jalārdra-pallavatayā dhautādhar evāśrubhiḥ
analyzed: tanvī megha jala ārdra pallava tayā dhautā adhar eva aśrubhiḥ

original: śūnyevābharaṇaiḥ svakāla-virahād viśrānta-puṣpodgamā /
analyzed: śūnyā iva ābharaṇaiḥ sva kāla virahāt viśrānta puṣpa udgamā

original: cintā maunam ivāśritā madhu-kṛtāṃ śabdair vinā lakṣyate
analyzed: cintā maunam iva āśritā madhukṛtām śabdaiḥ vinā lakṣyate

original: caṇḍī mām avadhūya pāda-patitaṃ jātānutāpeva sā //
analyzed: caṇḍī mām avadhūya pāda patitam jāta anutāpā iva sā

original: yathā vā-
analyzed: yathā vā

original: teṣāṃ gopa-vadhū-vilāsa-suhṛdāṃ rādhā-rahaḥ-sākṣiṇāṃ
analyzed: teṣām gopa vadhū vilāsa suhṛdām rādhā rahaḥ sākṣiṇām

original: kṣemaṃ bhadra kalinda-śaila-tanayā-tīre latā-veśmanāṃ /
analyzed: kṣemam bhadra kalinda śaila tanayā tīre latā veśmanām

original: vicchinne smara-talpa-kalpana-mṛd-ucchedopayoge 'dhunā
analyzed: vicchinne smara talpa kalpana mṛdu cheda upayoge

original: te jāne jaraṭhī-bhavanti vigalan nīla-tviṣaḥ pallavāḥ //[*10]
analyzed: te jāne jaraṭhībhavanti vigalan nīla tviṣaḥ pallavāḥ

original: [*10] Srk 808 (vidyāyāḥ); Svm 87.8 (kasyāpi)
analyzed: srk vidyāyāḥ svm kasya api

original: ity evam ādau viṣaye 'cetanānāṃ vākyārthī-bhāve 'pi cetana-vastu-vṛttānta-yojanāsty eva /
analyzed: iti evam ādau viṣaye cetanānām vākya arthībhāve cetana vastu vṛttānta yojanā asti eva

original: atha yatra cetana-vastu-vṛttānta-yojanāsti tatra rasādir alaṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: atha yatra cetana vastu vṛttānta yojanā asti tatra rasa ādiḥ alaṅkāraḥ

original: tad evaṃ saty upamādayo nirviṣayāḥ pravirala-viṣayā vā syuḥ /
analyzed: tat evam sati upama ādayaḥ nirviṣayāḥ pravirala viṣayāḥ vā syuḥ

original: yasmān nāsty evāsāv acetana-vastu-vṛttānto yatra cetana-vastu-vṛttānta-yojanā nāsty antato vibhāvatvena /
analyzed: yasmāt nā asti eva asau acetana vastu vṛttāntaḥ yatra cetana vastu vṛttānta yojanā nā asti antatas vibhāva tvena

original: tasmād aṅgatvena ca rasādīnām alaṅkāratā /
analyzed: tasmāt aṅga tvena ca rasa ādīnām alaṅkāra tā

original: yaḥ punar aṅgī raso bhāvo vā sarvākāram alaṅkāryaḥ sa dhvaner ātmeti // DhvA_2.5 //
analyzed: yaḥ punar aṅgī rasaḥ bhāvaḥ vā sarvākāram alaṅkāryaḥ sa dhvaneḥ ātmā iti

original: kiṃ ca-
analyzed: kim ca

original: tam artham avalambante ye 'ṅginaṃ te guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: tam artham avalambante ye ṅginam te guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: aṅgāśritās tv alaṅkārā mantavyāḥ kaṭakādivat // DhvK_2.6 //
analyzed: aṅga āśritāḥ tu alaṅkārāḥ mantavyāḥ kaṭaka ādi vat

original: ye tam arthaṃ rasādi-lakṣaṇam aṅginaṃ santam avalambate te guṇāḥ śauryādivat /
analyzed: ye tam artham rasa ādi lakṣaṇam aṅginam santam avalambate te guṇāḥ śaurya ādi vat

original: vācya-vācaka-lakṣaṇāny aṅgāni ye punas tad-āśritās te 'laṅkārā mantavyāḥ kaṭakādivat // DhvA_2.6 //
analyzed: vācya vācaka lakṣaṇāni aṅgāni ye punar tad āśritāḥ te laṅkārāḥ mantavyāḥ kaṭaka ādi vat

original: tathā ca-
analyzed: tathā ca

original: śṛṅgāra eva madhuraḥ paraḥ prahlādano rasaḥ /
analyzed: śṛṅgāraḥ eva madhuraḥ paraḥ prahlādanaḥ rasaḥ

original: tan-mayaṃ kāvyam āśritya mādhuryaṃ pratitiṣṭhati // DhvK_2.7 //
analyzed: tad mayam kāvyam āśritya mādhuryam pratitiṣṭhati

original: śṛṅgāra eva rasāntarāpekṣayā madhuraḥ prahlāda-hetutvāt /
analyzed: śṛṅgāraḥ eva rasa antara apekṣayā madhuraḥ prahlāda hetu tvāt

original: tat-prakāśana-para-śabdārthatayā kāvyasya sa mādhurya-lakṣaṇo guṇaḥ /
analyzed: tad prakāśana para śabdārtha tayā kāvyasya sa mādhurya lakṣaṇaḥ guṇaḥ

original: śravyatvaṃ punar ojaso 'pi sādhāraṇam iti // DhvA_2.7 //
analyzed: śravya tvam punar ojasaḥ u pi sādhāraṇam iti

original: śṛṅgāre vipralambhākhye karuṇe ca prakarṣavat /
analyzed: śṛṅgāre vipralambha ākhye karuṇe ca prakarṣa vat

original: mādhuryam ārdratāṃ yāti yatas tatrādhikaṃ manaḥ // DhvK_2.8 //
analyzed: mādhuryam ārdra tām yāti yatas tatra adhikam manaḥ

original: vipralambha-śṛṅgāra-karuṇayos tu mādhuryam eva prakarṣavat /
analyzed: vipralambha śṛṅgāra karuṇayoḥ tu mādhuryam eva prakarṣavat

original: sahṛdaya-hṛdayāvarjanātiśaya-nimittatvād iti // DhvA_2.8 //
analyzed: sahṛdaya hṛdaya āvarjana atiśaya nimitta tvāt iti

original: raudrādayo rasā dīptyā lakṣyante kāvya-vartinaḥ /
analyzed: raudra ādayaḥ rasāḥ dīptyā lakṣyante kāvya vartinaḥ

original: tad-vyakti-hetū śabdārthāv āśrityaujo vyavasthitam // DhvK_2.9 //
analyzed: tad vyakti hetū śabda arthau āśritya ojaḥ vyavasthitam

original: raudrādayo hi rasāḥ parāṃ dīptim ujjvalatāṃ janayantīti lakṣaṇayā ta eva dīptir ity ucyate /
analyzed: raudra ādayaḥ hi rasāḥ parām dīptim ujjvala tām janayanti iti lakṣaṇayā te eva dīptiḥ iti ucyate

original: tat-prakāśana-paraḥ śabdo dīrgha-samāsa-racanālaṅkṛtaṃ vākyam / yathā-
analyzed: tad prakāśana paraḥ śabdaḥ dīrgha samāsa racanā alaṅkṛtam vākyam yathā

original: cañcad-bhuja-bhramita-caṇḍa-gadābhighāta-
analyzed: cañcat bhuja bhramita caṇḍa gadā abhighāta

original: sañcūrṇitoru-yugalasya suyodhanasya /
analyzed: sañcūrṇita ūru yugalasya suyodhanasya

original: styānāvabaddha-ghana-śoṇita-śoṇa-pāṇir
analyzed: styāna avabaddha ghana śoṇita śoṇa pāṇiḥ

original: uttaṃsayiṣyati kacāṃs tava devi bhīmaḥ //(veṇi 1.21)
analyzed: uttaṃsayiṣyati kacān tava devi bhīmaḥ veṇi

original: tat-prakāśana-paraś cārtho 'napekṣita-dīrgha-samāsa-racanaḥ prasanna-vācakābhidheyaḥ / yathā-
analyzed: tad prakāśana paraḥ ca arthaḥ prasanna vācaka abhidheyaḥ yathā

original: yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti sva-bhuja-guru-madaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ śastram bibharti sva bhuja guru madaḥ pāṇḍavīnām camūnām

original: yo yaḥ pāñcāla-gotre śiśur adhika-vayā garbha-śayyāṃ gato vā /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ pāñcāla gotre śiśuḥ adhi kavayā garbhaśayyām gataḥ vā

original: yo yas tat-karma-sākṣī carati mayi raṇe yaś ca yaś ca pratīpaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ tad karma sākṣī carati mayi raṇe yaḥ ca yaḥ ca pratīpaḥ

original: krodhāndhas tasya tasya svayam api jagatām antakasyāntako 'ham //(veṇi 3.32)
analyzed: krodha andhaḥ tasya tasya svayam api jagatām antakasya antakaḥ ham veṇi

original: ity ādau dvayor ojastvam // DhvA_2.9 //
analyzed: iti ādau dvayoḥ ojaḥ tvam

original: samarpakatvaṃ kāvyasya yat tu sarva-rasān prati /
analyzed: samarpaka tvam kāvyasya yat tu sarva rasān prati

original: sa prasādo guṇo jñeyaḥ sarva-sādhāraṇa-kriyaḥ // DhvK_2.10 //
analyzed: sa prasādaḥ guṇaḥ jñeyaḥ sarva sādhāraṇa kriyaḥ

original: prasādas tu svacchatā śabdārthayoḥ /
analyzed: prasādaḥ tu svaccha tā śabda arthayoḥ

original: sa ca sarva-rasa-sādhāraṇo guṇaḥ sarva-racanā-sādhāraṇaś ca vyaṅgyārthāpekṣayaiva mukhyatayā vyavasthito mantavyaḥ // DhvA_2.10 //
analyzed: sa ca sarva rasa sādhāraṇaḥ guṇaḥ sarva racanā sādhāraṇaḥ ca vyaṅgya artha apekṣayā eva mukhya tayā vyavasthitaḥ mantavyaḥ

original: śruti-duṣṭādayo doṣā anityā ye ca darśitāḥ /
analyzed: śruti duṣṭa ādayaḥ doṣāḥ anityāḥ ye ca darśitāḥ

original: dhvany-ātmany eva śṛṅgāre te heyā ity udāhṛtāḥ // DhvK_2.11 //
analyzed: dhvani ātmani eva śṛṅgāre te heyāḥ iti udāhṛtāḥ

original: anityā doṣāś ca ye śruti-duṣṭādayaḥ sūcitās te 'pi na vācye artha-mātre,
analyzed: anityāḥ doṣāḥ ca ye śruti duṣṭa ādayaḥ sūcitāḥ te na vācye artha mātre

original: na ca vyaṅgye śṛṅgāre vā dhvaner anātma-bhūte /
analyzed: na ca vyaṅgye śṛṅgāre vā dhvaneḥ anātma bhūte

original: kiṃ tarhi ? dhvanyātmany eva śṛṅgāre 'ṅgitayā vyaṅgye te heyā ity udāhṛtāḥ /
analyzed: kim tarhi dhvani ātmani eva śṛṅgāre ṅgi tayā vyaṅgye te heyāḥ iti udāhṛtāḥ

original: anyathā hi teṣām anitya-doṣataiva na syāt /
analyzed: anyathā hi teṣām anitya doṣa tā eva na syāt

original: evam ayam asaṃlakṣya-krama-dyoto dhvaner ātmā pradarśitaḥ sāmānyena // DhvA_2.11 //
analyzed: evam ayam asaṃlakṣya krama dyotaḥ dhvaneḥ ātmā pradarśitaḥ sāmānyena

original: tasyāṅgānāṃ prabhedā ye prabhedāḥ svagatāś ca ye /
analyzed: tasya aṅgānām prabhedāḥ ye prabhedāḥ svagatāḥ ca ye

original: teṣāmānantyamanyonyasambandhaparikalpane // DhvK_2.12 //
analyzed: teṣām ānantyam anyonya sambandha parikalpane

original: aṅgitayā vyaṅgyo rasādir vivakṣitāny apara-vācyasya dhvaner eka ātmā ya uktas tasyāṅgānāṃ
analyzed: aṅgitayā vyaṅgyaḥ rasa ādiḥ vivakṣitāni apara vācyasya dhvaneḥ ekaḥ ātmā yaḥ uktaḥ tasya aṅgānām

original: vācya vācakānupātinām alaṅkārāṇāṃ ye prabhedā niravadhayo ye ca svagatās tasyāṅgino
analyzed: vācya vācaka anupātinām alaṅkārāṇām ye prabhedāḥ niravadhayaḥ ye ca svagatāḥ tasya aṅginaḥ

original: 'rthasya rasa-bhāva-tad-ābhāsa-tat-praśama-lakṣaṇā vibhāvānubhāva-vyabhicāri-pratipādana-sahitā
analyzed: rthasya rasa bhāva tad ābhāsa tad praśama lakṣaṇā vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāri pratipādana sahitā

original: anantāḥ svāśrayāpekṣayā niḥsīmāno viśeṣās teṣām anyonya-sambandha-parikalpane kriyamāṇe
analyzed: anantāḥ sva āśraya apekṣayā niḥsīmānaḥ viśeṣāḥ teṣām anyonya sambandha parikalpane kriyamāṇe

original: kasyacid anyatamasyāpi rasasya prakārāḥ parisaṅkhyātuṃ na śakyante kim uta sarveṣām /
analyzed: kasyacid anyatamasya api rasasya prakārāḥ parisaṅkhyātum na śakyante kim uta sarveṣām

original: tathā hi śṛṅgārasyāṅginas tāvad ādyau dvau bhedau-sambhogo vipralambhaś ca /
analyzed: tathā hi śṛṅgārasya aṅginaḥ tāvat ādyau dvau bhedau sambhogaḥ vipralambhaḥ ca

original: sambhogasya ca paraspara-prema-darśana-surata-viharaṇādi-lakṣaṇāḥ prakārāḥ /
analyzed: sambhogasya ca paraspara prema darśana surata viharaṇa ādi lakṣaṇāḥ prakārāḥ

original: vipralambhasyāpy abhilāṣerṣyā-viraha-pravāsa-vipralambhādayaḥ /
analyzed: vipralambhasya api abhilāṣa īrṣyā viraha pravāsa vipralambha ādayaḥ

original: teṣāṃ ca pratyekaṃ vibhāvānubhāva-vyabhicāri-bhedaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām ca pratyekam vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāri bhedaḥ

original: teṣāṃ ca deśa-kālādy-āśrayāvasthā-bheda iti svagata-bhedāpekṣayaikasya tasyāparimeyatvaṃ,
analyzed: teṣām ca deśa kāla ādi āśraya avasthā bhedaḥ iti svagata bheda apekṣayā ekasya tasya aparimeya tvam

original: kiṃ punar aṅga-prabheda-kalpanāyām /
analyzed: kim punar aṅga prabheda kalpanāyām

original: te hy aṅga-prabhedāḥ pratyekam aṅgi-prabheda-sambandha-parikalpane kriyamāṇe satyānantyam evopayānti // DhvA_2.12 //
analyzed: te hi aṅga prabhedāḥ pratyekam aṅgi prabheda sambandha parikalpane kriyamāṇe sati ānantyam eva upayānti

original: diṅ-mātraṃ tūcyate yena vyutpannānāṃ sa-cetasām /
analyzed: diś mātram tu ucyate yena vyutpannānām sa cetasām

original: buddhir āsāditālokā sarvatraiva bhaviṣyati // DhvK_2.13 //
analyzed: buddhiḥ āsādita ālokā sarvatra eva bhaviṣyati

original: diṅ-mātra-kathanena hi vyutpannānāṃ sahṛdayānām ekatrāpi rasa-bhede sahālaṅkārair aṅgāṅgi-bhāva-parijñānād āsāditālokā buddhiḥ sarvatraiva
analyzed: diś mātra kathanena hi vyutpannānām sahṛdayānām ekatra api rasa bhede saha alaṅkāraiḥ aṅga aṅgi bhāva parijñānāt āsādita ālokā buddhiḥ sarvatra eva

original: tatra-
analyzed: tatra

original: śṛṅgārasyāṅgino yatnād eka-rūpānubandhavān /
analyzed: śṛṅgārasya aṅginaḥ yatnāt eka rūpa anubandhavān

original: sarveṣv eva prabhedeṣu nānuprāsaḥ prakāśakaḥ // DhvK_2.14 //
analyzed: sarveṣu eva prabhedeṣu na anuprāsaḥ prakāśakaḥ

original: aṅgino hi śṛṅgārasya ye uktāḥ prabhedās teṣu sarveṣv eka-prakārānubandhitayā prabandhena pravṛtto 'nuprāso na vyañjakaḥ /
analyzed: aṅginaḥ hi śṛṅgārasya ye uktāḥ prabhedāḥ teṣu sarveṣu eka prakāra anubandhi tayā prabandhena pravṛttaḥ nuprāsaḥ na vyañjakaḥ

original: aṅgina ity anenāṅga-bhūtasya śṛṅgārasyaika-rūpānubandhy-anuprāsa-nibandhane kāma-cāram āha //2.14 //
analyzed: aṅginaḥ iti anena aṅga bhūtasya śṛṅgārasya eka rūpa anubandhi anuprāsa nibandhane kāmacāram āha

original: dhvanyātma-bhūte śṛṅgāre yamakādi-nibandhanam /
analyzed: dhvanya ātma bhūte śṛṅgāre yamaka ādi nibandhanam

original: śaktāv api pramāditvaṃ vipralambhe viśeṣataḥ // DhvK_2.15 //
analyzed: śaktau api pramādi tvam vipralambhe viśeṣataḥ

original: dhvaner ātma-bhūtaḥ śṛṅgāras tātparyeṇa vācya-vācakābhyāṃ prakāśyamānas tasmin yamakādīnāṃ yamaka-prakārāṇāṃ nibandhanaṃ duṣkara-śabda-bhaṅga-śleṣādīnāṃ  #
analyzed: dhvaneḥ ātma bhūtaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ tātparyeṇa vācya vācakābhyām prakāśyamānaḥ tasmin yamaka ādīnām yamaka prakārāṇām nibandhanam duṣkara śabda bhaṅga śleṣa ādīnām

original: śaktāv api pramāditvaṃ /
analyzed: śaktau api pramādi tvam

original: “pramāditvam” ity anenaitad darśyate-kāka-tālīyena kadācit kasyacid ekasya yamakāder niṣpattāv api bhūmnālaṅkārāntaravad rasāṅgatvena nibandho  #
analyzed: pramādi tvam iti anena etat darśyate kākatālīyena kadācid kasyacid ekasya yamaka ādeḥ niṣpattau api bhūmnā alaṅkāra antara vat rasa aṅga tvena

original: na kartavya iti /
analyzed: na kartavyaḥ iti

original: “vipralambhe viśeṣata” ity anena vipralambhe saukumāryātiśayaḥ khyāpyate /
analyzed: vipralambhe viśeṣataḥ iti anena vipralambhe saukumārya atiśayaḥ khyāpyate

original: tasmin dyotye yamakāder aṅgasya nibandho niyamān na kartavya iti // DhvA_2.15 //
analyzed: tasmin dyotye yamaka ādeḥ aṅgasya nibandhaḥ niyamāt na kartavyaḥ iti

original: atra yuktir abhidhīyate-
analyzed: atra yuktiḥ abhidhīyate

original: rasākṣiptatayā yasya bandhaḥ śakya-kriyo bhavet /
analyzed: rasa ākṣipta tayā yasya bandhaḥ śakya kriyaḥ bhavet

original: apṛthag-yatna-nirvatyaḥ so 'laṅkāro dhvanau mataḥ // DhvK_2.16 //
analyzed: apṛthak yatna nirvatyaḥ saḥ laṅkāraḥ dhvanau mataḥ

original: niṣpattāv āścarya-bhūto 'pi yasyālaṅkārasya rasākṣiptatayaiva bandhaḥ śakya-kriyo bhavet so 'sminn alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgye dhvanāv alaṅkāro mataḥ
analyzed: niṣpattau yasya alaṅkārasya rasa ākṣipta tayā eva bandhaḥ śakya kriyaḥ bhavet saḥ smin alakṣya krama vyaṅgye dhvanau alaṅkāraḥ mataḥ

original: tasyaiva rasāṅgatvaṃ mukhyam ity arthaḥ / yathā-
analyzed: tasya eva rasa aṅga tvam mukhyam iti arthaḥ yathā

original: kapole pattrālī karatala-nirodhena mṛditā
analyzed: kapole pattra ālī kara tala nirodhena mṛditā

original: nipīto niḥśvāsair ayam amṛta-hṛdyo 'dhara-rasaḥ /
analyzed: nipītaḥ niḥśvāsaiḥ ayam amṛta hṛdyaḥ dhara rasaḥ

original: muhuḥ kaṇṭhe lagnas taralayati bāṣpa-stana-taṭīṃ
analyzed: muhur kaṇṭhe lagnaḥ taralayati bāṣpa stana taṭīm

original: priyo manyur jātas tava niranurodhe na tu vayam //[*11]
analyzed: priyaḥ manyuḥ jātaḥ tava niranurodhe na tu vayam

original: [*11] Amaru 67; Srk 664, Skm 720, Skv 489, Sv 1627
analyzed: amaru

original: rasāṅgatve ca tasya lakṣaṇam apṛthag-yatna-nirvartyatvam iti yo rasaṃ bandhu-madhya-vasitasya
analyzed: rasa aṅga tve ca tasya lakṣaṇam apṛthak yatna nirvartya tvam iti yaḥ rasam bandhum adhyavasitasya

original: kaver alaṅkāras tāṃ vāsanām atyūhya yatnāntaram āsthitasya niṣpadyate sa na rasāṅgam iti /
analyzed: kaveḥ alaṅkāraḥ tām vāsanām atyūhya yatna antaram āsthitasya niṣpadyate sa na rasa aṅgam iti

original: yamake ca prabandhena buddhi-pūrvakaṃ kriyamāṇe niyamenaiva yatnāntara-parigraha āpatati śabda-viśeṣānveṣaṇa-rūpaḥ /
analyzed: yamake ca prabandhena buddhi pūrvakam kriyamāṇe niyamena eva yatna antara parigrahaḥ āpatati śabda viśeṣa anveṣaṇa rūpaḥ

original: alaṅkārāntareṣv api tat-tulyam iti cet-naivam;
analyzed: alaṅkāra antareṣu api tat tulyam iti ced nā evam

original: alaṅkārāntarāṇi hi nirūpyamāṇa-durghaṭanāny api rasa-samāhita-cetasaḥ pratibhānavataḥ kaver aham-pūrvikayā parāpatanti /
analyzed: alaṅkāra antarāṇi hi nirūpyamāṇa durghaṭanāni api rasa samāhita cetasaḥ pratibhānavataḥ kaveḥ ahampūrvikayā parāpatanti

original: yathā kādambaryāṃ kādambarī-darśanāvasare /
analyzed: yathā kādambaryām kādambarī darśana avasare

original: yathā ca māyā-rāma-śiro-darśanena vihvalāyāṃ sīta-devyāṃ setau /
analyzed: yathā ca māyā rāma śiraḥ darśanena vihvalāyām sītadevyām setau

original: yuktaṃ caitat,
analyzed: yuktam ca etat

original: yato rasā vācya-viśeṣair evākṣeptavyāḥ /
analyzed: yatas rasāḥ vācya viśeṣaiḥ eva ākṣeptavyāḥ

original: asyaivārthasya saṅgraha-ślokāḥ-
analyzed: asya eva arthasya saṅgraha ślokāḥ

original: rasavanti hi vastūni sālaṅkārāṇi kānicit /
analyzed: rasavanti hi vastūni sa alaṅkārāṇi kānicid

original: ekenaiva prayatnena nirvartyante mahā-kaveḥ //
analyzed: ekena eva prayatnena nirvartyante mahā kaveḥ

original: yamakādi-nibandhe tu pṛthag-yatno 'sya jāyate /
analyzed: yamaka ādi nibandhe tu pṛthak yatnaḥ sya jāyate

original: śaktasyāpi rase 'ṅgatvaṃ tasmād eṣāṃ na vidyate //
analyzed: śaktasya api rase ṅga tvam tasmāt eṣām na vidyate

original: rasābhāsāṅga-bhāvas tu yamakāder na vāryate /
analyzed: rasa ābhāsa aṅga bhāvaḥ tu yamaka ādeḥ na vāryate

original: dhvany-ātma-bhūte śṛṅgāre tv aṅgatā nopapadyate // DhvA_2.16 //
analyzed: dhvani ātma bhūte śṛṅgāre tu aṅga tā nā upapadyate

analyzed: idānīm dhvani ātma bhūtasya śṛṅgārasya vyañjakaḥ laṅkāra vargaḥ ākhyāyate

original: dhvany-ātma-bhūte śṛṅgāre samīkṣya viniveśitaḥ /
analyzed: dhvani ātma bhūte śṛṅgāre samīkṣya viniveśitaḥ

original: rūpakādir alaṅkāra-varga eti yathārthatām // DhvK_2.17 //
analyzed: rūpaka ādiḥ alaṅkāra vargaḥ eti yathārtha tām

original: alaṅkāro hi bāhyālaṅkārasāmyādaṅginaścārutva-heturucyate /
analyzed: alaṅkāraḥ hi bāhya alaṅkāra sāmyāt aṅginaḥ cāru tva hetuḥ ucyate

original: vācyālaṅkāravargaś ca rūpakādiryāvānukto vakṣyate ca kaiścit,
analyzed: vācyālaṅkāra vargaḥ ca rūpaka ādiḥ yāvān uktaḥ vakṣyate ca kaiścid

original: alaṅkārāṇāmanantatvāt ///
analyzed: alaṅkārāṇām ananta tvāt

original: sa sarvo 'pi yadi samīkṣya viniveśyate tada-lakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya dhvaner aṅginaḥ sarvasyaiva cārutvaheturniṣpadyate // DhvA_2.17 //
analyzed: sa yadi samīkṣya viniveśyate tat alakṣya krama vyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ aṅginaḥ sarvasya eva cāru tva hetuḥ niṣpadyate

original: eṣā cāsya viniveśane samīkṣā-
analyzed: eṣā ca asya viniveśane samīkṣā

analyzed: vivakṣā tad para tvena na aṅgi tvena kadācana

analyzed: kāle ca grahaṇa tyāgau na ati nirvahaṇa eṣitā

original: nirvyūḍhāv api cāṅgatve yatnena pratyavekṣaṇam /
analyzed: nirvyūḍhau api ca aṅga tve yatnena pratyavekṣaṇam

original: rūpakādir alaṅkāra-vargasyāṅgatva-sādhanam // DhvK_2.19 //
analyzed: rūpaka ādiḥ alaṅkāra vargasya aṅga tva sādhanam

original: calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ spṛśasi nava-gopa-sudṛśāṃ
analyzed: cala apāṅgām dṛṣṭim spṛśasi nava gopa sudṛśām

original: rahasyākhyāyīva mṛśasi mṛdu karṇāntika-caraḥ /
analyzed: rahasi ākhyāyī iva mṛśasi mṛdu karṇa antika caraḥ

original: karaṃ vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi rati-sarvasvam adharaṃ
analyzed: karam vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi rati sarvasvam adharam

original: vayaṃ tattvānveṣān madhukara hatās tvaṃ khalu kṛtī //[*12]
analyzed: vayam tattva anveṣāt madhukara hatāḥ tvam khalu kṛtī
sruc

original: atra hi bhramara-svabhāvoktir alaṅkāro rasānuguṇaḥ /
analyzed: atra hi bhramara svabhāva uktiḥ alaṅkāraḥ rasa anuguṇaḥ

original: “nāṅgitvena” iti na prādhānyena /
analyzed: na aṅgi tvena iti na prādhānyena

original: kadācid rasādi-tātparyeṇa vivakṣito 'pi hy alaṅkāraḥ kaścid aṅgitvena vivakṣito dṛśyate / yathā-

original: cakrābhighāta-prasabhājñayaiva cakāra yo rāhu-vadhū-janasya /
analyzed: cakra abhighāta prasabha ājñayā eva cakāra yaḥ rāhu vadhū janasya

original: āliṅganoddāma-vilāsa-vandhyaṃ ratotsavaṃ cumbana-mātra-śeṣam //
analyzed: āliṅgana uddāma vilāsa vandhyam rata utsavam cumbana mātra śeṣam

original: atra hi paryāyoktasyāṅgitvena vivakṣā rasādi-tātparye saty apīti /
analyzed: atra hi paryāyoktasya aṅgi tvena vivakṣā rasa ādi tātparye sati api iti

original: aṅgatvena vivakṣitam api yam avasare gṛhṇāti nānavasare /
analyzed: aṅga tvena vivakṣitam api yam avasare gṛhṇāti na anavasare

original: avasare gṛhītir,
analyzed: avasare gṛhītiḥ

original: yathā (ratnāvalyāṃ 2.4)-
analyzed: yathā ratnāvalyām

original: uddāmotkalikāṃ vipāṇḍura-rucaṃ prārabdha-jṛmbhāṃ kṣaṇād āyāsaṃ śvasanodgamair aviratair ātanvatīm ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: uddāma utkalikām vipāṇḍura rucam prārabdha jṛmbhām kṣaṇāt āyāsam śvasana udgamaiḥ avirataiḥ ātanvatīm ātmanaḥ

original: adyodyānalatām imāṃ samadanāṃ nārīm ivānyāṃ dhruvaṃ paśyan kopa-vipāṭala-dyuti mukhaṃ devyāḥ kariṣyāmy aham //[*13]
analyzed: adya udyāna latām imām sa madanām nārīm iva anyām dhruvam paśyan kopa vipāṭala dyuti mukham devyāḥ kariṣyāmi aham

original: [*13] Rasārṇava-sudhākara 2.26.
ity atra upamā śleṣasya /
analyzed: iti atra upamā śleṣasya

original: gṛhītam api ca yam avasare tyajati tad-rasānuguṇa-tayālaṅkārāntarāpekṣayā / yathā-

original: raktas tvaṃ nava-pallavair aham api ślāghyaiḥ priyāyā guṇais
analyzed: raktaḥ tvam nava pallavaiḥ aham api ślāghyaiḥ priyāyāḥ guṇaiḥ

original: tvām āyānti śilīmukhāḥ smara-dhanur-muktās tathā mām api /
analyzed: tvām āyānti śilīmukhāḥ smara dhanuḥ muktāḥ tathā mām api

original: kāntāpāda-talāhatis tava mude tadvan mamāpy āvayoḥ
analyzed: kāntā pāda tala āhatiḥ tava mude tadvat mama api āvayoḥ

original: sarvaṃ tulyam aśoka kevalam ahaṃ dhātrā sa-śokaḥ kṛtaḥ //[*14]
analyzed: sarvam tulyam aśoka kevalam aham dhātrā sa śokaḥ kṛtaḥ
sruc

original: nātrālaṅkāra-dvaya-sannipātaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ?
analyzed: na atra alaṅkāra dvaya sannipātaḥ kim tarhi

analyzed: alaṅkāra antaram eva śleṣa vyatireka lakṣaṇam narasiṃha vat iti ced na

original: tasya prakārāntareṇa vyavasthāpanāt /
analyzed: tasya prakāra antareṇa vyavasthāpanāt

original: yathā-“sa harir nāmnā devaḥ sa-harir vara-turaga-nivahena” ity ādau /
analyzed: yathā āsa hariḥ nāmnā devaḥ sa hariḥ vara turaga nivahena iti ādau

original: atra hy anya eva śabdaḥ śleṣasya viṣayo 'nyaś ca vyatirekasya /
analyzed: atra hi anyaḥ eva śabdaḥ śleṣasya viṣayaḥ nyaḥ ca vyatirekasya

original: śleṣa-mukhenaivātra vyatirekasyātma-lābha iti nāyaṃ saṃsṛṣṭer viṣaya iti cet-na ;
analyzed: śleṣa mukhena evā atra vyatirekasya ātmalābhaḥ iti na ayam saṃsṛṣṭeḥ viṣayaḥ iti ced na

original: vyatirekasya prakārāntareṇāpi darśanāt / yathā-
analyzed: vyatirekasya prakāra antareṇa api darśanāt yathā

original: no kalpāpāya-vāyor adaya-raya-dalat-kṣmādharasyāpi śamyā
analyzed: no kalpa apāya vāyoḥ adaya raya dalat kṣmādharasya api śamyā

original: gāḍhodgīrṇojjvala-śrīr ahani na rahitā no tamaḥ-kajjalena /
analyzed: gāḍha udgīrṇa ujjvala śrīḥ ahani na rahitā no tamaḥ kajjalena

original: prāptotpattiḥ pataṅgān na punar upagatā moṣa-muṣṇa-tviṣo vo
analyzed: prāpta utpattiḥ pataṅgāt na punar upagatāḥ moṣam uṣṇa tviṣaḥ vaḥ

analyzed: vartiḥ sā eva anya rūpā sukhayatu nikhila dvīpa dīpasya dīptiḥ

original: atra hi sāmya-prapañca-pratipādanaṃ vinaiva vyatireko darśitaḥ /

original: nātra śleṣa-mātrāc cārutva-pratītir astīti śleṣasya vyatirekāṅgatvenaiva vivakṣitatvāt na svato 'laṅkāratety api na vācyam /
analyzed: na atra śleṣa mātrāt cāru tva pratītiḥ asti iti śleṣasya vyatireka aṅga tvena eva vivakṣita tvāt na svatas laṅkāra tā iti api na vācyam

original: yata evaṃ-vidhe viṣaye sāmya-mātrād api supratipāditāc cārutvaṃ dṛśyata eva / yathā-

analyzed: ākrandāḥ stanitaiḥ

analyzed: tad viccheda bhuvaḥ ca śoka śikhinaḥ tulyāḥ taḍit vibhramaiḥ

analyzed: antar me dayitā mukham tava śaśī vṛttiḥ samā evā āvayoḥ

original: tat kiṃ mām aniśaṃ sakhe jala-dhara tvaṃ dagdhum evodyataḥ //[*15] ity ādau /

original: [*15] Srk 240, Skm 993, yaśodharmaṇaḥ, Smv 43.33.
analyzed: srk  skm  yaśaḥ dharmaṇaḥ
