analyzed: rasa nirvahaṇa ekatāna hṛdayaḥ yam ca na atyantam nirvoḍhum icchati yathā

original: kopāt komala-lola-bāhu-latikā-pāśena baddhā dṛḍhaṃ
analyzed: kopāt komala lola bāhu latikā pāśena baddhā dṛḍham

original: nītvā vāsa-niketanaṃ dayitayā sāyaṃ sakhīnāṃ puraḥ /
analyzed: nītvā vāsa niketanam dayitayā sāyam sakhīnām puras

original: bhūyo naivam iti skhalat-kala-girā saṃsūcya duśceṣṭitaṃ
analyzed: bhūyas nā evam iti skhalat kala girā saṃsūcya duśceṣṭitam

original: dhanyo hanyata eva nihnuti-paraḥ preyān rudatyā hasan //
analyzed: dhanyaḥ hanyate eva nihnuti paraḥ preyān rudatyā hasan

original: atra hi rūpakam ākṣiptam anirvyūḍhaṃ ca paraṃ rasa-puṣṭaye /
analyzed: atra hi rūpakam ākṣiptam anirvyūḍham ca param rasa puṣṭaye

original: nirvoḍhum iṣṭam api yaṃ yatnād aṅgatvena pratyavekṣate yathā-
analyzed: nirvoḍhum iṣṭam api yam yatnāt aṅga tvena pratyavekṣate yathā

original: śyāmāsvaṅgaṃ cakita-hariṇī-prekṣaṇe dṛṣṭi-pātaṃ
analyzed: śyāmāsu aṅgam cakita hariṇī prekṣaṇe dṛṣṭi pātam

original: gaṇḍa-cchāyāṃ śaśini śikhināṃ barha-bhāreṣu keśān /
analyzed: gaṇḍa chāyām śaśini śikhinām barha bhāreṣu keśān

original: utpaśyāmi pratanuṣu nadī-vīciṣu bhrū-vilāsān
analyzed: utpaśyāmi pratanuṣu nadī vīciṣu bhrū vilāsān

original: hantaika-sthaṃ kvacid api na te bhīru sādṛśyam asti //ity ādau /
analyzed: hanta ekastham kvacid api na te bhīru sādṛśyam asti iti ādau

original: sa evam upanibadhyamāno 'laṅkāro rasābhivyakti-hetuḥ kaver bhavati /
analyzed: saḥ evam upanibadhyamānaḥ laṅkāraḥ rasa abhivyakti hetuḥ kaveḥ bhavati

original: ukta-prakārātikrame tu niyamenaiva rasa-bhaṅga-hetuḥ saṃpadyate /
analyzed: ukta prakāra atikrame tu niyamena eva rasa bhaṅga hetuḥ saṃpadyate

original: lakṣyaṃ ca tathāvidhaṃ mahā-kavi-prabandheṣv api dṛśyate bahuśaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣyam ca tathāvidham mahā kavi prabandheṣu api dṛśyate bahuśas

original: tat tu sūkti-sahasra-dyotitātmanāṃ mahātmanāṃ doṣodghoṣaṇam ātmana eva dūṣaṇaṃ bhavatīti na vibhajya darśitam /
analyzed: tat tu sūkti sahasra dyotita ātmanām mahātmanām doṣa udghoṣaṇam ātmanaḥ eva dūṣaṇam bhavati iti na vibhajya darśitam

original: kiṃ tu rūpakāder alaṅkāra-vargasya yeyaṃ vyañjakatve rasādi-viṣaye lakṣaṇa-dig-darśitā
analyzed: kim tu rūpaka ādeḥ alaṅkāra vargasya yā iyam vyañjaka tve rasa ādi viṣaye lakṣaṇa diś darśi tā

original: tām anusaran svayaṃ cānyal lakṣaṇam utprekṣamāṇo yady alakṣya-krama-pratibham anantaroktam
analyzed: tām anusaran svayam ca anyat lakṣaṇam utprekṣamāṇaḥ yadi alakṣya krama pratibham anantara uktam

original: enaṃ dhvaner ātmānam upanibadhnāti sukaviḥ samāhita-cetās tadā tasyātma-lābho bhavati
analyzed: enam dhvaneḥ ātmānam upanibadhnāti su kaviḥ samāhita cetāḥ tadā tasya ātmalābhaḥ bhavati

original: mahīyān iti // DhvA_2.18-19 //
analyzed: mahīyān iti

original: krameṇa pratibhāty ātmā yo 'syānusvāna-sannibhaḥ /
analyzed: krameṇa pratibhāti ātmā

original: śabdārtha-śakti-mūlatvāt so 'pi dvedhā vyavasthitaḥ // DhvK_2.20 //
analyzed: śabda artha śakti mūla tvāt saḥ pi dvedhā vyavasthitaḥ

original: asya vivakṣitāny apara-vācyasya dhvaneḥ saṃlakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyatvād anuraṇana-prakhyo ya ātmā so 'pi śabda-śakti-mūlo 'rtha-śakti-mūlaś ceti  #
analyzed: asya vivakṣitāni apara vācyasya dhvaneḥ saṃlakṣya krama vyaṅgya tvāt anuraṇana prakhyaḥ yaḥ ātmā saḥ pi śabda śakti mūlaḥ rtha śakti mūlaḥ ca iti

original: dvi-prakāraḥ // DhvA_2.20 //
analyzed: dvi prakāraḥ

original: nanu śabda-śaktyā yatrārthāntaraṃ prakāśate sa yadi dhvaneḥ prakāra ucyate tad idānīṃ śleṣasya viṣaya evāpahṛtaḥ syāt,
analyzed: nanu śabda śaktyā yatra artha antaram prakāśate sa yadi dhvaneḥ prakāraḥ ucyate tat idānīm śleṣasya viṣayaḥ eva apahṛtaḥ syāt

original: nāpahṛta ity āha-
analyzed: na apahṛtaḥ iti āha

original: ākṣipta evālaṅkāraḥ śabda-śaktyā prakāśate /
analyzed: ākṣiptaḥ eva alaṅkāraḥ śabda śaktyā prakāśate

original: yasminn anuktaḥ śabdena śabda-śakty-udbhavo hi saḥ // DhvK_2.21 //
analyzed: yasmin an uktaḥ śabdena śabda śakti udbhavaḥ hi saḥ

original: yasmād alaṅkāro na vastu-mātraṃ yasmin kāvye śabda-śaktyā prakāśate sa śabda-śakty-udbhavo dhvanir ity asmākaṃ vivakṣitam /
analyzed: yasmāt alaṅkāraḥ na vastu mātram yasmin kāvye śabda śaktyā prakāśate sa śabda śakti udbhavaḥ dhvaniḥ iti asmākam vivakṣitam

original: vastu-dvaye ca śabda-śaktyā prakāśamāne śleṣaḥ / yathā-
analyzed: vastu dvaye ca śabda śaktyā prakāśamāne śleṣaḥ yathā

original: yena dhvasta-manobhavena balijit-kāyaḥ purāstrī-kṛto
analyzed: yena dhvasta manobhavena bali jit kāyaḥ purā astrī kṛtaḥ

original: yaś codvṛtta-bhujaṅga-hāra-valayo gaṅgāṃ ca yo 'dhārayat /
analyzed: yaḥ ca udvṛtta bhujaṅga hāra valayaḥ gaṅgām ca yaḥ dhārayat

original: yasyāhuḥ śaśimac chiro hara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ
analyzed: yasya āhuḥ śaśimat śiraḥ haraḥ iti stutyam ca nāma amarāḥ

original: pāyāt sa svayam andhaka-kṣaya-karas tvāṃ sarvado mādhavaḥ //
analyzed: pāyāt sa svayam andhaka kṣaya karaḥ tvām sarva daḥ mādhavaḥ

original: nanv alaṅkārāntara-pratibhāyām api śleṣa-vyapadeśo bhavatīti darśitaṃ bhaṭṭodbhaṭena,
analyzed: nanu alaṅkāra antara pratibhāyām api śleṣa vyapadeśaḥ bhavati iti darśitam bhaṭṭodbhaṭena

original: tat punar api śabda-śakti-mūlo dhvanir niravakāśa ity āśaṅkyedam uktam “ākṣipta” iti /
analyzed: tat punar api śabda śakti mūlaḥ dhvaniḥ niravakāśaḥ iti āśaṅkya idam uktam ākṣiptaḥ iti

original: tad ayam arthaḥ-yatra śabda-śaktyā sākṣād alaṅkārāntaraṃ vācyaṃ sat pratibhāsate sa sarvaḥ śleṣa-viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: tat ayam arthaḥ yatra śabda śaktyā sākṣāt alaṅkāra antaram vācyam sat pratibhāsate sa sarvaḥ śleṣa viṣayaḥ

original: yatra tu śabda-śaktyā sāmarthyākṣiptaṃ vācya-vyatiriktaṃ vyaṅgyam evālaṅkārāntaraṃ prakāśate sa dhvaner viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: yatra tu śabda śaktyā sāmarthya ākṣiptam vācya vyatiriktam vyaṅgyam eva alaṅkāra antaram prakāśate sa dhvaneḥ viṣayaḥ

original: śabda-śaktyā sākṣād-alaṅkārāntara-pratibhā yathā-
analyzed: śabda śaktyā sākṣāt alaṅkāra antara pratibhā yathā

original: tasyā vināpi hāreṇa nisargād eva hāriṇau /
analyzed: tasyāḥ vinā api hāreṇa nisargāt eva hāriṇau

original: janayāmāsatuḥ kasya vismayaṃ na payodharau //
analyzed: janayāmāsatuḥ kasya vismayam na payodharau

original: atra śṛṅgāra-vyabhicārī vismayākhyo bhāvaḥ sākṣād-virodhālaṅkāraś ca pratibhāsata iti virodha-cchāyānugrāhiṇaḥ śleṣasyāyaṃ viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: atra śṛṅgāra vyabhicārī vismaya ākhyaḥ bhāvaḥ sākṣāt virodha alaṅkāraḥ ca pratibhāsate iti virodha chāyā anugrāhiṇaḥ śleṣasya ayam viṣayaḥ

original: na tv anusvānopama-vyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ /
analyzed: na tu anusvāna upama vyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ

original: alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyasya tu dhvaner vācyena śleṣeṇa virodher na vā vyañjitasya viṣaya eva /
analyzed: alakṣya krama vyaṅgyasya tu dhvaneḥ vācyena śleṣeṇa virodheḥ na vā vyañjitasya viṣayaḥ eva

original: tasyā vināpi hāreṇa nisargād eva hāriṇau /
analyzed: tasyāḥ vinā api hāreṇa nisargāt eva hāriṇau

original: janayāmāsatuḥ kasya vismayaṃ na payodharau //
analyzed: janayāmāsatuḥ kasya vismayam na payodharau

original: atra śṛṅgāra-vyabhicārī vismayākhyo bhāvaḥ sākṣād-virodhālaṅkāraś ca pratibhāsata iti virodha-cchāyānugrāhiṇaḥ śleṣasyāyaṃ viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: atra śṛṅgāra vyabhicārī vismaya ākhyaḥ bhāvaḥ sākṣāt virodha alaṅkāraḥ ca pratibhāsate iti virodha chāyā anugrāhiṇaḥ śleṣasya ayam viṣayaḥ

original: na tv anusvānopama-vyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ /
analyzed: na tu anusvāna upama vyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ

original: alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyasya tu dhvaner vācyena śleṣeṇa virodher na vā vyañjitasya viṣaya eva /
analyzed: alakṣya krama vyaṅgyasya tu dhvaneḥ vācyena śleṣeṇa virodheḥ na vā vyañjitasya viṣayaḥ eva

original: yathā mamaiva-
analyzed: yathā mama eva

original: ślāghyāśeṣa-tanuṃ sudarśana-karaḥ sarvāṅga-līlājita-
analyzed: ślāghya aśeṣa tanum sudarśana karaḥ sarva aṅga līlā jita

original: trailokyāṃ caraṇāravinda-lalitenākrānta-loko hariḥ /
analyzed: trailokyām caraṇa aravinda lalitena ākrānta lokaḥ hariḥ

original: bibhrāṇāṃ mukham indu-sundara-rucaṃ candrātma-cakṣur dadhat
analyzed: bibhrāṇām mukham indu sundara rucam candra ātma cakṣuḥ dadhat

original: sthāne yāṃ svatanor apaśyad adhikāṃ sā rukmiṇī vo 'vatāt //
analyzed: sthāne yām sva tanoḥ apaśyat adhikām sā rukmiṇī vaḥ vatāt

original: atra vācyatayaiva vyatireka-cchāyānugrāhī śleṣaḥ pratīyate / yathā ca-
analyzed: atra vācya tayā eva vyatireka chāyā anugrāhī śleṣaḥ pratīyate yathā ca

original: bhramim aratim alasa-hṛdayatāṃ
analyzed: bhramim aratim alasa hṛdaya tām

original: pralayaṃ mūrcchāṃ tamaḥ śarīra-sārdam /
analyzed: pralayam mūrcchām tamaḥ śarīra sārdam

original: maraṇaṃ ca jalada-bhuja-gajaṃ
analyzed: maraṇam ca jalada bhuja gajam

original: prasahya kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām //
analyzed: prasahya kurute viṣam viyoginīnām

original: yathā vā-
analyzed: yathā vā

original: camahia-māṇasa-kañcaṇa-paṅka-aṇi mmahia-parimalā jassa /
analyzed: camahia māṇasa kañcaṇa paṅkaaṇi mmahia parimalā jassa

original: akhaṇḍia-dāṇa-pasārā bāhu-ppalihā ccia ga{i}ndā //
analyzed: akhaṇḍia dāṇa pasārāḥ bāhuppalihāḥ ccia gaindāḥ

original: [khaṇḍita-mānasa-kāñcana-paṅkajanir mathita-parimalā yasya /
analyzed: khaṇḍita mānasa kāñcana paṅkaja niḥ mathita parimalā yasya

original: akhaṇḍita-dāna-prasarā bāhu-parighā iva gajendrāḥ //]
analyzed: akhaṇḍita dāna prasarāḥ bāhu parighāḥ iva gaja indrāḥ

original: atra rūpaka-cchāyānugrāhī śleṣo vācyatayaivāvabhāsate /
analyzed: atra rūpaka chāyā anugrāhī śleṣaḥ vācya tayā eva avabhāsate

original: sa cākṣipto 'laṅkāro yatra punaḥ śabdāntareṇābhihita-svarūpas tatra na śabda-śakty-udbhavānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgya-dhvani-vyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ākṣiptaḥ laṅkāraḥ yatra punar śabda antareṇa abhihita svarūpaḥ tatra na śabda śakti udbhava anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgya dhvani vyavahāraḥ

original: tatra vakrokty-ādi-vācyālaṅkāra-vyavahāra eva / yathā-
analyzed: tatra vakrokti ādi vācya alaṅkāra vyavahāraḥ eva yathā

original: dṛṣṭyā keśava gopa-rāga-hṛtayā kiṃcin na dṛṣṭaṃ mayā
analyzed: dṛṣṭyā keśava gopa rāga hṛtayā kiṃcid na dṛṣṭam mayā

original: tenaiva skhalitāsmi nātha patitāṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase /
analyzed: tena eva skhalitā asmi nātha patitām kim nāma na ālambase

original: ekas tvaṃ viṣameṣu khinna-manasāṃ sarvābalānāṃ gatir
analyzed: ekaḥ tvam viṣameṣu khinna manasām sarva abalānām gatiḥ

original: gopyaivaṃ gaditaḥ sa-leśam avatād goṣṭhe harir vaś ciram //
analyzed: gopyā evam gaditaḥ sa leśam avatāt goṣṭhe hariḥ vaḥ ciram

original: evaṃ-jātīyakaḥ sarva eva bhavatu kāmaṃ vācya-śleṣasya viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: evaṃjātīyakaḥ sarvaḥ eva bhavatu kāmam vācya śleṣasya viṣayaḥ

original: yatra tu sāmarthyākṣiptaṃ sad-alaṅkārāntaraṃ śabda-śaktyā prakāśate sa sarva eva dhvaner viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: yatra tu sāmarthya ākṣiptam sat alaṅkāra antaram śabda śaktyā prakāśate sa sarvaḥ eva dhvaneḥ viṣayaḥ

original: yathā-“atrāntare kusuma-samaya-yugam upasaṃharann ajṛmbhata grīṣmābhidhānaḥ phulla-mallikā-dhavalāṭṭa-hāso mahā-kālaḥ” /
analyzed: yathā atrā antare kusuma samaya yugam upasaṃharan ajṛmbhata grīṣma abhidhānaḥ phulla mallikā dhavala aṭṭahāsaḥ mahā kālaḥ

original: yathā ca-
analyzed: yathā ca

original: unnataḥ prollasad-dhāraḥ kālāgarumalīmasaḥ /
analyzed: unnataḥ prollasat dhāraḥ kālāgaru malīmasaḥ

original: payodharabharastanvyāḥ kaṃ na cakre 'bhilāṣiṇam //
analyzed: payodhara bharaḥ tanvyāḥ kam na cakre bhilāṣiṇam

original: yathā vā-
analyzed: yathā vā

original: dattānandāḥ prajānāṃ samucita-samayākṛṣṭa-sṛṣṭaiḥ payobhiḥ
analyzed: datta ānandāḥ prajānām samucita samaya ākṛṣṭa sṛṣṭaiḥ payobhiḥ

original: pūrvāhṇe viprakīrṇā diśi diśi viramaty ahni saṃhāra-bhājaḥ /
analyzed: pūrvāhṇe viprakīrṇā diśi diśi viramati ahni saṃhāra bhājaḥ

original: dīptāṃśor dīrgha-duḥkha-prabhava-bhava-bhayodanvad-uttāra-nāvo
analyzed: dīptāṃśoḥ dīrgha duḥkha prabhava bhava bhaya udanvat uttāra nāvaḥ

original: gāvo vaḥ pāvanānāṃ parama-parimitāṃ prītim utpādayantu //
analyzed: gāvaḥ vaḥ pāvanānām parama parimitām prītim utpādayantu

original: eṣūdāharaṇeṣu śabda-śaktyā prakāśamāne satya-prākaraṇike 'rthāntare vākyasyāsambaddhārthābhidhāyitvaṃ
analyzed: eṣu udāharaṇeṣu śabda śaktyā prakāśamāne sati aprākaraṇike rthāntare vākyasya asambaddha artha abhidhāyi tvam

original: mā prasāṅkṣīd ity aprākaraṇika-prākaraṇikārthayor upamānopameya-bhāvaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ
analyzed: mā prasāṅkṣīt iti a prākaraṇika prākaraṇika arthayoḥ upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ

original: sāmarthyād ity arthākṣipto 'yaṃ śleṣo na śabdopārūḍha iti vibhinna eva śleṣād anusvānopama-vyaṅgyasya dhvaner viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: sāmarthyāt iti artha ākṣiptaḥ yam śleṣaḥ na śabda upārūḍhaḥ iti vibhinnaḥ eva śleṣāt anusvāna upama vyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ viṣayaḥ

original: anye 'pi cālaṅkārāḥ śabda-śakti-mūlānusvāna-rūpa-vyaṅgye dhvanau sambhavanty eva /
analyzed: anye pi ca alaṅkārāḥ śabda śakti mūla anusvāna rūpa vyaṅgye dhvanau sambhavanti eva

original: tathā hi virodho 'pi śabda-śakti-mūlānusvāna-rūpo dṛśyate /
analyzed: tathā hi virodhaḥ pi śabda śakti mūla anusvāna rūpaḥ dṛśyate

original: yathā sthāṇvīśvarākhya-janapada-varṇane bhaṭṭa-bāṇasya-
analyzed: yathā sthāṇvīśvara ākhya janapada varṇane bhaṭṭabāṇasya

original: yatra ca mātaṅga-gāminyaḥ śīlavatyaś ca gauryo vibhava-ratāś ca śyāmāḥ padma-rāgiṇyaś ca dhavala-dvija-śuci-vadanā madirāmodiśvasanāś ca pramadāḥ
analyzed: yatra ca mātaṅga gāminyaḥ śīlavatyaḥ ca gauryaḥ vibhava ratāḥ ca śyāmāḥ padma rāgiṇyaḥ ca dhavala dvija śuci vadanāḥ madirā āmodi śvasanāḥ ca pramadāḥ

original: atra hi vācyo virodhas tac-chāyānugrāhī vā śleṣo 'yam iti na śakyaṃ vaktum /
analyzed: atra hi vācyaḥ virodhaḥ tad chāyā anugrāhī vā śleṣaḥ yam iti na śakyam vaktum

original: sākṣāc-chabdena virodhālaṅkārasyāprakāśitatvāt /
analyzed: sākṣāt śabdena virodha alaṅkārasya aprakāśita tvāt

original: yatra hi sākṣāc-chabdāvedito virodhālaṅkāras tatra hi śliṣṭoktau vācyālaṅkārasya virodhasya śleṣasya vā viṣayatvam /
analyzed: yatra hi sākṣāt śabda āveditaḥ virodha alaṅkāraḥ tatra hi śliṣṭa uktau vācyālaṅkārasya virodhasya śleṣasya vā viṣaya tvam

original: yathā tatraiva-
analyzed: yathā tatra eva

original: “samavāya iva virodhināṃ padārthānām /
analyzed: samavāyaḥ iva virodhinām padārthānām

original: tathā hi-sannihita-bālāndhakārāpi bhāsvan-mūrtiḥ” ity ādau /
analyzed: tathā hi sannihita bāla andhakārā api bhāsvat mūrtiḥ iti ādau

original: yathā vā mamaiva-
analyzed: yathā vā mama eva

original: sarvaika-śaraṇam akṣayam adhīśam īśaṃ dhiyāṃ hariṃ kṛṣṇam /
analyzed: sarva eka śaraṇam akṣayam adhīśam īśam dhiyām harim kṛṣṇam

original: caturātmānaṃ niṣkriyam ari-mathanaṃ namata cakra-dharam //
analyzed: catur ātmānam niṣkriyam ari mathanam namata cakradharam

original: atra hi śabda-śakti-mūlānusvāna-rūpo virodhaḥ sphuṭam eva pratīyate /
analyzed: atra hi śabda śakti mūla anusvāna rūpaḥ virodhaḥ sphuṭam eva pratīyate

original: evaṃ-vidho vyatireko 'pi dṛśyate /
analyzed: evaṃvidhaḥ vyatirekaḥ pi dṛśyate

original: yathā mamaiva-
analyzed: yathā mama eva

original: khaṃ ye 'tyujjvalayanti lūna-tamaso ye vā nakhodbhāsino
analyzed: kham ye ti ujjvalayanti lūna tamasaḥ ye vā nakha udbhāsinaḥ

original: ye puṣṇanti saroruha-śriyam api kṣiptābja-bhāsaś ca ye /
analyzed: ye puṣṇanti saroruha śriyam api kṣipta abja bhāsaḥ ca ye

original: ye mūrdhasv avabhāsinaḥ kṣiti-bhṛtāṃ ye cāmarāṇāṃ śirāṃ-
analyzed: ye mūrdhasu avabhāsinaḥ kṣitibhṛtām ye ca amarāṇām śirām

original: syākrāmanty ubhaye 'pi te dina-pateḥ pādāḥ śriye santu vaḥ //
analyzed: sya ākrāmanti ubhaye te dinapateḥ pādāḥ śriye santu vaḥ

original: evam anye 'pi śabda-śakti-mūlānusvāna-rūpa-vyaṅgya-dhvani-prakārāḥ santi te sahṛdayaiḥ svayam anusartavyāḥ /
analyzed: evam anye pi śabda śakti mūla anusvāna rūpa vyaṅgya dhvani prakārāḥ santi te sahṛdayaiḥ svayam anusartavyāḥ

original: iha tu grantha-vistara-bhayān na tat-prapañcaḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: iha tu grantha vistara bhayāt na tad prapañcaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: artha-śakty-udbhavas tv anyo yatrārthaḥ sa prakāśate /
analyzed: artha śakti udbhavaḥ tu anyaḥ yatra arthaḥ sa prakāśate

original: yas tātparyeṇa vastv anyad vyanakty uktiṃ vinā svataḥ // DhvK_2.22 //
analyzed: yaḥ tātparyeṇa vastu anyat vyanakti uktim vinā svatas

original: yatrārthaḥ sva-sāmarthyād arthāntaram abhivyanakti śabda-vyāpāraṃ vinaiva so 'rtha-śakty-udbhavo nāmānusvānopama-vyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ /
analyzed: yatra arthaḥ sva sāmarthyāt artha antaram abhivyanakti śabda vyāpāram vinā eva saḥ rtha śakti udbhavaḥ nāma anusvāna upama vyaṅgyaḥ dhvaniḥ

original: yathā [ku.saṃ. 6.84]-
analyzed: yathā kusam

original: evaṃ vādini devarṣau pārśve pitur adhomukhī /
analyzed: evam vādini devarṣau pārśve pituḥ adhomukhī

original: līlā-kamala-patrāṇi gaṇayāmāsa pārvatī //
analyzed: līlā kamala patrāṇi gaṇayāmāsa pārvatī

original: atra hi līlā-kamala-patra-gaṇanam upasarjanīkṛta-svarūpaṃ śabda-vyāpāraṃ vinaivārthāntaraṃ vyabhicāri-bhāva-lakṣaṇaṃ prakāśayati /
analyzed: atra hi līlā kamala patra gaṇanam upasarjanīkṛta svarūpam śabda vyāpāram vinā eva artha antaram vyabhicāri bhāva lakṣaṇam prakāśayati

original: na cāyam alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyasyaiva dhvaner viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: na ca ayam alakṣya krama vyaṅgyasya eva dhvaneḥ viṣayaḥ

original: yato yatra sākṣac-chabda-niveditebhyo vibhāvānubhāva-vyabhicāribhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ,
analyzed: yatas yatra sākṣat śabda niveditebhyaḥ vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāribhyaḥ rasa ādīnām pratītiḥ

original: sa tasya kevalasya mārgaḥ /
analyzed: sa tasya kevalasya mārgaḥ

original: yathā kumāra-sambhave madhu-prasaṅge vasanta-puṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantyā devyā āgamanādi-varṇanaṃ
analyzed: yathā kumārasambhave madhuprasaṅge vasanta puṣpa ābharaṇam vahantyāḥ devyāḥ āgamana ādi varṇanam

original: manobhava-śara-sandhāna-paryantaṃ śambhoś ca parivṛtta-dhairyasya ceṣṭā-viśeṣa-varṇanādi
analyzed: manobhava śara sandhāna paryantam śambhoḥ ca parivṛtta dhairyasya ceṣṭā viśeṣa varṇana ādi

original: sākṣac-chabda-niveditam /
analyzed: sākṣat śabda niveditam

original: tasmād ayam anyo dhvaneḥ prakāraḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ayam anyaḥ dhvaneḥ prakāraḥ

original: yatra ca śabda-vyāpāra-sahāyo 'rtho 'rthāntarasya vyañjakatvenopādīyate sa nāsya dhvaner viṣayaḥ / yathā-
analyzed: yatra ca śabda vyāpāra sahāyaḥ rthaḥ rtha antarasya vyañjaka tvena upādīyate sa na asya dhvaneḥ viṣayaḥ yathā

original: saṅketa-kāla-manasaṃ viṭaṃ jñātvā vidagdhayā /
analyzed: saṅketa kāla manasam viṭam jñātvā vidagdhayā

original: hasan-netrārpitākūtaṃ līlā-padmaṃ nimīlitam //
analyzed: hasat netra arpita ākūtam līlā padmam nimīlitam

original: atra līlā-kamala-nimīlanasya vyañjakatvam uktyaiva niveditam // DhvA_2.22 //
analyzed: atra līlā kamala nimīlanasya vyañjaka tvam uktyā eva niveditam

original: tathā ca-
analyzed: tathā ca

original: śabdārtha-śaktyā kṣipto 'pi vyaṅgyo 'rthaḥ kavinā punaḥ /
analyzed: śabda artha śaktyā kṣiptaḥ u pi vyaṅgyaḥ rthaḥ kavinā punar

original: yatrāviṣkriyate svoktyā sānyaivālaṅkṛtir dhvaneḥ // DhvK_2.23 //
analyzed: yatra āviṣkriyate sva uktyā sā anyā eva alaṅkṛtiḥ dhvaneḥ

original: śabda-śaktyārtha-śaktyā śabdārtha-śaktyā vākṣipto 'pi vyaṅgyo 'rthaḥ kavinā punaryatra svoktyā prakāśī-kriyate so 'smād anusvānopama-vyaṅgyād  #
analyzed: śabda śaktyā artha śaktyā śabda artha śaktyā vā ākṣiptaḥ pi vyaṅgyaḥ rthaḥ kavinā punar yatra sva uktyā prakāśīkriyate saḥ u smāt anusvāna upama vyaṅgyāt

original: dhvaner anya evālaṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: dhvaneḥ anyaḥ eva alaṅkāraḥ

original: alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyasya vā dhvaneḥ sati sambhave sa tādṛg anyo 'laṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: alakṣya krama vyaṅgyasya vā dhvaneḥ sati sambhave sa tādṛś anyaḥ laṅkāraḥ

original: tatra śabda-śaktyā yathā-
analyzed: tatra śabda śaktyā yathā

original: vatse mā gā viṣādaṃ śvasanam urujavaṃ santyajordhva-pravṛttaṃ
analyzed: vatse mā gāḥ viṣādam śvasanam uru javam santyaja ūrdhva pravṛttam

original: kampaḥ ko vā gurus te bhavatu balabhidā jṛmbhitenātra yāhi /
analyzed: kampaḥ kaḥ vā guruḥ te bhavatu balabhidā jṛmbhitena atra yāhi

analyzed: pratyākhyānam surāṇām iti bhaya śamana chadmanā kārayitvā

original: artha-śaktyā yathā-

analyzed: ambā śete tra vṛddhā pariṇata vayasām agraṇīḥ atra

original: niḥśeṣāgāra-karma-śrama-śithila-tanuḥ kumbha-dāsī tathātra /
analyzed: niḥśeṣa āgāra karma śrama śithila tanuḥ kumbhadāsī tathā atra

analyzed: asmin pāpa aham ekā katipaya divasa proṣita prāṇa nāthā

analyzed: pānthāya ittham taruṇyā kathitam avasara vyāhṛti vyāja pūrvam

original: ubhaya-śaktyā,
analyzed: ubhaya śaktyā

original: artha-śakty-udbhavānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgye dhvanau yo vyañjako 'rtha uktas tasyāpi dvau prakārau-kaveḥ kavi-nibaddhasya vā vaktuḥ prauḍhokti-mātra-niṣpanna-śarīra
analyzed: artha śakti udbhava anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgye dhvanau yaḥ vyañjakaḥ rthaḥ uktaḥ tasya api dvau prakārau kaveḥ kavi nibaddhasya vā vaktuḥ prauḍha ukti mātra niṣpanna śarīra

original: svataḥ-sambhavī ca dvitīyaḥ /

analyzed: appei

analyzed: ahi nava saha āra muhe

analyzed: sajjayati surabhi māsaḥ na tāvat

analyzed: abhinava sahakāra mukhān

original: nava-patralān anaṅgasya śarān //)

original: kavi-nibaddha-vaktṛ-prauḍhokti-mātra-niṣpanna-śarīro yathodāhṛtam eva-“śikhariṇi” ity ādi / yathā vā-
analyzed: kavi nibaddha vaktṛ prauḍha ukti mātra niṣpanna śarīraḥ yathā udāhṛtam eva śikhariṇi iti ādi yathā vā

analyzed: sa ādara vitīrṇa yauvana hasta ālambam samunnamadbhyām

original: abhyutthānam iva manmathasya dattaṃ tava stanābhyām //
analyzed: abhyutthānam iva manmathasya dattam tava stanābhyām

original: svataḥ sambhavī ya aucityena bahir api sambhāvyamāna-sad-bhāvo na kevalaṃ bhaṇiti-vaśenaivābhiniṣpanna-śarīraḥ /
analyzed: svatas sambhavī yaḥ aucityena bahis api sambhāvyamāna sadbhāvaḥ na kevalam bhaṇiti vaśena eva abhiniṣpanna śarīraḥ

analyzed: muktāphala racita prasādhanānām madhye sapatnīnām

original: artha-śakter alaṅkāro yatrāpy anyaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: artha śakteḥ alaṅkāraḥ yatra api anyaḥ pratīyate

original: anusvānopama-vyaṅgyaḥ sa prakāro 'paro dhvaneḥ // DhvK_2.25 //
analyzed: anusvāna upama vyaṅgyaḥ sa paraḥ dhvaneḥ

original: vācyālaṅkāra-vyatirikto yatrānyo 'laṅkāro 'rtha-sāmarthyāt pratīyamāno 'vabhāsate so 'rtha-śakty-udbhavo nāmānusvāna-rūpa-vyaṅgyo 'nyo dhvaniḥ
analyzed: vācya alaṅkāra vyatiriktaḥ yatra anyaḥ laṅkāraḥ rtha sāmarthyāt pratīyamānaḥ vabhāsate saḥ rtha śakti udbhavaḥ nāma anusvāna rūpa vyaṅgyaḥ nyaḥ dhvaniḥ

original: tasya pravirala-viṣayatvam āśaṅkyedam ucyate-
analyzed: tasya pravirala viṣaya tvam āśaṅkya idam ucyate

original: rūpakādir alaṅkāra-vargo yo vācyatāṃ śritaḥ /

original: sa sarvo gamyamānatvaṃ bibhrad bhūmnā pradarśitaḥ // DhvK_2.26 //

original: anyatra vācyatvena prasiddho yo rūpakādir alaṅkāraḥ so 'nyatra pratīyamānatayā bāhulyena pradarśitas tatrabhavadbhir bhaṭṭodbhaṭādibhiḥ /
analyzed: anyatra vācya tvena prasiddhaḥ yaḥ rūpaka ādiḥ alaṅkāraḥ saḥ nyatra pratīyamāna tayā bāhulyena pradarśitaḥ tatrabhavadbhiḥ bhaṭṭodbhaṭa ādibhiḥ

original: tathā ca sa-sandehādiṣūpamā-rūpakātiśayoktīnāṃ prakāśamānatvaṃ pradarśitam ity alaṅkārāntarasyālaṅkārāntare vyaṅgyatvaṃ na yatna-pratipādyam
analyzed: tathā ca sa sandeha ādiṣu upamā rūpaka atiśayoktīnām prakāśamāna tvam pradarśitam iti alaṅkāra antarasya alaṅkāra antare vyaṅgya tvam na yatna pratipādyam

original: iyat punar ucyata eva-
analyzed: iyat punar ucyate eva

original: alaṅkārāntarasyāpi pratītau yatra bhāsate /

original: alaṅkārāntareṣu tv anuraṇana-rūpālaṅkāra-pratītau satyām api yatra vācyasya vyaṅgya-pratipādanaunmukhyena cārutvaṃ na prakāśate nāsau dhvaner  #
analyzed: alaṅkāra antareṣu tu anuraṇana rūpa alaṅkāra pratītau satyām api yatra vācyasya vyaṅgya pratipādana aunmukhyena cāru tvam na prakāśate na asau dhvaneḥ

original: mārgaḥ /
analyzed: mārgaḥ

original: tathā ca dīpakādāv alaṅkāre upamāyā gamyamānatve 'pi tatparatvena cārutvasyāvyavasthānān na dhvani-vyapadeśaḥ / yathā-
analyzed: tathā ca dīpaka ādau alaṅkāre upamāyāḥ gamyamāna tve pi tad para tvena cāru tvasya avyavasthānāt na dhvani vyapadeśaḥ yathā

original: canda-maūehiṃ ṇimā ṇalinī kamalehiṃ kusuma-gucchehiṃ laā /

analyzed: haṃsaiḥ śārada śobhā kāvya kathā sat janaiḥ kriyate gurvī

original: ity ādiṣūpamā-garbhatve 'pi sati vācyālaṅkāra-mukhenaiva cārutvaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate na vyaṅgyālaṅkāra-tātparyeṇa /
analyzed: iti ādiṣu upamā garbha tve sati vācya alaṅkāra mukhena eva cāru tvam vyavatiṣṭhate na vyaṅgya alaṅkāra tātparyeṇa

analyzed: setum badhnāti bhūyas kim iti ca sakala dvīpa nātha anuyātaḥ

analyzed: lāvaṇya kānti paripūrita diṅmukhe smin

analyzed: mā mānusammi loe dariddo

analyzed: utprekṣā dhvaniḥ yathā

original: tat tu candanāsakta-bhujaga-niḥśvāsānila-mūrcchitatvenotprekṣitam ity utprekṣā sākṣād anuktāpi vākyārtha-sāmarthyād anuraṇana-rūpā lakṣyate
analyzed: tat tu candana āsakta bhujaga niḥśvāsa anila mūrcchita tvena utprekṣitam iti utprekṣā sākṣāt anuktā api vākya artha sāmarthyāt anuraṇana rūpā lakṣyate

original: na caivaṃ-vidhe viṣaye ivādi-śabda-prayogam antareṇāsaṃbaddhataiveti śakyate vaktum /
analyzed: na ca evaṃvidhe viṣaye iva ādi śabda prayogam antareṇa asaṃbaddha tā eva iti śakyate vaktum

original: gamakatvād anyatrāpi tad-aprayoge tad-arthāvagati-darśanāt / yathā-
analyzed: gamaka tvāt anyatra api tad aprayoge tad artha avagati darśanāt yathā

original: īsā-kalusassa bi tuha muhassa ṇaṃ esa puṇṇimā-cando /
analyzed: īsā kalusassa bi tuha muhassa ṇaṃ esa puṇṇimā candaḥ

original: ajja sarisattaṇaṃ pābiūṇa aṅge bia ṇa māi //
analyzed: ajja sarisa ttaṇam aṅge bia ṇa māi

original: īrṣyā-kaluṣasyāpi tava mukhasya nanv eṣa pūrṇimā-candraḥ /
analyzed: īrṣyā kaluṣasya api tava mukhasya nanu eṣa pūrṇimā candraḥ

original: adya sadṛśatvaṃ prāpyāṅga eva na māti //
analyzed: adya sadṛśa tvam prāpya aṅge eva na māti

analyzed: yathā vā

original: trāsākulaḥ paripatan parito niketān
analyzed: trāsa ākulaḥ paripatan paritas niketān

analyzed: puṃbhiḥ na kaiścid api dhanvibhiḥ anvabandhi

original: tasthau tathāpi na mṛgaḥ kvacid aṅga-nābhir
analyzed: tasthau tathā api na mṛgaḥ kvacid aṅganābhiḥ

original: ākarṇa-pūrṇa-nayaneṣu-hatekṣaṇa-śrīḥ //
analyzed: ākarṇapūrṇa nayana iṣu hata īkṣaṇa śrīḥ

original: śabdārtha-vyavahāre ca prasiddhir eva pramāṇam /
analyzed: śabda artha vyavahāre ca prasiddhiḥ eva pramāṇam

original: śleṣa-dhvanir yathā-
analyzed: śleṣa dhvaniḥ yathā

original: ramyā iti prāptavatīḥ patākāḥ rāgaṃ viviktā iti vardhayantīḥ /
analyzed: ramyāḥ iti prāptavatīḥ patākāḥ rāgam viviktāḥ iti vardhayantīḥ

original: yasyām asevanta namad-valīkāḥ samaṃ vadhūbhir valabhīr yuvānaḥ //
analyzed: yasyām asevanta namat valīkāḥ samam vadhūbhiḥ valabhīḥ yuvānaḥ

original: atra vadhūbhiḥ saha valabhīrasevanteti vākyārtha-pratīter anantaraṃ vadhva iva valabhya iti śleṣa-pratītir aśabdāpy artha-sāmarthyān mukhyatvena  #
analyzed: atra vadhūbhiḥ saha valabhīḥ asevanta iti vākya artha pratīteḥ anantaram vadhvaḥ iva valabhyaḥ iti śleṣa pratītiḥ aśabdā api artha sāmarthyāt mukhya tvena

original: vartate /
analyzed: vartate

original: yathā-saṅkhya-dhvanir yathā-
analyzed: yathāsaṅkhya dhvaniḥ yathā

original: aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ puṣpitaś ca sahakāraḥ /
analyzed: aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ puṣpitaḥ ca sahakāraḥ

original: aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ puṣpitaś ca hṛdi madanaḥ //
analyzed: aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ puṣpitaḥ ca hṛdi madanaḥ

original: atra hi yathoddeśam anūddeśe yac cārutvam anuraṇana-rūpaṃ madana-viśeṣaṇa-bhūtāṅkuritādi-śabda-gataṃ
analyzed: atra hi yathoddeśam anūddeśe yat cāru tvam anuraṇana rūpam madana viśeṣaṇa bhūta aṅkurita ādi śabda gatam

original: tan-madana-sahakārayos tulya-yogitā-samuccaya-lakṣaṇād vācyād atiricyamānam ālakṣyate /
analyzed: tat madana sahakārayoḥ tulya yogitā samuccaya lakṣaṇāt vācyāt atiricyamānam ālakṣyate

analyzed: evam anye pi alaṅkārāḥ yathāyogam yojanīyāḥ

original: evam alaṅkāra-dhvani-mārgaṃ vyutpādya tasya prayojanavattāṃ khyāpayitum idam ucyate-
analyzed: evam alaṅkāra dhvani mārgam vyutpādya tasya prayojanavat tām khyāpayitum idam ucyate

original: śarīrīkaraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ vācyatve na vyavasthitam /
analyzed: śarīrīkaraṇam yeṣām vācya tve na vyavasthitam

original: te 'laṅkārāḥ parāṃ chāyāṃ yānti dhvanyaṅgatāṃ gataḥ // DhvK_2.28 //
analyzed: te laṅkārāḥ parām chāyām yānti dhvani aṅga tām gataḥ

original: dhvany-aṅgatā cobhābhyāṃ prakārābhyāṃ vyañjakatvena vyaṅgyatvena ca /
analyzed: dhvani aṅgatā ca ubhābhyām prakārābhyām vyañjaka tvena vyaṅgya tvena ca

original: tatreha prakaraṇād vyaṅgyatvenety avagantavyam /
analyzed: tatra iha prakaraṇāt vyaṅgya tvena iti avagantavyam

analyzed: vyaṅgya tve pi alaṅkārāṇām prādhānya vivakṣāyām eva satyām dhvanau antaḥpātaḥ

original: itarathā tu guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyatvaṃ pratipādayiṣyate // DhvA_2.28 //
analyzed: itarathā tu guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tvam pratipādayiṣyate

original: aṅgitvena vyaṅgyatāyām api /
analyzed: aṅgi tvena vyaṅgya tāyām api

analyzed: alaṅkārāṇām dvayī gatiḥ kadācid vastu mātreṇa vyajyante

original: kadācid alaṅkāreṇa / tatra-
analyzed: kadācid alaṅkāreṇa tatra

analyzed: vyajyante vastu mātreṇa yadā alaṅkṛtayaḥ tayā

original: dhruvaṃ dhvanyaṅgatā tāsāṃ . . . . . . . .
analyzed: dhruvam dhvani aṅga tā tāsām

original: atra hetuḥ-
analyzed: atra hetuḥ

original: . . . . . . . . kāvya-vṛttis tad-āśrayā // DhvK_2.29 //
yasmāt tatra tathāvidha-vyaṅgyālaṅkāra-paratvenaiva kāvyaṃ pravṛttam /
analyzed: yasmāt tatra tathāvidha vyaṅgya alaṅkāra para tvena eva kāvyam pravṛttam

analyzed: anyathā tu tad vākya mātram eva syāt

original: tāsām evālaṅkṛtīnām-
analyzed: tāsām eva alaṅkṛtīnām

original: alaṅkārāntara-vyaṅgya-bhāve . . . . . . . .
analyzed: alaṅkāra antara vyaṅgya bhāve

original: punaḥ,
analyzed: punar

original: . . . . . . . . dhvany-aṅgatā bhavet /
analyzed: bhavet

original: cārutvotkarṣato vyaṅgya-prādhānyaṃ yadi lakṣyate // DhvK_2.30 //
analyzed: cāru tva utkarṣataḥ vyaṅgya prādhānyam yadi lakṣyate

original: uktaṃ hy etat-“cārutvotkarṣa-nibandhanā vācya-vyaṅgyayoḥ prādhānya-vivakṣā” iti /
analyzed: uktam hi etad cāru tva utkarṣa nibandhanā vācya vyaṅgyayoḥ prādhānya vivakṣā iti

original: vastu mātra-vyaṅgyatve cālaṅkārāṇām anantaropadarśitebhya evodāharaṇebhyo viṣaya unneyaḥ /
analyzed: vastu mātra vyaṅgya tve ca alaṅkārāṇām anantara upadarśitebhyaḥ evā udāharaṇebhyaḥ viṣayaḥ unneyaḥ

original: tad evam artha-mātreṇālaṅkāra-viśeṣa-rūpeṇa vārthenārthāntarasyālaṅkārasya vā prakāśane
analyzed: tat evam artha mātreṇa alaṅkāra viśeṣa rūpeṇa vā arthena artha antarasya alaṅkārasya vā prakāśane

niravagantavyaḥ // DhvA_2.30 //
analyzed: niravagantavyaḥ

original: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedān pratipādya tad-ābhāsa-vivekaṃ kartum ucyate-
analyzed: evam dhvaneḥ prabhedān pratipādya tad ābhāsa vivekam kartum ucyate

original: yatra pratīyamāno 'rthaḥ pramliṣṭatvena bhāsate /
analyzed: yatra pratīyamānaḥ rthaḥ pramliṣṭa tvena bhāsate

original: vācyasyāṅgatayā vāpi nāsyāsau gocaro dhvaneḥ // DhvK_2.31 //
analyzed: vācyasya aṅga tayā vā api na asya asau gocaraḥ dhvaneḥ

original: dvividho 'pi pratīyamānaḥ sphuṭo 'sphuṭaś ca /
analyzed: dvividhaḥ pi pratīyamānaḥ sphuṭaḥ sphuṭaḥ ca

original: tatra ya eva sphuṭaḥ śabda-śaktyārtha-śaktyā vā prakāśate sa eva dhvaner mārgo netaraḥ /
analyzed: tatra yaḥ eva sphuṭaḥ śabda śaktyā artha śaktyā vā prakāśate saḥ eva dhvaneḥ mārgaḥ na itaraḥ

original: sphuṭo 'pi yo 'bhidheyasyāṅgatvena pratīyamāno 'vabhāsate so 'syānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgyasya dhvaner agocaraḥ / yathā-
analyzed: sphuṭaḥ pi yaḥ bhidheyasya aṅga tvena pratīyamānaḥ vabhāsate saḥ sya anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ agocaraḥ yathā

original: kamalāarā ṇa maliā haṃsā uḍḍābiā ṇa a piucchā /
analyzed: kamalāarā na maliā haṃsā uḍḍābiā na a piucchā

original: keṇa bi gāma-taḍāe abbhaṃ uttāṇaaṃ phaliham //
analyzed: keṇa bi gāma taḍāe abbham uttāṇaam phaliham

original: [kamalākarā na malitā haṃsā uḍḍāyitā na ca pitṛ-śvasaḥ /
analyzed: kamala ākarāḥ na malitāḥ haṃsāḥ uḍḍāyitāḥ na ca

analyzed: kena api grāma taṭāke bhram uttānitam kṣiptam

original: atra hi pratīyamānasya mugdha-vadhvā jaladhara-pratibimba-darśanasya vācyāṅgatvam eva /
analyzed: atra hi pratīyamānasya mugdha vadhvāḥ jaladhara pratibimba darśanasya vācya aṅga tvam eva

original: evaṃ-vidhe viṣaye 'nyatrāpi yatra vyaṅgyāpekṣayā vācyasya cārutvotkarṣa-pratītyā prādhānyam avasīyate,
analyzed: evaṃvidhe viṣaye nyatra api yatra vyaṅgya apekṣayā vācyasya cāru tva utkarṣa pratītyā prādhānyam avasīyate

analyzed: tatra vyaṅgyasya aṅga tvena pratīteḥ dhvaneḥ aviṣaya tvam yathā

original: vāṇari-kuḍaṅgoḍḍīṇa-sa{u}ni-kolāhalaṃ suṇantīe /
analyzed: vāṇari kuḍaṅga uḍḍīṇa sauni kolāhalam suṇantīe

original: ghara-kamma-vāvaḍāe bahue sīanti aṅgāiṃ //[*17]
analyzed: bahue

original: [*17] Supplement 868 to Gāhā-sattasāi.
analyzed: supplement to

original: [vetasa-latā-gahanoḍḍīna-śakuni-kolāhalaṃ śṛṇvatyāḥ /
analyzed: vetasa latā gahana uḍḍīna śakuni kolāhalam śṛṇvatyāḥ

original: gṛha-karma-vyāpṛtāyā vadhvāḥ sīdanty aṅgāni //]
analyzed: gṛhakarma vyāpṛtāyāḥ vadhvāḥ sīdanti aṅgāni

original: evaṃ-vidho hi viṣayaḥ prāyeṇa guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyasyodāharaṇatvena nirdekṣyate /
analyzed: evaṃvidhaḥ hi viṣayaḥ prāyeṇa guṇībhūta vyaṅgyasya udāharaṇa tvena nirdekṣyate

original: yatra tu prakaraṇādi-pratipattyā nirdhārita-viśeṣo vācyo 'rthaḥ punaḥ pratīyamānāṅga-tvenaivāvabhāsate so 'syaivānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgyasya dhvaner  #
analyzed: yatra tu prakaraṇa ādi pratipattyā nirdhārita viśeṣaḥ vācyaḥ rthaḥ punar pratīyamāna aṅgatvena eva avabhāsate saḥ tya eva anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ

original: mārgaḥ / yathā-
analyzed: mārgaḥ yathā

original: uccinasu paḍiaṃ kusumaṃ mā dhuṇa sehāliaṃ halia-suhṇe /
analyzed: uccinasu paḍiam kusumam mā dhuṇa sehāliam halia suhṇe

original: aha de visama-virāvo sasureṇa suo valaa-saddo //
analyzed: aha de visama virāvaḥ sa sureṇa suaḥ vala a saddaḥ

original: [uccinu patitaṃ kusumaṃ mā dhunīhi śephālikāṃ hālika-snuṣe /
analyzed: uccinu patitam kusumam mā dhunīhi śephālikām hālika snuṣe

original: eṣa te viṣama-vipākaḥ śvasureṇa śruto valaya-śabdaḥ //]
analyzed: eṣa te viṣama vipākaḥ śvasureṇa śrutaḥ valaya śabdaḥ

original: atra hy avinaya-patinā saha ramamāṇā sakhī bahiḥ-śruta-valaya-kala-kalayā sakhyā pratibodhyate /
analyzed: atra hi avinaya patinā saha ramamāṇā sakhī bahis śruta valaya kalakalayā sakhyā pratibodhyate

original: etad apekṣaṇīyaṃ vācyārtha-pratipattaye /
analyzed: etat apekṣaṇīyam vācya artha pratipattaye

original: pratipanne ca vācye 'rthe tasyāvinaya-pracchādana-tātparyeṇābhidhīyamānatvāt punar vyaṅgyāṅgatvam evety asminn anuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgya-dhvanāvantar-bhāvaḥ
analyzed: pratipanne ca vācye rthe tasya avinaya pracchādana tātparyeṇa abhidhīyamāna tvāt punar vyaṅgya aṅga tvam eva iti asmin anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgya dhvanau antarbhāvaḥ

original: evaṃ vivakṣita-vācyasya dhvanes tad-ābhāsa-viveke prastute satya-vivakṣita-vācyasyāpi taṃ kartum āha-
analyzed: evam vivakṣita vācyasya dhvaneḥ tad ābhāsa viveke prastute satya vivakṣita vācyasya api tam kartum āha

original: avyutpatter aśakter vā nibandho yaḥ skhalad-gateḥ /
analyzed: avyutpatteḥ aśakteḥ vā nibandhaḥ yaḥ skhalat gateḥ

original: śabdasya sa ca na jñeyaḥ sūribhir viṣayo dhvaneḥ // DhvK_2.32 //
analyzed: śabdasya sa ca na jñeyaḥ sūribhiḥ viṣayaḥ dhvaneḥ

original: skhalad-gater upacaritasya śabdasyāvyutpatter aśakter vā nibandho yaḥ sa ca na dhvaner viṣayaḥ / yataḥ-
analyzed: skhalat gateḥ upacaritasya śabdasya avyutpatteḥ aśakteḥ vā nibandhaḥ yaḥ sa ca na dhvaneḥ viṣayaḥ yatas

original: sarveṣv eva prabhedeṣu sphuṭatvenāvabhāsanam /
analyzed: sarveṣu eva prabhedeṣu sphuṭa tvena avabhāsanam

original: yad vyaṅgyasyāṅgi-bhūtasya tat pūrṇaṃ dhvani-lakṣaṇam // DhvK_2.33 //
analyzed: yat vyaṅgyasya aṅgi bhūtasya tat pūrṇam dhvani lakṣaṇam

original: tac codāhṛta-viṣayam eva // DhvA_2.33 //
analyzed: tat ca udāhṛta viṣayam eva

original: iti śrī-rājānakānanda-vardhanācārya-viracite dhvany-āloke dvitīya uddyotaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī rāja ānaka ānandavardhana ācārya viracite dhvanyāloke dvitīyaḥ uddyotaḥ

original: tṛtīyiddyotaḥ
analyzed: tṛtīyi ddyotaḥ

original: evaṃ vyaṅgya-mukhenaiva dhvaneḥ pradarśite sa-prabhede svarūpe punar vyañjaka-mukhenaitat prakāśyate-
analyzed: evam vyaṅgya mukhena eva dhvaneḥ pradarśite sa prabhede svarūpe punar vyañjaka mukhena etat prakāśyate

original: avivakṣita-vācyasya pada-vākya-prakāśatā /
analyzed: avivakṣita vācyasya pada vākya prakāśa tā

original: tad-anyasyānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgyasya ca dhvaneḥ // DhvK_3.1 //
analyzed: tad anyasya anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgyasya ca dhvaneḥ

original: avivakṣita-vācyasyātyanta-tiraskṛta-vācye prabhede pada-prakāśatā yathā maharṣer vyāsasya-saptaitāḥ samidhaḥ śriyaḥ /
analyzed: avivakṣita vācyasya atyanta tiraskṛta vācye prabhede pada prakāśa tā yathā mahā ṛṣeḥ vyāsasya saptā etāḥ samidhaḥ śriyaḥ

original: yathā vā kālidāsasya-kaḥ sannaddhe viraha-vidhurāṃ tvayy upekṣeta jāyām /
analyzed: yathā vā kālidāsa syakaḥ sannaddhe viraha vidhurām tvayi upekṣeta jāyām

original: yathā vā-kim iva hi madhurāṇāṃ maṇḍanaṃ nākṛtīnām /
analyzed: yathā vākim iva hi madhurāṇām maṇḍanam na ākṛtīnām

original: eṣūdāharaṇeṣu “samidha” iti,
analyzed: eṣu udāharaṇeṣu samidhaḥ iti

original: “sannaddha” iti,
analyzed: sannaddhaḥ iti

original: “madhurāṇām” iti ca padāni vyañjakatvābhiprāyeṇaiva kṛtāni /
analyzed: madhurāṇām iti ca padāni vyañjaka tva abhiprāyeṇa eva kṛtāni

original: tasyaivārthāntara-saṅkramita-vācye yathā-rāmeṇa priya-jīvitena tu kṛtaṃ premṇaḥ priye nocitam /
analyzed: tasya eva artha antara saṅkramita vācye yathā rāmeṇa priya jīvitena tu kṛtam premṇaḥ priye nā ucitam

original: atra rāmeṇety etat-padaṃ samasāhasaika-rasatvādi-vyaṅgyābhisaṅkramita-vācyaṃ vyañjakam /
analyzed: atra rāmeṇa iti etat padam sama sāhasa eka rasa tva ādi vyaṅgya abhisaṅkramita vācyam vyañjakam

original: yathā vā-
analyzed: yathā vā

original: emea jaṇo tissā deu kabolopamāi sasi-bimbaṃ /
analyzed: jaṇaḥ tissā

original: paramattha-viāre uṇa cando cando bia varāo //
analyzed: paramattha viāre uṇa cando candaḥ bia varāo

original: [evam eva janas tasyā dadāti kapolopamāyāṃ śaśi-bimbam /
analyzed: evam eva janaḥ tasyāḥ dadāti kapola upamāyām śaśi bimbam

original: paramārtha-vicāre punaś candraś candra iva varākaḥ //]
analyzed: parama artha vicāre punar candraḥ candraḥ iva varākaḥ

original: atra dvitīyaś candra-śabdo 'rthāntara-saṅkramita-vācyaḥ /
analyzed: atra dvitīyaḥ candra śabdaḥ rtha antara saṅkramita vācyaḥ

original: avivakṣita-vācyasyātyanta-tiraskṛta-vācye prabhede vākya-prakāśatā yathā-
analyzed: avivakṣita vācyasya atyanta tiraskṛta vācye prabhede vākya prakāśa tā yathā

original: yā niśā sarva-bhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī /
analyzed: yā niśā sarva bhūtānām tasyām jāgarti saṃyamī

original: yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ //

original: anena hi vākyena niśārtho na ca jāgaraṇārthaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ /

analyzed: tatra aikya pakṣe saṅghaṭana āśraya guṇa pakṣe ca guṇān ātma bhūta anādheya bhūtān vā āśritya tiṣṭhantī saṅghaṭanā rasa ādīn vyanakti iti ayam arthaḥ

original: yadā tu nānātva-pakṣe guṇāśraya-saṅghaṭanā-pakṣaḥ tadā guṇān āśritya tiṣṭhantī guṇa-paratantra-svabhāvā na tu guṇa-rūpaivety arthaḥ /
analyzed: yadā tu nānātva pakṣe guṇa āśraya saṅghaṭanā pakṣaḥ tadā guṇān āśritya tiṣṭhantī guṇa paratantra svabhāvā na tu guṇa rūpā eva iti arthaḥ

original: kiṃ punar evaṃ vikalpanasya prayojanam iti ?
analyzed: kim punar evam vikalpanasya prayojanam iti

original: abhidhīyate-yadi guṇāḥ saṅghaṭanā cetyekaṃ tattvaṃ saṅghaṭanāśrayā vā guṇāḥ,
analyzed: abhidhīyate yadi guṇāḥ saṅghaṭanā ca iti ekam tattvam saṅghaṭana āśrayāḥ vā guṇāḥ

original: tadā saṅghaṭanāyā iva guṇānām aniyata-viṣayatva-prasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: tadā saṅghaṭanāyāḥ iva guṇānām aniyata viṣaya tva prasaṅgaḥ

original: guṇānāṃ hi mādhurya-prasāda-prakarṣaḥ karuṇa-vipralambha-śṛṅgāra-viṣaya eva /
analyzed: guṇānām hi mādhurya prasāda prakarṣaḥ karuṇa vipralambha śṛṅgāra viṣayaḥ eva

original: raudrādbhutādi-viṣayam ojaḥ /
analyzed: raudra adbhuta ādi viṣayam ojaḥ

original: mādhuryaprasādau rasa-bhāvatad-ābhāsa-viṣayāveveti viṣayaniyamo vyavasthitaḥ,
analyzed: mādhurya prasādau rasa bhāva tad ābhāsa viṣayau eva iti viṣaya niyamaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: saṅghaṭanāyās tu sa vighaṭate /
analyzed: saṅghaṭanāyāḥ tu sa vighaṭate

original: tathā hi śṛṅgāre 'pi dīrgha-samāsā dṛśyate raudrādiṣv asamāsā ceti /
analyzed: tathā hi śṛṅgāre dīrgha samāsā dṛśyate raudra ādiṣu asamāsā ca iti

original: tatra śṛṅgāre dīrgha-samāsā yathā-“mandāra-kusuma-reṇu-piñjaritālakā” iti / yathā vā-
analyzed: tatra śṛṅgāre dīrgha samāsāḥ yathā mandāra kusuma reṇu piñjarita alakāḥ iti yathā vā

original: anavarata-nayana-jala-lava-
analyzed: anavarata nayanajala lava

original: nipatana-parimuṣita-patra-lekhaṃ te /
analyzed: nipatana parimuṣita patra lekham te

original: kara-tala-niṣaṇṇam abale
analyzed: kara tala niṣaṇṇam abale

original: vadanam idaṃ kaṃ na tāpayati //ity ādau /
analyzed: vadanam idam kam na tāpayati iti ādau

original: tathā raudrādiṣv apy asamāsā dṛśyate /
analyzed: tathā raudra ādiṣu api asamāsā dṛśyate

original: yathā-“yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti sva-bhuja-guru-madaḥ” ity ādau /
analyzed: yathā ayaḥ yaḥ śastram bibharti sva bhuja guru madaḥ iti ādau

original: tasmān na saṅghaṭanā-svarūpāḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt na saṅghaṭana a svarūpāḥ

original: na ca saṅghaṭanāśrayā guṇāḥ /
analyzed: na ca saṅghaṭana āśrayāḥ guṇāḥ

original: nanu yadi saṅghaṭanā guṇānāṃ nāśrayas tat kim-ālambanā ete parikalpyantām ?
analyzed: nanu yadi saṅghaṭanāḥ guṇānām na āśrayaḥ tat kimālambanāḥ ete parikalpyantām

original: ucyate-pratipāditam evaiṣām ālambanam /
analyzed: ucyate pratipāditam eva eṣām ālambanam

original: tam artham avalambante ye 'ṅginaṃ te guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: tam artham avalambante ye ṅginam te guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: aṅgāśritās tv alaṅkārā mantavyāḥ kaṭakādivat //iti /
analyzed: aṅga āśritāḥ tu alaṅkārāḥ mantavyāḥ kaṭaka ādi vat iti

original: athavā bhavantu śabdāśrayā eva guṇāḥ,
analyzed: athavā bhavantu śabda āśrayāḥ eva guṇāḥ

original: na caiṣām anuprāsādi-tulyatvam /
analyzed: na ca eṣām anuprāsa ādi tulya tvam

original: yasmād anuprāsādayo 'napekṣitārtha-śabda-dharmā eva pratipāditāḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt anuprāsa ādayaḥ eva pratipāditāḥ

original: guṇās tu vyaṅgya-viśeṣāvabhāsi-vācya-pratipādana-samartha-śabda-dharmā eva /
analyzed: guṇāḥ tu vyaṅgya viśeṣa avabhāsi vācya pratipādana samartha śabda dharmāḥ eva

original: śabda-dharmatvaṃ caiṣām anyāśrayatve 'pi śarīrāśrayatvam iva śauryādīnām /
analyzed: śabda dharma tvam ca eṣām anya āśraya tve pi śarīra āśraya tvam iva śaurya ādīnām

original: nanu yadi śabdāśrayā guṇās tat-saṅghaṭanā-rūpatvaṃ tad-āśrayatvaṃ vā teṣāṃ prāptam eva /
analyzed: nanu yadi śabda āśrayāḥ guṇāḥ tad saṅghaṭanā rūpa tvam tad āśraya tvam vā teṣām prāptam eva

original: na hy asaṅghaṭitāḥ śabdā artha-viśeṣa-pratipādya-rasādy-āśritānāṃ guṇānām avācakatvād āśrayā bhavanti /
analyzed: na hi a saṅghaṭitāḥ śabdāḥ artha viśeṣa pratipādya rasa ādi āśritānām guṇānām avācaka tvāt āśrayāḥ bhavanti

original: naivam /
analyzed: na evam

original: varṇa-pada-vyaṅgyatvasya rasādīnāṃ pratipāditatvāt /
analyzed: varṇa pada vyaṅgya tvasya rasa ādīnām pratipādita tvāt

original: abhyupagate vā vākya-vyaṅgyatve rasādīnāṃ na niyatā kācit saṅghaṭanā teṣām āśrayatvaṃ pratipadyata ity aniyata-saṅghaṭanāḥ śabdā eva guṇānāṃ  #
analyzed: abhyupagate vā vākya vyaṅgya tve rasa ādīnām na niyatā kācid saṅghaṭanā teṣām āśraya tvam pratipadyate iti aniyata saṅghaṭanāḥ śabdāḥ eva guṇānām

original: vyaṅgya-viśeṣānugatā āśrayāḥ /
analyzed: vyaṅgya viśeṣa anugatāḥ āśrayāḥ

original: nanu, mādhurye yadi nāmaivam ucyate tad ucyatām ;
analyzed: nanu mādhurye yadi nāma evam ucyate tat ucyatām

original: ojasaḥ punaḥ katham aniyata-saṅghaṭana-śabdāśrayatvam ?
analyzed: ojasaḥ punar katham aniyata saṅghaṭana śabda āśraya tvam

original: na hy asamāsā saṅghaṭanā kadācid ojasa āśrayatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: na hi asamāsā saṅghaṭanā kadācid ojasaḥ āśraya tām pratipadyate

original: ucyate-yadi na prasiddhi-mātra-graha-dūṣitaṃ cetas tad atrāpi na na brūmaḥ /
analyzed: ucyate yadi na prasiddhi mātra graha dūṣitam cetaḥ tat atra api na na brūmaḥ

original: ojasaḥ katham asamāsā saṅghaṭanā nāśrayaḥ ?
analyzed: ojasaḥ katham asamāsā saṅghaṭanā na āśrayaḥ

original: yato raudrādīn hi prakāśayataḥ kāvyasya dīptir oja iti prāk pratipāditam /
analyzed: yatas raudra ādīn hi prakāśayataḥ kāvyasya dīptiḥ ojaḥ iti prāk pratipāditam

original: tac caujo yady asamāsāyām api saṅghaṭanāyāṃ syāt tat ko doṣo bhavet ?
analyzed: tat ca ojaḥ yadi asamāsāyām api saṅghaṭanāyām syāt tat kaḥ doṣaḥ bhavet

original: na cācārutvaṃ sahṛdaya-hṛdaya-saṃvedyam asti /
analyzed: na ca acāru tvam sahṛdaya hṛdaya saṃvedyam asti

original: tasmād aniyata-saṅghaṭana-śabdāśrayatve guṇānāṃ na kācit kṣatiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt aniyata saṅghaṭana śabda āśraya tve guṇānām na kācid kṣatiḥ

original: teṣāṃ tu cakṣur-ādīnām iva yathāsvaṃ viṣaya-niyamitasya svarūpasya na kadācid vyabhicāraḥ /
analyzed: teṣām tu cakṣuḥ ādīnām iva yathāsvam viṣaya niyamitasya sva rūpasya na kadācid vyabhicāraḥ

original: yat tūktam-“saṅghaṭanāvad guṇānām apy aniyata-viṣayatvaṃ prāpnoti /
analyzed: yat tu uktam saṅghaṭanā vat guṇānām api aniyata viṣaya tvam prāpnoti

original: lakṣye vyabhicāradarśanāt” iti /
analyzed: lakṣye vyabhicāra darśanāt iti

original: tatrāpy etad ucyate-yatra lakṣye parikalpita-viṣaya-vyabhicāras tad virūpam evāstu /
analyzed: tatra api etat ucyate yatra lakṣye parikalpita viṣaya vyabhicāraḥ tat virūpam eva astu

original: katham acārutvaṃ tādṛśe viṣaye sahṛdayānāṃ nāvabhātīti cet ?
analyzed: katham acāru tvam tādṛśe viṣaye sahṛdayānām na avabhāti iti ced

original: kavi-śakti-tirohitatvāt /
analyzed: kavi śakti tirohita tvāt

original: dvividho hi doṣaḥ-kaver avyutpatti-kṛto 'śakti-kṛtaś ca /
analyzed: dvividhaḥ hi doṣaḥ kaveḥ śakti kṛtaḥ ca

original: tatrāvyutpatti-kṛto doṣaḥ śakti-tiraskṛtatvāt kadācin na lakṣyate /
analyzed: tatra avyutpatti kṛtaḥ doṣaḥ śakti tiraskṛta tvāt kadācid na lakṣyate

original: yas tv aśakti-kṛto doṣaḥ sa jhaṭiti pratīyate /
analyzed: yaḥ tu aśakti kṛtaḥ doṣaḥ sa jhaṭiti pratīyate

original: parikara-ślokaś cātra-
analyzed: parikara ślokaḥ ca atra

original: avyutpatti-kṛto doṣaḥ śaktyā saṃvriyate kaveḥ /
analyzed: avyutpatti kṛtaḥ doṣaḥ śaktyā saṃvriyate kaveḥ

original: yas tv aśakti-kṛtas tasya sa jhaṭity avabhāsate //
analyzed: yaḥ tu aśakti kṛtaḥ tasya sa jhaṭiti avabhāsate

original: tathā hi-mahā-kavīnām apy uttama-devatā-viṣaya-prasiddha-saṃbhoga-śṛṅgāra-nibandhanādy-anaucityaṃ śakti-tiraskṛtatvāt grāmyatvena na pratibhāsate
analyzed: tathā hi mahā kavīnām api uttama devatā viṣaya prasiddha saṃbhoga śṛṅgāra nibandhana ādi anaucityam śakti tiraskṛta tvāt grāmya tvena na pratibhāsate

original: yathā kumāra-sambhave devī-sambhoga-varṇanam /
analyzed: yathā kumārasambhave devī sambhoga varṇanam

original: evam ādau ca viṣaye yathaucitya-tyāgas tathā darśitam evāgre /
analyzed: evam ādau ca viṣaye yathā aucitya tyāgaḥ tathā darśitam eva agre

original: śakti-kṛtatvaṃ cānvaya-vyatirekābhyām avasīyate /
analyzed: śakti kṛta tvam ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām avasīyate

original: yathā hi śakti-rahitena kavinā evaṃ-vidhe viṣaye śṛṅgāra upanibadhyamānaḥ sphuṭam eva doṣatvena pratibhāsate /
analyzed: yathā hi śakti rahitena kavinā evaṃvidhe viṣaye śṛṅgāraḥ upanibadhyamānaḥ sphuṭam eva doṣa tvena pratibhāsate

original: nanv asmin pakṣe “yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti” ity ādau kim acārutvam ?
analyzed: nanu asmin pakṣe yaḥ yaḥ śastram bibharti iti ādau kim acāru tvam

original: apratīyamānam evāropayāmaḥ /
analyzed: a pratīyamānam eva āropayāmaḥ

original: tasmād guṇa-vyatiriktatve guṇa-rūpatve ca saṅghaṭanāyā anyaḥ kaścin niyama-hetur vaktavya ity ucyate /
analyzed: tasmāt guṇa vyatirikta tve guṇa rūpa tve ca saṅghaṭanāyāḥ anyaḥ kaścid niyama hetuḥ vaktavyaḥ iti ucyate

original: . . . . tan-niyame hetur aucityaṃ vaktṛ-vācyayoḥ // DhvK_3.6b //
tatra vaktā kaviḥ kavi-nibaddho vā,
analyzed: tatra vaktā kaviḥ kavi nibaddhaḥ vā

original: kavi-nibaddhaś cāpi rasa-bhāva-rahito rasa-bhāva-samanvito vā,
analyzed: kavi nibaddhaḥ ca api rasa bhāva rahitaḥ rasa bhāva samanvitaḥ vā

original: raso 'pi kathā-nāyakāśrayas tad-vipakṣāśrayo vā,
analyzed: rasaḥ pi kathā nāyaka āśrayaḥ tad vipakṣa āśrayaḥ vā

original: kathā-nāyakaś ca dhīrodāttādi-bheda-bhinnaḥ pūrvas tad-anantaro veti vikalpāḥ /
analyzed: kathānāyakaḥ ca dhīra udātta ādi bheda bhinnaḥ pūrvaḥ tad anantaraḥ vā iti vikalpāḥ

original: vācyaṃ ca dhvany-ātma-rasāṅgaṃ rasābhāsāṅgaṃ vā,
analyzed: vācyam ca dhvanya ātma rasa aṅgam rasa ābhāsa aṅgam vā

original: abhineyārtham anabhineyārthaṃ vā,
analyzed: abhineya artham an abhineya artham vā

original: uttama-prakṛty-āśrayaṃ tad-itarāśrayaṃ veti bahu-prakāram /
analyzed: uttama prakṛti āśrayam tad itara āśrayam vā iti bahu prakāram

original: tatra yadā kavir apagata-rasa-bhāvo vaktā tadā racanāyāḥ kāma-cāraḥ /
analyzed: tatra yadā kaviḥ apagata rasa bhāvaḥ vaktā tadā racanāyāḥ kāmacāraḥ

original: yadāpi kavi-nibaddho vaktā rasa-bhāva-rahitas tadā sa eva;
analyzed: yadā api kavi nibaddhaḥ vaktā rasa bhāva rahitaḥ tadā saḥ eva

original: yadā tu kaviḥ kavi-nibaddho vā vaktā rasa-bhāva-samanvito rasaś ca pradhānāśritatvād dhvany-ātma-bhūtas tadā niyamenaiva tatrāsamāsā-madhya-samāse  #
analyzed: yadā tu kaviḥ kavi nibaddhaḥ vā vaktā rasa bhāva samanvitaḥ rasaḥ ca pradhāna āśrita tvāt dhvani ātma bhūtaḥ tadā niyamena eva

original: eva saṅghaṭane /
analyzed: eva saṅghaṭane

original: karuṇa-vipralambha-śṛṅgārayos tv asamāsaiva saṅghaṭanā /
analyzed: karuṇa vipralambha śṛṅgārayoḥ tu asamāsā eva saṅghaṭanā

original: katham iti ced ucyate-raso yadā prādhānyena pratipādyas tadā tat-pratītau vyavadhāyakā virodhinaś ca sarvātmanaiva parihāryāḥ /
analyzed: katham iti ced ucyate irasaḥ yadā prādhānyena pratipādyaḥ tadā tad pratītau vyavadhāyakāḥ virodhinaḥ ca sarva ātmanā eva parihāryāḥ

original: evaṃ ca dīrgha-samāsā saṅghaṭanā samāsānām aneka-prakāra-sambhāvanayā kadācid rasa-pratītiṃ vyavadadhātīti tasyāṃ nātyantam abhiniveśaḥ śobhate
analyzed: evam ca dīrgha samāsā saṅghaṭanā samāsānām aneka prakāra sambhāvanayā kadācid rasa pratītim vyavadadhāti iti tasyām na atyantam abhiniveśaḥ śobhate

original: viśeṣato 'bhineyārthe kāvye,
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ bhineya arthe kāvye

original: tato 'nyatra ca viśeṣataḥ karuṇa-vipralambha-śṛṅgārayoḥ /
analyzed: tatas nyatra ca viśeṣataḥ karuṇa vipralambha śṛṅgārayoḥ

original: tayor hi sukumārataratvāt svalpāyām apy asvacchatāyāṃ śabdārthayoḥ pratītir mantharībhavati /
analyzed: tayoḥ hi sukumāratara tvāt su alpāyām api a svaccha tāyām śabda arthayoḥ pratītiḥ mantharībhavati

original: rasāntare punaḥ pratipādye raudrādau madhyama-samāsā saṅghaṭanā kadācid dhīroddhata-nāyaka-sambandha-vyāpāreṇa
analyzed: rasa antare punar pratipādye raudra ādau madhyama samāsā saṅghaṭanā kadācid dhīra uddhata nāyaka sambandha vyāpāreṇa

original: dīrgha-samāsāpi vā tad-ākṣepāvinābhāvi-rasocita-vācyāpekṣayā na viguṇā bhavatīti
analyzed: dīrgha samāsā api vā tad ākṣepa avinābhāvi rasa ucita vācya apekṣayā na viguṇā bhavati iti

original: sāpi nātyantaṃ parihāryā /
analyzed: sā api na atyantam parihāryā

original: sarvāsu ca saṅghaṭanāsu prasādākhyo guṇo vyāpī /
analyzed: sarvāsu ca saṅghaṭanāsu prasāda ākhyaḥ guṇaḥ vyāpī

original: sa hi sarva-rasa-sādhāraṇaḥ sarva-saṅghaṭanā-sādhāraṇaś cety uktam /
analyzed: sa hi sarva rasa sādhāraṇaḥ sarva saṅghaṭanā sādhāraṇaḥ ca iti uktam

original: prasādātikrame hy asamāsāpi saṅghaṭanā karuṇa-vipralambha-śṛṅgārau na vyanakti /
analyzed: prasāda atikrame hi a samāsā api saṅghaṭanā karuṇa vipralambha śṛṅgārau na vyanakti

original: tad-aparityāge ca madhyama-samāsāpi na na prakāśayati /
analyzed: tad aparityāge ca madhyama samāsā api na na prakāśayati

original: tasmāt sarvatra prasādo 'nusartavyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt sarvatra prasādaḥ anusartavyaḥ

original: ata eva ca “yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti” ity ādau yady ojasaḥ sthitir neṣyate tat-prasādākhya eva guṇo na mādhuryam /
analyzed: atas eva ca yaḥ yaḥ śastram bibharti iti ādau yadi ojasaḥ sthitiḥ na iṣyate tad prasāda ākhyaḥ eva guṇaḥ na mādhuryam

original: na cācārutvam ;
analyzed: na ca a cāru tvam

original: abhipreta-rasa-prakāśanāt /
analyzed: abhipreta rasa prakāśanāt

original: tasmād guṇāvyatiriktatve guṇa-vyatiriktatve vā saṅghaṭanāyā yathoktād aucityād viṣaya-niyamo 'stīti tasyā api rasa-vyañjakatvam /
analyzed: tasmāt guṇa avyatirikta tve guṇa vyatirikta tve vā saṅghaṭanāyāḥ yathā uktāt aucityāt viṣaya niyamaḥ sti iti tasyāḥ api rasa vyañjaka tvam

original: tasyāś ca rasābhivyakti-nimitta-bhūtāyā yo 'yam anantarokto niyama-hetuḥ sa eva guṇānāṃ niyato viṣaya iti guṇāśrayeṇa vyavasthānam apy aviruddham
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca rasa abhivyakti nimitta bhūtāyāḥ yaḥ yam anantara uktaḥ niyama hetuḥ saḥ eva guṇānām niyataḥ viṣayaḥ iti guṇa āśrayeṇa vyavasthānam api aviruddham

original: viṣayāśrayam apy anyad aucityaṃ tāṃ niyacchati /
analyzed: viṣaya āśrayam api anyat aucityam tām niyacchati

original: kāvya-prabhedāśrayataḥ sthitā bhedavatī hi sā // DhvK_3.7 //
analyzed: kāvya prabheda āśrayataḥ sthitā bhedavatī hi sā

original: vaktṛ-vācya-gataucitye saty api viṣayāśrayam anyad aucityaṃ saṅghaṭanāṃ niyacchati /
analyzed: vaktṛ vācya gata aucitye sati api viṣaya āśrayam anyat aucityam saṅghaṭanām niyacchati

original: yataḥ kāvyasya prabhedā muktakaṃ saṃskṛta-prākṛtāpabhraṃśa-nibaddham,
analyzed: yatas kāvyasya prabhedāḥ muktakam saṃskṛta prākṛta apabhraṃśa nibaddham

original: sandānitaka-viśeṣaka-kalāpaka-kulakāni,
analyzed: sandānitaka viśeṣaka kalāpaka kulakāni

original: paryāya-bandhaḥ parikathā khaṇḍa-kathā sakala-kathe sarga-bandho 'bhineyārtham ākhyāyikā-kathe ity evam ādayaḥ /
analyzed: paryāya bandhaḥ parikathā khaṇḍa kathā sakala kathe sargabandhaḥ bhineya artham ākhyāyikā kathe iti evam ādayaḥ

original: tad-āśrayeṇāpi saṅghaṭanā viśeṣavatī bhavati /
analyzed: tad āśrayeṇa api saṅghaṭanā viśeṣavatī bhavati

original: tatra muktakeṣu rasa-bandhābhiniveśinaḥ kaves tad-āśrayam aucityam /
analyzed: tatra muktakeṣu rasa bandha abhiniveśinaḥ kaveḥ tad āśrayam aucityam

original: tac ca darśitam eva /
analyzed: tat ca darśitam eva

original: anyatra kāma-cāraḥ /
analyzed: anyatra kāmacāraḥ

original: muktakeṣu prabandheṣv iva rasa-bandhābhiniveśinaḥ kavayo dṛśyante /
analyzed: muktakeṣu prabandheṣu iva rasa bandha abhiniveśinaḥ kavayaḥ dṛśyante

original: yathā hy amarukasya kaver muktakāḥ śṛṅgāra-rasa-syandinaḥ prabandhāyamānāḥ prasiddhā eva /
analyzed: yathā hi amarukasya kaveḥ muktakāḥ śṛṅgāra rasa syandinaḥ prabandhāyamānāḥ prasiddhāḥ eva

original: sandānitakādiṣu tu vikaṭa-nibandhanaucityān madhyama-samāsā-dīrgha-samāse eva racane /
analyzed: sandānitaka ādiṣu tu vikaṭa nibandhana aucityāt madhyama samāsa adīrgha samāse eva racane

original: prabandhāśrayeṣu yathokta-prabandhaucityam evānusartavyam /
analyzed: prabandha āśrayeṣu yathā ukta prabandha aucityam eva anusartavyam

original: paryāya-bandhe punar asamāsā-madhyama-samāse eva saṅghaṭane /
analyzed: paryāya bandhe punar eva saṅghaṭane

original: kadācid arthaucityāśrayeṇa dīrgha-samāsāyām api saṅghaṭanāyāṃ paruṣā grāmyā ca vṛttiḥ parihartavyā /
analyzed: kadācid artha aucitya āśrayeṇa dīrgha samāsāyām api saṅghaṭanāyām paruṣā grāmyā ca vṛttiḥ parihartavyā

original: parikathāyāṃ kāma-cāraḥ,
analyzed: parikathāyām kāmacāraḥ

original: tatretivṛtta-mātropanyāsena nātyantaṃ rasa-bandhābhiniveśāt /
analyzed: tatra iti vṛtta mātra upanyāsena na atyantam rasa bandha abhiniveśāt

original: khaṇḍa-kathā-sakala-kathayos tu prākṛta-prasiddhayoḥ kulakādi-nibandhana-bhūyastvād dīrgha-samāsāyām api na virodhaḥ /
analyzed: khaṇḍakathā sakalakathayoḥ tu prākṛta prasiddhayoḥ kulaka ādi nibandhana bhūyaḥ tvāt dīrgha samāsāyām api na virodhaḥ

original: vṛtty-aucityaṃ tu yathā-rasam anusartavyam /
analyzed: vṛtti aucityam tu yathārasam anusartavyam

original: sarga-bandhe tu rasa-tātparye yathā-rasam aucityam anyathā tu kāma-cāraḥ /
analyzed: sargabandhe tu rasa tātparye yathārasam aucityam anyathā tu kāmacāraḥ

original: dvayor api mārgayoḥ sarga-bandha-vidhāyināṃ darśanād rasa-tātparyaṃ sādhīyaḥ /
analyzed: dvayoḥ api mārgayoḥ sargabandha vidhāyinām darśanāt rasa tātparyam sādhīyaḥ

original: abhineyārthe tu sarvathā rasa-bandhe 'bhiniveśaḥ kāryaḥ /
analyzed: abhineya arthe tu sarvathā rasa bandhe bhiniveśaḥ kāryaḥ

original: ākhyāyikā-kathayos tu gadya-nibandhana-bāhulyād gadye ca chando-bandha-bhinna-prasthānatvād iha niyame hetur akṛta-pūrvo 'pi manāk kriyate
analyzed: ākhyāyikā kathayoḥ tu gadya nibandhana bāhulyāt gadye ca chandobandha bhinna prasthāna tvāt iha niyame hetuḥ a kṛta pūrvaḥ manāk kriyate

original: etad yathoktam aucityam eva tasyā niyāmakam /
analyzed: etat yathā uktam aucityam eva tasyāḥ niyāmakam

original: sarvatra gadya-bandhe 'pi chando-niyama-varjite // DhvK_3.8 //
analyzed: sarvatra gadya bandhe chandaḥ niyama varjite

original: yad etad aucityaṃ vaktṛ-vācya-gataṃ saṅghaṭanāyā niyāmakam uktam etad eva gadye chando-niyama-varjite 'pi viṣayāpekṣaṃ niyama-hetuḥ /
analyzed: yat etat aucityam vaktṛ vācya gatam saṅghaṭanāyāḥ niyāmakam uktam etat eva gadye chandaḥ niyama varjite viṣaya apekṣam niyama hetuḥ

original: tathā hy atrāpi yadā kaviḥ kavi-nibaddho vā vaktā rasa-bhāva-rahitas tadā kāma-cāraḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi atrā api yadā kaviḥ kavi nibaddhaḥ vā vaktā rasa bhāva rahitaḥ tadā kāmacāraḥ

original: rasa-bhāva-samanvite tu vaktari pūrvoktam evānusartavyam /
analyzed: rasa bhāva samanvite tu vaktari pūrva uktam eva anusartavyam

original: tatrāpi ca viṣayaucityam eva /
analyzed: tatra api ca viṣaya aucityam eva

original: ākhyāyikāyāṃ tu bhūmnā madhyama-samāsā-dīrgha-samāse eva saṅghaṭane /
analyzed: ākhyāyikāyām tu bhūmnā madhyama samāsa a dīrgha samāse eva saṅghaṭane

original: gadyasya vikaṭa-bandhāśrayeṇa chāyāvattvāt /
analyzed: gadyasya vikaṭa bandha āśrayeṇa chāyāvat tvāt

original: tatra ca tasya prakṛṣyamāṇatvāt /
analyzed: tatra ca tasya prakṛṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: kathāyāṃ tu vikaṭa-bandha-prācurye 'pi gadyasya rasa-bandhoktam aucityam anusartavyam // DhvA_3.8 //
analyzed: kathāyām tu vikaṭa bandha prācurye gadyasya rasa bandha uktam aucityam anusartavyam

original: rasa-bandhoktam aucityaṃ bhāti sarvatra saṃśritā /
analyzed: rasa bandha uktam aucityam bhāti sarvatra saṃśritā

original: racanā viṣayāpekṣaṃ tat tu kiṃcid vibhedavat // DhvK_3.9 //
analyzed: racanā viṣaya apekṣam tat tu kiṃcid vibheda vat

original: athavā padyavad gadya-bandhe 'pi rasa-bandhoktam aucityaṃ sarvatra saṃśritā racanā bhavati /
analyzed: athavā padya vat gadya bandhe rasa bandha uktam aucityam sarvatra saṃśritā racanā bhavati

original: tat tu viṣayāpekṣaṃ kiṃcid viśeṣavad bhavati,
analyzed: tat tu viṣaya apekṣam kiṃcid viśeṣavat bhavati

original: na tu sarvākāram /
analyzed: na tu sarvākāram

original: tathā hi gadya-bandhe 'py atidīrgha-samāsā racanā na vipralambha-śṛṅgāra-karuṇayor ākhyāyikāyām api śobhate /
analyzed: tathā hi gadyabandhe pi ati dīrgha samāsā racanā na vipralambha śṛṅgāra karuṇayoḥ ākhyāyikāyām api śobhate

original: nāṭakādāv apy asamāsaiva na raudra-vīrādi-varṇane /
analyzed: nāṭaka ādau api asamāsā eva na raudra vīra ādi varṇane

original: viṣayāpekṣaṃ tv aucityaṃ pramāṇato 'pakṛṣyate prakṛṣyate ca /
analyzed: viṣaya apekṣam tu aucityam pramāṇataḥ upakṛṣyate prakṛṣyate ca

original: tathā hy ākhyāyikāyāṃ nātyantam asamāsā sva-viṣaye 'pi nāṭakādau nātidīrgha-samāsā ceti saṅghaṭanāyā dig-anusartavyā // DhvA_3.9 //
analyzed: tathā hi ākhyāyikāyām na atyantam asamāsā sva viṣaye nāṭaka ādau na ati dīrgha samāsā ca iti saṅghaṭanāyāḥ diś anusartavyā

original: idānīm alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ prabandhātmā rāmāyaṇa-mahābhāratādau prakāśamānaḥ prasiddha eva /
analyzed: idānīm alakṣya krama vyaṅgyaḥ dhvaniḥ prabandha ātmā rāmāyaṇa mahābhārata ādau prakāśamānaḥ prasiddhaḥ eva

original: tasya tu yathā prakāśanaṃ tat pratipādyate-
analyzed: tasya tu yathā prakāśanam tat pratipādyate

original: vibhāvabhāvānubhāva-sañcāry-aucitya-cāruṇaḥ /
vidhiḥ kathā-śarīrasya vṛttasyotprekṣitasya vā // DhvK_3.10 //
analyzed: vidhiḥ kathā śarīrasya vṛttasya utprekṣitasya vā

original: itivṛtta-vaśāyātāṃ tyaktvānanuguṇāṃ sthitim /
analyzed: iti vṛtta vaśa āyātām tyaktvā ananuguṇām sthitim

original: utprekṣyāpy antarābhīṣṭa-rasocita-kathonnayaḥ // DhvK_3.11 //
analyzed: utprekṣya api antara abhīṣṭa rasa ucita kathā unnayaḥ

original: sandhi-sandhy-aṅga-ghaṭanaṃ rasābhivyakty-apekṣayā /
na tu kevalayā śāstra-sthiti-sampādanecchayā // DhvK_3.12 //
analyzed: na tu kevalayā śāstra sthiti sampādana icchayā

original: uddīpana-praśamane yathāvasaram antarā /
analyzed: uddīpana praśamane yathāvasaram antarā

original: rasasyārabdha-viśrānter anusandhānam aṅginaḥ // DhvK_3.13 //
analyzed: rasasya ārabdha viśrānteḥ anusandhānam aṅginaḥ

original: alaṅkṛtīnāṃ śaktāv apy ānurūpyeṇa yojanam /
analyzed: alaṅkṛtīnām śaktau api ānurūpyeṇa yojanam

original: prabandhasya rasādīnāṃ vyañjakatve nibandhanam // DhvK_3.14 //
analyzed: prabandhasya rasa ādīnām vyañjaka tve nibandhanam

original: prabandho 'pi rasādīnāṃ vyañjaka ity uktaṃ tasya vyañjakatve nibandhanam /
analyzed: rasa ādīnām vyañjakaḥ iti uktam tasya vyañjaka tve nibandhanam

original: prathamaṃ tāvad vibhāva-bhāvānubhāva-sañcāry-aucitya-cāruṇaḥ kathā-śarīrasya vidhir
analyzed: prathamam tāvat vibhāva bhāva anubhāva sañcāri aucitya cāruṇaḥ kathā śarīrasya vidhiḥ

original: yathāyathaṃ pratipipādayiṣita-rasa-bhāvādy-apekṣayā ya ucito vibhāvo bhāvo 'nubhāvaḥ
analyzed: yathāyatham pratipipādayiṣita rasa bhāva ādi apekṣayā yaḥ ucitaḥ vibhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ nubhāvaḥ

original: sañcārī vā tad-aucitya-cāruṇaḥ kathā-śarīrasya vidhir vyañjakatve nibandhanam ekam /
analyzed: sañcārī vā tad aucitya cāruṇaḥ kathā śarīrasya vidhiḥ vyañjaka tve nibandhanam ekam

original: tatra vibhāvaucityaṃ tāvat prasiddham /
analyzed: tatra vibhā vaucityam tāvat prasiddham

original: bhāvaucityaṃ tu prakṛty-aucityāt /
analyzed: bhāva aucityam tu prakṛti aucityāt

original: prakṛtir hy uttama-madhyamādhama-bhāvena divya-mānuṣādi-bhāvena ca vibhedinī /
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ hi uttama madhyama adhama bhāvena divya mānuṣa ādi bhāvena ca vibhedinī

original: tāṃ yathāyatham anusṛtyāsaṅkīrṇaḥ sthāyī bhāva upanibadhyamāna aucitya-bhāg bhavati /
analyzed: tām yathāyatham anusṛtya asaṅkīrṇaḥ sthāyī bhāvaḥ upanibadhyamānaḥ aucitya bhāj bhavati

original: anyathā tu kevala-mānuṣāśrayeṇa divyasya kevala-divyāśrayeṇa vā kevala-mānuṣasyotsāhādaya upanibadhyamānā anucitā bhavanti /
analyzed: anyathā tu kevala mānuṣa āśrayeṇa divyasya kevala divya āśrayeṇa vā kevala mānuṣasya utsāha ādayaḥ upanibadhyamānāḥ anucitāḥ bhavanti

original: tathā ca kevala-mānuṣasya rājāder varṇane saptārṇava-laṅghanādi-lakṣaṇā vyāpārā upanibadhyamānā sauṣṭhava-bhṛto 'pi nīrasā eva niyamena bhavanti,
analyzed: tathā ca kevala mānuṣasya rāja ādeḥ varṇane sapta arṇava laṅghana ādi lakṣaṇāḥ vyāpārāḥ upanibadhyamānāḥ nīrasāḥ eva niyamena bhavanti

original: tatra tv anaucityam eva hetuḥ /
analyzed: tatra tu anaucityam eva hetuḥ

original: nanu nāga-loka-gamanādayaḥ sātavāhana-prabhṛtīnāṃ śrūyante,
analyzed: nanu nāga loka gamana ādayaḥ sātavāhana prabhṛtīnām śrūyante

original: tad-aloka-sāmānya-prabhāvātiśaya-varṇane kim anaucityaṃ sarvorvī-bharaṇa-kṣamāṇāṃ kṣamā-bhujām iti /
analyzed: tad aloka sāmānya prabhāva atiśaya varṇane kim anaucityam sarva urvī bharaṇa kṣamāṇām kṣamābhujām iti

original: na tad asti ; na vayaṃ brūmo yat prabhāvātiśaya-varṇanam anucitaṃ rājñām,
analyzed: na tat asti na vayam brūmaḥ yat prabhāva atiśaya varṇanam anucitam rājñām

original: kiṃ tu kevala-mānuṣāśrayeṇa yotpādya-vastu-kathā kriyate tasyāṃ divyam aucityaṃ na yojanīyam /
analyzed: kim tu kevala mānuṣa āśrayeṇa yā utpādya vastu kathā kriyate tasyām divyam aucityam na yojanīyam

original: divya-mānuṣyāyāṃ tu kathāyām ubhayaucitya-yojanam aviruddham eva /
analyzed: divya mānuṣyāyām tu kathāyām ubhaya aucitya yojanam a viruddham eva

original: yathā pāṇḍv-ādi-kathāyām /
analyzed: yathā pāṇḍu ādi kathāyām

original: sātavāhanādiṣu tu yeṣu yāvad apadānaṃ śrūyate teṣu tāvan-mātram anugamyamānam anuguṇatvena pratibhāsate /
analyzed: sātavāhana ādiṣu tu yeṣu yāvat apadānam śrūyate teṣu tāvat mātram anugamyamānam anuguṇa tvena pratibhāsate

original: vyatiriktaṃ tu teṣām evopanibadhyamānam anucitam /
analyzed: vyatiriktam tu teṣām eva upanibadhyamānam anucitam

original: tad ayam atra paramārthaḥ-
analyzed: tat ayam atra parama arthaḥ

original: anaucityād ṛte nānyad rasa-bhangasya kāraṇam /
analyzed: anaucityāt ṛte nā anyat rasa bhangasya kāraṇam

original: prasiddhaucitya-bandhas tu rasasyopaniṣat parā //
analyzed: prasiddha aucitya bandhaḥ tu rasasya upaniṣad parā

original: ata eva ca bharate prakhyāta-vastu-viṣayatvaṃ prakhyātodātta-nāyakatvaṃ ca nāṭakasyāvaśya-kartavyatayopanyastam /
analyzed: atas eva ca bharate prakhyāta vastu viṣaya tvam prakhyāta udātta nāyaka tvam ca nāṭakasya avaśya kartavya tayā upanyastam

original: tena hi nāyakaucityānaucitya-viṣaye kavir na vyāmuhyati /
analyzed: tena hi nāyaka aucitya anaucitya viṣaye kaviḥ na vyāmuhyati

original: yas tūtpādya-vastu nāṭakādi kuryāt tasyāprasiddhānucita-nāyaka-svabhāva-varṇane mahān pramādaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu utpādya vastu nāṭaka ādi kuryāt tasya aprasiddha anucita nāyaka svabhāva varṇane mahān pramādaḥ

original: nanu yady utsāhādi-bhāva-varṇane kathañcid divya-mānuṣyādy-aucitya-parīkṣā kriyate tat kriyatām,
analyzed: nanu yadi utsāha ādi bhāva varṇane kathañcid divya mānuṣya ādi aucitya parīkṣā kriyate tat kriyatām

original: raty-ādau tu kiṃ tayā prayojanam ?
analyzed: rati ādau tu kim tayā prayojanam

original: ratir hi bhāratavarṣocitenaiva vyavahāreṇa divyānām api varṇanīyeti sthitiḥ /
analyzed: ratiḥ hi bhārata varṣa ucitena eva vyavahāreṇa divyānām api varṇanīyā iti sthitiḥ

original: naivam /
analyzed: na evam

original: tatraucityātikrameṇa sutarāṃ doṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatra aucitya atikrameṇa sutarām doṣaḥ

original: tathā hy adhama-prakṛtyaucityenottama-prakṛteḥ śṛṅgāropanibandhane kā bhaven nopahāsyatā /
analyzed: tathā hi adhama prakṛti aucityena uttama prakṛteḥ śṛṅgāra upanibandhane kā bhavet na upahāsya tā

original: trividhaṃ prakṛty-aucityaṃ bhārate varṣe 'py asti śṛṅgāra-viṣayam /
analyzed: trividham prakṛti aucityam bhārate varṣe pi asti śṛṅgāra viṣayam

original: yat tu divyam aucityaṃ tat tatrānupakārakam eveti cet-na vayaṃ divyam aucityaṃ śṛṅgāra-viṣayam anyat kiṃcid brūmaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu divyam aucityam tat tatra anupakārakam evā iti ced na vayam divyam aucityam śṛṅgāra viṣayam anyat kiṃcid brūmaḥ

original: kiṃ tarhi ? bhāratavarṣa-viṣaye yathottama-nāyakeṣu rājādiṣu śṛṅgāropanibandhas tathā divyāśrayo 'pi śobhate /
analyzed: kim tarhi bhārata varṣa viṣaye yathā uttama nāyakeṣu rāja ādiṣu śṛṅgāra upanibandhaḥ tathā śobhate

original: na ca rājādiṣu prasiddha-grāmya-śṛṅgāropanibandhanaṃ prasiddhaṃ nāṭakādau,
analyzed: na ca rāja ādiṣu prasiddha grāmya śṛṅgāra upanibandhanam prasiddham nāṭaka ādau

original: tathaiva deveṣu tat parihartavyam /
analyzed: tathā eva deveṣu tat parihartavyam

original: nāṭakāder abhineyārthatvād abhinayasya ca sambhoga-śṛṅgāra-viṣayasyāsabhyatvāt tatra parihāra iti cet-na;
analyzed: nāṭaka ādeḥ abhineya artha tvāt abhinayasya ca sambhoga śṛṅgāra viṣayasya asabhya tvāt tatra parihāraḥ iti ced na

original: yady abhinayasyaivaṃ-viṣayasyāsabhyatā tat kāvyasyaivaṃ-viṣayasya sā kena nivāryate ?
analyzed: yadi abhinayasya evaṃviṣayasya asabhya tā tat kāvyasya evaṃviṣayasya sā kena nivāryate

original: tasmād abhineyārthe 'nabhineyārthe vā kāvye yad uttama-prakṛte rājāder uttama-prakṛtibhir
analyzed: tasmāt abhineya arthe na abhineya arthe vā kāvye yat uttama prakṛte rāja ādeḥ uttama prakṛtibhiḥ

original: nāyikābhiḥ saha grāmya-sambhoga-varṇanaṃ tat pitroḥ sambhoga-varṇanam iva sutarām asabhyam /
analyzed: nāyikābhiḥ saha grāmya sambhoga varṇanam tat pitroḥ sambhoga varṇanam iva sutarām asabhyam

original: tathaivottama-devatādi-viṣayam /
analyzed: tathā eva uttama devatā ādi viṣayam

original: na ca sambhoga-śṛṅgārasya surata-lakṣaṇa evaikaḥ prakāraḥ,
analyzed: na ca sambhoga śṛṅgārasya surata lakṣaṇaḥ evā ekaḥ prakāraḥ

original: yāvad anye 'pi prabhedāḥ paraspara-prema-darśanādayaḥ sambhavanti,
analyzed: yāvat anye pi prabhedāḥ paraspara prema darśana ādayaḥ sambhavanti

original: te kasmād uttama-prakṛti-viṣaye na varṇyante ?
analyzed: te kasmāt uttama prakṛti viṣaye na varṇyante

original: tasmād utsāhavad ratāv api prakṛty-aucityam anusartavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt utsāha vat ratau api prakṛti aucityam anusartavyam

original: tathaiva vismayādiṣu /
analyzed: tathā eva vismaya ādiṣu

original: yat tv evaṃ-vidhe viṣaye mahākavīnām apy asamīkṣya-kāritā lakṣye dṛśyate sa doṣa eva /

analyzed: prasnigdhāḥ kvacid iṅgudī phala bhidaḥ sūcyante eva upalāḥ

original: viśvāsopagamād abhinna-gatayaḥ śabdaṃ sahante mṛgās
analyzed: viśvāsa upagamāt abhinna gatayaḥ śabdam sahante mṛgāḥ

original: toyādhāra-pathāś ca valkala-śikhā-niṣyanda-lekhāṅkitāḥ //ity ādau /
analyzed: toya ādhāra pathāḥ ca valkala śikhā nisyanda lekhā aṅkitāḥ iti ādau

original: dvitrāṇāṃ copasargāṇām ekatra pade yaḥ prayogaḥ so 'pi rasa-vyakty-anuguṇatayaiva nirdoṣaḥ /
analyzed: dvitrāṇām ca upasargāṇām ekatra pade yaḥ prayogaḥ saḥ u pi rasa vyakti anuguṇa tayā eva nirdoṣaḥ

original: yathā-“prabhraśyaty uttarīya-tviṣi tamasi samudvīkṣya vītāvṛtīn drāg jantūn” ity ādau /
analyzed: yathā prabhraśyati uttarīya tviṣi tamasi samudvīkṣya vīta āvṛtīn drāk jantūn iti ādau

original: yathā vā-“manuṣya-vṛttyā samupācarantam” ity ādau /
analyzed: yathā vā amanuṣya vṛttyā samupācarantam iti ādau

original: nipātānām api tathaiva /
analyzed: nipātānām api tathā eva

original: yathā-“aho batāsi spṛhaṇīya-vīryaḥ” ity ādau / yathā vā-
analyzed: yathā aho bata asi spṛhaṇīya vīryaḥ iti ādau yathā vā

original: ye jīvanti na mānti ye sma vapuṣi prītyā pranṛtyanti ca
analyzed: ye jīvanti na mānti ye sma vapuṣi prītyā pranṛtyanti ca

original: prasyandi-pramadāśravaḥ pulakitā dṛṣṭe guṇiny ūrjite /
analyzed: prasyandi pramadā śravaḥ pulakitāḥ dṛṣṭe guṇini ūrjite

original: hā dhik kaṣṭam aho kva yāmi śaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ janānāṃ kṛte
analyzed: hā dhik kaṣṭam aho kva yāmi śaraṇam teṣām janānām kṛte

original: nītānāṃ pralayaṃ śaṭhena vidhinā sādhu-dviṣaḥ puṣyatā //ity ādau /
analyzed: nītānām pralayam śaṭhena vidhinā sādhu dviṣaḥ puṣyatai iti ādau

original: pada-paunaruktyaṃ ca vyañjakatvāpekṣayaiva kadācitprayujyamānaṃ śobhāmāvahati /
analyzed: pada paunaruktyam ca vyañjaka tva apekṣayā eva kadācid prayujyamānam śobhām āvahati

original: yathā-
analyzed: yathā

original: yad vañcanāhita-matir bahu-cāṭu-garbhaṃ
analyzed: yat vañcana āhita matiḥ bahu cāṭu garbham

original: kāryonmukhaḥ khala-janaḥ kṛtakaṃ bravīti /
analyzed: kārya unmukhaḥ khala janaḥ kṛtakam bravīti

original: tat sādhavo na na vidanti vidanti kintu
analyzed: tat sādhavaḥ na na vidanti vidanti kintu

original: kartuṃ vṛthā-praṇayam asya na pārayanti //ity ādau /
analyzed: kartum vṛthā praṇayam asya na pārayanti iti ādau

original: kālasya vyañjakatvaṃ yathā-
analyzed: kālasya vyañjaka tvam yathā

original: sama-viṣama-nirviśeṣāḥ samantato manda-manda-sañcārāḥ /
analyzed: sama viṣama nirviśeṣāḥ samantataḥ manda manda sañcārāḥ

original: acirād bhaviṣyanti panthāno manorathānām api durlaṅghyāḥ //
analyzed: acirāt bhaviṣyanti panthānaḥ manorathānām api durlaṅghyāḥ

original: atra hy acirād bhaviṣyanti panthāna ity atra bhaviṣyantīty asmin pade pratyayaḥ kāla-viśeṣābhidhāyī rasa-paripoṣa-hetuḥ prakāśate /
analyzed: atra hi acirāt bhaviṣyanti panthānaḥ iti atra bhaviṣyanti iti asmin pade pratyayaḥ kāla viśeṣa abhidhāyī rasa paripoṣa hetuḥ prakāśate

original: ayaṃ hi gāthārthaḥ pravāsa-vipralambha-śṛṅgāra-vibhāvatayā vibhāvyamāno rasavān /
analyzed: ayam hi gāthā arthaḥ pravāsa vipralambha śṛṅgāra vibhāva tayā vibhāvyamānaḥ rasavān

original: yathātra pratyayāṃśo vyañjakas tathā kvacit prakṛty-aṃśo 'pi dṛśyate / yathā-
analyzed: yathā atra pratyaya aṃśaḥ vyañjakaḥ tathā kvacid prakṛti aṃśaḥ dṛśyate yathā

original: tad gehaṃ nata-bhitti mandiram idaṃ labdhāvagāhaṃ divaḥ
analyzed: tat geham nata bhitti mandiram idam labdha avagāham divaḥ

original: sā dhenur jaratī caranti kariṇām etā ghanābhā ghaṭāḥ /
analyzed: sā dhenuḥ jaratī caranti kariṇām etāḥ ghana ābhāḥ ghaṭāḥ

original: sa kṣudro musala-dhvaniḥ kalam idaṃ saṅgītakaṃ yoṣitām
analyzed: sa kṣudraḥ musala dhvaniḥ kalam idam saṅgītakam yoṣitām

original: āścaryaṃ divasair dvijo 'yam iyatīṃ bhūmiṃ samāropitaḥ //
analyzed: āścaryam divasaiḥ dvijaḥ yam iyatīm bhūmim samāropitaḥ

original: atra śloke divasair ity asmin pade prakṛty-aṃśo 'pi dyotakaḥ /
analyzed: atra śloke divasaiḥ iti asmin pade prakṛti aṃśaḥ dyotakaḥ

original: sarva-nāmnāṃ ca vyañjakatvaṃ yathānantarokte śloke /
analyzed: sarvanāmnām ca vyañjaka tvam yathā anantara ukte śloke

original: atra ca sarva-nāmnām eva vyañjakatvaṃ hṛdi vyavasthāpya kavinā kvety-ādi-śabda-prayogo na kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: atra ca sarvanāmnām eva vyañjaka tvam hṛdi vyavasthāpya kavinā kva ityādi śabda prayogaḥ na kṛtaḥ

original: anayā diśā sahṛdayair anye 'pi vyañjaka-viśeṣāḥ svayam utprekṣaṇīyāḥ /
analyzed: anayā diśā sahṛdayaiḥ anye vyañjaka viśeṣāḥ svayam utprekṣaṇīyāḥ

original: etac ca sarvaṃ pada-vākya-racanā-dyotanoktyaiva gatārtham api vaicitryeṇa vyutpattaye punar-uktam /
analyzed: etat ca sarvam pada vākya racanā dyotana uktyā eva gatārtham api vaicitryeṇa vyutpattaye punar uktam

original: nanu cārtha-sāmarthyākṣepyā rasādaya ity uktam,
analyzed: nanu ca artha sāmarthya ākṣepyāḥ rasa ādayaḥ iti uktam

original: tathā ca subādīnāṃ vyañjakatva-vaicitrya-kathanam ananvitam eva /
analyzed: tathā ca sup ādīnām vyañjaka tva vaicitrya kathanam ananvitam eva

original: uktam atra padānāṃ vyañjakatvokty-avasare /
kiṃ cārtha-viśeṣākṣepyatve 'pi rasādīnāṃ teṣām artha-viśeṣāṇāṃ vyañjaka-śabdāvinābhāvitvād yathā-pradarśitaṃ vyañjaka-svarūpa-parijñānaṃ vibhajyopayujyata  #
analyzed: kim ca artha viśeṣa ākṣepya tve pi rasa ādīnām teṣām artha viśeṣāṇām vyañjaka śabda avinābhāvi tvāt yathā pradarśitam vyañjaka svarūpa parijñānam vibhajya upayujyata

original: eva /
analyzed: eva

original: śabda-viśeṣāṇāṃ cānyatra ca cārutvaṃ yad vibhāgenopadarśitaṃ tad api teṣāṃ vyañjakatvenaivāvasthitam ity avagantavyam /
analyzed: śabda viśeṣāṇām ca anyatra ca cāru tvam yat vibhāgena upadarśitam tat api teṣām vyañjaka tvena eva avasthitam iti avagantavyam

original: yatrāpi na tat sampratibhāsate tatrāpi vyañjake racanāntare yad adṛṣṭaṃ sauṣṭhavaṃ teṣāṃ pravāha-patitānāṃ tad evābhyāsād apoddhṛtānām apy  #
analyzed: yatra api na tat sampratibhāsate tatra api vyañjake racanā antare yat adṛṣṭam sauṣṭhavam teṣām pravāha patitānām tat eva abhyāsāt apoddhṛtānām api

original: avabhāsata ity avasātavyam /
analyzed: avabhāsate iti avasātavyam

original: ko 'nyathā tulye vācakatve śabdānāṃ cārutva-viṣayo viśeṣaḥ syāt /
analyzed: kaḥ nyathā tulye vācaka tve śabdānām cāru tva viṣayaḥ viśeṣaḥ syāt

original: anya evāsau sahṛdaya-saṃvedya iti cet,
analyzed: anyaḥ eva asau sahṛdaya saṃvedyaḥ iti ced

original: kim idaṃ sahṛdayatvaṃ nāma ?
analyzed: kim idam sahṛdaya tvam nāma

original: kiṃ rasa-bhāvānapekṣa-kāvyāśrita-samaya-viśeṣābhijñatvam,
analyzed: kim rasa bhāva anapekṣa kāvya āśrita samaya viśeṣa abhijña tvam

original: uta rasa-bhāvādi-maya-kāvya-svarūpa-parijñāna-naipuṇyam /
analyzed: uta rasa bhāva ādi maya kāvya svarūpa parijñāna naipuṇyam

original: pūrvasmin pakṣe tathāvidha-sahṛdaya-vyavasthāpitānāṃ śabda-viśeṣāṇāṃ cārutva-niyamo na syāt /
analyzed: pūrvasmin pakṣe tathāvidha sahṛdaya vyavasthāpitānām śabda viśeṣāṇām cāru tva niyamaḥ na syāt

original: punaḥ samayāntareṇānyathāpi vyavasthāpana-sambhavāt /
analyzed: punar samaya antareṇa anyathā api vyavasthāpana sambhavāt

original: dvitīyasmiṃs tu pakṣe rasajñataiva sahṛdayatvam iti /
analyzed: dvitīyasmin tu pakṣe rasa jña tā eva sahṛdaya tvam iti

original: tathā-vidhaiḥ sahṛdayaiḥ saṃvedyo rasādi-samarpaṇa-sāmarthyam eva naisargikaṃ śabdānāṃ viśeṣa iti vyañjakatvāśrayy eva teṣāṃ mukhyaṃ cārutvam
analyzed: tathāvidhaiḥ sahṛdayaiḥ saṃvedyaḥ rasa ādi samarpaṇa sāmarthyam eva naisargikam śabdānām viśeṣaḥ iti vyañjaka tva āśrayi eva teṣām mukhyam cāru tvam

original: vācakatvāśrayāṇāṃ tu prasāda evārthāpekṣāyāṃ teṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: vācaka tva āśrayāṇām tu prasādaḥ eva artha apekṣāyām teṣām viśeṣaḥ

original: arthānapekṣāyāṃ tv anuprāsādir eva // DhvA_3.15-16 //
analyzed: artha anapekṣāyām tu anuprāsa ādiḥ eva

original: evaṃ rasādīnāṃ vyañjaka-svarūpam abhidhāya teṣām eva virodhi-rūpaṃ lakṣayitum idam upakramyate-
analyzed: evam rasa ādīnām vyañjaka svarūpam abhidhāya teṣām eva virodhi rūpam lakṣayitum idam upakramyate

original: prabandhe muktake vāpi rasādīn bandhum icchatā /
analyzed: prabandhe muktake vā api rasa ādīn bandhum icchatā

original: yatnaḥ kāryaḥ sumatinā parihāre virodhinām // DhvK_3.17 //
analyzed: yatnaḥ kāryaḥ sumatinā parihāre virodhinām

original: prabandhe muktake vāpi rasa-bhāva-nibandhanaṃ pratyādṛta-manāḥ kavir virodhi-parihāre paraṃ yatnam ādadhīta /
analyzed: prabandhe muktake vā api rasa bhāva nibandhanam pratyādṛta manāḥ kaviḥ virodhi parihāre param yatnam ādadhīta

original: anyathā tv asya rasa-mayaḥ śloka eko 'pi samyaṅ na sampadyate // 3.17 //
analyzed: anyathā tu asya rasa mayaḥ ślokaḥ samyak na sampadyate  /

original: kāni punas tāni virodhīni yāni yatnataḥ kaveḥ parihartavyāni ? ity ucyate-
analyzed: kāni punar tāni virodhīni yāni yatnataḥ kaveḥ parihartavyāni iti ucyate

original: virodhi-rasa-sambandhi-vibhāvādi-parigrahaḥ /
analyzed: virodhi rasa sambandhi vibhāva ādi parigrahaḥ

original: vistareṇānvitasyāpi vastuno 'nyasya varṇanam // DhvK_3.18 //
analyzed: vistareṇa anvitasya api vastunaḥ nyasya varṇanam

original: akāṇḍa eva vicchittir akāṇḍe ca prakāśanam /
analyzed: akāṇḍe eva vicchittiḥ akāṇḍe ca prakāśanam

original: paripoṣaṃ gatasyāpi paunaḥpunyena dīpanam /
analyzed: paripoṣam gatasya api paunaḥpunyena dīpanam

original: rasasya syād virodhāya vṛtty-anaucityam eva ca // DhvK_3.19 //
analyzed: rasasya syāt virodhāya vṛtti anaucityam eva ca

original: prastuta-rasāpekṣayā virodhī yo rasas tasya sambandhināṃ vibhāva-bhāvānubhāvānāṃ parigraho rasa-virodha-hetukaḥ sambhavanīyaḥ /
analyzed: prastuta rasa apekṣayā virodhī yaḥ rasaḥ tasya sambandhinām vibhāva bhāva anubhāvānām parigrahaḥ rasa virodha hetukaḥ sambhavanīyaḥ

original: tatra virodhi-rasa-vibhāva-parigraho yathā śānta-rasa-vibhāveṣu tad-vibhāvatayaiva nirūpiteṣv anantaram eva śṛṅgārādi-vibhāva-varṇane /
analyzed: tatra virodhi rasa vibhāva parigrahaḥ yathā śānta rasa vibhāveṣu tad vibhāva tayā eva nirūpiteṣu anantaram eva śṛṅgāra ādi vibhāva varṇane

original: virodhi-rasa-bhāva-parigraho yathā priyaṃ prati praṇaya-kalaha-kupitāsu kāminīṣu vairāgya-kathābhir anunaye /
analyzed: virodhi rasa bhāva parigrahaḥ yathā priyam prati praṇaya kalaha kupitāsu kāminīṣu vairāgya kathābhiḥ anunaye

original: virodhi-rasānubhāva-parigraho yathā praṇaya-kupitāyāṃ priyāyām aprasīdantyāṃ nāyakasya kopāveśa-vivaśasya raudrānubhāva-varṇane /
analyzed: virodhi rasa anubhāva parigrahaḥ yathā praṇaya kupitāyām priyāyām a prasīdantyām nāyakasya kopa āveśa vivaśasya raudra anubhāva varṇane

original: ayaṃ cānyo rasa-bhaṅga-hetur yat prastuta-rasāpekṣayā vastuno 'nyasya kathañcid anvitasyāpi vistareṇa kathanam /
analyzed: ayam ca anyaḥ rasa bhaṅga hetuḥ yat prastuta rasa apekṣayā vastunaḥ nyasya kathañcid anvitasya api vistareṇa kathanam

original: yathā vipralambha-śṛṅgāre nāyakasya kasyacid varṇayitum upakrānte kaver yamakādy-alaṅkāra-nibandhana-rasikatayā mahatā prabandhena parvatādi-varṇane
analyzed: yathā vipralambha śṛṅgāre nāyakasya kasyacid varṇayitum upakrānte kaveḥ yamaka ādi alaṅkāra nibandhana rasika tayā mahatā prabandhena parvata ādi varṇane

original: ayaṃ cāparo rasa-bhaṅga-hetur avagantavyo yad akāṇḍa eva vicchittiḥ rasasyākaṇḍa eva ca prakāśanam /
analyzed: ayam ca aparaḥ rasa bhaṅga hetuḥ avagantavyaḥ yat akāṇḍe eva vicchittiḥ rasasya akaṇḍe eva ca prakāśanam

original: tatrānavasare virāmo rasasya yathā nāyakasya kasyacit spṛhaṇīya-samāgamayā nāyikayā
analyzed: tatra anavasare virāmaḥ rasasya yathā nāyakasya kasyacid spṛhaṇīya samāgamayā nāyikayā

original: kayācit parāṃ paripoṣa-padavīṃ prāpte śṛṅgāre vidite ca parasparānurāge samāgamopāya-cintocitaṃ
analyzed: kayācid parām paripoṣa padavīm prāpte śṛṅgāre vidite ca paraspara anurāge samāgama upāya cintā ucitam

original: vyavahāram utsṛjya svatantratayā vyāpārāntara-varṇane /
analyzed: vyavahāram utsṛjya svatantra tayā vyāpāra antara varṇane

original: anavasare ca prakāśanaṃ rasasya yathā pravṛtte pravṛtta-vividha-vīra-saṅkṣaye kalpa-saṅkṣaya-kalpe
analyzed: anavasare ca prakāśanam rasasya yathā pravṛtte pravṛtta vividha vīra saṅkṣaye kalpa saṅkṣaya kalpe
