original: saṅgrāme rāma-deva-prāyasyāpi tāvan nāyakasyānupakrānta-vipralambha-śṛṅgārasya nimittam
analyzed: saṅgrāme rāmadeva prāyasya api tāvat nāyakasya anupakrānta vipralambha śṛṅgārasya nimittam

original: ucitam antareṇaiva śṛṅgāra-kathāyām avatāra-varṇane /
analyzed: ucitam antareṇa eva śṛṅgāra kathāyām avatāra varṇane

original: na caivaṃ-vidhe viṣaye daiva-vyāmohitatvaṃ kathā-puruṣasya parihāro yato rasa-bandha eva kaveḥ prādhānyena pravṛtti-nibandhanaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: na ca evaṃvidhe viṣaye daiva vyāmohita tvam kathā puruṣasya parihāraḥ yatas rasa bandhaḥ eva kaveḥ prādhānyena pravṛtti nibandhanam yuktam

original: itivṛtta-varṇanaṃ tad-upāya evety uktaṃ prāk “ālokārthi yathā dīpa-śikhāyāṃ yatnavān janaḥ” ity ādinā /
analyzed: iti vṛtta varṇanam tad upāyaḥ eva iti uktam prāk āloka arthi yathā dīpa śikhāyām yatnavān janaḥ iti ādinā

original: ata eva cetivṛtta-mātra-varṇana-prādhānye 'ṅgāṅgi-bhāva-rahita-rasa-bhāva-nibandhena
analyzed: atas eva ca iti vṛtta mātra varṇana prādhānye ṅga aṅgi bhāva rahita rasa bhāva nibandhena

original: ca kavīnām evaṃ-vidhāni skhalitāni bhavantīti rasādi-rūpa-vyaṅgya-tātparyam evaiṣāṃ
analyzed: ca kavīnām evaṃvidhāni skhalitāni bhavanti iti rasa ādi rūpa vyaṅgya tātparyam eva eṣām

original: yuktam iti yatno 'smābhir ārabdho na dhvani-pratipādana-mātrābhiniveśena /
analyzed: yuktam iti smābhiḥ ārabdhaḥ na dhvani pratipādana mātra abhiniveśena

original: punaś cāyam anyo rasa-bhaṅga-hetur avadhāraṇīyo yat paripoṣaṃ gatasyāpi rasasya paunaḥpunyena dīpanam /
analyzed: punar ca ayam anyaḥ rasa bhaṅga hetuḥ avadhāraṇīyaḥ yat paripoṣam gatasya api rasasya paunaḥpunyena dīpanam

original: upabhukto hi rasaḥ sva-sāmagrī-labdha-paripoṣaḥ punaḥ punaḥ parāmṛśyamānaḥ parimlāna-kusuma-kalpaḥ kalpate /
analyzed: upabhuktaḥ hi rasaḥ sva sāmagrī labdha paripoṣaḥ punar punar parāmṛśyamānaḥ parimlāna kusuma kalpaḥ kalpate

original: tathā vṛtter vyavahārasya yad anaucityaṃ tad api rasa-bhaṅga-hetur eva /
analyzed: tathā vṛtteḥ vyavahārasya yat anaucityam tat api rasa bhaṅga hetuḥ eva

original: yathā nāyakaṃ prati nāyikāyāḥ kasyāścid ucitāṃ bhaṅgim antareṇa svayaṃ sambhogābhilāṣa-kathane /
analyzed: yathā nāyakam prati nāyikāyāḥ kasyāścid ucitām bhaṅgim antareṇa svayam sambhoga abhilāṣa kathane

original: yadi vā vṛttīnāṃ bharata-prasiddhānāṃ kaiśikyādīnāṃ kāvyālaṅkārāntara-prasiddhānām upanāgarikādyānāṃ vā yad anaucityam aviṣaye nibandhanaṃ  #
analyzed: yadi vā vṛttīnām bharata prasiddhānām kaiśikī ādīnām kāvya alaṅkāra antara prasiddhānām upanāgarika ādyānām vā yat anaucityam aviṣaye nibandhanam

original: tad api rasa-bhaṅga-hetuḥ /
analyzed: tat api rasa bhaṅga hetuḥ

original: evam eṣāṃ rasa-virodhinām anyeṣāṃ cānayā diśā svayam utprekṣitānāṃ parihāre sat-kavibhir avahitair bhavitavyam /
analyzed: evam eṣām rasa virodhinām anyeṣām ca anayā diśā svayam utprekṣitānām parihāre sat kavibhiḥ avahitaiḥ bhavitavyam

original: parikara-ślokāś cātra-
analyzed: parikara ślokāḥ ca atra

original: mukhyā vyāpāra-viṣayāḥ sukavīnāṃ rasādayaḥ /
analyzed: mukhyāḥ vyāpāra viṣayāḥ su kavīnām rasa ādayaḥ

original: teṣām nibandhane bhāvye taiḥ sadaivāpramādibhiḥ //
analyzed: teṣām nibandhane bhāvye taiḥ sadā eva apramādibhiḥ

original: nīrasas tu prabandho yaḥ so 'paśabdo mahān kaveḥ /
analyzed: nīrasaḥ tu prabandhaḥ yaḥ saḥ u paśabdaḥ mahān kaveḥ

original: sa tenākavir eva syād anyenāsmṛta-lakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: sa tena akaviḥ eva syāt anyena asmṛta lakṣaṇaḥ

original: pūrve viśṛṅkhala-giraḥ kavayaḥ prāpya-kīrtayaḥ /
analyzed: pūrve viśṛṅkhala giraḥ kavayaḥ prāpya kīrtayaḥ

original: tān samāśritya na tyājyā nītir eṣā manīṣiṇā //
analyzed: tān samāśritya na tyājyā nītiḥ eṣā manīṣiṇā

original: vālmīki-vyāsa-mukhyāś ca ye prakhyātāḥ kavīśvarāḥ /
analyzed: vālmīki vyāsa mukhyāḥ ca ye prakhyātāḥ kavi īśvarāḥ

original: tad-abhiprāya-bāhyo 'yaṃ nāsmābhir darśito nayaḥ //iti// DhvA_3.19 //
analyzed: tad abhiprāya bāhyaḥ yam na asmābhiḥ darśitaḥ nayaḥ iti

original: vivakṣite rase labdha-pratiṣṭhe tu virodhinām /
analyzed: vivakṣite rase labdha pratiṣṭhe tu virodhinām

original: bādhyānām aṅga-bhāvaṃ vā prāptānām uktir acchalā // DhvK_3.20 //
analyzed: bādhyānām aṅga bhāvam vā prāptānām uktiḥ a chalā

original: sva-sāmagryā labdha-paripoṣe tu vivakṣite rase virodhināṃ virodhi-rasāṅgānāṃ bādhyānām aṅga-bhāvaṃ vā prāptānāṃ satām uktir adoṣā /
analyzed: sva sāmagryāḥ labdha paripoṣe tu vivakṣite rase virodhinām virodhi rasa aṅgānām bādhyānām aṅga bhāvam vā prāptānām satām uktiḥ adoṣā

original: bādhyatvaṃ hi virodhināṃ śakyābhibhavatve sati nānyathā /
analyzed: bādhya tvam hi virodhinām śakya abhibhava tve sati nā anyathā

original: tathā ca teṣām uktiḥ prastuta-rasa-paripoṣāyaiva sampadyate /
analyzed: tathā ca teṣām uktiḥ prastuta rasa paripoṣāya eva sampadyate

original: aṅga-bhāvaṃ prāptānāṃ ca teṣāṃ virodhitvam eva nivartate /
analyzed: aṅga bhāvam prāptānām ca teṣām virodhi tvam eva nivartate

original: aṅga-bhāva-prāptir hi teṣāṃ svābhāvikī samāropa-kṛtā vā /
analyzed: aṅga bhāva prāptiḥ hi teṣām svābhāvikī samāra upakṛtā vā

original: tatra yeṣāṃ naisargikī teṣāṃ tāvad uktāv avirodha eva /
analyzed: tatra yeṣām naisargikī teṣām tāvat uktau avirodhaḥ eva

original: yathā vipralambha-śṛṅgāre tad-aṅgānāṃ vyādhy-ādīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca tad-aṅgānām evādoṣo nātad-aṅgānām /
analyzed: yathā vipralambha śṛṅgāre tad aṅgānām vyādhi ādīnām teṣām ca tad aṅgānām eva adoṣaḥ na a tad aṅgānām

original: tad-aṅgatve ca sambhavaty api maraṇasyopanyāso na jyāyān /
analyzed: tad aṅga tve ca sambhavati api maraṇasya upanyāsaḥ na jyāyān

original: āśraya-vicchede rasasyātyanta-viccheda-prāpteḥ /
analyzed: āśraya vicchede rasasya atyanta viccheda prāpteḥ

original: karuṇasya tu tathā-vidhe viṣaye paripoṣo bhaviṣyatīti cet na ;
analyzed: karuṇasya tu tathāvidhe viṣaye paripoṣaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced na

original: yasyāprastutatvāt prastutasya ca vicchedāt /
analyzed: yasya a prastuta tvāt prastutasya ca vicchedāt

original: yatra tu karuṇa-rasasyaiva kāvyārthatvaṃ tatrāvirodhaḥ /
analyzed: yatra tu karuṇa rasasya eva kāvya artha tvam tatra avirodhaḥ

original: śṛṅgāre vā maraṇasyādīrgha-kāla-pratyāpatti-sambhave kadācid upanibandho nātyanta-virodhī /
analyzed: śṛṅgāre vā maraṇasya adīrgha kāla pratyāpatti sambhave kadācid upanibandhaḥ na atyanta virodhī

original: dīrgha-kāla-pratyāpattau tu tasyāntarā pravāha-viccheda evety evaṃ-vidhetivṛttopanibandhanaṃ rasa-bandha-pradhānena kavinā parihartavyam /
analyzed: dīrgha kāla pratyāpattau tu tasya antarā pravāha vicchedaḥ evā iti evaṃvidha iti vṛtta upanibandhanam rasa bandha pradhānena kavinā parihartavyam

original: tatra labdha-pratiṣṭhe tu vivakṣite rase virodhi-rasāṅgānāṃ bādhyatvenoktāv adoṣo yathā-
analyzed: tatra labdha pratiṣṭhe tu vivakṣite rase virodhi rasa aṅgānām bādhya tvena uktau adoṣaḥ yathā

original: kvākaryaṃ śaśa-lakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā
analyzed: kva akaryam śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulam dṛśyeta sā

original: doṣāṇāṃ praśamāya me śrutam aho kope 'pi kāntaṃ mukham /
analyzed: doṣāṇām praśamāya me śrutam aho kope kāntam mukham

original: kiṃ vakṣyanty apakalmaṣāḥ kṛta-dhiyaḥ svapne 'pi sā durlabhā
analyzed: kim vakṣyanti apakalmaṣāḥ kṛta dhiyaḥ svapne sā durlabhā

original: cetaḥ svāsthyam upaihi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ pāsyati //
analyzed: cetaḥ svāsthyam upaihi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyaḥ dharam pāsyati

original: yathā vā puṇḍarīkasya mahāśvetāṃ prati pravṛtta-nirbharānurāgasya dvitīya-muni-kumāropadeśa-varṇane /
analyzed: yathā vā puṇḍarīkasya mahāśvetām prati pravṛtta nirbhara anurāgasya dvitīya muni kumāra upadeśa varṇane

original: svābhāvikyām aṅga-bhāva-prāptāv adoṣo yathā-
analyzed: svābhāvikyām aṅga bhāva prāptau adoṣaḥ yathā

original: bhramim aratim alasa-hṛdayatāṃ
analyzed: bhramim aratim alasa hṛdaya tām

original: pralayaṃ mūrcchāṃ tamaḥ śarīra-sādam /
analyzed: pralayam mūrcchām tamaḥ śarīra sādam

original: maraṇaṃ ca jalada-bhujagajaṃ
analyzed: maraṇam ca jalada bhuja gajam

original: prasahya kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām //ity ādau /
analyzed: prasahya kurute viṣam viyoginīnām iti ādau

original: samāropitāyām apy avirodho yathā-“pāṇḍu-kṣāmam” ity ādau /
analyzed: samāropitāyām api avirodhaḥ yathā āpāṇḍu kṣāmam iti ādau

original: iyaṃ cāṅga-bhāva-prāptir anyā yadādhikārikatvāt pradhāna ekasmin vākyārthe rasayor bhāvayor vā paraspara-virodhinor dvayor aṅga-bhāva-gamanaṃ  #
analyzed: iyam ca aṅga bhāva prāptiḥ anyā yadā ādhikārika tvāt pradhāne ekasmin vākya arthe rasayoḥ bhāvayoḥ vā paraspara virodhinoḥ dvayoḥ aṅga bhāva gamanam

original: tasyām api na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: tasyām api na doṣaḥ

original: yathoktaṃ “kṣipto hāstāvalagnaḥ” ity ādau /
analyzed: yathā uktam kṣiptaḥ hā astāvalagnaḥ iti ādau

original: kathaṃ tatrāvirodha iti cet,
analyzed: katham tatra avirodhaḥ iti ced

original: dvayor api tayor anya-paratvena vyavasthānāt /
analyzed: dvayoḥ api tayoḥ anya para tvena vyavasthānāt

original: anya-paratve 'pi virodhinoḥ kathaṃ virodha-nivṛttir iti cet,
analyzed: anya para tve virodhinoḥ katham virodha nivṛttiḥ iti ced

original: ucyate-vidhau viruddha-samāveśasya duṣṭatvaṃ nānuvāde / yathā-
analyzed: ucyate vidhau viruddha samāveśasya duṣṭa tvam na anuvāde yathā

original: ehi gaccha patottiṣṭha vada maunaṃ samācara /
analyzed: ehi gaccha pata uttiṣṭha vada maunam samācara

original: evam āśā-graha-grastaiḥ krīḍanti dhanino 'rthibhiḥ //ity ādau /
analyzed: evam āśā graha grastaiḥ krīḍanti dhaninaḥ rthibhiḥ iti ādau

original: atra hi vidhi-pratiṣedhayor anūdyamānatvena samāveśe na virodhas tathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: atra hi vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ anūdyamāna tvena samāveśe na virodhaḥ tathā iha api bhaviṣyati

original: śloke hy asminn īrṣyā-vipralambha-śṛṅgāra-karuṇa-vastunor na vidhīyamānatvam /
analyzed: śloke hi asmin īrṣyā vipralambha śṛṅgāra karuṇa vastunoḥ na vidhīyamāna tvam

original: tripura-ripu-prabhāvātiśayasya vākyārthatvāt tad-aṅgatvena ca tayor vyavasthānāt /
analyzed: tripura ripu prabhāva atiśayasya vākya artha tvāt tad aṅga tvena ca tayoḥ vyavasthānāt

original: na ca raseṣu vidhy-anuvāda-vyavahāro nāstīti śakyaṃ vaktum,
analyzed: na ca raseṣu vidhi anuvāda vyavahāraḥ na asti iti śakyam vaktum

original: teṣāṃ vākyārthatvenābhyupagamāt /
analyzed: teṣām vākya artha tvena abhyupagamāt

original: vākyārthasya vācyasya ca yau vidhy-anuvādau tau tad-ākṣiptānāṃ rasānāṃ kena vāryate /
analyzed: vākya arthasya vācyasya ca yau vidhi anuvādau tau tad ākṣiptānām rasānām kena vāryate

original: yair vā sākṣāt-kāvyārthatā rasādīnāṃ nābhyupagamyate,
analyzed: yaiḥ vā sākṣāt kāvya artha tā rasa ādīnām na abhyupagamyate

original: tais teṣāṃ tan-nimittatā tāvad avaśyam abhyupagantavyā /
analyzed: taiḥ teṣām tad nimitta tā tāvat avaśyam abhyupagantavyā

original: tathāpy atra śloke na virodhaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api atra śloke na virodhaḥ

original: yasmād anūdyamānāṅga-nimittobhaya-rasa-vastu-sahakāriṇo vidhīyamānāṃśād bhāva-viśeṣa-pratītir utpadyate tataś ca na kaścid virodhaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt anūdyamāna aṅga nimitta ubhaya rasa vastu sahakāriṇaḥ vidhīyamāna aṃśāt bhāva viśeṣa pratītiḥ utpadyate tatas ca na kaścid virodhaḥ

original: dṛśyate hi viruddhobhaya-sahakāriṇaḥ kāraṇāt kārya-viśeṣotpattiḥ /
analyzed: dṛśyate hi viruddha ubhaya sahakāriṇaḥ kāraṇāt kārya viśeṣa utpattiḥ

original: viruddha-phalotpādana-hetutvaṃ hi yugapad ekasya kāraṇasya viruddhaṃ na tu viruddhobhaya-sahakāritvam /
analyzed: viruddha phala utpādana hetu tvam hi yugapad ekasya kāraṇasya viruddham na tu viruddha ubhaya sahakāri tvam

original: evaṃ-vidha-viruddha-padārtha-viṣayaḥ katham abhinayaḥ prayoktavya iti cet,
analyzed: evaṃvidha viruddha padārtha viṣayaḥ katham abhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ iti ced

original: anūdyamānaivaṃ-vidha-vācya-viṣaye yā vārtā sātrāpi bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: anūdyamānā evaṃvidha vācya viṣaye yā vārtā sā atrā api bhaviṣyati

original: evaṃ-vidhy-anuvādanayāśrayeṇātra śloke parihṛtas tāvad virodhaḥ /
analyzed: evaṃvidhi anuvāda nayā āśrayeṇa atra śloke parihṛtaḥ tāvat virodhaḥ

original: kiṃ ca nāyakasyābhinandanīyodayasya kasyacit prabhāvātiśaya-varṇane tat-pratipakṣāṇāṃ
analyzed: kim ca nāyakasya abhinandanīya udayasya kasyacid prabhāva atiśaya varṇane tad pratipakṣāṇām

original: yaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ sa parīkṣakāṇāṃ na vaiklavyam ādadhāti pratyuta prīty-atiśaya-nimittatāṃ
analyzed: yaḥ karuṇaḥ rasaḥ sa parīkṣakāṇām na vaiklavyam ādadhāti pratyuta prīti atiśaya nimitta tām

original: pratipadyata ity atas tasya kuṇṭha-śaktikatvāt tad-virodha-vidhāyino na kaścid doṣaḥ /
analyzed: pratipadyate iti atas tasya kuṇṭhaśaktika tvāt tad virodha vidhāyinaḥ na kaścid doṣaḥ

original: tasmād vākyārthī-bhūtasya rasasya bhāvasya vā virodhī rasa-virodhīti vaktuṃ nyāyyaḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt vākya arthībhūtasya rasasya bhāvasya vā virodhī rasa virodhī iti vaktum nyāyyaḥ

original: na tv aṅga-bhūtasya kasyacit /
analyzed: na tu aṅga bhūtasya kasyacid

original: athavā vākyārthī-bhūtasyāpi kasyacit karuṇa-rasa-viṣayasya tādṛśena śṛṅgāra-vastunā bhaṅgi-viśeṣāśrayeṇa saṃyojanaṃ rasa-paripoṣāyaiva jāyate
analyzed: athavā vākya arthībhūtasya api kasyacid karuṇa rasa viṣayasya tādṛśena śṛṅgāra vastunā bhaṅgi viśeṣa āśrayeṇa saṃyojanam rasa paripoṣāya eva jāyate

original: yataḥ prakṛti-madhurāḥ padārthāḥ śocanīyatāṃ prāptāḥ prāg-avasthā-bhāvibhiḥ saṃsmaryamāṇair vilāsair adhikataraṃ śokāveśam upajanayanti / yathā-
analyzed: yatas prakṛti madhurāḥ padārthāḥ śocanīya tām prāptāḥ prāc avasthā bhāvibhiḥ saṃsmaryamāṇaiḥ vilāsaiḥ adhikataram śoka āveśam upajanayanti yathā

original: ayaṃ sa raśanotkarṣī pīna-stana-vimardanaḥ /
analyzed: ayam sa raśanā utkarṣī pīna stana vimardanaḥ

original: nābhyūru-jaghana-sparśī nīvī-visraṃsanaḥ karaḥ //ity ādau /
analyzed: nābhi ūru jaghana sparśī nīvī visraṃsanaḥ karaḥ iti ādau

original: tad atra tripura-yuvatīnāṃ śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnir ārdrāparādhaḥ kāmī yathā vyavaharati sma /
analyzed: tat atra tripura yuvatīnām śāmbhavaḥ śara agniḥ ārdra aparādhaḥ kāmī yathā vyavaharati sma

original: tathā vyavahṛtavān ity anenāpi prakāreṇāsty eva nirvirodhatvam /
analyzed: tathā vyavahṛtavān iti anena api prakāreṇa asti eva nirvirodha tvam

original: tasmād yathā yathā nirūpyate tathā tathātra doṣābhāvaḥ / itthaṃ ca-
analyzed: tasmāt yathā yathā nirūpyate tathā tathā atra doṣa abhāvaḥ ittham ca

original: krāmantyaḥ kṣata-komalāṅguli-galad-raktaiḥ sadarbhāḥ sthalīḥ
analyzed: krāmantyaḥ kṣata komala aṅguli galat raktaiḥ sa darbhāḥ sthalīḥ

original: pādaiḥ pātita-yāvakair iva patad-bāṣpāmbu-dhautānanāḥ /
analyzed: pādaiḥ pātita yāvakaiḥ iva patat bāṣpa ambu dhauta ānanāḥ

original: bhītā bhartṛ-karāvalambita-karās tvad-vairi-nātho 'dhunā
analyzed: bhītāḥ bhartṛ kara avalambita karāḥ tvad vairi nāthaḥ dhunā

original: dāvāgniṃ parito bhramanti punar apy udyad-vivāhā iva //
analyzed: dāva agnim paritas bhramanti punar api udyat vivāhāḥ iva

original: ity evam ādīnāṃ sarveṣām eva nirvirodhatvam avagantavyam /
analyzed: iti evam ādīnām sarveṣām eva nirvirodha tvam avagantavyam

original: evaṃ tāvad rasādīnāṃ virodhi-rasādibhiḥ samāveśāsamāveśayor viṣaya-vibhāgo darśitaḥ // DhvA_3.20 //
analyzed: evam tāvat rasa ādīnām virodhi rasa ādibhiḥ samāveśa asamāveśayoḥ viṣaya vibhāgaḥ darśitaḥ

original: idānīṃ teṣām eka-prabandha-viniveśane nyāyyo yaḥ kramas taṃ pratipādayitum ucyate-
analyzed: idānīm teṣām eka prabandha viniveśane nyāyyaḥ yaḥ kramaḥ tam pratipādayitum ucyate

original: prasiddhe 'pi prabandhānāṃ nānā-rasa-nibandhane /
analyzed: prasiddhe pi prabandhānām nānā rasa nibandhane

original: eko raso 'ṅgīkartavyas teṣām utkarṣam icchatā // DhvK_3.21 //
analyzed: ekaḥ rasaḥ ṅgīkartavyaḥ teṣām utkarṣam icchatā

original: prabandheṣu mahākāvyādiṣu nāṭakādiṣu vā viprakīrṇatayāṅgāṅgi-bhāvena bahavo rasā
analyzed: prabandheṣu mahākāvya ādiṣu nāṭaka ādiṣu vā viprakīrṇa tayā aṅga aṅgi bhāvena bahavaḥ rasāḥ

original: upanibadhyanta ity atra prasiddhau satyām api yaḥ prabandhānāṃ chāyātiśaya-yogam
analyzed: upanibadhyante iti atra prasiddhau satyām api yaḥ prabandhānām chāyā atiśaya yogam

original: icchati tena teṣāṃ rasānām anyatamaḥ kaścid vivakṣito raso 'ṅgitvena viniveśayitavya
analyzed: icchati tena teṣām rasānām anyatamaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ rasaḥ ṅgi tvena viniveśayitavya

original: ity ayaṃ yuktataro mārgaḥ // DhvA_3.21 //
analyzed: iti ayam yuktataraḥ mārgaḥ

original: nanu rasāntareṣu bahuṣu prāpta-paripoṣeṣu satsu katham ekasyāṅgitā na virudhyata ity āśaṅkyedam ucyate-
analyzed: nanu rasa antareṣu bahuṣu prāpta paripoṣeṣu satsu katham ekasya aṅgi tā na virudhyate iti āśaṅkya idam ucyate

original: rasāntara-samāveśaḥ prastutasya rasasya yaḥ /
analyzed: rasa antara samāveśaḥ prastutasya rasasya yaḥ

original: nopahanty aṅgitāṃ so 'sya sthāyitvenāvabhāsinaḥ // DhvK_3.22 //
analyzed: na upahanti aṅgi tām saḥ sya sthāyi tvena avabhāsinaḥ

original: prabandheṣu prathamataraṃ prastutaḥ san punaḥ punar anusandhīyamānatvena sthāyī yo
analyzed: prabandheṣu prathamataram prastutaḥ san punar punar anusandhīyamāna tvena sthāyī yaḥ

original: rasas tasya sakala-bandha-vyāpino rasāntarair antarāla-vartibhiḥ samāveśo yaḥ sa
analyzed: rasaḥ tasya sakala bandha vyāpinaḥ rasa antaraiḥ antarāla vartibhiḥ samāveśaḥ yaḥ sa

original: nāṅgitām upahanti // DhvA_3.22 //
analyzed: na aṅgitām upahanti

original: etad evopapādayitum ucyate-
analyzed: etat eva upapādayitum ucyate

original: kāryam ekaṃ yathā vyāpi prabandhasya vidhīyate /
analyzed: kāryam ekam yathā vyāpi prabandhasya vidhīyate

original: tathā rasasyāpi vidhau virodho naiva vidyate // DhvK_3.23 //
analyzed: tathā rasasya api vidhau virodhaḥ nā eva vidyate

original: sandhyādi-mayasya prabandha-śarīrasya yathā kāryam ekam anuyāyi vyāpakaṃ kalpyate na ca tat-kāryāntarair na saṅkīryate,
analyzed: sandhyā ādi mayasya prabandha śarīrasya yathā kāryam ekam anuyāyi vyāpakam kalpyate na ca tat kārya antaraiḥ na saṅkīryate

original: na ca taiḥ saṅkīryamāṇasyāpi tasya prādhānyam apacīyate,
analyzed: na ca taiḥ saṅkīryamāṇasya api tasya prādhānyam apacīyate

original: tathaiva rasasyāpy ekasya sanniveśe kriyamāṇe virodho na kaścit /
analyzed: tathā eva rasasya api ekasya sanniveśe kriyamāṇe virodhaḥ na kaścid

original: pratyuta pratyudita-vivekānām anusandhānavatāṃ sa-cetasāṃ tathā-vidhe viṣaye prahlādātiśayaḥ pravartate // DhvA_3.23 //
analyzed: pratyuta pratyudita vivekānām anusandhānavatām sa cetasām tathāvidhe viṣaye prahlāda atiśayaḥ pravartate

original: nanu yeṣāṃ rasānāṃ parasparāvirodhaḥ yathā-vīra-śṛṅgārayoḥ śṛṅgāra-hāsyayo raudra-śṛṅgārayor
analyzed: nanu yeṣām rasānām paraspara avirodhaḥ yathā vīra śṛṅgārayoḥ śṛṅgāra hāsyayoḥ raudra śṛṅgārayoḥ

original: vīrādbhutayor vīra-raudrayo raudra-karuṇayoḥ śṛṅgārādbhutayor vā tatra bhavatv aṅgāṅgi-bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: vīra adbhutayoḥ vīra raudrayoḥ raudra karuṇayoḥ śṛṅgāra adbhutayoḥ vā tatra bhavatu aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ

original: teṣāṃ tu sa kathaṃ bhaved yeṣāṃ parasparaṃ bādhya-bādhaka-bhāvaḥ ?
analyzed: teṣām tu sa katham bhavet yeṣām parasparam bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ

original: yathā-śṛṅgāra-bībhatsayor vīra-bhayānakayoḥ śānta-raudrayoḥ śanta-śṛṅgārayor vā ity āśaṅkyedam ucyate-
analyzed: yathā śṛṅgāra bībhatsayoḥ vīra bhayānakayoḥ śānta raudrayoḥ vā iti āśaṅkya idam ucyate

original: avirodhī virodhī vā raso 'ṅgini rasāntare /
analyzed: avirodhī virodhī vā rasaḥ ṅgini rasa antare

original: paripoṣaṃ na netavyas tathā syād avirodhitā // DhvK_3.24 //
analyzed: paripoṣam na netavyaḥ tathā syāt avirodhi tā

original: aṅgini rasāntare śṛṅgārādau prabandha-vyaṅgye sati avirodhī virodhī vā rasaḥ paripoṣaṃ na netavyaḥ /
analyzed: aṅgini rasa antare śṛṅgāra ādau prabandha vyaṅgye sati avirodhī virodhī vā rasaḥ paripoṣam na netavyaḥ

original: tatrāvirodhino rasasyāṅgi-rasāpekṣayāty antam ādhikyaṃ na kartavyam ity ayaṃ prathamaḥ paripoṣa-parihāraḥ /
analyzed: tatra avirodhinaḥ rasasya aṅgirasa apekṣayā ati antam ādhikyam na kartavyam iti ayam prathamaḥ paripoṣa parihāraḥ

original: utkarṣa-sāmye 'pi tayor virodhāsambhavāt / yathā-
analyzed: utkarṣa sāmye pi tayoḥ virodha asambhavāt yathā

original: ekato roditi priyā anyataḥ samara-tūrya-nirghoṣaḥ /
analyzed: ekatas roditi priyā anyatas samara tūrya nirghoṣaḥ

original: snehena raṇa-rasena ca bhaṭasya dolāyitaṃ hṛdayam /
analyzed: snehena raṇa rasena ca bhaṭasya dolāyitam hṛdayam

original: yathā vā-
analyzed: yathā vā

original: kaṇṭhāc chitvākṣamālāvalayam iva kare hāram āvartayantī
analyzed: kaṇṭhāt śitvā akṣamālā valayam iva kare hāram āvartayantī

original: kṛtvā paryaṅka-bandhaṃ viṣadhara-patinā mekhalāyā guṇena /
analyzed: kṛtvā paryaṅka bandham viṣadhara patinā mekhalāyāḥ guṇena

original: mithyā-mantrābhijāpasphurad-adhara-puṭa-vyañjitāvyakta-hāsā
analyzed: mithyā mantra abhijāpa sphurat adhara puṭa vyañjita avyakta hāsā

original: devī sandhyābhyasūyā hasita-paśupatis tatra dṛṣṭā tu vo 'vyāt //ity atra /
analyzed: devī sandhyā abhyasūyā hasita paśupatiḥ tatra dṛṣṭā tu vaḥ iti atra

original: aṅgirasa-viruddhānāṃ vyabhicāriṇāṃ prācuryeṇāniveśanam,
analyzed: aṅgirasa viruddhānām vyabhicāriṇām prācuryeṇa a niveśanam

original: niveśane vā kṣipram evāṅgirasa-vyabhicāry-anuvṛttir iti dvitīyaḥ /
analyzed: niveśane vā kṣipram eva āṅgirasa vyabhicāri anuvṛttiḥ iti dvitīyaḥ

original: aṅgatvena punaḥ punaḥ pratyavekṣā paripoṣaṃ nīyamānasyāpy aṅga-bhūtasya rasasyeti tṛtīyaḥ /
analyzed: aṅga tvena punar punar pratyavekṣā paripoṣam nīyamānasya api aṅga bhūtasya rasasya iti tṛtīyaḥ

original: anayā diśānye 'pi prakārā utprekṣaṇīyāḥ /
analyzed: anayā diśā anye pi prakārāḥ utprekṣaṇīyāḥ

original: virodhinas tu rasasyāṅgirasāpekṣayā kasyacin nyūnatā sampādanīyā /
analyzed: virodhinaḥ tu rasasya aṅgirasa apekṣayā kasyacid nyūna tā sampādanīyā

original: yathā śānte 'ṅgini śṛṅgārasya śṛṅgāre vā śāntasya /
analyzed: yathā śānte ṅgini śṛṅgārasya śṛṅgāre vā śāntasya

original: paripoṣa-rahitasya rasasya kathaṃ rasatvam iti cet-uktam atrāṅgirasāpekṣayeti /
analyzed: paripoṣa rahitasya rasasya katham rasa tvam iti ced uktam atra āṅgirasa apekṣayā iti

original: aṅgino hi rasasya yāvān paripoṣas tāvāṃs tasya na kartavyaḥ,
analyzed: aṅginaḥ hi rasasya yāvān paripoṣaḥ tāvān tasya na kartavyaḥ

original: svatas tu sambhavī paripoṣaḥ kena vāryate /
analyzed: svatas tu sambhavī paripoṣaḥ kena vāryate

original: etac cāpekṣikaṃ prakarṣa-yogitvam ekasya rasasya bahu-raseṣu prabandheṣu rasānām
analyzed: etat ca āpekṣikam prakarṣa yogi tvam ekasya rasasya bahu raseṣu prabandheṣu rasānām

original: aṅgāṅgi-bhāvam anabhyupagacchatāpy aśakya-pratikṣepam ity anena prakāreṇāvirodhināṃ
analyzed: aṅga aṅgi bhāvam an abhyupagacchatā api aśakya pratikṣepam iti anena prakāreṇa avirodhinām

original: virodhināṃ ca rasānām aṅgāṅgi-bhāvena samāveśe prabandheṣu syād avirodhaḥ /
analyzed: virodhinām ca rasānām aṅga aṅgi bhāvena samāveśe prabandheṣu syāt avirodhaḥ

original: etac ca sarvaṃ yeṣāṃ raso rasāntarasya vyabhicārī bhavati iti darśanaṃ tan-matenocyate /
analyzed: etat ca sarvam yeṣām rasaḥ rasa antarasya vyabhicārī bhavati iti darśanam tad matena ucyate

original: matāntare 'pi rasānāṃ sthāyino bhāvā upacārād rasa-śabdenoktās teṣām aṅgatvaṃ nirvirodham eva // DhvA_3.24 //
analyzed: mata antare pi rasānām sthāyinaḥ bhāvāḥ upacārāt rasa śabdena uktāḥ teṣām aṅga tvam nirvirodham eva

original: evam avirodhināṃ virodhināṃ ca prabandha-sthenāṅginā rasena samāveśe sādhāraṇam avirodhopāyaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ virodhi-viṣayam eva taṃ pratipādayitum  #
analyzed: evam avirodhinām virodhinām ca prabandha sthena aṅginā rasena samāveśe sādhāraṇam avirodha upāyam pratipādya idānīm virodhi viṣayam eva tam pratipādayitum

original: idam ucyate-
analyzed: idam ucyate

original: viruddhaikāśrayo yas tu virodhī sthāyino bhavet /
analyzed: viruddha eka āśrayaḥ yaḥ tu virodhī sthāyinaḥ bhavet

original: sa vibhinnāśrayaḥ kāryas tasya poṣe 'py adoṣatā // DhvK_3.25 //
analyzed: sa vibhinna āśrayaḥ kāryaḥ tasya poṣe pi adoṣa tā

original: ekādhikaraṇy avirodhī nairantarya-virodhī ceti dvividho virodhī /
analyzed: eka adhikaraṇī avirodhī nairantarya virodhī ca iti dvividhaḥ virodhī

original: tatra prabandha-sthena sthāyināṅginā rasenaucityāpekṣayā viruddhaikāśrayo yo virodhī yathā vīreṇa bhayānakaḥ sa vibhinnāśrayaḥ kāryaḥ /
analyzed: tatra prabandha sthena sthāyinā aṅginā rasena aucitya apekṣayā viruddha eka āśrayaḥ yaḥ virodhī yathā vīreṇa bhayānakaḥ sa vibhinna āśrayaḥ kāryaḥ

original: tasya vīrasya ya āśrayaḥ kathānāyakas tad-vipakṣa-viṣaye sanniveśayitavyaḥ /
analyzed: tasya vīrasya yaḥ āśrayaḥ kathā nāyakaḥ tad vipakṣa viṣaye san niveśayitavyaḥ

original: tathā sati ca tasya virodhino 'pi yaḥ paripoṣaḥ sa nirdoṣaḥ /
analyzed: tathā sati ca tasya yaḥ paripoṣaḥ sa nirdoṣaḥ

original: vipakṣa-viṣaye hi bhayātiśaya-varṇane nāyakasya naya-parākramādi-sampat sutarām uddyotitā bhavati /
analyzed: vipakṣa viṣaye hi bhaya atiśaya varṇane nāyakasya naya parākrama ādi sampad sutarām uddyotitā bhavati

original: etac ca madīye 'rjuna-carite 'rjunasya pātālāvataraṇa-prasaṅge vaiśadyena pradarśitam /
analyzed: etat ca madīye rjuna carite rjunasya pātāla avataraṇa prasaṅge vaiśadyena pradarśitam

original: evam aikādhikaraṇya-virodhinaḥ prabandha-sthena sthāyinā rasenāṅga-bhāva-gamane nirvirodhatvaṃ yathā tathā tad darśitam /
analyzed: evam aika adhikaraṇya virodhinaḥ prabandha sthena sthāyinā rasena aṅga bhāva gamane nirvirodha tvam yathā tathā tat darśitam

original: dvitīyasya tu tat pratipādayitum ucyate-
analyzed: dvitīyasya tu tat pratipādayitum ucyate

original: ekāśrayatve nirdoṣo nairantarye virodhavān /
analyzed: eka āśraya tve nirdoṣaḥ nairantarye virodhavān

original: rasāntara-vyavadhinā raso vyaṅgyaḥ sumedhasā // DhvK_3.26 //
yaḥ punar ekādhikaraṇatve nirvirodho nairantarye tu virodhī sa rasāntara-vyavadhānena prabandhe niveśayitavyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ punar eka adhikaraṇa tve nirvirodhaḥ nairantarye tu virodhī sa rasa antara vyavadhānena prabandhe niveśayitavyaḥ

original: yathā śānta-śṛṅgārau nāgānande niveśitau /
analyzed: yathā śānta śṛṅgārau nāgānande niveśitau

original: śāntaś ca tṛṣṇā-kṣaya-sukhasya yaḥ paripoṣas tal-lakṣaṇo rasaḥ pratīyata eva /
analyzed: śāntaḥ ca tṛṣṇā kṣaya sukhasya yaḥ paripoṣaḥ tad lakṣaṇaḥ rasaḥ pratīyate eva

original: tathā coktam-
analyzed: tathā ca uktam

original: yac ca kāma-sukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham /
analyzed: yat ca kāma sukham loke yat ca divyam mahat sukham

original: tṛṣṇākṣaya-sukhasyaite nārhataḥ ṣoḍaśīṃ kalām //
analyzed: tṛṣṇā kṣaya sukhasya ete na arhataḥ ṣoḍaśīm kalām

original: yadi nāma sarva-janānubhava-gocaratā tasya nāsti naitāvatāsāv aloka-sāmānya-mahānubhāva-citta-vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ pratikṣeptuṃ śakyaḥ /
analyzed: yadi nāma sarva jana anubhava gocara tā tasya nā asti na etāvatā asau aloka sāmānya mahā anubhāva cittavṛtti viśeṣaḥ pratikṣeptum śakyaḥ

original: na ca vīre tasyāntar-bhāvaḥ kartuṃ yuktaḥ /
analyzed: na ca vīre tasya antarbhāvaḥ kartum yuktaḥ

original: tasyābhimāna-mayatvena vyavasthāpanāt /
analyzed: tasya abhimāna maya tvena vyavasthāpanāt

original: asya cāhaṅkāra-praśamaika-rūpatayā sthiteḥ /
analyzed: asya ca ahaṅkāra praśama eka rūpa tayā sthiteḥ

original: tayoś caivaṃ-vidha-viśeṣa-sadbhāve 'pi yady aikyaṃ parikalpyate tad vīra-raudrayor api tathā prasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ ca evaṃvidha viśeṣa sadbhāve pi yadi aikyam parikalpyate tat vīra raudrayoḥ api tathā prasaṅgaḥ

original: dayā-vīrādīnāṃ ca citta-vṛtti-viśeṣāṇāṃ sarvākāram ahaṅkāra-rahitatvena śānta-rasa-prabhedatvam,
analyzed: dayā vīra ādīnām ca citta vṛtti viśeṣāṇām sarvākāram ahaṅkāra rahita tvena śānta rasa prabheda tvam

original: itarathā tu vīra-prabhedatvam iti vyavasthāpyamāne na kaścid virodhaḥ /
analyzed: itarathā tu vīra prabheda tvam iti vyavasthāpyamāne na kaścid virodhaḥ

original: tad evam asti śānto rasaḥ /
analyzed: tat evam asti śāntaḥ rasaḥ

original: tasya cāviruddha-rasa-vyavadhānena prabandhe virodhi-rasa-samāveśe saty api nirvirodhatvam /
analyzed: tasya ca aviruddha rasa vyavadhānena prabandhe virodhi rasa samāveśe sati api nirvirodha tvam

original: yathā pradarśite viṣaye // DhvA_3.26 //
analyzed: yathā pradarśite viṣaye

original: etad eva sthirī-kartum idam ucyate-
analyzed: etat eva sthirīkartum idam ucyate

original: rasāntarāntaritayor eka-vākya-sthayor api /
analyzed: rasa antara antaritayoḥ eka vākya sthayoḥ api

original: nivartate hi rasayoḥ samāveśe virodhitā // DhvK_3.27 //
analyzed: nivartate hi rasayoḥ samāveśe virodhi tā

original: rasāntara-vyavahitayor eka-prabandha-sthayor virodhitā nivartata ity atra na kācid bhrāntiḥ /
yasmād eka-vākya-sthayor api rasayor uktayā nītyā viruddhatā nivartate / yathā-
analyzed: yasmāt eka vākya sthayoḥ api rasayoḥ uktayā nītyā viruddha tā nivartate yathā

original: bhū-reṇu-digdhān nava-pārijāta-
analyzed: bhū reṇu digdhān nava pārijāta

original: mālā-rajo-vāsita-bāhu-madhyāḥ /
analyzed: mālā rajaḥ vāsita bāhu madhyāḥ

original: gāḍhaṃ śivābhiḥ parirabhyamāṇān
analyzed: gāḍham śivābhiḥ parirabhyamāṇān

original: surāṅganāśliṣṭa-bhujān tarālāḥ //
analyzed: sura aṅganā āśliṣṭa bhujān tarālāḥ

original: sa-śoṇitaiḥ kravya-bhujāṃ sphuradbhiḥ
analyzed: sa śoṇitaiḥ kravyabhujām sphuradbhiḥ

original: pakṣaiḥ khagānām u pavījyamānān /
analyzed: pakṣaiḥ khagānām u pavījyamānān

original: saṃvījitāś candana-vāri-sekaiḥ
analyzed: saṃvījitāḥ candana vāri sekaiḥ

original: sugandhibhiḥ kalpa-latā-dukūlaiḥ //
analyzed: sugandhibhiḥ kalpalatā dukūlaiḥ

original: vimāna-paryaṅka-tale niṣaṇṇāḥ
analyzed: vimāna paryaṅka tale niṣaṇṇāḥ

original: kutūhalāviṣṭatayā tadānīm /
analyzed: kutūhala āviṣṭa tayā tadānīm

original: nirdiśyamānāṃ lalanāṅgulībhir
analyzed: nirdiśyamānām lalanā aṅgulībhiḥ

original: vīrāḥ sva-dehān patitān apaśyan //ity ādau /
analyzed: vīrāḥ sva dehān patitān apaśyan iti ādau

original: atra hi śṛṅgāra-bībhatsayos tad-aṅgayor vā vīra-rasa-vyavadhānena samāveśo na virodhī /
analyzed: atra hi śṛṅgāra bībhatsayoḥ tad aṅgayoḥ vā vīra rasa vyavadhānena samāveśaḥ na virodhī

original: virodham avirodhaṃ ca sarvatretthaṃ nirūpayet /
analyzed: virodham avirodham ca sarvatra ittham nirūpayet

original: viśeṣatas tu śṛṅgāre sukumāratamā hy asau // DhvK_3.28 //
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ tu śṛṅgāre sukumāratamā hi asau

original: yathokta-lakṣaṇānusāreṇa virodhāvirodhau sarveṣu raseṣu prabandhe 'nyatra ca nirūpayet sahṛdayaḥ;
analyzed: yathā ukta lakṣaṇa anusāreṇa virodha avirodhau sarveṣu raseṣu prabandhe ca nirūpayet sahṛdayaḥ

original: viśeṣatas tu śṛṅgāre /
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ tu śṛṅgāre

original: sa hi rati-paripoṣātmakatvād rateś ca svalpenāpi nimittena bhaṅga-sambhavāt sukumāratamaḥ sarvebhyo rasebhyo manāg api virodhi-samāveśaṃ na  #
analyzed: sa hi rati paripoṣa ātmaka tvāt rateḥ ca su alpena api nimittena bhaṅga sambhavāt sukumāratamaḥ sarvebhyaḥ rasebhyaḥ manāk api virodhi samāveśam na

original: sahate /
analyzed: sahate

original: avadhānātiśayavān rase tatraiva sat-kaviḥ /
analyzed: avadhāna atiśayavān rase tatra eva sat kaviḥ

original: bhavet tasmin pramādo hi jhaṭity evopalakṣyate // DhvK_3.29 //
analyzed: bhavet tasmin pramādaḥ hi jhaṭiti evā upalakṣyate

original: tatraiva ca rase sarvebhyo 'pi rasebhyaḥ saukumāryātiśaya-yogini kavir avadhānavān prayatnavān syāt /
analyzed: tatra eva ca rase sarvebhyaḥ rasebhyaḥ saukumārya atiśaya yogini kaviḥ avadhānavān prayatnavān syāt

original: tatra hi pramādyatas tasya sahṛdaya-madhye kṣipram evāvajñāna-viṣayatā bhavati /
analyzed: tatra hi pramādyataḥ tasya sahṛdaya madhye kṣipram evā avajñāna viṣaya tā bhavati

original: śṛṅgāra-raso hi saṃsāriṇāṃ niyamenānubhava-viṣayatvāt sarva-rasebhyaḥ kamanīyatayā pradhāna-bhūtaḥ /
analyzed: śṛṅgāra rasaḥ hi saṃsāriṇām niyamena anubhava viṣaya tvāt sarva rasebhyaḥ kamanīya tayā pradhāna bhūtaḥ

original: evaṃ ca sati-
analyzed: evam ca sati

original: vineyān unmukhī-kartuṃ kāvya-śobhārtham eva vā /
analyzed: vineyān unmukhīkartum kāvya śobhā artham eva vā

original: tad-viruddha-rasa-sparśas tad-aṅgānāṃ na duṣyati // DhvK_3.30 //
analyzed: tad viruddha rasa sparśaḥ tad aṅgānām na duṣyati

original: śṛṅgāra-viruddha-rasa-sparśaḥ śṛṅgārāṅgānāṃ yaḥ sa na kevalam avirodha-lakṣaṇa-yoge sati na duṣyati yāvad vineyān unmukhīkartuṃ kāvya-śobhārtham  #
analyzed: śṛṅgāra viruddha rasa sparśaḥ śṛṅgāra aṅgānām yaḥ sa na kevalam avirodha lakṣaṇa yoge sati na duṣyati yāvat vineyān unmukhīkartum kāvya śobhā artham

original: eva vā kriyamāṇo na duṣyati /
analyzed: eva vā kriyamāṇaḥ na duṣyati

original: śṛṅgāra-rasāṅgair unmukhī-kṛtāḥ santo hi vineyāḥ sukhaṃ vinayopadeśān gṛhṇanti /
analyzed: śṛṅgāra rasa aṅgaiḥ unmukhīkṛtāḥ santaḥ hi vineyāḥ sukham vinaya upadeśān gṛhṇanti

original: sad-ācāropadeśa-rūpā hi nāṭakādi-goṣṭhī vineya-jana-hitārtham eva munibhir avatāritā /
analyzed: sat ācāra upadeśa rūpā hi nāṭaka ādi goṣṭhī vineya jana hita artham eva munibhiḥ avatāritā

original: kiṃ ca śṛṅgārasya sakala-jana-mano-harābhirāmatvāt tad-aṅga-samāveśaḥ kāvye śobhātiśayaṃ puṣyatīty anenāpi prakāreṇa virodhini rase śṛṅgārāṅga-samāveśo  #
analyzed: kim ca śṛṅgārasya sakala jana manohara abhirāma tvāt tad aṅga samāveśaḥ kāvye śobhā atiśayam puṣyati iti anena api prakāreṇa virodhini rase śṛṅgāra aṅga samāveśaḥ

original: na virodhī /
analyzed: na virodhī

original: tataś ca-
analyzed: tatas ca

original: satyaṃ manoramā rāmāḥ satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ /
analyzed: satyam manoramāḥ rāmāḥ satyam ramyāḥ vibhūtayaḥ

original: kiṃ tu mattāṅganāpāṅga-bhaṅga-lolaṃ hi jīvitam //
analyzed: kim tu matta aṅganā apāṅga bhaṅga lolam hi jīvitam

original: ity ādiṣu nāsti rasa-virodha-doṣaḥ /
analyzed: iti ādiṣu na asti rasa virodha doṣaḥ

original: vijñāyetthaṃ rasādīnām avirodha-virodhayoḥ /
analyzed: vijñāya ittham rasa ādīnām avirodha virodhayoḥ

original: viṣayaṃ sukaviḥ kāvyaṃ kurvan muhyati na kvacit // DhvK_3.31 //
analyzed: viṣayam su kaviḥ kāvyam kurvan muhyati na kvacid

original: ittham anenānantaroktena prakāreṇa rasādīnāṃ rasa-bhāva-tad-ābhāsānāṃ parasparaṃ
analyzed: ittham anena anantara uktena prakāreṇa rasa ādīnām rasa bhāva tad ābhāsānām parasparam

original: virodhasyāvirodhasya ca viṣayaṃ vijñāya sukaviḥ kāvya-viṣaye pratibhātiśaya-yuktaḥ
analyzed: virodhasya avirodhasya ca viṣayam vijñāya su kaviḥ kāvya viṣaye pratibhā atiśaya yuktaḥ

original: kāvyaṃ kurvan na kvacin muhyati /
analyzed: kāvyam kurvan na kvacid muhyati

original: evaṃ rasādiṣu virodhāvirodha-nirūpaṇasyopayogitvaṃ pratipādya vyañjaka-vācya-vācaka-nirūpaṇasyāpi tad-viṣayasya tat pratipādyate-
analyzed: evam rasa ādiṣu virodha avirodha nirūpaṇasya upayogi tvam pratipādya vyañjaka vācya vācaka nirūpaṇasya api tad viṣayasya tat pratipādyate

original: vācyānāṃ vācakānāṃ ca yad aucityena yojanam /
analyzed: vācyānām vācakānām ca yat aucityena yojanam

original: rasādi-viṣayeṇaitat karma mukhyaṃ mahā-kaveḥ // DhvK_3.32 //
analyzed: rasa ādi viṣayeṇa etat karma mukhyam mahā kaveḥ

original: vācyānām itivṛtta-viśeṣāṇāṃ vācakānāṃ ca tad-viṣayāṇāṃ rasādi-viṣayeṇaucityena yad yojanam etan mahākaver mukhyaṃ karma /
analyzed: vācyānām iti vṛtta viśeṣāṇām vācakānām ca tad viṣayāṇām rasa ādi viṣayeṇa aucityena yat yojanam etat mahā kaveḥ mukhyam karma

original: ayam eva hi mahākaver mukhyo vyāpāro yad rasādīnām eva mukhyatayā kāvyārthīkṛtya tad-vyakty-anuguṇatvena śabdānām arthānāṃ copanibandhanam
analyzed: ayam eva hi mahā kaveḥ mukhyaḥ vyāpāraḥ yat rasa ādīnām eva mukhya tayā kāvya arthīkṛtya tad vyakti anuguṇa tvena śabdānām arthānām ca upanibandhanam

original: etac ca rasāditātparyeṇa kāvyanibandhanaṃ bharatādāvapi suprasiddham eveti pratipādayitum āha-
analyzed: etat ca rasa ādi tātparyeṇa kāvya nibandhanam bharata ādau api su prasiddham evā iti pratipādayitum āha

original: rasādy-anuguṇatvena vyavahāro 'rtha-śabdayoḥ /
analyzed: rasa ādi anuguṇa tvena vyavahāraḥ rtha śabdayoḥ

original: aucityavānyastā etā vṛttayo dvividhāḥ sthitāḥ // DhvK_3.33 //
analyzed: aucityavān yaḥ tāḥ etāḥ vṛttayaḥ dvividhāḥ sthitāḥ

original: vyavahāro hi vṛttir ity ucyate /
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ hi vṛttiḥ iti ucyate

original: tatra rasānuguṇa aucityavān vācyāśrayo yo vyavahāras tā etāḥ kaiśiky-ādyā vṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra rasa anuguṇaḥ aucityavān vācya āśrayaḥ yaḥ vyavahāraḥ tāḥ etāḥ kaiśikī ādyāḥ vṛttayaḥ

original: vācakāśrayāś copanāgarikādyāḥ /
analyzed: vācaka āśrayāḥ ca upanāgarika ādyāḥ

original: vṛttayo hi rasādi-tātparyeṇa saṃniveśitāḥ kām api nāṭyasya kāvyasya ca chāyām āvahanti /
analyzed: vṛttayaḥ hi rasa ādi tātparyeṇa saṃniveśitāḥ kām api nāṭyasya kāvyasya ca chāyām āvahanti

original: rasādayo hi dvayor api tayor jīva-bhūtāḥ /
analyzed: rasa ādayaḥ hi dvayoḥ api tayoḥ jīva bhūtāḥ

original: itivṛttādi tu śarīra-bhūtam eva /
analyzed: itivṛtta ādi tu śarīra bhūtam eva

original: atra kecid āhuḥ-“guṇa-guṇi-vyavahāro rasādīnām itivṛttādibhiḥ saha yuktaḥ,
analyzed: atra kecid āhuḥ guṇa guṇi vyavahāraḥ rasa ādīnām iti vṛtta ādibhiḥ saha yuktaḥ

original: na tu jīva-śarīra-vyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: na tu jīva śarīra vyavahāraḥ

original: rasādi-mayaṃ hi vācyaṃ pratibhāsate na tu rasādibhiḥ pṛthag-bhūtam” iti /
analyzed: rasa ādi mayam hi vācyam pratibhāsate na tu rasa ādibhiḥ pṛthak bhūtam iti

original: atrocyate-yadi rasādi-mayam eva vācyaṃ yathā gauratva-mayaṃ śarīram /
analyzed: atrā ucyate yadi rasa ādi mayam eva vācyam yathā gaura tva mayam śarīram

original: evaṃ sati yathā śarīre pratibhāsamāne niyamenaiva gauratvaṃ pratibhāsate sarvasya tathā vācyena sahaiva rasādayo 'pi sahṛdayasyāsahṛdayasya  #
analyzed: evam sati yathā śarīre pratibhāsamāne niyamena eva gaura tvam pratibhāsate sarvasya tathā vācyena saha eva rasa ādayaḥ sahṛdayasya asahṛdayasya

original: ca pratibhāseran /
analyzed: ca pratibhāseran

original: na caivam; tathā caitat pratipāditam eva prathamoddyote /
analyzed: na ca evam tathā ca etat pratipāditam eva prathama uddyote

original: syān matam / ratnānām iva jātyatvaṃ pratipattṛ-viśeṣataḥ saṃvedyaṃ vācyānāṃ rasādi-rūpatvam iti /
analyzed: syāt matam ratnānām iva jātya tvam pratipattṛ viśeṣataḥ saṃvedyam vācyānām rasa ādi rūpa tvam iti

original: naivam /
analyzed: na evam

original: yato yathā jātyatvena pratibhāsamāne ratne ratna-svarūpānatiriktatvam eva tasya lakṣyate tathā rasādīnām api vibhāvānubhāvādi-rūpa-vācyāvyatiriktatvam  #
analyzed: yatas yathā jātya tvena pratibhāsamāne ratne ratna sva rūpa anatirikta tvam eva tasya lakṣyate tathā rasa ādīnām api vibhāva anubhāva ādi rūpa vācya avyatirikta tvam

original: eva lakṣyeta /
analyzed: eva lakṣyeta

original: na caivam; na hi vibhāvānubhāva-vyabhicāriṇa eva rasā iti kasyacid avagamaḥ /
analyzed: na ca evam na hi vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāriṇaḥ eva rasāḥ iti kasyacid avagamaḥ

original: ata eva ca vibhāvādi-pratīty-avinābhāvinī rasādīnāṃ pratītir iti tat-pratītyoḥ kārya-kāraṇa-bhāvena vyavasthānāt kramo 'vaśyambhāvī /
analyzed: atas eva ca vibhāva ādi pratīti avinābhāvinī rasa ādīnām pratītiḥ iti tad pratītyoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvena vyavasthānāt kramaḥ vaśyambhāvī

original: sa tu lāghavān na prakāśyate “ity alakṣya-kramā eva santo vyaṅgyā rasādayaḥ” ity uktam /
analyzed: sa tu lāghavāt na prakāśyate iti alakṣya kramāḥ eva santaḥ vyaṅgyāḥ rasa ādayaḥ iti uktam

original: nanu śabda eva prakaraṇādy-avacchinno vācya-vyaṅgyayoḥ samam eva pratītim upajanayatīti kiṃ tatra krama-kalpanayā /
analyzed: nanu śabdaḥ eva prakaraṇa ādi avacchinnaḥ vācya vyaṅgyayoḥ samam eva pratītim upajanayati iti kim tatra krama kalpanayā

original: na hi śabdasya vācya-pratīti-parāmarśa eva vyañjakatve nibandhanam /
analyzed: na hi śabdasya vācya pratīti parāmarśaḥ eva vyañjaka tve nibandhanam

original: tathā hi gītādi-śabdebhyo 'pi rasābhivyaktir asti /
analyzed: tathā hi gīta ādi śabdebhyaḥ pi rasa abhivyaktiḥ asti

original: na ca teṣām antarā vācya-parāmarśaḥ /
analyzed: na ca teṣām antarā vācya parāmarśaḥ

original: atrāpi brūmaḥ-prakaraṇādy-avacchedena vyañjakatvaṃ śabdānām ity anumatam evaitad asmākam /
analyzed: atrā api brūmaḥ prakaraṇa ādi avacchedena vyañjaka tvam śabdānām iti anumatam eva etat asmākam

original: kiṃ tu tad-vyañjakatvaṃ teṣāṃ kadācit svarūpa-viśeṣa-nibandhanaṃ kadācid vācaka-śakti-nibandhanam /
analyzed: kim tu tad vyañjaka tvam teṣām kadācid svarūpa viśeṣa nibandhanam kadācid vācaka śakti nibandhanam

original: tatra yeṣāṃ vācaka-śakti-nibandhanaṃ teṣāṃ yadi vācya-pratītim antareṇaiva svarūpa-pratītyā niṣpannaṃ tad bhaven na tarhi vācaka-śakti-nibandhanam
analyzed: tatra yeṣām vācaka śakti nibandhanam teṣām yadi vācya pratītim antareṇa eva svarūpa pratītyā niṣpannam tat bhavet na tarhi vācaka śakti nibandhanam

original: atha tan-nibandhanaṃ tan-niyamenaiva vācya-vācaka-bhāva-pratīty-uttara-kālatvaṃ vyaṅgya-pratīteḥ prāptam eva /
analyzed: atha tad nibandhanam tad niyamena eva vācya vācaka bhāva pratīti uttara kāla tvam vyaṅgya pratīteḥ prāptam eva

original: sa tu kramo yadi lāghavān na lakṣyate tat kiṃ kriyate /
analyzed: sa tu kramaḥ yadi lāghavāt na lakṣyate tat kim kriyate

original: yadi ca vācya-pratītim antareṇaiva prakaraṇādy-avacchinna-śabda-mātra-sādhyā rasādi-pratītiḥ
analyzed: yadi ca vācya pratītim antareṇa eva prakaraṇa ādi avacchinna śabda mātra sādhyā rasa ādi pratītiḥ

original: syāt tad-anavadhārita-prakaraṇānāṃ vācya-vācakabhāve ca svayam avyutpannānāṃ pratipattṝṇāṃ
analyzed: syāt tad anavadhārita prakaraṇānām vācya vācaka bhāve ca svayam avyutpannānām pratipattṝṇām

original: kāvya-mātra-śravaṇād evāsau bhavet /
analyzed: kāvya mātra śravaṇāt eva asau bhavet

original: saha-bhāve ca vācya-pratīter anupayogaḥ,
analyzed: sahabhāve ca vācya pratīteḥ anupayogaḥ

original: upayoge vā na sahabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: upayoge vā na sahabhāvaḥ

original: yeṣām api svarūpa-viśeṣa-pratīti-nimittaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ yathā gītādi-śabdānāṃ teṣām api svarūpa-pratīter vyaṅgya-pratīteś ca niyama-bhāvī kramaḥ
analyzed: yeṣām api sva rūpa viśeṣa pratīti nimittam vyañjaka tvam yathā gīta ādi śabdānām teṣām api sva rūpa pratīteḥ vyaṅgya pratīteḥ ca niyama bhāvī kramaḥ

original: tat tu śabdasya kriyā-paurvāparyam ananya-sādhya-tat-phala-ghaṭanāsv āśu-bhāvinīṣu vācyenāvirodhiny abhidheyāntara-vilakṣaṇe rasādau na pratīyate
analyzed: tat tu śabdasya kriyā paurvāparyam ananya sādhya tad phala ghaṭanāsu āśu bhāvinīṣu vācyena avirodhini abhidheya antara vilakṣaṇe rasa ādau na pratīyate

original: kvacit tu lakṣyata eva /
analyzed: kvacid tu lakṣyate eva

original: yathānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgya-pratītiṣu /
analyzed: yathā anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgya pratītiṣu

original: tatrāpi katham iti ced ucyate-artha-śakti-mūlānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgye dhvanau tāvad
analyzed: tatra api katham iti ced ucyate artha śakti mūla anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgye dhvanau tāvat

original: abhidheyasya tat-sāmarthyākṣiptasya cārthasyābhidheyāntara-vilakṣaṇatayātyanta-vilakṣaṇe
analyzed: abhidheyasya tad sāmarthya ākṣiptasya ca arthasya abhidheya antara vilakṣaṇa tayā atyanta vilakṣaṇe

original: ye pratītī tayor aśakya-nihnavo nimitta-nimitti-bhāva iti sphuṭam eva tatra paurvāparyam /
analyzed: ye pratītī tayoḥ aśakya nihnavaḥ nimitta nimitti bhāvaḥ iti sphuṭam eva tatra paurvāparyam

original: yathā prathamoddyote pratīyamānārtha-siddhy-artham udāhṛtāsu gāthāsu /
analyzed: yathā prathama uddyote pratīyamāna artha siddhi artham udāhṛtāsu gāthāsu

original: tathā-vidhe ca viṣaye vācya-vyaṅgyayor atyanta-vilakṣaṇatvād yaiva ekasya pratītiḥ saivetarasyeti na śakyate vaktum /
analyzed: tathāvidhe ca viṣaye vācya vyaṅgyayoḥ atyanta vilakṣaṇa tvāt yā eva ekasya pratītiḥ sā eva itarasya iti na śakyate vaktum

original: śabda-śakti-mūlānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgye tu dhvanau-“gāvo vaḥ pāvanānāṃ parama-parimitāṃ
analyzed: śabda śakti mūla anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgye tu dhvanaugāvaḥ vaḥ pāvanānām param aparimitām

original: prītim utpādayantu” ity ādāv artha-dvaya-pratītau śābdyām artha-dvayasyopamānopameya-bhāva-pratītir
analyzed: prītim utpādayantu iti ādau artha dvaya pratītau śābdyām artha dvayasya upamāna upameya bhāva pratītiḥ

original: upamā-vācaka-pada-virahe saty artha-sāmarthyād ākṣipteti,
analyzed: upamā vācaka pada virahe sati artha sāmarthyāt ākṣiptā iti

original: tatrāpi sulakṣam abhidheya-vyaṅgyālaṅkāra-pratītyoḥ paurvāparyam /
analyzed: tatra api su lakṣam abhidheya vyaṅgya alaṅkāra pratītyoḥ paurvāparyam

original: pada-prakāśa-śabda-śakti-mūlānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgye 'pi dhvanau viśeṣaṇa-padasyobhayārtha-sambandha-yogyasya
analyzed: pada prakāśa śabda śakti mūla anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgye pi dhvanau viśeṣaṇa padasya ubhaya artha sambandha yogyasya

original: yojakaṃ padam antareṇa yojanam aśābdam apy arthād avasthitam ity atrāpi pūrvavad
analyzed: yojakam padam antareṇa yojanam aśābdam api arthāt avasthitam iti atra api pūrvavat

original: abhidheya-tat-sāmarthyākṣiptālaṅkāra-mātra-pratītyoḥ susthitam eva paurvāparyam /
analyzed: abhidheya tad sāmarthya ākṣipta alaṅkāra mātra pratītyoḥ susthitam eva paurvāparyam

original: ārthy api ca pratipattis tathāvidhe viṣaye ubhayārtha-sambandha-yogya-śabda-sāmarthya-prasāviteti śabda-śakti-mūlā kalpyate /
analyzed: ārthī api ca pratipattiḥ tathāvidhe viṣaye ubhaya artha sambandha yogya śabda sāmarthya prasāvitā iti śabda śakti mūlā kalpyate

original: avivakṣita-vācyasya tu dhvaneḥ prasiddha-sva-viṣaya-vaimukhya-pratīti-pūrvakam evārthāntara-prakāśanam iti niyama-bhāvī kramaḥ /
analyzed: avivakṣita vācyasya tu dhvaneḥ prasiddha sva viṣaya vaimukhya pratīti pūrvakam eva artha antara prakāśanam iti niyama bhāvī kramaḥ

original: tatrāvivakṣita-vācyatvād eva vācyena saha vyaṅgyasya krama-pratīti-vicāro na kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tatra avivakṣita vācya tvāt eva vācyena saha vyaṅgyasya krama pratīti vicāraḥ na kṛtaḥ

original: tasmād abhidhānābhidheya-pratītyor iva vācya-vyaṅgya-pratītyor nimitta-nimitti-bhāvān niyama-bhāvī kramaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt abhidhāna abhidheya pratītyoḥ iva vācya vyaṅgya pratītyoḥ nimitta nimitti bhāvāt niyama bhāvī kramaḥ

original: sa tūkta-yuktyā kvacil lakṣyate kvacin na lakṣyate /
analyzed: sa tu ukta yuktyā kvacid lakṣyate kvacid na lakṣyate

original: tad evaṃ vyañjaka-mukhena dhvani-prakāreṣu nirūpiteṣu kaścid brūyāt-kim idaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ nāma vyaṅgyārtha-prakāśanam,
analyzed: tat evam vyañjaka mukhena dhvani prakāreṣu nirūpiteṣu kaścid brūyāt kim idam vyañjaka tvam nāma vyaṅgya artha prakāśanam

original: na hi vyañjakatvam /
analyzed: na hi vyañjaka tvam

original: tad vyaṅgyatvaṃ cārthasya vyañjaka-siddhy-adhīnaṃ vyaṅgyatvam /
analyzed: tat vyaṅgya tvam ca arthasya vyañjaka siddhi adhīnam vyaṅgya tvam

original: vyaṅgyāpekṣayā ca vyañjakatva-siddhir ity anyonya-saṃśrayād avyavasthānam /
analyzed: vyaṅgya apekṣayā ca vyañjaka tva siddhiḥ iti anyonya saṃśrayāt avyavasthānam

original: nanu vācya-vyatiriktasya vyaṅgyasya siddhiḥ prāg eva pratipāditā tat-siddhy-adhīnā ca vyañjaka-siddhir iti kaḥ paryanuyogāvasaraḥ /
analyzed: nanu vācya vyatiriktasya vyaṅgyasya siddhiḥ prāk eva pratipāditā tad siddhi adhīnā ca vyañjaka siddhiḥ iti kaḥ paryanuyoga avasaraḥ

original: satyam evaitat /
analyzed: satyam eva etat

original: prāg-ukta-yuktibhir vācya-vyatiriktasya vastunaḥ siddhiḥ kṛtā,
analyzed: prāgukta yuktibhiḥ vācya vyatiriktasya vastunaḥ siddhiḥ kṛtā

original: sa tv artho vyaṅgyatayaiva kasmād vyapadiśyate yatra ca prādhānyenānavasthānaṃ tatra vācyatayaivāsau vyapadeṣṭuṃ yuktaḥ,
analyzed: sa tu arthaḥ vyaṅgya tayā eva kasmāt vyapadiśyate yatra ca prādhānyena anavasthānam tatra vācya tayā eva asau vyapadeṣṭum yuktaḥ

original: tat-paratvād vākyasya /
analyzed: tad para tvāt vākyasya

original: ataś ca tat-prakāśino vākyasya vācakatvam eva vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: atas ca tad prakāśinaḥ vākyasya vācaka tvam eva vyāpāraḥ

original: kiṃ tasya vyāpārāntara-kalpanayā ?
analyzed: kim tasya vyāpāra antara kalpanayā

original: tasmāt tātparya-viṣayo yo 'rthaḥ sa tāvan mukhyatayā vācyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt tātparya viṣayaḥ yaḥ rthaḥ sa tāvat mukhya tayā vācyaḥ

original: yā tv antarā tathā-vidhe viṣaye vācyāntara-pratītiḥ sā tat-pratīter upāya-mātraṃ padārtha-pratītiriva vākyārtha-pratīteḥ /
analyzed: yā tu antarā tathāvidhe viṣaye vācya antara pratītiḥ sā tad pratīteḥ upāya mātram padārtha pratītiḥ iva vākya artha pratīteḥ

original: atrocyate-yatra śabdaḥ svārtham abhidadhāno 'rthāntaram avagamayati tatra yat tasya svārthābhidhāyitvaṃ yac ca tadarthāntarāvagama-hetutvaṃ  #
analyzed: atra ucyate yatra śabdaḥ sva artham abhidadhānaḥ rtha antaram avagamayati tatra yat tasya sva artha abhidhāyi tvam yat ca tad artha antara avagama hetu tvam

original: tayor aviśeṣo viśeṣo vā /
analyzed: tayoḥ aviśeṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ vā

original: na tāvad aviśeṣaḥ;
analyzed: na tāvat aviśeṣaḥ

original: yasmāt tau dvau vyāpārau bhinna-viṣayau bhinna-rūpau ca pratīyete eva /
analyzed: yasmāt tau dvau vyāpārau bhinna viṣayau bhinna rūpau ca pratīyete eva

original: tathā hi vācakatva-lakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ śabdasya svārtha-viṣayaḥ gamakatva-lakṣaṇas tv arthāntara-viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi vācaka tva lakṣaṇaḥ vyāpāraḥ śabdasya sva artha viṣayaḥ gamaka tva lakṣaṇaḥ tu artha antara viṣayaḥ

original: na ca sva-para-vyavahāro vācya-vyaṅgyayor apahnotuṃ śakyaḥ,
analyzed: na ca sva para vyavahāraḥ vācya vyaṅgyayoḥ apahnotum śakyaḥ

original: ekasya sambandhitvena pratīter aparasya sambandhi-sambandhitvena /
analyzed: ekasya sambandhi tvena pratīteḥ aparasya sambandhi sambandhi tvena

original: vācyo hy arthaḥ sākṣāc-chabdasya sambandhī tad-itaras tv abhidheya-sāmarthyākṣiptaḥ sambandhi-sambandhī /
analyzed: vācyaḥ hi arthaḥ sākṣāt śabdasya sambandhī tad itaraḥ tu abhidheya sāmarthya ākṣiptaḥ sambandhi sambandhī

original: yadi ca sva-sambandhitvaṃ sākṣāt tasya syāt tadārthāntaratva-vyavahāra eva na syāt /
analyzed: yadi ca sva sambandhi tvam sākṣāt tasya syāt tadā artha antara tva vyavahāraḥ eva na syāt

original: tasmād viṣaya-bhedas tāvat tayor vyāpārayoḥ suprasiddhaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt viṣaya bhedaḥ tāvat tayoḥ vyāpārayoḥ su prasiddhaḥ

original: rūpa-bhedo 'pi prasiddha eva /
analyzed: rūpa bhedaḥ pi prasiddhaḥ eva

original: na hi yaivābhidhāna-śaktiḥ saivāvagamana-śaktiḥ /
analyzed: na hi yā eva abhidhāna śaktiḥ sā eva avagamana śaktiḥ

original: avācakasyāpi gīta-śabdāde rasādi-lakṣaṇārthāvagama-darśanāt /
analyzed: avācakasya api gīta śabda ādeḥ rasa ādi lakṣaṇa artha avagama darśanāt

original: aśabdasyāpi ceṣṭāder artha-viśeṣa-prakāśana-prasiddheḥ /
analyzed: a śabdasya api ceṣṭā ādeḥ artha viśeṣa prakāśana prasiddheḥ

original: tathā hi “vrīḍā-yogān natavadanayā” ity ādiśloke ceṣṭāviśeṣaḥ sukavinārtha-prakāśanahetuḥ pradarśita eva /
analyzed: tathā hi vrīḍā yogāt nata vadanayā iti ādi śloke ceṣṭā viśeṣaḥ su kavinā artha prakāśana hetuḥ pradarśitaḥ eva

original: tasmād bhinna-viṣayatvādbhinna-rūpatvāc ca svārthābhidhāyitvam arthāntarāvagama-hetutvaṃ ca śabdasya yat tayoḥ spaṣṭa eva bhedaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt bhinna viṣaya tvāt bhinna rūpa tvāt ca svārtha abhidhāyi tvam artha antara avagama hetu tvam ca śabdasya yat tayoḥ spaṣṭaḥ eva bhedaḥ

original: viśeṣaś cen na tarhīdānīm avagamanasyābhidheya-sāmarthyākṣiptasyārthāntarasya vācyatva-vyapadeśyatā /
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ ced na tarhi idānīm avagamanasya abhidheya sāmarthya ākṣiptasya artha antarasya vācya tva vyapadeśya tā

original: śabda-vyāpāra-gocaratvaṃ tu tasyāsmābhir iṣyata eva,
analyzed: śabda vyāpāra gocara tvam tu tasya asmābhiḥ iṣyate eva

original: tat tu vyaṅgyatvenaiva na vācyatvena /
analyzed: tat tu vyaṅgya tvena eva na vācya tvena

original: prasiddhābhidhānāntara-sambandha-yogyatvena ca tasyārthāntarasya pratīteḥ śabdāntareṇa svārthābhidhāyinā yad-viṣayīkaraṇaṃ tatra prakāśanoktir  #
analyzed: prasiddha abhidhāna antara sambandha yogya tvena ca tasya artha antarasya pratīteḥ śabda antareṇa sva artha abhidhāyinā yat viṣayīkaraṇam tatra prakāśana uktiḥ

original: eva yuktā /
analyzed: eva yuktā

original: na ca padārtha-vākyārtha-nyāyo vācya-vyaṅgyayoḥ /
analyzed: na ca padārtha vākya artha nyāyaḥ vācya vyaṅgyayoḥ

original: yataḥ padārtha-pratītir asatyaiveti kaiścid vidvadbhir āsthitam /
analyzed: yatas padārtha pratītiḥ asatyā evā iti kaiścid vidvadbhiḥ āsthitam

original: yair apy asatyatvam asyā nābhyupeyate tair vākyārtha-padārthayor ghaṭa-tad-upādāna-kāraṇa-nyāyo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ /
analyzed: yaiḥ api asatya tvam asyāḥ na abhyupeyate taiḥ vākya artha padārthayoḥ ghaṭa tad upādānakāraṇa nyāyaḥ bhyupagantavyaḥ

original: yathā hi ghaṭe niṣpanne tad-upādāna-kāraṇānāṃ na pṛthag-upalambhas tathaiva vākye
analyzed: yathā hi ghaṭe niṣpanne tad upādānakāraṇānām na pṛthak upalambhaḥ tathā eva vākye

original: tad-arthe vā pratīte pada-tad-arthānāṃ teṣāṃ tadā vibhaktatayopalambhe vākyārtha-buddhir eva dūrībhavet /
analyzed: tad arthe vā pratīte pada tad arthānām teṣām tadā vibhakta tayā upalambhe vākya artha buddhiḥ eva dūrībhavet

original: na tv eṣa vācya-vyaṅgyayor nyāyaḥ,
analyzed: na tu eṣa vācya vyaṅgyayoḥ nyāyaḥ

original: na hi vyaṅgye pratīyamāne vācya-buddhir dūrībhavati,
analyzed: na hi vyaṅgye pratīyamāne vācya buddhiḥ dūrībhavati

original: vācyāvabhāsāvinābhāvena tasya prakāśanāt /
analyzed: vācya avabhāsa avinābhāvena tasya prakāśanāt

original: tasmād ghaṭa-pradīpa-nyāyas tayoḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt ghaṭa pradīpa nyāyaḥ tayoḥ

original: yathaiva hi pradīpa-dvāreṇa ghaṭa-pratītāv utpannāyāṃ na pradīpa-prakāśo nivartate tad-vyaṅgya-pratītau vācyāvabhāsaḥ /
analyzed: yathā eva hi pradīpa dvāreṇa ghaṭa pratītau utpannāyām na pradīpa prakāśaḥ nivartate tad vyaṅgya pratītau vācya avabhāsaḥ

original: yat tu prathamoddyote “yathā padārtha-dvāreṇa” (1.10)
analyzed: yat tu prathama uddyote yathā padārtha dvāreṇa

original: ity ādy-uktaṃ tad-upāyatva-mātrāt sāmya-vivakṣayā /
analyzed: iti ādi uktam tad upāya tva mātrāt sāmya vivakṣayā

original: nanv evaṃ yugapad-artha-dvaya-yogitvaṃ vākyasya prāptaṃ tad-bhāve ca tasya vākyataiva vighaṭate,
analyzed: nanu evam yugapad artha dvaya yogi tvam vākyasya prāptam tad bhāve ca tasya vākya tā eva vighaṭate

original: tasyā aikārthya-lakṣaṇatvāt ;
analyzed: tasyāḥ aikārthya lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: naiṣa doṣaḥ ;
analyzed: na eṣa doṣaḥ

original: guṇa-pradhāna-bhāvena tayor vyavasthānāt /
analyzed: guṇa pradhāna bhāvena tayoḥ vyavasthānāt

original: vyaṅgyasya hi kvacit prādhānyaṃ vācyasyopasarjana-bhāvaḥ kvacid vācyasya prādhānyam aparasya guṇa-bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: vyaṅgyasya hi kvacid prādhānyam vācyasya upasarjana bhāvaḥ kvacid vācyasya prādhānyam aparasya guṇa bhāvaḥ

original: tatra vyaṅgya-prādhānye dhvanir ity uktam eva ;
analyzed: tatra vyaṅgya prādhānye dhvaniḥ iti uktam eva

original: vācya-prādhānye tu prakārāntaraṃ nirdekṣyate /
analyzed: vācya prādhānye tu prakāra antaram nirdekṣyate

original: tasmāt sthitam etat-vyaṅgya-paratve 'pi kāvyasya na vyaṅgyasyābhidheyatvam api tu vyaṅgyatvam eva /
analyzed: tasmāt sthitam etat vyaṅgya paratve pi kāvyasya na vyaṅgyasya abhidheya tvam api tu vyaṅgya tvam eva

original: kiṃ ca vyaṅgyasya prādhānyenāvivakṣāyāṃ vācyatvaṃ tāvad bhavadbhir nābhyupagantavyam atatparatvāc chabdasya /
analyzed: kim ca vyaṅgyasya prādhānyena avivakṣāyām vācya tvam tāvat bhavadbhiḥ nā abhyupagantavyam atatpara tvāt śabdasya

original: tad asti tāvad vyaṅgyaḥ śabdānāṃ kaścid viṣaya iti /
analyzed: tat asti tāvat vyaṅgyaḥ śabdānām kaścid viṣayaḥ iti

original: yatrāpi tasya prādhānyaṃ tatrāpi kim iti tasya svarūpam apahnūyate /
analyzed: yatra api tasya prādhānyam tatra api kim iti tasya svarūpam apahnūyate

original: evaṃ tāvad vācakatvād anyad eva vyañjakatvam ;
analyzed: evam tāvat vācaka tvāt anyat eva vyañjaka tvam

original: itaś ca vācakatvād vyañjakatvasyānyatvaṃ yad vācakatvaṃ śabdaikāśrayam itarat tu śabdāśrayam arthāśrayaṃ ca śabdārthayor dvayor api vyañjakatvasya  #
analyzed: itas ca vācaka tvāt vyañjaka tvasya anya tvam yat vācaka tvam śabda eka āśrayam itarat tu śabda āśrayam artha āśrayam ca śabda arthayoḥ dvayoḥ api vyañjaka tvasya

original: pratipāditatvāt /
analyzed: pratipādita tvāt

original: guṇa-vṛttis tūpacāreṇa lakṣaṇayā cobhayāśrayāpi bhavati /
analyzed: guṇa vṛttiḥ tu upacāreṇa lakṣaṇayā ca ubhaya āśrayā api bhavati

original: kintu tato 'pi vyañjakatvaṃ svarūpato viṣayataś ca bhidyate /
analyzed: vyañjaka tvam svarūpataḥ viṣayataḥ ca bhidyate

original: rūpa-bhedas tāvad ayam-yad amukhyatayā vyāpāro guṇa-vṛttiḥ prasiddhā /
analyzed: rūpa bhedaḥ tāvat ayam yat amukhya tayā vyāpāraḥ guṇa vṛttiḥ prasiddhā

original: vyañjakatvaṃ tu mukhyatayaiva śabdasya vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: vyañjaka tvam tu mukhya tayā eva śabdasya vyāpāraḥ

original: na hy arthād vyaṅgya-traya-pratītir yā tasyā amukhyatvaṃ manāg api lakṣyate /
analyzed: na hi arthāt vyaṅgya traya pratītiḥ yā tasyāḥ amukhya tvam manāk api lakṣyate

original: ayaṃ cānyaḥ svarūpa-bhedaḥ-yad guṇa-vṛttir amukhyatvena vyavasthitaṃ vācakatvam evocyate /
analyzed: ayam ca anyaḥ svarūpa bhedaḥ yat guṇa vṛttiḥ amukhya tvena vyavasthitam vācaka tvam eva ucyate

original: vyañjakatvaṃ tu vācakatvād atyantaṃ vibhinnam eva /
analyzed: vyañjaka tvam tu vācaka tvāt atyantam vibhinnam eva

original: etac ca pratipāditam /
analyzed: etat ca pratipāditam

original: ayaṃ cāparo rūpa-bhedo yadguṇa-vṛttau yadārtho 'rthāntaram upalakṣayati tadopalakṣaṇīyārthātmanā pariṇata evāsau sampadyate /
analyzed: ayam ca aparaḥ rūpa bhedaḥ yad guṇa vṛttau yadā arthaḥ rtha antaram upalakṣayati tadā upalakṣaṇīya artha ātmanā pariṇataḥ eva asau sampadyate

original: yathā “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ity ādau /
analyzed: yathā gaṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ iti ādau

original: vyañjakatva-mārge tu yadārtho 'rthāntaraṃ dyotayati tadā svarūpaṃ prakāśayann evāsāv anyasya prakāśakaḥ pratīyate pradīpavat /
analyzed: vyañjaka tva mārge tu yadā arthaḥ rtha antaram dyotayati tadā sva rūpam prakāśayan eva asau anyasya prakāśakaḥ pratīyate pradīpa vat

original: yathā-“līlā-kamala-patrāṇi gaṇayāmāsa pārvatī” ity ādau /
analyzed: yathā līlā kamala patrāṇi gaṇayāmāsa pārvatī iti ādau

original: yadi ca yatrātiraskṛtasva-pratītir artho 'rthāntaraṃ lakṣayati tatra lakṣaṇā-vyavahāraḥ kriyate,
analyzed: yadi ca yatra atiraskṛta sva pratītiḥ arthaḥ rtha antaram lakṣayati tatra lakṣaṇā vyavahāraḥ kriyate

original: tad evaṃ sati lakṣaṇaiva mukhyaḥ śabda-vyāpāra iti prāptam /
analyzed: tat evam sati lakṣaṇā eva mukhyaḥ śabda vyāpāraḥ iti prāptam

original: yasmāt prāyeṇa vākyānāṃ vācya-vyatirikta-tātparya-viṣayārthāvabhāsitvam /
analyzed: yasmāt prāyeṇa vākyānām vācya vyatirikta tātparya viṣaya artha avabhāsi tvam

original: nanu tvat-pakṣe 'pi yadārtho vyaṅgya-trayaṃ prakāśayati tadā śabdasya kīdṛśo vyāpāraḥ ?
analyzed: nanu tvad pakṣe yadā arthaḥ vyaṅgya trayam prakāśayati tadā śabdasya kīdṛśaḥ vyāpāraḥ

original: ucyate-prakaraṇādy-avacchinna-śabda-vaśenaivārthasya tathā-vidhaṃ vyañjakatvam iti śabdasya tatropayogaḥ katham apahnūyate ?
analyzed: ucyate prakaraṇa ādi avacchinna śabda vaśena eva arthasya tathāvidham vyañjaka tvam iti śabdasya tatra upayogaḥ katham apahnūyate

original: viṣaya-bhedo 'pi guṇa-vṛtti-vyañjakatvayoḥ spaṣṭa eva /
analyzed: viṣaya bhedaḥ pi guṇa vṛtti vyañjaka tvayoḥ spaṣṭaḥ eva

original: yato vyañjakatvasya rasādayo 'laṅkāra-viśeṣā vyaṅgya-rūpāvacchinnaṃ vastu ceti trayaṃ viṣayaḥ /
tatra rasādi-pratītir guṇa-vṛttir iti na kenacid ucyate na ca śakyate vaktum /
analyzed: tatra rasa ādi pratītiḥ guṇa vṛttiḥ iti na kenacid ucyate na ca śakyate vaktum

original: vyaṅgyālaṅkāra-pratītir api tathaiva /
analyzed: vyaṅgya alaṅkāra pratītiḥ api tathā eva

original: vastu-cārutva-pratītaye sva-śabdānabhidheyatvena yat pratipipādayitum iṣyate tad vyaṅgyam /
analyzed: vastu cāru tva pratītaye sva śabda anabhidheya tvena yat pratipipādayitum iṣyate tat vyaṅgyam

original: tac ca na sarvaṃ guṇa-vṛtterviṣayaḥ prasiddhy-anurodhābhyām api gauṇānāṃ śabdānāṃ prayoga-darśanāt /
analyzed: tat ca na sarvam guṇa vṛtteḥ viṣayaḥ prasiddhi anurodhābhyām api gauṇānām śabdānām prayoga darśanāt

original: tathoktaṃ prāk /
analyzed: tathā uktam prāk

original: yadapi ca guṇa-vṛtter viṣayastad api ca vyañjakatvānupraveśena /
analyzed: yat api ca guṇa vṛtteḥ viṣayaḥ tat api ca vyañjaka tva anupraveśena

original: tasmād guṇa-vṛtter api vyañjakatvasyātyanta-vilakṣaṇatvam /
vācakatva-guṇa-vṛtti-vilakṣaṇasyāpi ca tasya tad-ubhayāśrayatvena vyavasthānam /
analyzed: vācaka tva guṇa vṛtti vilakṣaṇasya api ca tasya tad ubhaya āśraya tvena vyavasthānam

original: vyañjakatvaṃ hi kvacid vācakatvāśrayeṇa vyavatiṣṭhate,
analyzed: vyañjaka tvam hi kvacid vācaka tva āśrayeṇa vyavatiṣṭhate

original: yathā vivakṣitānya-para-vācye dhvanau /
analyzed: yathā vivakṣita anya para vācye dhvanau

original: kvacit tu guṇa-vṛtty-āśrayeṇa yathā avivakṣita-vācye dhvanau /
analyzed: kvacid tu guṇa vṛtti āśrayeṇa yathā avivakṣita vācye dhvanau

original: tad-ubhayāśrayatva-pratipādanāyaiva ca dhvaneḥ prathamataraṃ dvau prabhedāv upanyastau /
analyzed: tad ubhaya āśraya tva pratipādanāya eva ca dhvaneḥ prathamataram dvau prabhedau upanyastau

original: tad ubhayāśritatvāc ca tad-eka-rūpatvaṃ tasya na śakyate vaktum /
analyzed: tat ubhaya āśrita tvāt ca tad eka rūpa tvam tasya na śakyate vaktum

original: yasmān na tad-vācakatvaika-rūpam eva,
analyzed: yasmāt na tad vācaka tva ekarūpam eva

original: kvacil lakṣaṇāśrayeṇa vṛtteḥ /
analyzed: kvacid lakṣaṇa āśrayeṇa vṛtteḥ

original: na ca lakṣaṇaika-rūpam evānyatra vācakatvāśrayeṇa vyavasthānāt /
analyzed: na ca lakṣaṇa eka rūpam eva anyatra vācaka tva āśrayeṇa vyavasthānāt

original: na cobhaya-dharmatvenaiva tad-ekaika-rūpaṃ na bhavati /
analyzed: na ca ubhaya dharma tvena eva tat eka eka rūpam na bhavati

original: yāvad vācakatva-lakṣaṇādi-rūpa-rahita-śabd-adharmatvenāpi /
analyzed: yāvat vācaka tva lakṣaṇa ādi rūpa rahita śabda dharma tvena api

original: tathā hi gīta-dhvanīnām api vyañjakatvam asti rasādi-viṣayam /
analyzed: tathā hi gīta dhvanīnām api vyañjaka tvam asti rasa ādi viṣayam

original: na ca teṣāṃ vācakatvaṃ lakṣaṇā vā kathañcil lakṣyate /
analyzed: na ca teṣām vācaka tvam lakṣaṇā vā kathañcid lakṣyate

original: śabdād anyatrāpi viṣaye vyañjakatvasya darśanād vācakatvādi-śabda-dharma-prakāratvam ayuktaṃ vaktum /
analyzed: śabdāt anyatra api viṣaye vyañjaka tvasya darśanāt vācaka tva ādi śabda dharma prakāra tvam ayuktam vaktum

original: yadi ca vācakatva-lakṣaṇādīnāṃ śabda-prakārāṇāṃ prasiddha-prakāra-vilakṣaṇatve 'pi vyañjakatvaṃ prakāratvena parikalpyate tac chabdasyaiva  #
analyzed: yadi ca vācaka tva lakṣaṇa ādīnām śabda prakārāṇām prasiddha prakāra vilakṣaṇa tve pi vyañjaka tvam prakāra tvena parikalpyate tat śabdasya eva

original: prakāratvena kasmān na parikalpyate ?
analyzed: prakāra tvena kasmāt na parikalpyate

original: tad evaṃ śābde vyavahāre trayaḥ prakārāḥ-vācakatvaṃ guṇa-vṛttir vyañjakatvaṃ ca /
analyzed: tat evam śābde vyavahāre trayaḥ prakārāḥ vācaka tvam guṇa vṛttiḥ vyañjaka tvam ca

original: tatra vyañjakatve yadā vyaṅgya-prādhānyaṃ tadā dhvaniḥ,
analyzed: tatra vyañjaka tve yadā vyaṅgya prādhānyam tadā dhvaniḥ

original: tasya cāvivakṣita-vācyo vivakṣitānya-para-vācyaś ceti dvau prabhedāv anukrāntau prathamataraṃ tau savistaraṃ nirṇītau /
analyzed: tasya ca avivakṣita vācyaḥ vivakṣita anya para vācyaḥ ca iti dvau prabhedau anukrāntau prathamataram tau sa vistaram nirṇītau

original: anyo brūyāt-nanu vivakṣitānya-para-vācye dhvanau guṇa-vṛttitā nāstīti yad ucyate tad yuktam /
analyzed: anyaḥ brūyāt nanu vivakṣita anya para vācye dhvanau guṇa vṛtti tā na asti iti yat ucyate tat yuktam

original: yasmād vācya-vācaka-pratīti-pūrvikā yatrārthāntara-pratipattis tatra kathaṃ guṇa-vṛtti-vyavahāraḥ,
analyzed: yasmāt vācya vācaka pratīti pūrvikā yatra artha antara pratipattiḥ tatra katham guṇa vṛtti vyavahāraḥ

original: na hi guṇa-vṛttau yadā nimittena kenacid viṣayāntare śabda āropyate atyanta-tiraskṛta-svārthaḥ /
analyzed: na hi guṇa vṛttau yadā nimittena kenacid viṣaya antare śabdaḥ āropyate atyanta tiraskṛta sva arthaḥ

original: yathā-“agnir māṇavakaḥ” ity ādau,
analyzed: yathā agniḥ māṇavakaḥ iti ādau

original: yadā vā svārtham aṃśenāparityajaṃs tat-sambandha-dvāreṇa viṣayāntaram ākrāmati,
analyzed: yadā vā sva artham aṃśena a parityajan tad sambandha dvāreṇa viṣaya antaram ākrāmati

original: yathā “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ity ādau /
analyzed: yathā gaṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ iti ādau

original: tadāvivakṣita-vācyatvam upapadyate /
analyzed: tadā avivakṣita vācya tvam upapadyate

original: ata eva ca vivakṣitānya-para-vācye dhvanau vācya-vācakayor dvayor api svarūpa-pratītir arthāvagamanaṃ ca dṛśyata iti vyañjakatva-vyavahāro
analyzed: atas eva ca vivakṣita anya para vācye dhvanau vācya vācakayoḥ dvayoḥ api svarūpa pratītiḥ artha avagamanam ca dṛśyate iti vyañjaka tva vyavahāraḥ

original: svarūpaṃ prakāśayann eva parāvabhāsako vyañjaka ity ucyate,
analyzed: sva rūpam prakāśayan eva para avabhāsakaḥ vyañjakaḥ iti ucyate

original: tathāvidhe viṣaye vācakatvasyaiva vyañjakatvam iti guṇa-vṛtti-vyavahāro niyamenaiva na śakyate kartum /
analyzed: tathāvidhe viṣaye vācaka tvasya eva vyañjaka tvam iti guṇa vṛtti vyavahāraḥ niyamena eva na śakyate kartum

original: avivakṣita-vācyas tu dhvanir guṇa-vṛtteḥ kathaṃ bhidyate ?
analyzed: avivakṣita vācyaḥ tu dhvaniḥ guṇa vṛtteḥ katham bhidyate

original: tasya prabheda-dvaye guṇa-vṛttiprabhedadvaya-rūpatā lakṣyata eva yataḥ /
analyzed: tasya prabheda dvaye guṇa vṛtti prabheda dvaya rūpa tā lakṣyate eva yatas

original: ayam api na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: ayam api na doṣaḥ

original: yasmād avivakṣita-vācyo dhvanir guṇa-vṛtti-mārgāśrayo 'pi bhavati na tu guṇa-vṛtti-rūpa eva /
analyzed: yasmāt avivakṣita vācyaḥ dhvaniḥ bhavati na tu guṇa vṛtti rūpaḥ eva

original: guṇa-vṛttir hi vyañjakatva-śūnyāpi dṛśyate /
analyzed: guṇa vṛttiḥ hi vyañjaka tva śūnyā api dṛśyate

original: vyañjakatvaṃ ca yathokta-cārutva-hetuṃ vyaṅgyaṃ vinā na vyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: vyañjaka tvam ca yathā ukta cāru tva hetum vyaṅgyam vinā na vyavatiṣṭhate

original: guṇa-vṛttis tu vācya-dharmāśrayeṇaiva vyaṅgya-mātrāśrayeṇa cābhedopacāra-rūpā sambhavati,
analyzed: guṇa vṛttiḥ tu vācya dharma āśrayeṇa eva vyaṅgya mātra āśrayeṇa ca abheda upacāra rūpā sambhavati

original: yathā-tīkṣṇatvād agnir māṇavakaḥ,
analyzed: yathā a tīkṣṇa tvāt agniḥ māṇavakaḥ

original: āhlādakatvāc candra evāsyā mukham ity ādau /
analyzed: āhlādaka tvāt candraḥ eva asyāḥ mukham iti ādau

original: yathā ca “priye jane nāsti punar uktam” ity ādau /
analyzed: yathā ca priye jane na asti punar uktam iti ādau

original: yāpi lakṣaṇa-rūpa-guṇa-vṛttiḥ sāpy upalakṣaṇīyārtha-saṃbandha-mātrāśrayeṇa cāru-rūpa-vyaṅgya-pratītiṃ vināpi sambhavaty eva,
analyzed: yā api lakṣaṇa rūpa guṇa vṛttiḥ sā api upalakṣaṇīya artha saṃbandha mātra āśrayeṇa cāru rūpa vyaṅgya pratītim vinā api sambhavati eva

original: yathā-“mañcāḥ krośanti” ity ādau viṣaye /
analyzed: yathā mañcāḥ krośanti iti ādau viṣaye

original: yatra tu sā cāru-rūpa-vyaṅgya-pratīti-hetus tatrāpi vyañjakatvānupraveśenaiva vācakatvavat /
analyzed: yatra tu sā cāru rūpa vyaṅgya pratīti hetuḥ tatra api vyañjaka tva anupraveśena eva vācaka tva vat

original: asambhavinā cārthena yatra vyavahāraḥ,
analyzed: asambhavinā ca arthena yatra vyavahāraḥ

original: yathā-“suvarṇa-puṣpāṃ pṛthivīm” ity ādau tatra cāru-rūpa-vyaṅgya-pratītir eva prayojiketi tathā-vidhe 'pi viṣaye guṇa-vṛttau satyām api dhvani-vyavahāra  #
analyzed: yathā suvarṇa puṣpām pṛthivīm iti ādau tatra cāru rūpa vyaṅgya pratītiḥ eva prayojikā iti tathāvidhe viṣaye guṇa vṛttau satyām api dhvani vyavahāra

original: eva yukty-anurodhī /
analyzed: eva yukti anurodhī

original: tasmād avivakṣita-vācye dhvanau dvayor api prabhedayor vyañjakatva-viśeṣāviśiṣṭā
analyzed: tasmāt avivakṣita vācye dhvanau dvayoḥ api prabhedayoḥ vyañjaka tva viśeṣa a viśiṣṭā

original: guṇa-vṛttir na tu tad-eka-rūpā sahṛdaya-hṛdayāhlādinī pratīyamānā pratīti-hetutvād
analyzed: guṇa vṛttiḥ na tu tad eka rūpā sahṛdaya hṛdaya āhlādinī pratīyamānā pratīti hetu tvāt

original: viṣayāntare tad-rūpa-śūnyāyā darśanāt /
analyzed: viṣaya antare tad rūpa śūnyāyāḥ darśanāt

original: etac ca sarvaṃ prāk sūcitam api sphuṭatara-pratītaye punar uktam /
analyzed: etat ca sarvam prāk sūcitam api sphuṭatara pratītaye punar uktam

original: api ca vyañjakatva-lakṣaṇo yaḥ śabdārthayor dharmaḥ sa prasiddha-sambandhānurodhīti na kasyacid vimati-viṣayatām arhati /
analyzed: api ca vyañjaka tva lakṣaṇaḥ yaḥ śabda arthayoḥ dharmaḥ sa prasiddha sambandha anurodhi iti na kasyacid vimati viṣaya tām arhati

original: śabdārthayor hi prasiddho yaḥ sambandho vācya-vācaka-bhāvākhyas tam anurundhāna eva vyañjakatva-lakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ sāmagry-antara-sambandhād  #
analyzed: śabda arthayoḥ hi prasiddhaḥ yaḥ sambandhaḥ vācya vācaka bhāva ākhyaḥ tam anurundhānaḥ eva vyañjaka tva lakṣaṇaḥ vyāpāraḥ sāmagrī antara sambandhāt

original: aupādhikaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: aupādhikaḥ pravartate

original: ata eva vācakatvāt tasya viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva vācaka tvāt tasya viśeṣaḥ

original: vācakatvaṃ hi śabda-viśeṣasya niyata ātmā vyutpatti-kālād ārabhya tad-avinābhāvena tasya prasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: vācaka tvam hi śabda viśeṣasya niyataḥ ātmā vyutpatti kālāt ārabhya tad avinābhāvena tasya prasiddha tvāt

original: sa tv aniyataḥ,
analyzed: sa tu aniyataḥ

original: aupādhikatvāt /
analyzed: aupādhika tvāt

original: prakaraṇādy-avacchedena tasya pratīter itarathā tv apratīteḥ /
analyzed: prakaraṇa ādi avacchedena tasya pratīteḥ itarathā tu apratīteḥ

original: nanu yady aniyatas tat kiṃ tasya svarūpa-parīkṣayā ?
analyzed: nanu yadi aniyataḥ tat kim tasya svarūpa parīkṣayā

original: naiṣa doṣaḥ ;
analyzed: na eṣa doṣaḥ

original: yataḥ śabdātmani tasyāniyatatvam,
analyzed: yatas śabda ātmani tasya aniyata tvam

original: na tu sve viṣaye vyaṅgya-lakṣaṇe /
analyzed: na tu sve viṣaye vyaṅgya lakṣaṇe

original: liṅgatva-nyāyaś cāsya vyañjaka-bhāvasya lakṣyate,
analyzed: liṅga tva nyāyaḥ ca asya vyañjaka bhāvasya lakṣyate

original: yathā liṅgatvam āśrayeṣv aniyatāvabhāsam,
analyzed: yathā liṅga tvam āśrayeṣu aniyata avabhāsam

original: icchādhīnatvāt ;
analyzed: icchā adhīna tvāt

original: sva-viṣayāvyabhicāri ca /
analyzed: sva viṣaya avyabhicāri ca

original: tathaivedaṃ yathā darśitaṃ vyañjakatvam /
analyzed: tathā evā idam yathā darśitam vyañjaka tvam

original: śabdātmany aniyatatvād eva ca tasya vācakatva-prakāratā na śakyā kalpayitum /
analyzed: śabda ātmani aniyata tvāt eva ca tasya vācaka tva prakāra tā na śakyā kalpayitum

original: yadi hi vācakatva-prakāratā tasya bhavet tac-chabdātmani niyatatāpi syād vācakatvavat /
analyzed: yadi hi vācaka tva prakāra tā tasya bhavet tad śabda ātmani niyata tā api syāt vācaka tva vat

original: sa ca tathā-vidha aupādhiko dharmaḥ śabdānām autpattika-śabdārtha-sambandha-vādinā vākya-tattva-vidā pauruṣāpauruṣeyayor vākyayor viśeṣam abhidadhatā
analyzed: sa ca tathāvidhaḥ aupādhikaḥ dharmaḥ śabdānām autpattika śabda artha sambandha vādinā vākya tattva vidā pauruṣa apauruṣeyayoḥ vākyayoḥ viśeṣam abhidadhatā

original: tad anabhyupagame hi tasya śabdārtha-sambandha-nityatve saty apy apauruṣeya-pauruṣeyayor vākyayor artha-pratipādane nirviśeṣatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: tat anabhyupagame hi tasya śabda artha sambandha nitya tve sati api apauruṣeya pauruṣeyayoḥ vākyayoḥ artha pratipādane nirviśeṣa tvam syāt

original: tad-abhyupagame tu pauruṣeyāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ puruṣecchānuvidhāna-samāropitaupādhika-vyāpārāntarāṇāṃ saty api svābhidheya-sambandhāparityāge mithyārthatāpi  #
analyzed: tad abhyupagame tu pauruṣeyāṇām vākyānām puruṣa icchā anuvidhāna samāropita aupādhika vyāpāra antarāṇām sati api sva abhidheya sambandha aparityāge mithyārtha tā api

original: bhavet /
analyzed: bhavet

original: dṛśyate hi bhāvānām aparityakta-sva-svabhāvānām api sāmagry-antara-sampāta-sampāditaupādhika-vyāpārāntarāṇāṃ viruddha-kriyatvam /
analyzed: dṛśyate hi bhāvānām a parityakta sva svabhāvānām api sāmagrī antara sampāta sampādita aupādhika vyāpāra antarāṇām viruddha kriya tvam

original: tathā hi-hima-mayūkha-prabhṛtīnāṃ nirvāpita-sakala-jīva-lokaṃ śītalatvam udvahatām
analyzed: tathā hi hima mayūkha prabhṛtīnām nirvāpita sakala jīva lokam śītala tvam udvahatām

original: eva priyā-viraha-dahana-dahyamāna-mānasair janair ālokyamānānāṃ satāṃ santāpa-kāritvaṃ prasiddham eva /
analyzed: eva priyā viraha dahana dahyamāna mānasaiḥ janaiḥ ālokyamānānām satām santāpa kāri tvam prasiddham eva

original: tasmāt pauruṣeyāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ saty api naisargike 'rtha-sambandhe mithyārthatvaṃ samarthayitum icchatā vācakatva-vyatiriktaṃ kiṃcid rūpam aupādhikaṃ  #
analyzed: tasmāt pauruṣeyāṇām vākyānām sati api naisargike rtha sambandhe mithyā artha tvam samarthayitum icchatā vācaka tva vyatiriktam kiṃcid rūpam aupādhikam

original: vyaktam evābhidhānīyam /
analyzed: vyaktam eva abhidhānīyam

original: tac ca vyañjakatvādṛte nānyat /
analyzed: tat ca vyañjaka tvāt ṛte na anyat

original: vyaṅgya-prakāśanaṃ hi vyañjakatvam /
analyzed: vyaṅgya prakāśanam hi vyañjaka tvam

original: pauruṣeyāṇi ca vākyāni prādhānyena puruṣābhiprāyam eva prakāśayanti /
analyzed: pauruṣeyāṇi ca vākyāni prādhānyena puruṣa abhiprāyam eva prakāśayanti

original: sa ca vyaṅgya eva na tv abhidheyaḥ,
analyzed: sa ca vyaṅgyaḥ eva na tu abhidheyaḥ

original: tena sahābhidhānasya vācya-vācakabhāva-lakṣaṇa-sambandhābhāvāt /
analyzed: tena saha abhidhānasya vācya vācaka bhāva lakṣaṇa sambandha abhāvāt

original: nanv anena nyāyena sarveṣām eva laukikānāṃ vākyānāṃ dhvani-vyavahāraḥ prasaktaḥ /
analyzed: nanu anena nyāyena sarveṣām eva laukikānām vākyānām dhvani vyavahāraḥ prasaktaḥ

original: sarveṣām apy anena nyāyena vyañjakatvāt /
analyzed: sarveṣām api anena nyāyena vyañjaka tvāt

original: satyam etat;
analyzed: satyam etat

original: kiṃ tu vaktr-abhiprāya-prakāśanena yad vyañjakatvaṃ tat sarveṣām eva laukikānāṃ vākyānām aviśiṣṭam /
analyzed: kim tu vaktṛ abhiprāya prakāśanena yat vyañjaka tvam tat sarveṣām eva laukikānām vākyānām aviśiṣṭam

original: tat tu vācakatvān na bhidyate vyaṅgyam hi tatra nāntarīyakatayā vyavasthitam /
analyzed: tat tu vācaka tvāt na bhidyate vyaṅgyam hi tatra nāntarīyaka tayā vyavasthitam

original: na tu vivakṣitatvena /
analyzed: na tu vivakṣita tvena

original: yasya tu vivakṣitatvena vyaṅgyasya sthitiḥ tad vyañjakatvaṃ dhvani-vyavahārasya prayojakam /
analyzed: yasya tu vivakṣita tvena vyaṅgyasya sthitiḥ tat vyañjaka tvam dhvani vyavahārasya prayojakam

original: yat tv abhiprāya-viśeṣa-rūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ śabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśate tad bhavati vivakṣitaṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sat /
analyzed: yat tu abhiprāya viśeṣa rūpam vyaṅgyam śabda arthābhyām prakāśate tat bhavati vivakṣitam tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānam sat

original: kintu tad eva kevalam aparimita-viṣayasya dhvani-vyavahārasya na prayojakam avyāpakatvāt /
analyzed: kintu tat eva kevalam aparimita viṣayasya dhvani vyavahārasya na prayojakam avyāpaka tvāt

original: tathā darśita-bheda-traya-rūpaṃ tātparyeṇa dyotyamānam abhiprāya-rūpam anabhiprāya-rūpaṃ
analyzed: tathā darśita bheda traya rūpam tātparyeṇa dyotyamānam abhiprāya rūpam anabhiprāya rūpam

original: ca sarvam eva dhvani-vyavahārasya prayojakam iti yathokta-vyañjaktva-viśeṣe dhvani-lakṣaṇe
analyzed: ca sarvam eva dhvani vyavahārasya prayojakam iti yathā ukta vyañjak tva viśeṣe dhvani lakṣaṇe

original: nātivyāptir na cāvyāptiḥ /
analyzed: na ativyāptiḥ na ca avyāptiḥ

original: tasmād vākya-tattva-vidāṃ matena tāvad vyañjakatva-lakṣaṇaḥ śābdo vyāpāro na virodhī pratyutānuguṇa eva lakṣyate /
analyzed: tasmāt vākya tattva vidām matena tāvat vyañjaka tva lakṣaṇaḥ śābdaḥ vyāpāraḥ na virodhī pratyuta anuguṇaḥ eva lakṣyate

original: pariniścita-nirapa-bhraṃśa-śabda-brahmaṇāṃ vipaścitāṃ matam āśrityaiva pravṛtto 'yaṃ dhvani-vyavahāra iti taiḥ saha kiṃ virodhāvirodhau cintyete
analyzed: pariniścita nirapabhraṃśa śabdabrahmaṇām vipaścitām matam āśritya eva pravṛttaḥ yam dhvani vyavahāraḥ iti taiḥ saha kim virodha avirodhau cintyete

original: kṛtrima-śabdārtha-sambandha-vādināṃ tu yukti-vidām anubhava-siddha evāyaṃ vyañjaka-bhāvaḥ śabdānām arthāntarāṇām ivāvirodhaś ceti na pratikṣepya-padavīm  #
analyzed: kṛtrima śabda artha sambandha vādinām tu yukti vidām anubhava siddhaḥ eva ayam vyañjaka bhāvaḥ śabdānām artha antarāṇām iva avirodhaḥ ca iti na pratikṣepya padavīm

original: avatarati /
analyzed: avatarati

original: vācakatve hi tārkikāṇāṃ vipratipattayaḥ pravartantām,
analyzed: vācaka tve hi tārkikāṇām vipratipattayaḥ pravartantām

original: kim idaṃ svābhāvikaṃ śabdānām āho svit sāmayikam ity ādyāḥ /
analyzed: kim idam svābhāvikam śabdānām āho svid sāmayikam iti ādyāḥ

original: vyañjakatve tu tat-pṛṣṭha-bhāvini bhāvāntara-sādhāraṇe loka-prasiddha evānugamyamāne ko vimatīnām avasaraḥ /
analyzed: vyañjaka tve tu tad pṛṣṭha bhāvini bhāva antara sādhāraṇe loka prasiddhe evā anugamyamāne kaḥ vimatīnām avasaraḥ

original: alaukike hy arthe tārkikāṇāṃ vimatayo nikhilāḥ pravartante na tu laukike /
analyzed: alaukike hi arthe tārkikāṇām vimatayaḥ nikhilāḥ pravartante na tu laukike

original: na hi nīla-madhurādiṣv aśeṣa-lokendriya-gocare bādhā-rahite tattve parasparaṃ vipratipannā dṛśyante /
analyzed: na hi nīla madhura ādiṣu aśeṣa loka indriya gocare bādhā rahite tattve parasparam vipratipannāḥ dṛśyante

original: na hi bādhā-rahitaṃ nīlaṃ nīlam iti bruvann apareṇa pratiṣidhyate naitan nīlaṃ pītam etad iti /
analyzed: na hi bādhā rahitam nīlam nīlam iti bruvan apareṇa pratiṣidhyate na etat nīlam pītam etat iti

original: tathaiva vyañjakatvaṃ vācakānāṃ śabdānām avācakānāṃ ca gīta-dhvanīnām aśabda-rūpāṇāṃ ca ceṣṭādīnāṃ yat sarveṣām anubhava-siddham eva tat kenāpahnūyate
analyzed: tathā eva vyañjaka tvam vācakānām śabdānām a vācakānām ca gīta dhvanīnām a śabda rūpāṇām ca ceṣṭā ādīnām yat sarveṣām anubhava siddham eva tat kena apahnūyate

original: aśabdam arthaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ hi sūcayanto vyāhārās tathā vyāpārā nibaddhāś cānibaddhāś ca vidagdha-pariṣatsu vividhā vibhāvyante /
analyzed: a śabdam artham ramaṇīyam hi sūcayantaḥ vyāhārāḥ tathā vyāpārāḥ nibaddhāḥ ca a nibaddhāḥ ca vidagdha pariṣatsu vividhāḥ vibhāvyante

original: tān upahāsyatām ātmanaḥ pariharan ko 'tisandadhīta sacetāḥ /
analyzed: tān upahāsya tām ātmanaḥ pariharan kaḥ tisandadhīta sa cetāḥ

original: atha brūyāt,
analyzed: atha brūyāt

original: asty atisandhānāvasaraḥ vyañjakatvaṃ śabdānāṃ gamakatvaṃ tac ca liṅgatvam ataś ca
analyzed: asti atisandhāna avasaraḥ vyañjaka tvam śabdānām gamaka tvam tat ca liṅga tvam atas ca

original: vyaṅgya-pratītir liṅgi-pratītir eveti liṅgi-liṅga-bhāva eva teṣāṃ vyaṅgya-vyañjaka-bhāvo nāparaḥ kaścit /
analyzed: vyaṅgya pratītiḥ liṅgi pratītiḥ evā iti liṅgi liṅga bhāvaḥ eva teṣām vyaṅgya vyañjaka bhāvaḥ na aparaḥ kaścid

original: ataś caitad avaśyam eva boddhavyaṃ yasmād vaktr-abhiprāyāpekṣayā vyañjakatvam idānīm eva tvayā pratipāditaṃ vaktr-abhiprāyaś cānumeya-rūpa
analyzed: atas ca etat avaśyam eva boddhavyam yasmāt vaktṛ abhiprāya apekṣayā vyañjaka tvam idānīm eva tvayā pratipāditam vaktṛ abhiprāyaḥ ca anumeya rūpa

original: atrocyate-nanv evam api yadi nāma syāt tat kiṃ naś chinnam /
analyzed: atra ucyate nanu evam api yadi nāma syāt tat kim naḥ chinnam

original: vācakatva-guṇa-vṛtti-vyatirikto vyañjakatva-lakṣaṇaḥ śabda-vyāpāro 'stīty asmābhir abhyupagatam /
analyzed: vācaka tva guṇa vṛtti vyatiriktaḥ vyañjaka tva lakṣaṇaḥ śabda vyāpāraḥ sti iti asmābhiḥ abhyupagatam

original: tasya caivam api na kācit kṣatiḥ /
analyzed: tasya ca evam api na kācid kṣatiḥ

original: tad dhi vyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvam astu anyad vā /
analyzed: tat hi vyañjaka tvam liṅga tvam astu anyat vā

original: sarvathā prasiddha-śābda-prakāra-vilakṣaṇatvaṃ śabda-vyāpāra-viṣayatvaṃ ca tasyāstīti nāsty evāvayor vivādaḥ /
analyzed: sarvathā prasiddha śābda prakāra vilakṣaṇa tvam śabda vyāpāra viṣaya tvam ca tasya asti iti na asti eva āvayoḥ vivādaḥ

original: na punar ayaṃ paramārtho yad-vyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvam eva sarvatra vyaṅgya-pratītiś ca liṅgi-pratītir eveti /
analyzed: na punar ayam paramārthaḥ yat vyañjaka tvam liṅga tvam eva sarvatra vyaṅgya pratītiḥ ca liṅgi pratītiḥ eva iti

original: yad api sva-pakṣa-siddhaye 'smad-uktam anūditaṃ tvayā vaktr-abhiprāyasya vyaṅgyatvenābhyupagamāt
analyzed: yat api sva pakṣa siddhaye smad uktam anūditam tvayā vaktṛ abhiprāyasya vyaṅgya tvena abhyupagamāt

original: tat-prakāśane śabdānāṃ liṅgatvam eveti tad etad yathāsmābhir abhihitaṃ tad vibhajyaṃ
analyzed: tad prakāśane śabdānām liṅga tvam eva iti tat etat yathā asmābhiḥ abhihitam tat vibhajyam

original: pratipādyate śrūyatām-dvividho viṣayaḥ śabdānāṃ-
analyzed: pratipādyate śrūyatām dvividhaḥ viṣayaḥ śabdānām

original: anumeyaḥ pratipādyaś ca /
analyzed: anumeyaḥ pratipādyaḥ ca

original: tatrānumeyo vivakṣā-lakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tatra anumeyaḥ vivakṣā lakṣaṇaḥ

original: vivakṣā ca śabda-svarūpa-prakāśanecchā śabdenārtha-prakāśanecchā ceti dvi-prakārā /
analyzed: vivakṣā ca śabda svarūpa prakāśana icchā śabdena artha prakāśana icchā ca iti dvi prakārā

original: tatrādyā na śābda-vyavahārāṅgam /
analyzed: tatra ādyāḥ na śābdavyavahāra aṅgam

original: sā hi prāṇitva-mātra-pratipatti-phalā /
analyzed: sā hi prāṇi tva mātra pratipatti phalā
