original: dvitīyā tu śabda-viśeṣāvadhāraṇā-vasita-vyavahitāpi śabda-karaṇa-vyavahāra-nibandhanam /
analyzed: dvitīyā tu śabda viśeṣa avadhāraṇa avasita vyavahitā api śabda karaṇa vyavahāra nibandhanam

original: te tu dve apy anumeyo viṣayaḥ śabdānām /
analyzed: te tu dve api anumeyaḥ viṣayaḥ śabdānām

original: pratipādyas tu prayoktur artha-pratipādana-samīhā-viṣayīkṛto 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: pratipādyaḥ tu prayoktuḥ artha pratipādana samīhā viṣayīkṛtaḥ rthaḥ

original: sa ca dvividhaḥ-vācyo vyaṅgyaś ca /
analyzed: sa ca dvividhaḥ vācyaḥ vyaṅgyaḥ ca

original: prayoktā hi kadācit sva-śabdenārthaṃ prakāśayituṃ samīhate kadācit sva-śabdānabhidheyatvena prayojanāpekṣayā kayācit /
analyzed: prayoktā hi kadācid sva śabdena artham prakāśayitum samīhate kadācid sva śabda anabhidheya tvena prayojana apekṣayā kayācid

original: sa tu dvividho 'pi pratipādyo viṣayaḥ śabdānāṃ na liṅgitayā svarūpeṇa prakāśate,
analyzed: sa tu dvividhaḥ pi pratipādyaḥ viṣayaḥ śabdānām na liṅgi tayā sva rūpeṇa prakāśate

original: api tu kṛtrimeṇākṛtrimeṇa vā sambandhāntareṇa /
analyzed: api tu kṛtrimeṇa akṛtrimeṇa vā sambandha antareṇa

original: vivakṣā-viṣayatvaṃ hi tasyārthasya śabdair liṅgitayā pratīyate na tu svarūpam /
analyzed: vivakṣā viṣaya tvam hi tasya arthasya śabdaiḥ liṅgi tayā pratīyate na tu svarūpam

original: yadi hi liṅgitayā tatra śabdānāṃ vyāpāraḥ syāt tac chabdārthe samyaṅ mithyātvādi vivādā eva na pravarteran dhūmādi-liṅgānumitānumeyāntaravat
analyzed: yadi hi liṅgi tayā tatra śabdānām vyāpāraḥ syāt tat śabda arthe samyak mithyātva ādi vivādāḥ eva na pravarteran dhūma ādi liṅga anumita anumeya antara vat

original: vyaṅgyaś cārtho vācya-sāmarthyākṣiptatayā vācyavac chabdasya sambandhī bhavaty eva /
analyzed: vyaṅgyaḥ ca arthaḥ vācya sāmarthya ākṣipta tayā vācya vat śabdasya sambandhī bhavati eva

original: sākṣād-asākṣād-bhāvo hi sambandhasyāprayojakaḥ /
analyzed: sākṣāt asākṣāt bhāvaḥ hi sambandhasya aprayojakaḥ

original: vācya-vācaka-bhāvāśrayatvaṃ ca vyañjakatvasya prāg eva darśitam /
analyzed: vācya vācaka bhāva āśraya tvam ca vyañjaka tvasya prāk eva darśitam

original: tasmād vaktrabhiprāya-rūpa eva vyaṅgye liṅgatayā śabdānāṃ vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt vaktṛ abhiprāya rūpe eva vyaṅgye liṅga tayā śabdānām vyāpāraḥ

original: tad-viṣayīkṛte tu pratipādyatayā /
analyzed: tad viṣayīkṛte tu pratipādya tayā

original: pratīyamāne tasminn abhiprāya-rūpe 'nabhiprāya-rūpe ca vācakatve naiva vyāpāraḥ sambandhāntareṇa vā /
analyzed: pratīyamāne tasmin abhiprāya rūpe ca vācaka tve nā eva vyāpāraḥ sambandha antareṇa vā

original: na tāvad vācakatvena yathoktaṃ prāk /
analyzed: na tāvat vācaka tvena yathā uktam prāk

original: sambandhāntareṇa vyañjakatvam eva /
analyzed: sambandha antareṇa vyañjaka tvam eva

original: na ca vyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatva-rūpam eva ālokādiṣv anyathā dṛṣṭatvāt /
tasmāt pratipādyo viṣayaḥ śabdānāṃ na liṅgitvena sambandhī vācyavat /
analyzed: tasmāt pratipādyaḥ viṣayaḥ śabdānām na liṅgi tvena sambandhī vācya vat

original: yo hi liṅgitvena teṣāṃ sambandhī yathā darśito viṣayaḥ sa na vācyatvena pratīyate,
analyzed: yaḥ hi liṅgi tvena teṣām sambandhī yathā darśitaḥ viṣayaḥ sa na vācya tvena pratīyate

original: api tūpādhitvena /
analyzed: api tu upādhi tvena

original: pratipādyasya ca viṣayasya liṅgitve tad-viṣayāṇāṃ vipratipattīnāṃ laukikair eva kriyamāṇānām abhāvaḥ prasajyeteti /
analyzed: pratipādyasya ca viṣayasya liṅgi tve tad viṣayāṇām vipratipattīnām laukikaiḥ eva kriyamāṇānām abhāvaḥ prasajyeta iti

original: etac coktam eva /
analyzed: etat ca uktam eva

original: yathā ca vācya-viṣaye pramāṇāntarānugamena samyaktva-pratītau kvacit kriyamāṇāyāṃ tasya pramāṇāntara-viṣayatve saty api na śabda-vyāpāra-viṣayatā-hānis  #
analyzed: yathā ca vācya viṣaye pramāṇa antara anugamena samyaktva pratītau kvacid kriyamāṇāyām tasya pramāṇa antara viṣaya tve sati api na śabda vyāpāra viṣaya tā hāniḥ

original: tad-vyaṅgyasyāpi /
analyzed: tad vyaṅgyasya api

original: kāvya-viṣaye ca vyaṅgya-pratītīnāṃ satyā satya-nirūpaṇasyāprayojakatvam eveti tatra pramāṇāntara-vyāpāra-parīkṣopahāsāyaiva sampadyate /
analyzed: kāvya viṣaye ca vyaṅgya pratītīnām satyā satya nirūpaṇasya aprayojaka tvam eva iti tatra pramāṇa antara vyāpāra parīkṣā upahāsāya eva sampadyate

original: tasmāl liṅgi-pratītir eva sarvatra vyaṅgya-pratītir iti na śakyate vaktum /
analyzed: tasmāt liṅgi pratītiḥ eva sarvatra vyaṅgya pratītiḥ iti na śakyate vaktum

original: yat tv anumeya-rūpa-vyaṅgya-viṣayaṃ śabdānāṃ vyañjakatvaṃ tad-dhvani-vyavahārasyāprayojakam /
analyzed: yat tu anumeya rūpa vyaṅgya viṣayam śabdānām vyañjaka tvam tat dhvani vyavahārasya aprayojakam

original: api tu vyañjakatva-lakṣaṇaḥ śabdānāṃ vyāpāra autpattika-śabdārtha-sambandha-vādināpy abhyupagantavya iti pradarśanārtham upanyastam /
analyzed: api tu vyañjaka tva lakṣaṇaḥ śabdānām vyāpāraḥ autpattika śabda artha sambandha vādinā api abhyupagantavyaḥ iti pradarśana artham upanyastam

original: tad dhi vyañjakatvaṃ kadācil liṅgatvena kadācid rūpāntareṇa śabdānāṃ vācakānām avācakānāṃ ca sarva-vādibhir apratikṣepyam ity ayam asmābhir  #
analyzed: tat hi vyañjaka tvam kadācid liṅga tvena kadācid rūpa antareṇa śabdānām vācakānām avācakānām ca sarva vādibhiḥ a pratikṣepyam iti ayam asmābhiḥ

original: yatna ārabdhaḥ /
analyzed: yatnaḥ ārabdhaḥ

original: tad evaṃ guṇa-vṛtti-vācakatvādibhyaḥ śabda-prakārebhyo niyamenaiva tāvad vilakṣaṇaṃ vyañjakatvam /
analyzed: tat evam guṇa vṛtti vācaka tva ādibhyaḥ śabda prakārebhyaḥ niyamena eva tāvat vilakṣaṇam vyañjaka tvam

original: tad-antaḥ-pātitve 'pi tasya haṭhād abhidhīyamāne tad-viśeṣasya dhvaner yat-prakāśanaṃ vipratipatti-nirāsāya sahṛdaya-vyutpattaye vā tat-kriyamāṇam  #
analyzed: tad antaḥpāti tve pi tasya haṭhāt abhidhīyamāne tad viśeṣasya dhvaneḥ yat prakāśanam vipratipatti nirāsāya sahṛdaya vyutpattaye vā tat kriyamāṇam

original: anatisandheyam eva /
analyzed: an atisandheyam eva

original: na hi sāmānya-mātra-lakṣaṇenopayogi-viśeṣa-lakṣaṇānāṃ pratikṣepaḥ śakyaḥ kartum /
analyzed: na hi sāmānya mātra lakṣaṇena upayogi viśeṣa lakṣaṇānām pratikṣepaḥ śakyaḥ kartum

original: evaṃ hi sati sattā-mātra-lakṣaṇe kṛte sakala-sad-vastu-lakṣaṇānāṃ paunaruktya-prasaṅgaḥ / tad evam-
analyzed: evam hi sati sattā mātra lakṣaṇe kṛte sakala sat vastu lakṣaṇānām paunaruktya prasaṅgaḥ tat evam

original: vimati-viṣayo ya āsīn manīṣiṇāṃ satatam avidita-sa-tattvaḥ /
analyzed: vimati viṣayaḥ yaḥ āsīt manīṣiṇām satatam a vidita sa tattvaḥ

original: dhvani-saṃjñitaḥ prakāraḥ kāvyasya vyañjitaḥ so 'yam // DhvA_3.33 //
analyzed: dhvani saṃjñitaḥ prakāraḥ kāvyasya vyañjitaḥ saḥ yam

original: prakāro 'nyo guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgyaḥ kāvyasya dṛśyate /
analyzed: prakāraḥ nyaḥ guṇībhūta vyaṅgyaḥ kāvyasya dṛśyate

original: yatra vyaṅgyānvaye vācya-cārutvaṃ syāt prakarṣavat // DhvK_3.34 //
analyzed: yatra vyaṅgya anvaye vācya cāru tvam syāt prakarṣavat

original: vyaṅgyo 'rtho lalanā-lāvaṇya-prakhyo yaḥ pratipāditas tasya prādhānye dhvanir ity uktam /
analyzed: vyaṅgyaḥ rthaḥ lalanā lāvaṇya prakhyaḥ yaḥ pratipāditaḥ tasya prādhānye dhvaniḥ iti uktam

original: tasya tu guṇī-bhāvena vācya-cārutva-prakarṣe guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgyo nāma kāvya-prabhedaḥ prakalpyate /
analyzed: tasya tu guṇībhāvena vācya cāru tva prakarṣe guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaḥ nāma kāvya prabhedaḥ prakalpyate

original: tatra vastu-mātrasya vyaṅgyasya tiraskṛta-vācyebhyaḥ pratīyamānasya kadācid vācya-rūpa-vākyārthāpekṣayā guṇī-bhāve sati guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgyatā  #
analyzed: tatra vastu mātrasya vyaṅgyasya tiraskṛta vācyebhyaḥ pratīyamānasya kadācid vācya rūpa vākyārtha apekṣayā guṇībhāve sati guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tā  /

original: / yathā-
analyzed: yathā

original: lāvaṇya-sindhur aparaiva hi keyam atra
analyzed: lāvaṇya sindhuḥ aparā eva hi kā iyam atra

original: yatrotpalāni śaśinā saha samplavante /
analyzed: yatra utpalāni śaśinā saha samplavante

original: unmajjati dvirada-kumbha-taṭī ca yatra
analyzed: unmajjati dvirada kumbha taṭī ca yatra

original: yatrāpare kadalikāṇḍa-mṛṇāla-daṇḍāḥ //
analyzed: yatra apare kadali kāṇḍa mṛṇāla daṇḍāḥ

original: atiraskṛtavācyebhyo 'pi śabdebhyaḥ pratīyamānasya vyaṅgyasya kadācid vācya-prādhānyena kāvyacārutvāpekṣayā guṇībhāve sati guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyatā,
analyzed: a tiraskṛta vācyebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ pratīyamānasya vyaṅgyasya kadācid vācya prādhānyena kāvya cāru tva apekṣayā guṇībhāve sati guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tā

original: yathodāhṛtam-“anurāgavatī sandhyā” ity evam ādi /
analyzed: yathā udāhṛtam anurāgavatī sandhyā iti evam ādi

original: tasyaiva svayam uktyā prakāśīkṛtatvena guṇībhāvaḥ,
analyzed: tasya eva svayam uktyā prakāśīkṛta tvena guṇībhāvaḥ

original: yathodāhṛtam-
analyzed: yathā udāhṛtam

original: “saṅketa-kāla-manasam” ity ādi /
analyzed: saṅketa kāla manasam iti ādi

original: rasādi-rūpa-vyaṅgyasya guṇībhāvo rasavad-alaṅkāre darśitaḥ ;
analyzed: rasa ādi rūpa vyaṅgyasya guṇībhāvaḥ rasavat alaṅkāre darśitaḥ

original: tatra ca teṣām ādhikārika-vākyāpekṣayā guṇībhāvo vivahana-pravṛtta-bhṛtyānuyāyi-rājavat /
analyzed: tatra ca teṣām ādhikārika vākya apekṣayā guṇībhāvaḥ vivahana pravṛtta bhṛtya anuyāyi rāja vat

original: vyaṅgyālaṅkārasya guṇībhāve dīpakādi-viṣayaḥ // DhvA_3.34 //
analyzed: vyaṅgya alaṅkārasya guṇībhāve dīpaka ādi viṣayaḥ

original: tathā-
analyzed: tathā

original: prasanna-gambhīra-padāḥ kāvya-bandhāḥ sukhāvahāḥ /
analyzed: prasanna gambhīra padāḥ kāvya bandhāḥ sukha āvahāḥ

original: ye ca teṣu prakāro 'yam eva yojyāḥ sumedhasā // DhvK_3.35 //
analyzed: ye ca teṣu prakāraḥ yam eva yojyāḥ sumedhasā

original: ye caite 'parimita-svarūpā api prakāśamānās tathāvidhārtha-ramaṇīyāḥ santo vivekināṃ sukhāvahāḥ kāvya-bandhās teṣu sarveṣv evāyaṃ prakāro guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgyo  #
analyzed: ye ca ete parimita sva rūpāḥ api prakāśamānāḥ tathāvidha artha ramaṇīyāḥ santaḥ vivekinām sukha āvahāḥ kāvya bandhāḥ teṣu sarveṣu eva ayam prakāraḥ guṇībhūta vyaṅgyaḥ

original: nāma yojanīyaḥ / yathā-
analyzed: nāma yojanīyaḥ yathā

original: lacchī duhidā jāmāuo harī taṃsa ghariṇiā gaṅgā /
analyzed: lacchī duhidā jāmāuaḥ harī gaṅgā

original: amia-miaṅkā a suā aho kuḍumbaṃ mahoahiṇo //
analyzed: a suā aho kuḍumbam mahoahiṇaḥ

original: [lakṣmī duhitā jāmātā hariḥ tathā gṛhiṇī gaṅgā /
analyzed: lakṣmī duhitā jāmātā hariḥ tathā gṛhiṇī gaṅgā

original: amṛta-mṛgāṅkau ca sutau aho kuṭumbaṃ mahodadheḥ //]// DhvA_3.35//
analyzed: amṛta mṛgāṅkau ca sutau aho kuṭumbam mahā udadheḥ

original: vācyālaṅkāra-vargo 'yaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśānugame sati /
analyzed: vācya alaṅkāra vargaḥ yam vyaṅgya aṃśa anugame sati

original: prāyeṇaiva parāṃ chāyāṃ bibhral lakṣye nirīkṣyate // DhvK_3.36 //
analyzed: prāyeṇa eva parām chāyām bibhrat lakṣye nirīkṣyate

original: vācyālaṅkāra-vargo 'yaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśasyālaṅkārasya vastu-mātrasya vā yathā-yogam anugame sati cchāyātiśayaṃ bibhral-lakṣaṇa-kārair eka-deśena
analyzed: vācya alaṅkāra vargaḥ yam vyaṅgya aṃśasya alaṅkārasya vastu mātrasya vā yathāyogam anugame sati chāyā atiśayam bibhrat lakṣaṇa kāraiḥ ekadeśena

original: sa tu tathā-rūpaḥ prāyeṇa sarva eva parīkṣyamāṇo lakṣye nirīkṣyate /
analyzed: sa tu tathārūpaḥ prāyeṇa sarvaḥ eva parīkṣyamāṇaḥ lakṣye nirīkṣyate

original: tathā hi-dīpaka-samāsoktyādi-vadanye 'py alaṅkārāḥ prāyeṇa vyaṅgyālaṅkārāntara-vastv-antara-saṃsparśino dṛśyante /
analyzed: tathā hi dīpaka samāsokti ādi vat anye pi alaṅkārāḥ prāyeṇa vyaṅgya alaṅkāra antara vastu antara saṃsparśinaḥ dṛśyante

original: yataḥ prathamaṃ tāvad atiśayokti-garbhatā sarvālaṅkāreṣu śakya-kriyā /
analyzed: yatas prathamam tāvat atiśayokti garbha tā sarva alaṅkāreṣu śakya kriyā

original: kṛtaiva ca sā mahā-kavibhiḥ kām api kāvyacchaviṃ puṣyati,
analyzed: kṛtā eva ca sā mahā kavibhiḥ kām api kāvya chavim puṣyati

original: kathaṃ hy atiśayayogitā sva-viṣayaucityena kriyamāṇā satī kāvye notkarṣam āvahet /
analyzed: katham hi atiśaya yogi tā sva viṣaya aucityena kriyamāṇā satī kāvye nā utkarṣam āvahet

original: bhāmahenāpy atiśayokti-lakṣaṇe yad uktam-
analyzed: bhāmahena api atiśayokti lakṣaṇe yat uktam

original: saiṣā sarvaiva vakroktir anayārtho vibhāvyate /
analyzed: sā eṣā sarvā eva vakroktiḥ anayā arthaḥ vibhāvyate

original: yatno 'syāṃ kavinā kāryaḥ ko 'laṅkāro 'nayā vinā //iti /
analyzed: syām kavinā kāryaḥ kaḥ laṅkāraḥ nayā vinā iti

original: tatrātiśayoktir yam alaṅkāram adhitiṣṭhati kavi-pratibhā-vaśāt tasya cārutvātiśaya-yogo
analyzed: tatra atiśayoktiḥ yam alaṅkāram adhitiṣṭhati kavi pratibhā vaśāt tasya cāru tva atiśaya yogaḥ

original: 'nyasya tv alaṅkāra-mātrataiveti sarvālaṅkāra-śarīra-svīkaraṇa-yogyatvenābhedopacārāt
analyzed: nyasya tu alaṅkāra mātra tā eva iti sarva alaṅkāra śarīra svīkaraṇa yogya tvena abheda upacārāt

original: saiva sarvālaṅkāra-rūpety ayam evārtho 'vagantavyaḥ /
analyzed: sā eva sarva alaṅkāra rūpā iti ayam eva arthaḥ vagantavyaḥ

original: tasyāś cālaṅkārāntara-saṃkīrṇatvaṃ kadācid vācyatvena kadacid vyaṅgyatvena /
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca alaṅkāra antara saṃkīrṇa tvam kadācid vācya tvena kadacid vyaṅgya tvena

original: vyaṅgyatvam api kadācit prādhānyena kadācid guṇa-bhāvena /
analyzed: vyaṅgya tvam api kadācid prādhānyena kadācid guṇa bhāvena

original: tatrādye pakṣe vācyālaṅkāra-mārgaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ādye pakṣe vācya alaṅkāra mārgaḥ

original: dvitīye tu dhvanāv antarbhāvaḥ /
analyzed: dvitīye tu dhvanau antarbhāvaḥ

original: tṛtīye tu guṇībhūta-vyaṅgya-rūpatā /
analyzed: tṛtīye tu guṇībhūta vyaṅgya rūpa tā

original: ayaṃ ca prakāro 'nyeṣām apy alaṅkārāṇām asti,
analyzed: ayam ca prakāraḥ nyeṣām api alaṅkārāṇām asti

original: teṣāṃ tu na sarva-viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām tu na sarva viṣayaḥ

original: atiśayoktes tu sarvālaṅkāra-viṣayo 'pi sambhavatīty ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: atiśayokteḥ tu sarva alaṅkāra viṣayaḥ sambhavati iti ayam viśeṣaḥ

original: yeṣu cālaṅkāreṣu sādṛśya-mukhena tattva-pratilambhaḥ yathā rūpakopamā-tulyayogitā-nidarśanādiṣu
analyzed: yeṣu ca alaṅkāreṣu sādṛśya mukhena tattva pratilambhaḥ yathā rūpaka upamā tulya yogi tā nidarśana ādiṣu

original: teṣu gamyamāna-dharma-mukhenaiva yat sādṛśyaṃ tad eva śobhātiśaya-śāli bhavatīti
analyzed: teṣu gamyamāna dharma mukhena eva yat sādṛśyam tat eva śobhā atiśaya śāli bhavati iti

original: te sarve 'pi cārutvātiśaya-yoginaḥ santo guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyasyaiva viṣayāḥ /
analyzed: te sarve pi cāru tva atiśaya yoginaḥ santaḥ guṇībhūta vyaṅgyasya eva viṣayāḥ

original: samāsoktyākṣepa-paryāyokty-ādiṣu tu gamyamānāṃśāvinābhāvenaiva tattva-vyavasthānād guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyatā nirvivādaiva /
analyzed: samāsokti ākṣepa paryāyokti ādiṣu tu gamyamāna aṃśa avinābhāvena eva tattva vyavasthānāt guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tā nirvivādā eva

original: tatra ca guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyatāyām alaṅkārāṇāṃ keṣāñcid alaṅkāra-viśeṣa-garbhatāyāṃ niyamaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tāyām alaṅkārāṇām keṣāñcid alaṅkāra viśeṣa garbha tāyām niyamaḥ

original: yathā vyāja-stuteḥ preyo 'laṅkāra-garbhatve /
analyzed: yathā vyāja stuteḥ preyaḥ laṅkāra garbha tve

original: keṣāñcid alaṅkāra-mātra-garbhatāyāṃ niyamaḥ /
analyzed: keṣāñcid alaṅkāra mātra garbha tāyām niyamaḥ

original: yathā sandehādīnām upamā-garbhatve /
analyzed: yathā sandeha ādīnām upamā garbha tve

original: keṣāñcid alaṅkārāṇāṃ paraspara-garbhatāpi sambhavati /
analyzed: keṣāṃcid alaṅkārāṇām paraspara garbha tā api sambhavati

original: yathā dīpakopamayoḥ /
analyzed: yathā dīpaka upamayoḥ

original: tatra dīpakam upamā-garbhatvena prasiddham /
analyzed: tatra dīpakam upamā garbha tvena prasiddham

original: upamāpi kadācid dīpaka-cchāyānuyāyinī /
analyzed: upamā api kadācid dīpaka chāyā anuyāyinī

original: yathā mālopamā /
analyzed: yathā mālā upamā

original: tathā hi “prabhā-mahatyā śikhayeva dīpaḥ” ity ādau sphuṭaiva dīpaka-cchāyā lakṣyate /
analyzed: tathā hi prabhā mahatyā śikhayā iva dīpaḥ iti ādau sphuṭā eva dīpaka chāyā lakṣyate

original: tad evaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśa-saṃsparśe sati cārutvātiśaya-yogino rūpakādayo 'laṅkārāḥ sarva eva guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyasya mārgaḥ /
analyzed: tat evam vyaṅgya aṃśa saṃsparśe sati cāru tva atiśaya yoginaḥ rūpaka ādayaḥ laṅkārāḥ sarve eva guṇībhūta vyaṅgyasya mārgaḥ

original: guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyatvaṃ ca teṣāṃ tathā-jātīyānāṃ sarveṣām evoktānuktānāṃ sāmānyam /
analyzed: guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tvam ca teṣām tathājātīyānām sarveṣām eva ukta anuktānām sāmānyam

original: tal-lakṣaṇe sarva evaite sulakṣitā bhavanti /
analyzed: tad lakṣaṇe sarve eva ete su lakṣitāḥ bhavanti

original: ekaikasya svarūpa-viśeṣa-kathanena tu sāmānya-lakṣaṇa-rahitena pratipāda-pāṭheneva śabdā na śakyante tattvato nirjñātum ānantyāt /
analyzed: ekaikasya svarūpa viśeṣa kathanena tu sāmānya lakṣaṇa rahitena pratipāda pāṭhena iva śabdāḥ na śakyante tattvataḥ nirjñātum ānantyāt

original: anantā hi vāg-vikalpās tat-prakārā eva cālaṅkārāḥ /
analyzed: anantāḥ hi vāc vikalpāḥ tad prakārāḥ eva ca alaṅkārāḥ

original: guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyasya ca prakārāntareṇāpi vyaṅgyārthānugama-lakṣaṇena viṣayatvam asty eva /
analyzed: guṇībhūta vyaṅgyasya ca prakāra antareṇa api vyaṅgya artha anugama lakṣaṇena viṣaya tvam asti eva

original: tad ayaṃ dhvani-niṣyanda-rūpo dvitīyo 'pi mahā-kavi-viṣayo 'tiramaṇīyo lakṣaṇīyaḥ sahṛdayaiḥ /
analyzed: tat ayam dhvani nisyanda rūpaḥ dvitīyaḥ pi mahā kavi viṣayaḥ ti ramaṇīyaḥ lakṣaṇīyaḥ sahṛdayaiḥ

original: sarvathā nāsty eva sahṛdaya-hṛdaya-hāriṇaḥ kāvyasya sa prakāro yatra na pratīyamānārtha-saṃsparśena saubhāgyam /
analyzed: sarvathā nā asti eva sahṛdaya hṛdaya hāriṇaḥ kāvyasya sa prakāraḥ yatra na pratīyamāna artha saṃsparśena saubhāgyam

original: tad idaṃ kāvya-rahasyaṃ param iti sūribhir bhāvanīyam /
analyzed: tat idam kāvya rahasyam param iti sūribhiḥ bhāvanīyam

original: mukhyā mahā-kavi-girām alaṅkṛti-bhṛtām api /
analyzed: mukhyāḥ mahā kavi girām alaṅkṛti bhṛtām api

original: pratīyamāna-cchāyaiṣā bhūṣā lajjeva yoṣitām // DhvK_3.37 //
analyzed: pratīyamāna chāyā eṣā bhūṣā lajjā iva yoṣitām

original: anayā suprasiddho 'py arthaḥ kim api kāmanīya-kamānīyate / tad yathā-
analyzed: anayā su prasiddhaḥ api arthaḥ kim api kāmanīyakam ānīyate tat yathā

original: viśrambhotthā manmathājñā-vidhāne
analyzed: viśrambha utthāḥ manmatha ājñā vidhāne

original: ye mugdhākṣyāḥ ke 'pi līlā-viśeṣāḥ /
analyzed: ye mugdhākṣyāḥ ke pi līlā viśeṣāḥ

original: akṣuṇṇās te cetasā kevalena
analyzed: a kṣuṇṇāḥ te cetasā kevalena

original: sthitvaikānte santataṃ bhāvanīyāḥ //
analyzed: sthitvā ekānte santatam bhāvanīyāḥ

original: ity atra ke 'pīty anena padena vācyam aspaṣṭam abhidadhatā pratīyamānaṃ vastv-akliṣṭam anantam arpayatā kā chāyā nopapāditā // DhvA_3.37 //
analyzed: iti atra ke pi iti anena padena vācyam aspaṣṭam abhidadhatā pratīyamānam vastu akliṣṭam anantam arpayatā kā chāyā na upapāditā

original: arthāntara-gatiḥ kākvā yā caiṣā paridṛśyate /
analyzed: artha antara gatiḥ kākvā yā ca eṣā paridṛśyate

original: sā vyaṅgyasya guṇī-bhāve prakāram imam āśritā // DhvK_3.38 //
analyzed: sā vyaṅgyasya guṇībhāve prakāram imam āśritā

original: yā caiṣā kākvā kvacid arthāntara-pratītirdṛśyate sa vyaṅgyasyārthasya guṇībhāve sati guṇībhūta-vyaṅgya-lakṣaṇaṃ kāvya-prabhedamāśrayate /
analyzed: yā ca eṣā kākvā kvacid artha antara pratītiḥ dṛśyate sa vyaṅgyasya arthasya guṇībhāve sati guṇībhūta vyaṅgya lakṣaṇam kāvya prabhedam āśrayate

original: yathā-“svasthā bhavanti mayi jīvati dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ” / yathā vā-
analyzed: yathāsvasthāḥ bhavanti mayi jīvati dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ yathā vā

original: ām asatyaḥ uparama pativrate na tvayā malinitaṃ śīlam /
analyzed: ām asatyaḥ uparama pativrate na tvayā malinitam śīlam

original: kiṃ punar janasya jāyeva nāpitaṃ taṃ na kāmayāmahe //
analyzed: kim punar janasya jāyā iva nāpitam tam na kāmayāmahe

original: śabda-śaktir eva hi svābhidheya-sāmarthyākṣipta-kāku-sahāyā saty artha-viśeṣa-pratipatti-hetur na kāku-mātram /
analyzed: śabda śaktiḥ eva hi sva abhidheya sāmarthya ākṣipta kāku sahāyā satī artha viśeṣa pratipatti hetuḥ na kāku mātram

original: viṣayāntare svecchākṛtāt kāku-mātrāt tathā-vidhārtha-pratipatty-asambhavāt /
analyzed: viṣaya antare sva icchā kṛtāt kāku mātrāt tathāvidha artha pratipatti asambhavāt

original: sa cārthaḥ kāku-viśeṣa-sahāya-śabda-vyāpāropārūḍho 'py artha-sāmarthya-labhya iti vyaṅgya-rūpa eva /
analyzed: sa ca arthaḥ kāku viśeṣa sahāya śabda vyāpāra upārūḍhaḥ api artha sāmarthya labhyaḥ iti vyaṅgya rūpaḥ eva

original: vācakatvānugamenaiva tu yadā tad-viśiṣṭa-vācya-pratītis tadā guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyatayā tathā-vidhārtha-dyotinaḥ kāvyasya vyapadeśaḥ /
analyzed: vācaka tva anugamena eva tu yadā tad viśiṣṭa vācya pratītiḥ tadā guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tayā tathāvidha artha dyotinaḥ kāvyasya vyapadeśaḥ

original: vyaṅgya-viśiṣṭa-vācyābhidhāyino hi guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyatvam /
analyzed: vyaṅgya viśiṣṭa vācya abhidhāyinaḥ hi guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tvam

original: prabhedasyāsya viṣayo yaś ca yuktyā pratīyate /
analyzed: prabhedasya asya viṣayaḥ yaḥ ca yuktyā pratīyate

original: vidhātavyā sahṛdayair na tatra dhvani-yojanā // DhvK_3.38 //
analyzed: vidhātavyā sahṛdayaiḥ na tatra dhvani yojanā

original: saṅkīrṇo hi kaścid dhvaner guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyasya ca lakṣye dṛśyate mārgaḥ /
analyzed: saṅkīrṇaḥ hi kaścid dhvaneḥ guṇībhūta vyaṅgyasya ca lakṣye dṛśyate mārgaḥ

original: tatra yasya yukti-sahāyatā tatra tena vyapadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ /
analyzed: tatra yasya yukti sahāya tā tatra tena vyapadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ

original: na sarvatra dhvanir āgiṇā bhavitavyam / yathā-
analyzed: na sarvatra dhvaniḥ āgiṇā bhavitavyam yathā

original: patyuḥ śiraś-candra-kalām anena
analyzed: patyuḥ śiraḥ candra kalām anena

original: spṛśeti sakhyā parihāsa-pūrvam /
analyzed: spṛśa iti sakhyā parihāsa pūrvam

original: sā rañjayitvā caraṇau kṛtāśīr
analyzed: sā rañjayitvā caraṇau kṛta āśīḥ

original: mālyena tāṃ nirvacanaṃ jaghāna //
analyzed: mālyena tām nirvacanam jaghāna

original: yathā ca-
analyzed: yathā ca

original: prayacchatoccaiḥ kusumāni māninī
analyzed: prayacchata uccais kusumāni māninī

original: vipakṣa-gotraṃ dayitena lambhitā /
analyzed: vipakṣa gotram dayitena lambhitā

original: na kiṃcid ūce caraṇena kevalaṃ
analyzed: na kiṃcid ūce caraṇena kevalam

original: lilekha bāṣpākula-locanā bhuvam //
analyzed: lilekha bāṣpa ākula locanā bhuvam

original: ity atra “nirvacanaṃ jaghāna” “na kiṃcid ūce” iti pratiṣedha-mukhena vyaṅgyasyārthasyoktyā kiṃcid viṣayī-kṛtatvād guṇībhāva eva śobhate /
analyzed: iti atra nirvacanam jaghāna na kiṃcid ūce iti pratiṣedha mukhena vyaṅgyasya arthasya uktyā kiṃcid viṣayīkṛta tvāt guṇībhāvaḥ eva śobhate

original: yadā vakroktiṃ vinā vyaṅgyo 'rthas tātparyeṇa pratīyate tadā tasya prādhānyam /
analyzed: yadā vakroktim vinā vyaṅgyaḥ rthaḥ tātparyeṇa pratīyate tadā tasya prādhānyam

original: yathā “evaṃ vādini devarṣau” ity ādau /
analyzed: yathā evam vādini devarṣau iti ādau

original: iha punaruktir bhaṅgyāstīti vācyasyāpi prādhānyam /
analyzed: iha punaruktiḥ bhaṅgyā asti iti vācyasya api prādhānyam

original: tasmān nātrānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgya-dhvani-vyapadeśo vidheyaḥ // DhvA_3.39 //
analyzed: tasmāt na atra anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgya dhvani vyapadeśaḥ vidheyaḥ

original: prakāro 'yaṃ guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyo 'pi dhvani-rūpatām /
analyzed: prakāraḥ yam guṇībhūta vyaṅgyaḥ pi dhvani rūpa tām

original: dhatte rasādi-tātparya-paryālocanayā punaḥ // DhvK_3.40 //
analyzed: dhatte rasa ādi tātparya paryālocanayā punar

original: guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyo 'pi kāvya-prakāro rasa-bhāvādi-tātparyālocane punar dhvanir eva sampadyate /
analyzed: guṇībhūta vyaṅgyaḥ pi kāvya prakāraḥ rasa bhāva ādi tātparya ālocane punar dhvaniḥ eva sampadyate

original: yathātraivānantarodāhṛte śloka-dvaye / yathā ca-
analyzed: yathā atra eva anantara udāhṛte śloka dvaye yathā ca

original: durārādhā rādhā subhaga yad anenāpi mṛjatas
analyzed: durārādhā rādhā subhaga yat anena api mṛjataḥ

original: tavaitat-prāṇeśājaghana-vasanenāśru patitam /
analyzed: tava etat prāṇeśā jaghana vasanena aśru patitam

original: kaṭhoraṃ strī-cetas tad alam upacārair virama he
analyzed: kaṭhoram strī cetaḥ tat alam upacāraiḥ virama he

original: kriyāt kalyāṇaṃ vo harir anunayeṣv evam uditaḥ //
analyzed: kriyāt kalyāṇam vaḥ hariḥ anunayeṣu evam uditaḥ

original: evaṃ sthite ca “nyakkāro hy ayam eva” ity ādi-śloka-nirdiṣṭānāṃ padānāṃ vyaṅgya-viśiṣṭa-vācya-pratipādane 'py etad-vākyārthībhūta-rasāpekṣayā  #
analyzed: evam sthite ca nyakkāraḥ hi ayam eva iti ādi śloka nirdiṣṭānām padānām vyaṅgya viśiṣṭa vācya pratipādane pi etad vākya arthībhūta rasa apekṣayā

original: vyañjakatvam uktam /
analyzed: vyañjaka tvam uktam

original: ne teṣāṃ padānām arthāntara-saṃkramita-vācya-dhvani-bhramo vidhātavyaḥ,
analyzed: teṣām padānām artha antara saṃkramita vācya dhvani bhramaḥ vidhātavyaḥ

original: vivakṣita-vācyatvāt teṣām /
analyzed: vivakṣita vācya tvāt teṣām

original: teṣu hi vyaṅgya-viśiṣṭatvaṃ vācyasya pratīyate na tu vyaṅgya-rūpa-pariṇatatvam /
analyzed: teṣu hi vyaṅgya viśiṣṭa tvam vācyasya pratīyate na tu vyaṅgya rūpa pariṇata tvam

original: tasmād vākyaṃ tatra dhvaniḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt vākyam tatra dhvaniḥ

original: padāni tu guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyāni /
analyzed: padāni tu guṇībhūta vyaṅgyāni

original: na ca kevalaṃ guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyāny eva padāny alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgya-dhvaner vyañjakāni yāvad-arthāntara-saṃkramita-vācyāni dhvani-prabheda-rūpāṇy  #
analyzed: na ca kevalam guṇībhūta vyaṅgyāni eva padāni alakṣya krama vyaṅgya dhvaneḥ vyañjakāni yāvat artha antara saṃkramita vācyāni dhvani prabheda rūpāṇi

original: api /
analyzed: api

original: yathātraiva śloke rāvaṇa ity asya prabhedāntara-rūpa-vyañjakatvam /
analyzed: yathā atra eva śloke rāvaṇaḥ iti asya prabheda antara rūpa vyañjaka tvam

original: yatra tu vākye rasādi-tātparyaṃ nāsti guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyaiḥ padair udbhāsite 'pi tatra guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyataiva samudāya-dharmaḥ / yathā-
analyzed: yatra tu vākye rasa ādi tātparyam na asti guṇībhūta vyaṅgyaiḥ padaiḥ udbhāsite tatra guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tā eva samudāya dharmaḥ yathā

original: rājānam api sevante viṣamam apy upayuñjate /
analyzed: rājānam api sevante viṣamam api upayuñjate

original: ramante ca saha strībhiḥ kuśalāḥ khalu mānavāḥ //ity ādau /
analyzed: ramante ca saha strībhiḥ kuśalāḥ khalu mānavāḥ iti ādau

original: vācya-vyaṅgyayoḥ prādhānyāprādhānya-viveke paraḥ prayatno vidhātavyaḥ,

original: vyaṅgyasyārthasya prādhānye dhvani-saṃjñita-kāvya-prakāraḥ guṇa-bhāve tu guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyatā /

original: atha kim idaṃ citraṃ nāma ?
analyzed: atha kim idam citram nāma

analyzed: vastu ca sarvam eva jagat gatam avaśyam kasyacid rasasya bhāvasya vā aṅga tvam pratipadyate antatas vibhāva tvena

original: citta-vṛtti-viśeṣā hi rasādayaḥ,
analyzed: citta vṛtti viśeṣāḥ hi rasa ādayaḥ

original: na ca tad asti vastu kiṃcid yan na citta-vṛtti-viśeṣam upajanayati tad-anutpādane vā kavi-viṣayataiva tasya na syāt kavi-viṣayaś ca citratayā  #
analyzed: na ca tat asti vastu kiṃcid yat na citta vṛtti viśeṣam upajanayati tad anutpādane vā kavi viṣaya tā eva tasya na syāt kavi viṣayaḥ ca citra tayā

original: kaścin nirūpyate /
analyzed: kaścid nirūpyate

analyzed: kim tu yadā rasa bhāva ādi vivakṣā śūnyaḥ kaviḥ śabdālaṅkāram arthālaṅkāram vā upanibadhnāti tadā tad vivakṣā apekṣayā rasa ādi śūnyatā arthasya parikalpyate

original: vivakṣopārūḍha eva hi kāvye śabdānām arthaḥ /

analyzed: vācya sāmarthya vaśena vā kavi vivakṣā virahe tathāvidhe viṣaye rasa ādi pratītiḥ

analyzed: bhavantī paridurbalā bhavati iti anena api prakāreṇa nīrasa tvam parikalpya citra viṣayaḥ vyavasthāpyate

original: tad idam uktam-
analyzed: tat idam uktam

original: alaṅkāra-nibandho yaḥ sa citra-viṣayo mataḥ //
analyzed: alaṅkāra nibandhaḥ yaḥ sa citra viṣayaḥ mataḥ

original: rasādiṣu vivakṣā tu syāt tātparyavatī yadā /
analyzed: rasa ādiṣu vivakṣā tu syāt tātparyavatī yadā

original: etac ca citraṃ kavīnāṃ viśṛṅkhala-girāṃ rasādi-tātparyam anapekṣyaiva kāvya-pravṛtti-darśanād asmābhiḥ parikalpitam /
