original: idānīntanānāṃ tu nyāyye kāvya-naya-vyavasthāpane kriyamāṇe nāsty eva dhvani-vyatiriktaḥ kāvya-prakāraḥ /
analyzed: idānīntanānām tu nyāyye kāvya naya vyavasthāpane kriyamāṇe nā asti eva dhvani vyatiriktaḥ kāvya prakāraḥ

original: yataḥ paripākavatāṃ kavīnāṃ rasādi-tātparya-virahe vyāpāra eva na śobhate /
analyzed: yatas paripākavatām kavīnām rasa ādi tātparya virahe vyāpāraḥ eva na śobhate

original: rasādi-tātparye ca nāsty eva tad vastu yad abhimata-rasāṅgatāṃ nīyamānaṃ na praguṇībhavati /
analyzed: rasa ādi tātparye ca nā asti eva tat vastu yat abhimata rasa aṅga tām nīyamānam na praguṇībhavati

original: acetanā pi hi bhāvā yathāyatham ucita-rasa-vibhāvatayā cetana-vṛttānta-yojanayā vā na santy eva te ye yānti na rasāṅgatām /
analyzed: acetanāḥ hi bhāvāḥ yathāyatham ucita rasa vibhāva tayā cetana vṛttānta yojanayā vā na santi eva te ye yānti na rasa aṅga tām

original: tathā cedam ucyate-
analyzed: tathā ca idam ucyate

original: apāre kāvya-saṃsāre kavir ekaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: apāre kāvya saṃsāre kaviḥ ekaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: yathāsmai rocate viśvaṃ tathedaṃ parivartate //
analyzed: yathā asmai rocate viśvam tathā idam parivartate

original: śṛṅgārī cet kaviḥ kāvye jātaṃ rasa-mayaṃ jagat /
analyzed: śṛṅgārī ced kaviḥ kāvye jātam rasa mayam jagat

original: sa eva vīta-rāgaś cen nīrasaṃ sarvam eva tat //
analyzed: saḥ eva vīta rāgaḥ ced nīrasam sarvam eva tat

original: bhāvān acetanān api cetanavac cetanānacetanavat /
analyzed: bhāvān acetanān api cetanavat cetana an acetana vat

original: vyavahārayati yatheṣṭaṃ sukaviḥ kāvye svatantratayā //
analyzed: vyavahārayati yathā iṣṭam su kaviḥ kāvye svatantra tayā

original: tasmān nāsty eva tad vastu yat sarvātmanā rasa-tātparyavataḥ kaves tad-icchayā tad-abhimata-rasāṅgatāṃ na dhatte /
analyzed: tasmāt nā asti eva tat vastu yat sarva ātmanā rasa tātparyavataḥ kaveḥ tad icchayā tad abhimata rasa aṅga tām na dhatte

original: tathopanibadhyamānaṃ vā na cārutvātiśayaṃ puṣṇāti /
analyzed: tathā upanibadhyamānam vā na cāru tva atiśayam puṣṇāti

original: sarvam etac ca mahā-kavīnāṃ kāvyeṣu dṛśyate /
analyzed: sarvam etat ca mahā kavīnām kāvyeṣu dṛśyate

original: asmābhir api sveṣu kāvya-prabandheṣu yathāyathaṃ darśitam eva /
analyzed: asmābhiḥ api sveṣu kāvya prabandheṣu yathāyatham darśitam eva

original: sthite caivaṃ sarva eva kāvya-prakāro na dhvani-dharmatām atipatati rasādy-apekṣāyāṃ kaver guṇībhūta-vyaṅgya-lakṣaṇo 'pi prakāras tad-aṅgatām  #
analyzed: sthite ca evam sarvaḥ eva kāvya prakāraḥ na dhvani dharma tām atipatati rasa ādi apekṣāyām kaveḥ guṇībhūta vyaṅgya lakṣaṇaḥ pi prakāraḥ tad aṅga tām

original: avalambata ity uktaṃ prāk /
analyzed: avalambataḥ iti uktam prāk

original: yadā tu cāṭuṣu devatā-stutiṣu vā rasādīnām aṅgatayā vyavasthānaṃ hṛdayavatīṣu ca
analyzed: yadā tu cāṭuṣu devatā stutiṣu vā rasa ādīnām aṅga tayā vyavasthānam hṛdayavatīṣu ca

original: suprajñaka-gāthāsu kāsucid vyaṅgya-viśiṣṭa-vācye prādhānyaṃ tad api guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyasya
analyzed: su prajñaka gāthāsu kāsucid vyaṅgya viśiṣṭa vācye prādhānyam tat api guṇībhūta vyaṅgyasya

original: dhvani-niṣpanda-bhūtatvam evety uktaṃ prāk /
analyzed: dhvani niṣpanda bhūta tvam eva iti uktam prāk

original: tad evam idānīṃtana-kavi-kāvya-nayopadeśe kriyamāṇe prāthamikānām abhyāsārthināṃ yadi paraṃ citreṇa vyavahāraḥ,
analyzed: tat evam idānīṃtana kavi kāvya naya upadeśe kriyamāṇe prāthamikānām abhyāsa arthinām yadi param citreṇa vyavahāraḥ

original: prāpta-pariṇatīnāṃ tu dhvanir eva kāvyam iti sthitam etat /
analyzed: prāpta pariṇatīnām tu dhvaniḥ eva kāvyam iti sthitam etat

original: tad ayam atra saṅgrahaḥ-
analyzed: tat ayam atra saṅgrahaḥ

original: yasmin raso vā bhāvo vā tātparyeṇa prakāśate /
analyzed: yasmin rasaḥ vā bhāvaḥ vā tātparyeṇa prakāśate

original: saṃvṛttyābhihitau vastu yatrālaṅkāra eva vā //
analyzed: saṃvṛttyā abhihitau vastu yatra alaṅkāraḥ eva vā

original: kāvyādhvani dhvanir vyaṅgya-prādhānyaika-nibandhanaḥ /
sarvatra tatra viṣayī jñeyaḥ sahṛdayair janaiḥ // DhvA_3.42 //
analyzed: sarvatra tatra viṣayī jñeyaḥ sahṛdayaiḥ janaiḥ

original: saguṇībhūta-vyaṅgyaiḥ sālaṅkāraiḥ saha prabhedaiḥ svaiḥ /
analyzed: sa guṇībhūta vyaṅgyaiḥ sa alaṅkāraiḥ saha prabhedaiḥ svaiḥ

original: saṅkara-saṃsṛṣṭibhyāṃ punar apy uddyotate bahudhā // DhvK_3.43 //
analyzed: saṅkara saṃsṛṣṭibhyām punar api uddyotate bahudhā

original: tasya ca dhvaneḥ sva-prabhedair guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyena vācyālaṅkāraiś ca saṅkara-saṃsṛṣṭi-vyavasthāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāṃ bahu-prabhedatā lakṣye dṛśyate
analyzed: tasya ca dhvaneḥ sva prabhedaiḥ guṇībhūta vyaṅgyena vācya alaṅkāraiḥ ca saṅkara saṃsṛṣṭi vyavasthāyām kriyamāṇāyām bahu prabheda tā lakṣye dṛśyate

original: tathā hi sva-prabheda-saṅkīrṇaḥ,
analyzed: tathā hi sva prabheda saṅkīrṇaḥ

original: sva-prabheda-saṃsṛṣṭo guṇībhūta-vyaṅgya-saṅkīrṇo guṇībhūta-vyaṅgya-saṃsṛṣṭo vācyālaṅkārāntara-saṅkīrṇo
analyzed: sva prabheda saṃsṛṣṭaḥ guṇībhūta vyaṅgya saṅkīrṇaḥ guṇībhūta vyaṅgya saṃsṛṣṭaḥ vācya alaṅkāra antara saṅkīrṇaḥ

original: vācyālaṅkārāntara-saṃsṛṣṭaḥ saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkāra-saṅkīrṇaḥ saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkāra-saṃsṛṣṭaś ceti
analyzed: vācya alaṅkāra antara saṃsṛṣṭaḥ saṃsṛṣṭa alaṅkāra saṅkīrṇaḥ saṃsṛṣṭa alaṅkāra saṃsṛṣṭaḥ ca iti

original: bahudhā dhvaniḥ prakāśate /
analyzed: bahudhā dhvaniḥ prakāśate

original: tatra sva-prabheda-saṅkīrṇatvaṃ kadācid anugrāhyānugrāhaka-bhāvena /
analyzed: tatra sva prabheda saṅkīrṇa tvam kadācid anugrāhya anugrāhaka bhāvena

original: yathā-“evaṃ-vādini devarṣau” ity ādau /
analyzed: yathā evam vādini devarṣau iti ādau

original: atra hy artha-śakty-udbhavānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgya-dhvani-prabhedenālakṣya-krama-vyaṅgya-dhvani-prabhedo 'nugṛhyamāṇaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: atra hi artha śakti udbhava anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgya dhvani prabhedena alakṣya krama vyaṅgya dhvani prabhedaḥ nugṛhyamāṇaḥ pratīyate

original: evaṃ kadācit prabheda-dvaya-sampāta-sandehena / yathā-
analyzed: evam kadācid prabheda dvaya sampāta sandehena yathā

original: khaṇa-pāhuṇiā deara esā jāāeṃ kiṃ pi de bhaṇidā /
analyzed: khaṇa pāhuṇiā deara esā jāāeṃ kim pi de bhaṇidā

original: rua{i} paḍohara-valahī-gharammi aṇuṇijja{u} barāī //
analyzed: ruai paḍohara valahī gharammi

original: [kṣaṇa-prāghuṇikā devara eṣā jāyayā kim api te bhaṇitā /
analyzed: kṣaṇaprāghuṇikā devaraḥ eṣā jāyayā kim api te bhaṇitā

original: roditi śūnya-valabhī-gṛhe 'nunīyatāṃ varākī //]
analyzed: roditi śūnya valabhī gṛhe nunīyatām varākī

original: atra hy anunīyatām ity etat-padam arthāntara-saṅkramita-vācyatvena vivakṣitāny apara-vācyatvena ca sambhāvyate /
analyzed: atra hi anunīyatām iti etat padam artha antara saṅkramita vācyatvena vivakṣitāni apara vācyatvena ca sambhāvyate

original: na cānyatara-pakṣa-nirṇaye pramāṇam asti /
analyzed: na ca anyatara pakṣa nirṇaye pramāṇam asti

original: eka-vyañjakānupraveśena tu vyaṅgyatvam alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyasya sva-prabhedāntarāpekṣayā bāhulyena sambhavati /
analyzed: eka vyañjaka anupraveśena tu vyaṅgya tvam alakṣya krama vyaṅgyasya sva prabheda antara apekṣayā bāhulyena sambhavati

original: yathā-“snigdha-śyāmala” ity ādau /
analyzed: yathā snigdha śyāmalaḥ iti ādau

original: sva-prabheda-saṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ ca yathā pūrvodāharaṇa eva /
analyzed: sva prabheda saṃsṛṣṭa tvam ca yathā pūrva udāharaṇe eva

original: atra hy arthāntara-saṃkramita-vācyasyātyanta-tiraskṛta-vācyasya ca saṃsargaḥ /
analyzed: atra hi artha antara saṃkramita vācyasya atyanta tiraskṛta vācyasya ca saṃsargaḥ

original: guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgya-saṅkīrṇatvaṃ yathā-“nyak-kāro hy ayam eva me yad arayaḥ” ity ādau /
analyzed: guṇībhūta vyaṅgya saṅkīrṇa tvam yathā anyakkāraḥ hi ayam eva me yat arayaḥ iti ādau

original: yathā vā-
analyzed: yathā vā

original: kartā dyūta-cchalānāṃ jatu-maya-śaraṇoddīpanaḥ so 'bhimānī
analyzed: kartā dyūta chalānām jatu maya śaraṇa uddīpanaḥ saḥ bhimānī

original: kṛṣṇā-keśottarīya-vyapanayana-paṭuḥ pāṇḍavā yasya dāsāḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇākeśa uttarīya vyapanayana paṭuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ yasya dāsāḥ

original: rājā duḥśāsanāder gurur anuja-śatasyāṅga-rājasya mitraṃ
analyzed: rājā duḥśāsana ādeḥ guruḥ anuja śatasya aṅga rājasya mitram

original: kvāste duryodhano 'sau kathayata na ruṣā draṣṭum abhyāgatau svaḥ //
analyzed: kva āste duryodhanaḥ sau kathayata na ruṣā draṣṭum abhyāgatau svaḥ

original: atra hy alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyasya vākyārthī-bhūtasya vyaṅgya-viśiṣṭa-vācyābhidhāyibhiḥ padaiḥ sammiśratā /
analyzed: atra hi alakṣya krama vyaṅgyasya vākya arthībhūtasya vyaṅgya viśiṣṭa vācya abhidhāyibhiḥ padaiḥ sammiśra tā

original: ata eva ca padārthāśrayatve guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgyasya vākyārthāśrayatve ca dhvaneḥ saṅkīrṇatāyām api na virodhaḥ sva-prabhedāntaravat /
analyzed: atas eva ca padārtha āśraya tve guṇībhūta vyaṅgyasya vākyārtha āśraya tve ca dhvaneḥ saṅkīrṇa tāyām api na virodhaḥ sva prabheda antara vat

original: yathā hi dhvani-prabhedāntarāṇi parasparaṃ saṅkīryante padārtha-vākyārthāśrayatvena ca na viruddhāni /
analyzed: yathā hi dhvani prabheda antarāṇi parasparam saṅkīryante padārtha vākyārtha āśraya tvena ca na viruddhāni

original: kiṃ caika-vyaṅgyāśrayatve tu pradhāna-guṇa-bhāvo virudhyate na tu vyaṅgya-bhedāpekṣayā,
analyzed: kim ca eka vyaṅgya āśraya tve tu pradhāna guṇa bhāvaḥ virudhyate na tu vyaṅgya bheda apekṣayā

original: tato 'py asya na virodhaḥ /
analyzed: tatas api asya na virodhaḥ

original: ayaṃ ca saṅkara-saṃsṛṣṭi-vyavahāro bahūnām ekatra vācya-vācaka-bhāva iva vyaṅgya-vyañjaka-bhāve 'pi nirvirodha eva mantavyaḥ /
analyzed: ayam ca saṅkara saṃsṛṣṭi vyavahāraḥ bahūnām ekatra vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ iva vyaṅgya vyañjaka bhāve pi nirvirodhaḥ eva mantavyaḥ

original: yatra tu padāni kānicid avivakṣita-vācyāny anuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgya-vācyāni vā tatra dhvani-guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgyayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭatvam /
analyzed: yatra tu padāni kānicid avivakṣita vācyāni anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgya vācyāni vā tatra dhvani guṇībhūta vyaṅgyayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭa tvam

original: yathā-“teṣāṃ gopa-vadhū-vilāsa-suhṛdām” ity ādau /
analyzed: yathā teṣām gopa vadhū vilāsa suhṛdām iti ādau

original: atra hi “vilāsa-suhṛdām” “rādhā-rahaḥ-sākṣiṇām” ity ete pade dhvani-prabheda-rūpe “te” “jāne” ity ete ca pade guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgya-rūpe /
analyzed: atra hi vilāsa suhṛdām rādhā rahaḥsākṣiṇām iti ete pade dhvani prabheda rūpe te jāne iti ete ca pade guṇībhūta vyaṅgya rūpe

original: vācyālaṅkāra-saṅkīrṇatvam alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyāpekṣayā rasavati sālaṅkāre kāvye sarvatra suvyavasthitam /
analyzed: vācya alaṅkāra saṅkīrṇa tvam alakṣya krama vyaṅgya apekṣayā rasavati sa alaṅkāre kāvye sarvatra su vyavasthitam

original: prabhedāntarāṇām api kadācit saṅkīrṇatvaṃ bhavaty eva /
analyzed: prabheda antarāṇām api kadācid saṅkīrṇa tvam bhavati eva

original: yathā mamaiva-
analyzed: yathā mama eva

original: yā vyāpāravatī rasān rasayituṃ kācit kavīnāṃ navā
analyzed: yā vyāpāravatī rasān rasayitum kācid kavīnām navā

original: dṛṣṭir yā pariniṣṭhitārtha-viṣayonmeṣā ca vaipaścitī /
analyzed: dṛṣṭiḥ yā pariniṣṭhita artha viṣaya unmeṣā ca vaipaścitī

original: te dve apy avalambya viśvam aniśaṃ nirvarṇayanto vayaṃ
analyzed: te dve api avalambya viśvam aniśam nirvarṇayantaḥ vayam

original: śrāntā naiva ca labdham abdhi-śayana /
analyzed: śrāntāḥ nā eva ca labdham abdhiśayana

original: tvad-bhakti-tulyaṃ sukham //
analyzed: tvad bhakti tulyam sukham

original: ity atra virodhālaṅkāreṇārthāntara-saṃkramita-vācyasya dhvani-prabhedasya saṅkīrṇatvam /
analyzed: iti atra virodha alaṅkāreṇa artha antara saṃkramita vācyasya dhvani prabhedasya saṅkīrṇa tvam

original: vācyālaṅkāra-saṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ ca padāpekṣayaiva /
analyzed: vācya alaṅkāra saṃsṛṣṭa tvam ca pada apekṣayā eva

original: yatra hi kānicit padāni vācyālaṅkāra-bhāñji kānicic ca dhvani-prabheda-yuktāni / yathā-
analyzed: yatra hi kānicid padāni vācya alaṅkāra bhāñji kānicid ca dhvani prabheda yuktāni yathā

original: dīrghīkurvan paṭu mada-kalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ
analyzed: dīrghīkurvan paṭu mada kalam kūjitam sārasānām

original: pratyūṣeṣu sphuṭita-kamalāmoda-maitrī-kaṣāyaḥ /
yatra strīṇāṃ harati surata-glānim aṅgānukūlaḥ
analyzed: yatra strīṇām harati surata glānim aṅga anukūlaḥ

original: siprāvātaḥ priyatama iva prārthanā-cāṭu-kāraḥ //
analyzed: siprā vātaḥ priyatamaḥ iva prārthanā cāṭu kāraḥ

original: atra hi maitrī-padam avivakṣita-vācyo dhvaniḥ /
analyzed: atra hi maitrī padam avivakṣita vācyaḥ dhvaniḥ

original: padāntareṣv alaṅkārāntarāṇi /
analyzed: pada antareṣu alaṅkāra antarāṇi

original: saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkārāntara-saṅkīrṇo dhvanir, yathā-
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭa alaṅkāra antara saṅkīrṇaḥ dhvaniḥ yathā

original: danta-kṣatāni karajaiś ca vipāṭitāni
analyzed: danta kṣatāni karajaiḥ ca vipāṭitāni

original: prodbhinna-sāndra-pulake bhavataḥ śarīre /
analyzed: prodbhinna sāndra pulake bhavataḥ śarīre

original: dattāni rakta-manasā mṛga-rāja-vadhvā
analyzed: dattāni rakta manasā mṛgarāja vadhvā

original: jāta-spṛhair munibhir apy avalokitāni //
analyzed: jāta spṛhaiḥ munibhiḥ api avalokitāni

original: atra hi samāsokti-saṃsṛṣṭena virodhālaṅkāreṇa saṅkīrṇasyālakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ prakāśanam /
analyzed: atra hi samāsokti saṃsṛṣṭena virodha alaṅkāreṇa saṅkīrṇasya alakṣya krama vyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ prakāśanam

original: dayā-vīrasya paramārthato vākyārthībhūtatvāt /
analyzed: dayāvīrasya paramārthataḥ vākya arthībhūta tvāt

original: saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkāra-saṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ ca dhvaner yathā-
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭa alaṅkāra saṃsṛṣṭa tvam ca dhvaneḥ yathā

original: abhinava-payodhara-rasiteṣu pathika-śyāmāyiteṣu divaseṣu /
analyzed: abhinava payodhara rasiteṣu pathika śyāmāyiteṣu divaseṣu

original: śobhate prasārita-grīvāṇāṃ nṛttaṃ mayūra-vṛndānām //
analyzed: śobhate prasārita grīvāṇām nṛttam mayūra vṛndānām

original: atra hy upamā-rūpakābhyāṃ śabda-śakty-udbhavānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ saṃsṛṣṭatvam /
analyzed: atra hi upamā rūpakābhyām śabda śakti udbhava anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ saṃsṛṣṭa tvam

original: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedāḥ prabheda-bhedāś ca kena śakyante /
analyzed: evam dhvaneḥ prabhedāḥ prabheda bhedāḥ ca kena śakyante

original: saṅkhyātuṃ diṅ-mātraṃ teṣām idam uktam asmābhiḥ // DhvK_3.44 //
analyzed: saṅkhyātum diś mātram teṣām idam uktam asmābhiḥ

original: anantā hi dhvaneḥ prakārāḥ sahṛdayānāṃ vyutpattaye teṣāṃ diṅ-mātraṃ kathitam //
analyzed: anantāḥ hi dhvaneḥ prakārāḥ sahṛdayānām vyutpattaye teṣām diś mātram kathitam

original: ity ukta-lakṣaṇo yo dhvanir vivecyaḥ prayatnataḥ sadbhiḥ
analyzed: iti ukta lakṣaṇaḥ yaḥ dhvaniḥ vivecyaḥ prayatnataḥ sadbhiḥ

original: sat-kāvyaṃ kartuṃ vā jñātuṃ vā samyag abhiyuktaiḥ // DhvK_3.45 //
analyzed: satkāvyam kartum vā jñātum vā samyak abhiyuktaiḥ

original: ukta-svarūpa-dhvani-nirūpaṇa-nipuṇā hi sat-kavayaḥ sahṛdayāś ca niyatam eva kāvya-viṣaye parāṃ prakarṣa-padavīm āsādayanti //
analyzed: ukta svarūpa dhvani nirūpaṇa nipuṇāḥ hi sat kavayaḥ sahṛdayāḥ ca niyatam eva kāvya viṣaye parām prakarṣa padavīm āsādayanti

original: asphuṭa-sphuritaṃ kāvya-tattvam etad yathoditam /
analyzed: asphuṭa sphuritam kāvya tattvam etat yathā uditam

original: aśaknuvadbhir vyākartuṃ rītayaḥ sampravartitāḥ // DhvK_3.46 //
analyzed: a śaknuvadbhiḥ vyākartum rītayaḥ sampravartitāḥ

original: etad-dhvani-pravartanena nirṇītaṃ kāvya-tattvam asphuṭa-sphuritaṃ sad aśaknuvadbhiḥ pratipādayituṃ vaidarbhī gauḍī pāñcālī ceti rītayaḥ pravartitāḥ
analyzed: etat dhvani pravartanena nirṇītam kāvya tattvam asphuṭa sphuritam sat a śaknuvadbhiḥ pratipādayitum vaidarbhī gauḍī pāñcālī ca iti rītayaḥ pravartitāḥ

original: rīti-lakṣaṇa-vidhāyināṃ hi kāvya-tattvam etad asphuṭatayā manāk-sphuritam āsīd iti lakṣyate tad atra sphuṭatayā sampradarśitenānyena rīti-lakṣaṇena  #
analyzed: rīti lakṣaṇa vidhāyinām hi kāvya tattvam etat asphuṭa tayā manāk sphuritam āsīt iti lakṣyate tat atra sphuṭa tayā sampradarśitena anyena rīti lakṣaṇena

original: na kiṃcit // DhvA_3.46 //
analyzed: na kiṃcid

original: śabda-tattvāśrayāḥ kāścid artha-tattva-yujo 'parāḥ /
analyzed: śabda tattva āśrayāḥ kāścid artha tattva yujaḥ parāḥ

original: vṛttayo 'pi prakāśante jñāte 'smin kāvya-lakṣaṇe // DhvK_3.47 //
analyzed: vṛttayaḥ pi prakāśante jñāte smin kāvya lakṣaṇe

original: asmin vyaṅgya-vyañjakabhāvavivecanamaye kāvya-lakṣaṇe jñāte sati yāḥ kāścitprasiddhā
analyzed: asmin vyaṅgya vyañjaka bhāva vivecana maye kāvya lakṣaṇe jñāte sati yāḥ kāścid prasiddhā

original: upanāgarikādyāḥ śabdatattvāśrayāḥ vṛttayo yāścārthatattvasambaddhāḥ kaiśikyādayastāḥ
analyzed: upanāgarikā ādyāḥ śabda tattva āśrayāḥ vṛttayaḥ yāḥ ca artha tattva sambaddhāḥ kaiśikī ādayaḥ tāḥ

original: samyagrītipadavīmavataranti /
analyzed: samyak rīti padavīm avataranti

original: anyathā tu tāsāmadṛṣṭārthānām iva vṛttīnāmaśraddheyatvam eva syānnānubhavasiddhatvam /
analyzed: anyathā tu tāsām adṛṣṭa arthānām iva vṛttīnām aśraddheya tvam eva syāt na anubhava siddha tvam

original: evaṃ sphuṭatayaiva lakṣaṇīyaṃ svarūpamasya dhvaneḥ /
analyzed: evam sphuṭa tayā eva lakṣaṇīyam svarūpam asya dhvaneḥ

original: yatra śabdānām arthānāṃ ca keṣāñcitpratipattṛviśeṣasaṃvedyaṃ jātyatvam iva ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ
analyzed: yatra śabdānām arthānām ca keṣāñcid pratipattṛ viśeṣa saṃvedyam jātya tvam iva ratna viśeṣāṇām

original: cārutvamanākhyeyamavabhāsate kāvye tatra dhvanivyavahāra iti yallakṣaṇaṃ dhvaner
analyzed: cāru tvam anākhyeyam avabhāsate kāvye tatra dhvani vyavahāraḥ iti yat lakṣaṇam dhvaneḥ

original: ucyate kenacittadayuktam iti nābhidheyatāmarhati /
analyzed: ucyate kenacid tat ayuktam iti na abhidheya tām arhati

original: yataḥ śabdānāṃ svarūpāśrayas tāvad akliṣṭatve satyaprayuktaprayogaḥ /
analyzed: yatas śabdānām sva rūpa āśrayaḥ tāvat akliṣṭa tve satya prayukta prayogaḥ

original: vācakāśrayas tu prasādo vyañjakatvaṃ ceti viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: ca iti

original: arthānāṃ ca sphuṭatvenāvabhāsanaṃ vyaṅgyaparatvaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśaviśiṣṭatvam ceti viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: arthānām ca sphuṭa tvena avabhāsanam vyaṅgya para tvam vyaṅgya aṃśa viśiṣṭa tvam ca iti viśeṣaḥ

original: tau ca viśeṣau vyākhyātuṃ śakyete vyākhyātau ca bahuprakāram /
analyzed: tau ca viśeṣau vyākhyātum śakyete vyākhyātau ca bahu prakāram

original: tadvyatiriktānākhyeyaviśeṣasambhāvanā tu vivekāvasādabhāvamūlaiva /
analyzed: tad vyatirikta anākhyeya viśeṣa sambhāvanā tu viveka avasāda bhāva mūlā eva

original: yasmādanākhyeyatvaṃ sarva-śabdāgocaratvena na kasyacitsambhavati /
analyzed: yasmāt anākhyeya tvam sarva śabda agocara tvena na kasyacid sambhavati

original: antato 'nākhyeyaśabdena tasyābhidhānasambhavāt /
analyzed: antatas na ākhyeya śabdena tasya abhidhāna sambhavāt

original: sāmānyasaṃsparśivikalpaśabdāgocaratve sati,
analyzed: sāmānya saṃsparśi vikalpa śabda agocara tve sati

original: prakāśamānatvaṃ tu yadanākhyeyatvam ucyate kvacit tad api kāvyaviśeṣāṇāṃ ratnaviśeṣāṇām iva na sambhavati /
analyzed: prakāśamāna tvam tu yat anākhyeya tvam ucyate kvacid tat api kāvya viśeṣāṇām ratna viśeṣāṇām iva na sambhavati

original: teṣāṃ lakṣaṇakāraivyākṛta-rūpatvāt /
analyzed: teṣām lakṣaṇakāraiḥ vyākṛta rūpa tvāt

original: ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ ca sāmānyasambhāvanayaiva mūlyasthitiparikalpanādarśanācca /
analyzed: ratna viśeṣāṇām ca sāmānya sambhāvanayā eva mūlya sthiti parikalpanā darśanāt ca

original: ubhayeṣām api teṣāṃ pratipattṛviśeṣasaṃvedyatvamasty eva /
analyzed: ubhayeṣām api teṣām pratipattṛ viśeṣa saṃvedya tvam asti eva

original: vaikaṭikā eva hi ratnatattvavidaḥ,
analyzed: vaikaṭikāḥ eva hi ratna tattva vidaḥ

original: sahṛdayā eva hi kāvyānāṃ rasajñā iti kasyātra vipratipattiḥ /
analyzed: sahṛdayāḥ eva hi kāvyānām rasa jñāḥ iti kasya atra vipratipattiḥ

original: yat tv anirdeśyatvaṃ sarva-lakṣaṇa-viṣayaṃ bauddhānāṃ prasiddhaṃ tattanmataparīkṣāyāṃ granthāntare nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu anirdeśya tvam sarva lakṣaṇa viṣayam bauddhānām prasiddham tat tad mata parīkṣāyām grantha antare nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ

original: iha tu granthāntaraśravaṇalavaprakāśanaṃ sahṛdayavaimanasyapradāyīti na prakriyate /
analyzed: iha tu grantha antara śravaṇa lava prakāśanam sahṛdaya vaimanasya pradāyi iti na prakriyate

original: bauddhamatena vā yathā pratyakṣādilakṣaṇaṃ tathāsmākaṃ dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: bauddha matena vā yathā pratyakṣa ādi lakṣaṇam tathā asmākam dhvani lakṣaṇam bhaviṣyati

original: tasmāllakṣaṇāntarasyāghaṭanādaśabdārthatvācca tasyoktam eva dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ sādhīyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt lakṣaṇa antarasya aghaṭanāt aśabda artha tvāt ca tasya uktam eva dhvani lakṣaṇam sādhīyaḥ

original: tad idam uktam-
analyzed: tat idam uktam

original: anākhyeyāṃśa-bhāsitvaṃ nirvācyārthatayā dhvaneḥ /
analyzed: anākhyeya aṃśa bhāsi tvam nirvācya artha tayā dhvaneḥ

original: na lakṣaṇaṃ,
analyzed: na lakṣaṇam

original: lakṣaṇaṃ tu sādhīyo 'sya yathoditam //
analyzed: lakṣaṇam tu sādhīyaḥ yathā uditam

original: // iti śrī-rājānakānandavardhanācārya-viracite dhvany-āloke tṛtīya uddyotaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī rāja ānaka ānandavardhana ācārya viracite dhvanyāloke tṛtīyaḥ uddyotaḥ

original: // caturthoddyotaḥ //
analyzed: caturtha uddyotaḥ

original: evaṃ dhvaniṃ sa-prapañcaṃ vipratipatti-nirāsārthaṃ vyutpādya tad-vyutpādane prayojanāntaram ucyate-
analyzed: evam dhvanim sa prapañcam vipratipatti nirāsa artham vyutpādya tad vyutpādane prayojana antaram ucyate

original: dhvaner yaḥ saguṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgyasyādhvā pradarśitaḥ /
analyzed: dhvaneḥ yaḥ sa guṇībhūta vyaṅgyasya adhvā pradarśitaḥ

original: anenānantyam āyāti kavīnāṃ pratibhā-guṇaḥ // DhvK_4.1 //
analyzed: anena ānantyam āyāti kavīnām pratibhā guṇaḥ

original: ya eṣa dhvaner guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgyasya ca mārgaḥ prakāśitas tasya phalāntaraṃ kavi-pratibhānantyam /
analyzed: yaḥ eṣa dhvaneḥ guṇībhūta vyaṅgyasya ca mārgaḥ prakāśitaḥ tasya phala antaram kavi pratibhā ānantyam

original: katham iti cet-
analyzed: katham iti ced

original: ato hy anyatamenāpi prakāreṇa vibhūṣitā /
analyzed: atas hi anyatamena api prakāreṇa vibhūṣitā

original: vāṇī navatvam āyāti pūrvārthānvayavaty api // DhvK_4.2 //
analyzed: vāṇī nava tvam āyāti pūrva artha anvayavatī api

original: ato dhvaner ukta-prabheda-madhyād anyatamenāpi prakāreṇa vibhūṣitā satī vāṇī purātana-kavi-nibaddhārtha-saṃsparśavaty api navatvam āyāti /
analyzed: atas dhvaneḥ ukta prabheda madhyāt anyatamena api prakāreṇa vibhūṣitā satī vāṇī purātana kavi nibaddha artha saṃsparśavatī api nava tvam āyāti

original: tathā hy avivakṣita-vācyasya dhvaneḥ prakāra-dvaya-samāśrayeṇa navatvaṃ pūrvārthānugame 'pi, yathā-
analyzed: tathā hi avivakṣita vācyasya dhvaneḥ prakāra dvaya samāśrayeṇa nava tvam pūrva artha anugame yathā

original: smitaṃ kiṃcin mugdhaṃ tarala-madhuro dṛṣṭi-vibhavaḥ
analyzed: smitam kiṃcid mugdham tarala madhuraḥ dṛṣṭi vibhavaḥ

original: parispando vācām abhinava-vilāsormi-sarasaḥ /
analyzed: parispandaḥ vācām abhinava vilāsa ūrmi sarasaḥ

original: gatānām ārambhaḥ kisalayita-līlā-parimalaḥ
analyzed: gatānām ārambhaḥ kisalayita līlā parimalaḥ

original: spṛśantyās tāruṇyaṃ kim iva hi na ramyaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ //
analyzed: spṛśantyāḥ tāruṇyam kim iva hi na ramyam mṛga dṛśaḥ

original: ity asya,
analyzed: iti asya

original: sa-vibhrama-smitodbhedā lolākṣyaḥ praskhalad-giraḥ /
analyzed: sa vibhrama smita udbhedāḥ lola akṣyaḥ praskhalat giraḥ

original: nitambālasa-gāminyaḥ kāminyaḥ kasya na priyāḥ //
analyzed: nitamba alasa gāminyaḥ kāminyaḥ kasya na priyāḥ

original: ity evam ādiṣu ślokeṣu satsv api tiraskṛta-vācya-dhvani-samāśrayeṇāpūrvatvam eva pratibhāsate / tathā-
analyzed: iti evam ādiṣu ślokeṣu satsu api tiraskṛta vācya dhvani samāśrayeṇa apūrva tvam eva pratibhāsate tathā

original: yaḥ prathamaḥ prathamaḥ sa tu tathā hi hata-hasti-bahala-palalāśī /
analyzed: yaḥ prathamaḥ prathamaḥ sa tu tathā hi hata hasti bahala palala āśī

original: śvāpada-gaṇeṣu siṃhaḥ siṃhaḥ kenādharī-kriyate //ity asya,
analyzed: śvāpada gaṇeṣu siṃhaḥ siṃhaḥ kena adharīkriyate iti asya

original: sva-tejaḥ-krīta-mahimā kenānyenātiśayyate /
analyzed: sva tejaḥ krīta mahimā kena anyena atiśayyate

original: mahadbhir api mātaṅgaiḥ siṃhaḥ kim abhibhūyate //
analyzed: mahadbhiḥ api mātaṅgaiḥ siṃhaḥ kim abhibhūyate

original: ity evam ādiṣu ślokeṣu satsv apy arthāntara-saṅkramita-vācya-dhvani-samāśrayeṇa navatvam /
analyzed: iti evam ādiṣu ślokeṣu satsu api artha antara saṅkramita vācya dhvani samāśrayeṇa nava tvam

original: vivakṣitāny apara-vācyasyāpy ukta-prakāra-samāśrayeṇa navatvaṃ, yathā-
analyzed: vivakṣitāni apara vācyasya api ukta prakāra samāśrayeṇa nava tvam yathā

original: nidrā-kaitavinaḥ priyasya vadane vinyasya vaktraṃ vadhūr
analyzed: nidrā kaitavinaḥ priyasya vadane vinyasya vaktram vadhūḥ

original: bodha-trāsa-niruddha-cumbana-rasāpy ābhoga-lolaṃ sthitā /
analyzed: bodha trāsa niruddha cumbana rasā api ābhoga lolam sthitā

original: vailakṣyād vimukhībhaved iti punas tasyāpy anārambhiṇaḥ
analyzed: vailakṣyāt vimukhībhavet iti punar tasya api anārambhiṇaḥ

original: sākāṅkṣa-pratipatti nāma hṛdayaṃ yātaṃ tu pāraṃ rateḥ //
analyzed: sākāṅkṣapratipatti nāma hṛdayam yātam tu pāram rateḥ

original: ity ādeḥ ślokasya,
analyzed: iti ādeḥ ślokasya

original: śūnyaṃ vāsa-gṛhaṃ vilokya śayanād utthāya kiṃcic chanair
analyzed: śūnyam vāsagṛham vilokya śayanāt utthāya kiṃcid śanais

original: nidrā-vyājam upāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyur mukham /
analyzed: nidrā vyājam upāgatasya su ciram nirvarṇya patyuḥ mukham

original: visrabdhaṃ paricumbya jāta-pulakām ālokya gaṇḍa-sthalīṃ
analyzed: visrabdham paricumbya jāta pulakām ālokya gaṇḍa sthalīm

original: lajjā-namra-mukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā //
analyzed: lajjā namra mukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciram cumbitā

original: ity ādiṣu ślokeṣu satsv api navatvam /
analyzed: iti ādiṣu ślokeṣu satsu api nava tvam

original: yathā vā-“taraṅgabhrūbhaṅgā” ity ādiślokasya “nānābhaṅgibhramadbhrūḥ” ity ādiślokāpekṣayānyatvam // DhvA_4.2 //
analyzed: yathā vāta raṅga bhrū bhaṅgāḥ iti ādi ślokasya nānā bhaṅgi bhramat bhrūḥ iti ādi śloka apekṣayā anyatvam

original: yuktyānayānusartavyo rasādir bahu-vistaraḥ /
analyzed: yuktyā anayā anusartavyaḥ rasa ādiḥ bahu vistaraḥ

original: mitho 'py anantatāṃ prāptaḥ kāvya-mārgo yadāśrayāt // DhvK_4.3 //
analyzed: mithas pi ananta tām prāptaḥ kāvya mārgaḥ yad āśrayāt

original: bahu-vistāro 'yaṃ rasa-bhāva-tad-ābhāsa-tat-praśama-lakṣaṇo mārgo yathāsvaṃ vibhāvānubhāva-prabheda-kalanayā yathoktaṃ prāk /
analyzed: bahu vistāraḥ yam rasa bhāva tad ābhāsa tad praśama lakṣaṇaḥ mārgaḥ yathāsvam vibhāva anubhāva prabheda kalanayā yathoktam prāk

original: sa sarva evānayā yuktyānusartavyaḥ /
analyzed: sa sarvaḥ eva anayā yuktyā anusartavyaḥ

original: yasya rasāder āśrayād ayaṃ kāvya-mārgaḥ purātanaiḥ kavibhiḥ sahasra-saṃkhyair asaṃkhyair vā bahu-prakāraṃ kṣuṇṇatvān mito 'py anantatām eti
analyzed: yasya rasa ādeḥ āśrayāt ayam kāvya mārgaḥ purātanaiḥ kavibhiḥ sahasra saṃkhyaiḥ asaṃkhyaiḥ vā bahu prakāram kṣuṇṇa tvāt mitaḥ u pi ananta tām eti

original: rasa-bhāvādīnāṃ hi pratyekaṃ vibhāvānubhāva-vyabhicāri-samāśrayād aparimitatvam /
analyzed: rasa bhāva ādīnām hi pratyekam vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāri samāśrayāt aparimita tvam

original: teṣāṃ caikaika-prabhedāpekṣayāpi tāvaj jagad-vṛttam upanibadhyamānaṃ sukavibhis tad-icchā-vaśād anyathā sthitam apy anyathaiva vivartate /
analyzed: teṣām ca ekaika prabheda apekṣayā api tāvat jagat vṛttam upanibadhyamānam su kavibhiḥ tad icchā vaśāt anyathā sthitam api anyathā eva vivartate

original: pratipāditaṃ caitac citra-vicārāvasare /
analyzed: pratipāditam ca etat citra vicāra avasare

original: gāthā cātra kṛtaiva mahā-kavinā-
analyzed: gāthā ca atra kṛtā eva mahā kavinā

original: atathā-sthitān api tathā-saṃsthitān iva hṛdaye yā niveśayati /
analyzed: a tathā sthitān api tathā saṃsthitān iva hṛdaye yā niveśayati

original: artha-viśeṣān sā jayati vikaṭa-kavi-gocarā vāṇī //
analyzed: artha viśeṣān sā jayati vikaṭaka vigocarā vāṇī

original: tad itthaṃ rasa-bhāvādy-āśrayeṇa kāvyārthānām ānantyaṃ supratipāditam /
analyzed: tat ittham rasa bhāva ādi āśrayeṇa kāvya arthānām ānantyam su pratipāditam

original: etad evopapādayitum ucyate-
analyzed: etat eva upapādayitum ucyate

original: dṛṣṭa-pūrvā api hy arthāḥ kāvye rasa-parigrahāt /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa pūrvāḥ api hi arthāḥ kāvye rasa parigrahāt

original: sarve navā ivābhānti madhu-māsa iva drumāḥ // DhvK_4.4 //
analyzed: sarve navāḥ iva ābhānti madhu māse iva drumāḥ

original: tathā hi vivakṣitāny apara-vācyasyaiva śabda-śakty-udbhavānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgya-prakāra-samāśrayeṇa navatvam /
analyzed: tathā hi vivakṣitāni apara vācyasya eva śabda śakti udbhava anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgya prakāra samāśrayeṇa nava tvam

original: yathā-“dharaṇī-dhāraṇāyādhunā tvaṃ śeṣaḥ” ity ādeḥ /
analyzed: yathā dharaṇī dhāraṇāya adhunā tvam śeṣaḥ iti ādeḥ

original: śeṣo hima-giris tvaṃ ca mahānto guravaḥ sthirāḥ /
analyzed: śeṣaḥ himagiriḥ tvam ca mahāntaḥ guravaḥ sthirāḥ

original: yad alaṅghita-maryādāś calantīṃ bibhrate bhuvam //
analyzed: yat a laṅghita maryādāḥ calantīm bibhrate bhuvam

original: ity ādiṣu satsv api /
analyzed: iti ādiṣu satsu api

original: tasyaivārtha-śakty-udbhavānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgya-samāśrayeṇa navatvam /
analyzed: tasya eva artha śakti udbhava anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgya samāśrayeṇa nava tvam

original: yathā-“evaṃ-vādini devarṣau” ity ādi ślokasya /
analyzed: yathā evam vādini devarṣau iti ādi ślokasya

original: kṛte vara-kathālāpe kumāryaḥ pulakodgamaiḥ /
analyzed: kṛte vara kathā ālāpe kumāryaḥ pulaka udgamaiḥ

original: sūcayanti spṛhām antar-lajjayāvanatānanāḥ //
analyzed: sūcayanti spṛhām antar lajjayā avanata ānanāḥ

original: ity ādiṣu satsv artha-śakty-udbhavānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgyasya kavi-prauḍhokti-nirmita-śarīratvena navatvam /
analyzed: iti ādiṣu satsu artha śakti udbhava anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgyasya kavi prauḍhā ukti nirmita śarīra tvena nava tvam

original: yathā-“sajjayati surabhi-māso” ity ādeḥ /
analyzed: yathā sajjayati iti ādeḥ

original: surabhi-samaye pravṛtte sahasā prādurbhavanti ramaṇīyāḥ /
analyzed: surabhi samaye pravṛtte sahasā prādurbhavanti ramaṇīyāḥ

original: rāgavatām utkalikāḥ sahaiva sahakāra-kalikābhiḥ //
analyzed: rāgavatām utkalikāḥ saha eva sahakāra kalikābhiḥ

original: ity ādiṣu satsv apy apūrvatvam eva /
analyzed: iti ādiṣu satsu api apūrva tvam eva

original: artha-śakty-udbhavānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgyasya kavi-nibaddha-vaktṛ-prauḍhokti-mātra-niṣpanna-śarīratvena navatvam /
yathā “'vāṇijya hasti-dantāḥ” ity ādi-gāthārthasya /
analyzed: yathā hasti dantāḥ iti ādi gāthā arthasya

original: kariṇī-behabbaaro maha putto ekka-kāṇḍa-vinibāī /
analyzed: maha putto

original: haa soṇhāeṃ taha kaho jaha kaṇḍa-karaṇḍaaṃ baha{i} //
analyzed: haa taha kaho jaha kaṇḍa karaṇḍaam bahai

original: [kariṇī-vaidhavya-karo mama putra eka-kāṇḍa-vinipātī /
analyzed: kariṇī vaidhavya karaḥ mama putraḥ eka kāṇḍa vinipātī

original: hata-snuṣayā tathā kṛto yathā kāṇḍa-karaṇḍakaṃ vahati //]
analyzed: hata snuṣayā tathā kṛtaḥ yathā kāṇḍa karaṇḍakam vahati

original: evam ādiṣv artheṣu satsv apy anālīḍhataiva // DhvA_4.4 //
analyzed: evam ādiṣu artheṣu satsu api an ālīḍha tā eva

original: yathā vyaṅgya-bheda-samāśrayeṇa dhvaneḥ kāvyārthānāṃ navatvam utpadyate,
analyzed: yathā vyaṅgya bheda samāśrayeṇa dhvaneḥ kāvya arthānām nava tvam utpadyate

original: tathā vyañjaka-bheda-samāśrayeṇāpi /
analyzed: tathā vyañjaka bheda samāśrayeṇa api

original: tat tu grantha-vistara-bhayān na likhyate,
analyzed: tat tu grantha vistara bhayāt na likhyate

original: svayam eva sahṛdayair abhyūhyam /
analyzed: svayam eva sahṛdayaiḥ abhyūhyam

original: atra ca punaḥ punar uktam api sāratayedam ucyate-
analyzed: atra ca punar punar uktam api sāra tayā idam ucyate

original: vyaṅgya-vyañjaka-bhāve 'smin vividhe sambhavaty api /
analyzed: vyaṅgya vyañjaka bhāve smin vividhe sambhavati api

original: rasādi-maya ekasmin kaviḥ syād avadhānavān // DhvK_4.5 //
analyzed: rasa ādi maye ekasmin kaviḥ syāt avadhānavān

original: asminn arthānantya-hetau vyaṅgya-vyañjaka-bhāve vicitre śabdānāṃ sambhavaty api kavir apūrvārtha-lābhārthī rasādi-maya ekasmin vyaṅgya-vyañjaka-bhāve  #
analyzed: asmin artha ānantya hetau vyaṅgya vyañjaka bhāve vicitre śabdānām sambhavati api kaviḥ apūrva artha lābha arthī rasa ādi maye ekasmin vyaṅgya vyañjaka bhāve

original: yatnād avadadhīta /
analyzed: yatnāt avadadhīta

original: rasa-bhāva-tad-ābhāsa-rūpe hi vyaṅgye tad-vyañjakeṣu ca yathā-nirdiṣṭeṣu varṇa-pada-vākya-racanā-prabandheṣv avahita-manasaḥ kaveḥ sarvam apūrvaṃ  #
analyzed: rasa bhāva tad ābhāsa rūpe hi vyaṅgye tad vyañjakeṣu ca yathā nirdiṣṭeṣu varṇa pada vākya racanā prabandheṣu avahita manasaḥ kaveḥ sarvam apūrvam

original: kāvyaṃ sampadyate /
analyzed: kāvyam sampadyate

original: tathā ca rāmāyaṇa-mahābhāratādiṣu saṅgrāmādayaḥ punaḥ punar abhihitā api nava-navāḥ prakāśante /
analyzed: tathā ca rāmāyaṇa mahābhārata ādiṣu saṅgrāma ādayaḥ punar punar abhihitāḥ api nava navāḥ prakāśante

original: prabandhe cāṅgī rasa eka evopanibadhyamāno 'rtha-viśeṣa-lābhaṃ chāyātiśayaṃ ca puṣṇāti /
analyzed: prabandhe ca aṅgī rasaḥ ekaḥ evā upanibadhyamānaḥ rtha viśeṣa lābham chāyā atiśayam ca puṣṇāti

original: kasminn iveti cet-yathā rāmāyaṇe yathā vā mahābhārate /
analyzed: kasmin iva iti ca iti athā rāmāyaṇe yathā vā mahābhārate

original: rāmāyaṇe hi karuṇo rasaḥ svayam ādi-kavinā sūtritaḥ “śokaḥ ślokatvam āgataḥ” ity evaṃ-vādinā /
analyzed: rāmāyaṇe hi karuṇaḥ rasaḥ svayam ādi kavinā sūtritaḥ śokaḥ śloka tvam āgataḥ iti evaṃvādinā

original: nirvyūḍhaś ca sa eva sītātyanta-viyoga-paryantam eva sva-prabandham uparacayatā /
analyzed: nirvyūḍhaḥ ca saḥ eva sītā atyanta viyoga paryantam eva sva prabandham uparacayatā

original: mahābhārate 'pi śāstra-kāvya-rūpa-cchāyānvayini vṛṣṇi-pāṇḍava-virasāvasāna-vaimanasya-dāyinīṃ
analyzed: mahābhārate pi śāstra kāvya rūpa chāyā anvayini vṛṣṇi pāṇḍava virasa avasāna vaimanasya dāyinīm

original: samāptim upanibadhnatā mahā-muninā vairāgya-janana-tātparyaṃ prādhānyena sva-prabandhasya
analyzed: samāptim upanibadhnatā mahāmuninā vairāgya janana tātparyam prādhānyena sva prabandhasya

original: darśayatā mokṣa-lakṣaṇaḥ puruṣārthaḥ śānto rasaś ca mukhyatayā vivakṣā-viṣayatvena sūcitaḥ /
analyzed: darśayatā mokṣa lakṣaṇaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ śāntaḥ rasaḥ ca mukhya tayā vivakṣā viṣaya tvena sūcitaḥ

original: etac cāṃśena vivṛtam evānyair vyākhyā-vidhāyibhiḥ /
analyzed: etat ca aṃśena vivṛtam eva anyaiḥ vyākhyā vidhāyibhiḥ

original: svayam eva caitad udgīrṇaṃ tenodīrṇa-mahā-moha-magnam ujjihīrṣatā lokam ativimala-jñānāloka-dāyinā loka-nāthena-
analyzed: svayam eva ca etat udgīrṇam tena udīrṇa mahā moha magnam ujjihīrṣatā lokam ati vimala jñāna āloka dāyinā lokanāthena

original: yathā yathā viparyeti loka-tantram asāravat /
analyzed: yathā yathā viparyeti lokatantram asāravat

original: tathā tathā virāgo 'tra jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
analyzed: tathā tathā jāyate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: ity ādi bahuśaḥ kathayatā /
analyzed: iti ādi bahuśas kathayatā

original: tataś ca śānto raso rasāntarair mokṣa-lakṣaṇaḥ puruṣārthaḥ puruṣārthāntarais tad-upasarjanatvenānugamyamāno
analyzed: tatas ca śāntaḥ rasaḥ rasa antaraiḥ mokṣa lakṣaṇaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ puruṣa artha antaraiḥ tad upasarjana tvena anugamyamānaḥ

original: 'ṅgitvena vivakṣā-viṣaya iti mahābhārata-tātparyaṃ suvyaktam evāvabhāsate /
analyzed: ṅgi tvena vivakṣā viṣayaḥ iti mahābhārata tātparyam su vyaktam eva avabhāsate

original: aṅgāṅgi-bhāvaś ca yathā rasānāṃ tathā pratipāditam eva /
analyzed: aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ ca yathā rasānām tathā pratipāditam eva

original: pāramārthikāntas tattvānapekṣayā śarīrasyevāṅga-bhūtasya rasasya puruṣārthasya ca sva-prādhānyena cārutvam apy aviruddham /
analyzed: pāramārthika antar tattva anapekṣayā śarīrasya iva aṅga bhūtasya rasasya puruṣa arthasya ca sva prādhānyena cāru tvam api aviruddham

original: nanu mahābhārate yāvān vivakṣā-viṣayaḥ so 'nukramaṇyāṃ sarva evānukrānto na caitat tatra dṛśyate,
analyzed: nanu mahābhārate yāvān vivakṣā viṣayaḥ saḥ nukramaṇyām sarvaḥ eva anukrāntaḥ na ca etat tatra dṛśyate

original: pratyuta sarva-puruṣārtha-prabodha-hetutvaṃ sarva-rasa-garbhatvaṃ ca mahābhāratasya tasminn uddeśe sva-śabda-niveditatvena pratīyate /
analyzed: pratyuta sarva puruṣa artha prabodha hetutvam sarva rasa garbha tvam ca mahābhāratasya tasmin uddeśe sva śabda nivedita tvena pratīyate

original: atrocyate-satyaṃ śāntasyaiva rasasyāṅgitvaṃ mahābhārate mokṣasya ca sarva-puruṣārthebhyaḥ prādhānyam ity etan na sva-śabdābhidheya-tvenānukramaṇyā
analyzed: atrā ucyate satyam śāntasya eva rasasya aṅgi tvam mahābhārate mokṣasya ca sarva puruṣa arthebhyaḥ prādhānyam iti etat na sva śabda abhidheya tvena anukramaṇyā

original: darśitaṃ tu vyaṅgyatvena-“bhagavān vāsudevaś ca kīrtyate 'tra sanātanaḥ” ity asmin vākye /
analyzed: darśitam tu vyaṅgya tvena bhagavān vāsudevaḥ ca kīrtyate sanātanaḥ iti asmin vākye

original: anena hy ayam artho vyaṅgyatvena vivakṣito yad atra mahābhārate pāṇḍavādi-caritaṃ yat kīrtyate tat sarvam avasāna-virasam avidyā-prapañca-rūpaṃ
analyzed: anena hi ayam arthaḥ vyaṅgya tvena vivakṣitaḥ yat atra mahābhārate pāṇḍava ādi caritam yat kīrtyate tat sarvam avasāna virasam avidyā prapañca rūpam

original: paramārtha-satya-svarūpas tu bhagavān vāsudevo 'tra kīrtyate /
analyzed: parama artha satya svarūpaḥ tu bhagavān kīrtyate

original: tasmāt tasminn eva parameśvare bhagavati bhavata bhāvita-cetaso,
analyzed: tasmāt tasmin eva parameśvare bhagavati bhavata bhāvita cetasaḥ

original: mā bhūta vibhūtiṣu niḥsārāsu rāgiṇo guṇeṣu vā naya-vinaya-parākramādiṣv amīṣu kevaleṣu keṣucit sarvātmanā pratiniviṣṭa-dhiyaḥ /
analyzed: mā bhūta vibhūtiṣu niḥsārāsu rāgiṇaḥ guṇeṣu vā naya vinaya parākrama ādiṣu amīṣu kevaleṣu keṣucid sarva ātmanā pratiniviṣṭa dhiyaḥ

original: tathā cāgre-paśyata niḥsāratāṃ saṃsārasyety amum evārthaṃ dyotayan sphuṭam evāvabhāsate vyañjaka-śakty-anugṛhītaś ca śabdaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca agre paśyata niḥsāra tām saṃsārasya iti amum eva artham dyotayan sphuṭam evā avabhāsate vyañjaka śakti anugṛhītaḥ ca śabdaḥ

original: evaṃ-vidham evārthaṃ garbhīkṛtaṃ sandarśayanto 'nantara-ślokā lakṣyante-“sa hi satyam” ity ādayaḥ /
analyzed: evaṃvidham eva artham garbhīkṛtam sandarśayantaḥ nantaraślokāḥ lakṣyante sa hi satyam iti ādayaḥ

original: ayaṃ ca nigūḍha-ramaṇīyo 'rtho mahābhāratāvasāne harivaṃśa-varṇanena samāptiṃ vidadhatā tenaiva kavi-vedhasā kṛṣṇa-dvaipāyanena samyak-sphuṭī-kṛtaḥ
analyzed: ayam ca nigūḍha ramaṇīyaḥ rthaḥ mahābhārata avasāne harivaṃśa varṇanena samāptim vidadhatā tena eva kavi vedhasā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanena samyak sphuṭīkṛtaḥ

original: anena cārthena saṃsārātīte tattvāntare bhakty-atiśayaṃ pravartayatā sakala eva sāṃsāriko vyavahāraḥ pūrva-pakṣīkṛto nyakṣeṇa prakāśate /
analyzed: anena ca arthena saṃsāra atīte tattva antare bhakti atiśayam pravartayatā sakalaḥ eva sāṃsārikaḥ vyavahāraḥ pūrvapakṣīkṛtaḥ nyakṣeṇa prakāśate

original: devatā-tīrtha-tapaḥ-prabhṛtīnāṃ ca prabhāvātiśaya-varṇanaṃ tasyaiva para-brahmaṇaḥ prāpty-upāyatvena tad-vibhūtitvenaiva devatā-viśeṣāṇām anyeṣāṃ  #
analyzed: devatā tīrtha tapaḥ prabhṛtīnām ca prabhāva atiśaya varṇanam tasya eva para brahmaṇaḥ prāpti upāya tvena tad vibhūti tvena eva devatā viśeṣāṇām anyeṣām

original: ca /
analyzed: ca

original: pāṇḍavādi-carita-varṇanasyāpi vairāgya-janana-tātparyād vairāgyasya ca mokṣa-mūlatvān
analyzed: pāṇḍava ādi carita varṇanasya api vairāgya janana tātparyāt vairāgyasya ca mokṣa mūla tvān

original: mokṣasya ca bhagavat-prāpty-upāyatvena mukhyatayā gītādiṣu pradarśitatvāt para-brahma-prāpty-upāyatvam eva paramparayā /
analyzed: mokṣasya ca bhagavat prāpti upāya tvena mukhya tayā gītā ādiṣu pradarśita tvāt para brahma prāpti upāya tvam eva paramparayā

original: vāsudevādi-saṃjñābhidheyatvena cāparimita-śakty-āspadaṃ paraṃ brahma gītādi-pradeśāntareṣu
analyzed: vāsudeva ādi saṃjñā abhidheya tvena ca aparimita śakti āspadam param brahma gīta ādi pradeśa antareṣu

original: tad-abhidhānatvena labdha-prasiddhi māthura-prādurbhāvānukṛta-sakala-svarūpaṃ vivakṣitaṃ
analyzed: tad abhidhāna tvena labdha prasiddhi māthura prādurbhāva anukṛta sakala svarūpam vivakṣitam

original: na tu māthura-prādurbhāvāṃśa eva,
analyzed: na tu māthura prādurbhāva aṃśe eva

original: sanātana-śabda-viśeṣitatvāt /
analyzed: sanātana śabda viśeṣita tvāt

original: rāmāyaṇādiṣu cānayā saṃjñayā bhagavan-mūrty-antare vyavahāra-darśanāt /
analyzed: rāmāyaṇa ādiṣu ca anayā saṃjñayā bhagavat mūrti antare vyavahāra darśanāt

original: nirṇītaś cāyam arthaḥ śabda-tattva-vidbhir eva /
analyzed: nirṇītaḥ ca ayam arthaḥ śabda tattva vidbhiḥ eva

original: tad evam anukramaṇī-nirdiṣṭena vākyena bhagavad-vyatirekiṇaḥ sarvasyānyasyānityatāṃ prakāśayatā mokṣa-lakṣaṇa evaikaḥ paraḥ puruṣārthaḥ śāstranaye,
analyzed: tat evam anukramaṇī nirdiṣṭena vākyena bhagavat vyatirekiṇaḥ sarvasya anyasya anitya tām prakāśayatā mokṣa lakṣaṇaḥ eva ekaḥ paraḥ puruṣa arthaḥ śāstra naye

original: kāvya-naye ca tṛṣṇākṣaya-sukha-paripoṣa-lakṣaṇaḥ śānto raso mahābhāratasyāṅgitvena vivakṣita iti supratipāditam /
analyzed: kāvya naye ca tṛṣṇā kṣaya sukha paripoṣa lakṣaṇaḥ śāntaḥ rasaḥ mahābhāratasya aṅgi tvena vivakṣitaḥ iti su pratipāditam

original: atyanta-sāra-bhūtatvāc cāyam artho vyaṅgyatvenaiva darśito na tu vācyatvena /
analyzed: atyanta sāra bhūta tvāt ca ayam arthaḥ vyaṅgya tvena eva darśitaḥ na tu vācya tvena

original: sāra-bhūto hy arthaḥ sva-śabdānabhidheyatvena prakāśitaḥ sutarām eva śobhām āvahati /
analyzed: sāra bhūtaḥ hi arthaḥ sva śabda anabhidheya tvena prakāśitaḥ sutarām eva śobhām āvahati

original: prasiddhiś ceyam asty eva vidagdha-vidvat-pariṣatsu yad abhimatataraṃ vastu vyaṅgyatvena prakāśyate na sākṣāc-chabda-vācyatvena /
analyzed: prasiddhiḥ ca iyam asti eva vidagdha vidvas pariṣatsu yat abhimatataram vastu vyaṅgya tvena prakāśyate na sākṣāt śabda vācya tvena

original: tasmāt sthitam etat-aṅgibhūta-rasādy-āśrayeṇa kāvye kriyamāṇe navārtha-lābho bhavati bandha-cchāyā ca mahatī sampadyata iti /
analyzed: tasmāt sthitam etad aṅgi bhūta rasa ādi āśrayeṇa kāvye kriyamāṇe nava artha lābhaḥ bhavati bandha chāyā ca mahatī sampadyate iti

original: ata eva ca rasānuguṇārtha-viśeṣopanibandham alaṅkārāntara-virahe 'pi chāyātiśaya-yogi lakṣye dṛśyate / yathā-
analyzed: atas eva ca rasa anuguṇa artha viśeṣa upanibandham alaṅkāra antara virahe pi chāyā atiśaya yogi lakṣye dṛśyate yathā

original: munir jayati yogīndro mahātmā kumbha-sambhavaḥ /
analyzed: muniḥ jayati yogi indraḥ mahātmā kumbhasambhavaḥ

original: yenaika-culake dṛṣṭau tau divyau matsya-kacchapau //ity ādau /
analyzed: yena eka culake dṛṣṭau tau divyau matsya kacchapau iti ādau

original: atra hy adbhuta-rasānuguṇam eka-culake matsya-kacchapa-darśanaṃ chāyātiśayaṃ puṣṇāti /
analyzed: atra hi adbhuta rasa anuguṇam eka culake matsya kacchapa darśanam chāyā atiśayam puṣṇāti

original: tatra hy eka-culake sakala-jaladhi-sannidhānād api divya-matsya-kacchapa-darśanam akṣuṇṇatvād adbhuta-rasānuguṇataram /
analyzed: tatra hi eka culake sakala jaladhi sannidhānāt api divya matsya kacchapa darśanam a kṣuṇṇa tvāt adbhuta rasa anuguṇataram

original: kṣuṇṇaṃ hi vastu loka-prasiddhyādbhutam api nāścaryakāri bhavati /
analyzed: kṣuṇṇam hi vastu loka prasiddhyā adbhutam api na āścarya kāri bhavati

original: na cākṣuṇṇaṃ vastūpanibadhyamānam adbhuta-rasasyaivānuguṇaṃ yāvad rasāntarasyāpi / tad yathā-
analyzed: na ca akṣuṇṇam vastu upanibadhyamānam adbhuta rasasya eva anuguṇam yāvat rasa antarasya api tat yathā

original: svidyati romāñcate vepate rathyāyāṃ tulāgreṇa /
analyzed: svidyati romāñcate vepate rathyāyām tulā agreṇa

original: sa pārśvo 'dyāpi subhaga tasyā yenāsyatikrāntaḥ //
analyzed: sa pārśvaḥ dyā api subhaga tasyāḥ yena asi atikrāntaḥ

original: [svidyati romāñcate vepate rathyāyāṃ tulāgreṇa /
analyzed: svidyati romāñcate vepate rathyāyām tulā agreṇa

original: sa pārśvo 'dyāpi subhaga tasyā yenāsyatikrāntaḥ //]
analyzed: sa pārśvaḥ dyā api subhaga tasyāḥ yena asi atikrāntaḥ

original: etad gāthārthād bhāvyamānād yā rasa-pratītir bhavati,
analyzed: etat gāthā arthāt bhāvyamānāt yā rasa pratītiḥ bhavati

original: sā tvāṃ spṛṣṭvā svidyati romāñcate vepate ity evaṃ-vidhād arthāt pratīyamānān manāg api no jāyate /
analyzed: sā tvām spṛṣṭvā svidyati romāñcate vepate iti evaṃvidhāt arthāt pratīyamānāt manāk api na u jāyate

original: tad evaṃ dhvani-prabheda-samāśrayeṇa yathā kāvyārthānāṃ navatvaṃ jāyate tathā pratipāditam /
analyzed: tat evam dhvani prabheda samāśrayeṇa yathā kāvya arthānām nava tvam jāyate tathā pratipāditam

original: guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyasyāpi tribheda-vyaṅgyāpekṣayā ye prakārās tat-samāśrayeṇāpi kāvya-vastūnāṃ navatvaṃ bhavaty eva /
analyzed: guṇībhūta vyaṅgyasya api tri bheda vyaṅgya apekṣayā ye prakārāḥ tad samāśrayeṇa api kāvya vastūnām nava tvam bhavati eva

original: tat tv ativistāra-kārīti nodāhṛtaṃ sahṛdayaiḥ svayam utprekṣaṇīyam // DhvA_4.5 //
analyzed: tat tu ati vistāra kārī iti na udāhṛtam sahṛdayaiḥ svayam utprekṣaṇīyam

original: dhvaner itthaṃ guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyasya ca samāśrayāt /
analyzed: dhvaneḥ ittham guṇībhūta vyaṅgyasya ca samāśrayāt

original: na kāvyārtha-virāmo 'sti yadi syāt pratibhā-guṇaḥ // DhvK_4.6 //
analyzed: na kāvya artha virāmaḥ sti yadi syāt pratibhā guṇaḥ

original: satsv api purātana-kavi-prabandheṣu yadi syāt pratibhā-guṇaḥ,
analyzed: satsu api purātana kavi prabandheṣu yadi syāt pratibhā guṇaḥ

original: tasmiṃs tv asati na kiṃcid eva kaver vastv asti /
analyzed: tasmin tu asati na kiṃcid eva kaveḥ vastu asti

original: bandha-cchāyāpy artha-dvayānurūpa-śabda-sanniveśo 'rtha-pratibhānābhāve katham upapadyate /
analyzed: bandha chāyā api artha dvaya anurūpa śabda sanniveśaḥ rtha pratibhāna abhāve katham upapadyate

original: anapekṣitārtha-viśeṣākṣara-racanaiva bandha-cchāyeti nedaṃ nedīyaḥ sahṛdayānām /
analyzed: an apekṣita artha viśeṣa akṣara racanā eva bandha chāyā iti nā idam nedīyaḥ sahṛdayānām

original: evaṃ hi saty arthānapekṣa-catura-madhura-vacana-racanāyām api kāvya-vyapadeśaḥ pravarteta /
analyzed: evam hi sati artha anapekṣa catura madhura vacana racanāyām api kāvya vyapadeśaḥ pravarteta

original: śabdārthayoḥ sāhityena kāvyatve kathaṃ tathā-vidhe viṣaye kāvya-vyavastheti cet-paropanibaddhārtha-viracane
analyzed: śabda arthayoḥ sāhityena kāvya tve katham tathāvidhe viṣaye kāvya vyavasthā iti ced para upanibaddha artha viracane

original: yathā tat-kāvyatva-vyavahāras tathā tathā-vidhānāṃ kāvya-sandarbhāṇām // DhvA_4.6 //
analyzed: yathā tad kāvya tva vyavahāraḥ tathā tathāvidhānām kāvya sandarbhāṇām

original: na cārthānantyaṃ vyaṅgyārthāpekṣayaiva yāvad vācyārthāpekṣayāpīti pratipādayitum ucyate-
analyzed: na ca artha ānantyam vyaṅgya artha apekṣayā eva yāvat vācya artha apekṣayā api iti pratipādayitum ucyate

original: avasthādeśa-kālādi-viśeṣair api jāyate /
analyzed: avasthā deśa kāla ādi viśeṣaiḥ api jāyate

original: ānantyam eva vācyasya śuddhasyāpi svabhāvataḥ // DhvK_4.7 //
analyzed: ānantyam eva vācyasya śuddhasya api svabhāvataḥ

original: śuddhasyānapekṣita-vyaṅgyasyāpi vācyasyānantyam eva jāyate svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: śuddhasya an apekṣita vyaṅgyasya api vācyasya ānantyam eva jāyate svabhāvataḥ

original: svabhāvo hy ayaṃ vācyānāṃ cetanānām acetanānāṃ ca yad avasthā-bhedād deśa-bhedāt kāla-bhedāt svālakṣaṇya-bhedāc cānantatā bhavati /
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ hi ayam vācyānām cetanānām acetanānām ca yat avasthā bhedāt deśa bhedāt kāla bhedāt svālakṣaṇya bhedāt ca ananta tā bhavati

original: taiś ca tathā-vyavasthitaiḥ sadbhiḥ prasiddhāneka-svabhāvānusaraṇa-rūpayā svabhāvoktyāpi tāvad upanibadhyamānair niravadhiḥ kāvyārthaḥ sampadyate
analyzed: taiḥ ca tathā vyavasthitaiḥ sadbhiḥ prasiddha aneka svabhāva anusaraṇa rūpayā svabhāva uktyā api tāvat upanibadhyamānaiḥ niravadhiḥ kāvya arthaḥ sampadyate

original: tathā hy avasthā-bhedān navatvaṃ yathā-bhagavatī pārvatī kumārasambhave “sarvopamā-dravya-samuccayena”
analyzed: tathā hi avasthā bhedāt nava tvam yathā bhagavatī pārvatī kumārasambhave sarva upamā dravya samuccayena

original: [ku.saṃ. 1.49] ity ādibhir uktibhiḥ prathamam eva parisamāpita-rūpa-varṇanāpi punar
analyzed: iti ādibhiḥ uktibhiḥ prathamam eva parisamāpita rūpa varṇanā api punar

original: bhagavataḥ śambhor locana-gocaram āyāntī “vasanta-puṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantī” [ku.saṃ.
analyzed: bhagavataḥ śambhoḥ locana gocaram āyāntī vasanta puṣpa ābharaṇam vahantī kusam

original: 3.53] manmathopakaraṇa-bhūtena bhaṅgyantareṇopavarṇitā /
analyzed: manmatha upakaraṇa bhūtena bhaṅgī antareṇa upavarṇitā

original: saiva ca punar navodvāha-samaye prasādhyamānā “tāṃ prāṅ-mukhīṃ tatra niveśya tanvīm” ity ādy-uktibhir navenaiva prakāreṇa nirūpita-rūpa-sauṣṭhavā
analyzed: sā eva ca punar nava udvāha samaye prasādhyamānā tām prāc mukhīm tatra niveśya tanvīm iti ādi uktibhiḥ navena eva prakāreṇa nirūpita rūpa sauṣṭhavā

original: na ca te tasya kaver ekatraivāsakṛt-kṛtā varṇana-prakārā apunar-uktatvena vā nava-navārtha-nirbharatvena vā pratibhāsante /
analyzed: na ca te tasya kaveḥ ekatra eva asakṛt kṛtāḥ varṇana prakārāḥ apunarukta tvena vā nava nava artha nirbhara tvena vā pratibhāsante

original: darśitam eva caitad viṣama-bāṇa-līlāyām-
analyzed: darśitam eva ca etat viṣama bāṇa līlāyām

original: ṇa a tāṇaṃ ghaḍa(i)
analyzed: ṇa a tāṇam ghaḍai

original: ohī ṇa a te dīsanti kaha bi punaruttā /
analyzed: na a te dīsanti kaha bi punaruttā

original: je bibbhamā piāṇaṃ atthā vā suka(i)-bāṇīnaṃ //
analyzed: je bibbhamā piāṇam atthā vā sukaibāṇīnam

original: [na ca teṣāṃ ghaṭate 'vadhiḥ,
analyzed: na ca teṣām ghaṭate vadhiḥ

original: na ca te dṛśyante katham api punaruktāḥ /
analyzed: na ca te dṛśyante katham api punar uktāḥ

original: ye vibhramāḥ priyāṇām arthā vā sukavi-vāṇīnām //]
analyzed: ye vibhramāḥ priyāṇām arthāḥ vā su kavi vāṇīnām

original: ayam aparaś cāvasthā-bheda-prakāro yad acetanānāṃ sarveṣāṃ cetanaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpam abhimānitva-prasiddhaṃ himavad gaṅgādīnām /
analyzed: ayam aparaḥ ca avasthā bheda prakāraḥ yat acetanānām sarveṣām cetanam dvitīyam rūpam abhimāni tva prasiddham himavat gaṅgā ādīnām

original: tac cocita-cetana-viṣaya-svarūpa-yojanayopanibadhyamānam anyad eva sampadyate /
analyzed: tat ca ucita cetana viṣaya sva rūpa yojanayā upanibadhyamānam anyat eva sampadyate

original: yathā kumāra-sambhava eva parvata-svarūpasya himavato varṇanaṃ,
analyzed: yathā kumārasambhave eva parvata svarūpasya himavataḥ varṇanam

original: punaḥ saptarṣi-priyoktiṣu cetana-tat-svarūpāpekṣayā pradarśitaṃ tad apūrvam eva pratibhāti /
analyzed: punar saptarṣi priya uktiṣu cetana tad svarūpa apekṣayā pradarśitam tat apūrvam eva pratibhāti

original: prasiddhaś cāyaṃ sat-kavīnāṃ mārgaḥ /
analyzed: prasiddhaḥ ca ayam sat kavīnām mārgaḥ

original: idaṃ ca prasthānaṃ kavi-vyutpattaye viṣama-bāṇa-līlāyāṃ sa-prapañcaṃ darśitam /
analyzed: idam ca prasthānam kavi vyutpattaye viṣama bāṇa līlāyām sa prapañcam darśitam

original: cetanānāṃ ca bālyādy-avasthābhir anyatvaṃ sat-kavīnāṃ prasiddham eva /
analyzed: cetanānām ca bālya ādi avasthābhiḥ anya tvam sat kavīnām prasiddham eva

original: cetanānām avasthā-bhede 'py avāntarāvasthā-bhedān nānātvam /
analyzed: cetanānām avasthā bhede pi avāntara avasthā bhedāt nānātvam

original: yathā kumārīṇāṃ kusuma-śara-bhinna-hṛdayānām anyāsāṃ ca /
analyzed: yathā kumārīṇām kusuma śara bhinna hṛdayānām anyāsām ca

original: tatrāpi vinītānām avinītānāṃ ca /
analyzed: tatra api vinītānām avinītānām ca

original: acetanānāṃ ca bhāvānām ārambhādy-avasthā-bheda-bhinnānām ekaikaśaḥ svarūpam upanibadhyamānam ānantyam evopayāti / yathā-
analyzed: acetanānām ca bhāvānām ārambha ādi avasthā bheda bhinnānām ekaikaśas sva rūpam upanibadhyamānam ānantyam eva upayāti yathā

original: haṃsānāṃ ninadeṣu yaiḥ kavalitair āsajyate kūjatām
analyzed: haṃsānām ninadeṣu yaiḥ kavalitaiḥ āsajyate kūjatām

original: anyaḥ ko 'pi kaṣāya-kaṇṭha-luṭhanād āghargharo vibhramaḥ /
analyzed: anyaḥ kaḥ pi kaṣāya kaṇṭha luṭhanāt āghargharaḥ vibhramaḥ

original: te sampraty akaṭhora-vāraṇa-vadhū-dantāṅkura-spardhino
analyzed: te samprati a kaṭhora vāraṇa vadhū danta aṅkura spardhinaḥ

original: niryātāḥ kamalākareṣu bisinī-kandāgrima-granthayaḥ //[*23]
analyzed: niryātāḥ kamala ākareṣu bisinī kanda agrima granthayaḥ

original: [*23] Srk 284, Skm 1309 (credited to Kamalāyudha)
analyzed: credited to kamalāyudha

original: evam anyatrāpi diśānayānusartavyam /
analyzed: evam anyatra api diśā anayā anusartavyam

original: deśa-bhedān nānātvam acetanānāṃ tāvat /
analyzed: deśa bhedāt nānātvam acetanānām tāvat

original: yathā vāyūnāṃ nānā-dig-deśa-cāriṇām anyeṣām api salila-kusumādīnāṃ prasiddham eva /
analyzed: yathā vāyūnām nānā diś deśa cāriṇām anyeṣām api salila kusuma ādīnām prasiddham eva

original: cetanānām api mānuṣa-paśu-pakṣi-prabhṛtīnāṃ grāmāraṇya-salilādi-samedhitānāṃ parasparaṃ mahān viśeṣaḥ samupalakṣyata eva /
analyzed: cetanānām api mānuṣa paśu pakṣi prabhṛtīnām grāma araṇya salila ādi samedhitānām parasparam mahān viśeṣaḥ samupalakṣyate eva

original: sa ca vivicya yathāyatham upanibadhyamānas tathaivānantyam āyāti /
analyzed: sa ca vivicya yathāyatham upanibadhyamānaḥ tathā eva ānantyam āyāti

original: tathā hi-mānuṣāṇām eva tāvad dig-deśādi-bhinnānāṃ ye vyavahāra-vyāpārādiṣu vicitrā viśeṣās teṣāṃ kenāntaḥ śakyate gantum,
analyzed: tathā hi mānuṣāṇām eva tāvat diś deśa ādi bhinnānām ye vyavahāra vyāpāra ādiṣu vicitrāḥ viśeṣāḥ teṣām kena antaḥ śakyate gantum

original: viśeṣato yoṣitām /
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ yoṣitām

original: upanibadhyate ca tat sarvam eva sukavibhir yathā-pratibham /
analyzed: upanibadhyate ca tat sarvam eva su kavibhiḥ yathāpratibham

original: kāla-bhedāc ca nānātvam /
analyzed: kāla bhedāt ca nānātvam

original: yatha rtu-bhedād dig-vyoma-salilādīnām acetanānām /
analyzed: yathā ṛtu bhedāt diś vyoma salila ādīnām acetanānām

original: cetanānāṃ cautsukyādayaḥ kāla-viśeṣāśrayiṇaḥ prasiddhā eva /
analyzed: cetanānām ca autsukya ādayaḥ kāla viśeṣa āśrayiṇaḥ prasiddhāḥ eva

original: svālakṣaṇya-prabhedāc ca sakala-jagad-gatānāṃ vastūnāṃ vinibandhanaṃ prasiddham eva /
analyzed: svālakṣaṇya prabhedāt ca sakala jagat gatānām vastūnām vinibandhanam prasiddham eva

original: tac ca yathāvasthitam api tāvad upanibadhyamānam anantatām eva kāvyārthasyāpādayati /
analyzed: tat ca yathā avasthitam api tāvat upanibadhyamānam ananta tām eva kāvya arthasya āpādayati

original: atra kecid ācakṣīran-yathā sāmānyātmanā vastūni vācyatāṃ pratipadyante na viśeṣātmanā ;
analyzed: atra kecid ācakṣīḥ anyathā sāmānya ātmanā vastūni vācya tām pratipadyante na viśeṣa ātmanā

original: tāni hi svayam anubhūtānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ tan-nimittānāṃ ca svarūpam anyatrāropayadbhiḥ sva-parānubhūta-rūpa-sāmānya-mātrāśrayeṇopanibadhyante
analyzed: tāni hi svayam anubhūtānām sukha ādīnām tad nimittānām ca svarūpam anyatra āropayadbhiḥ sva para anubhūta rūpa sāmānya mātra āśrayeṇa upanibadhyante

original: na hi tair atītam anāgataṃ vartamānaṃ ca paricitādi-sva-lakṣaṇaṃ yogibhir iva pratyakṣīkriyate ;
analyzed: na hi taiḥ atītam anāgatam vartamānam ca paricita ādi sva lakṣaṇam yogibhiḥ iva pratyakṣīkriyate

original: tac cānubhāvyānubhava-sāmānyaṃ sarva-pratipattṛ-sādhāraṇaṃ parimitatvāt purātanānām eva gocarī-bhūtam,
analyzed: tat ca anubhāvya anubhava sāmānyam sarva pratipattṛ sādhāraṇam parimita tvāt purātanānām eva gocarībhūtam

original: tasyāviṣayatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: tasya aviṣaya tva anupapatteḥ

original: ata eva sa prakāra-viśeṣo yair adyatanair abhinavatvena pratīyate teṣām abhimāna-mātram eva bhaṇiti-kṛtaṃ vaicitrya-mātram atrāstīti /
analyzed: atas eva sa prakāra viśeṣaḥ yaiḥ adyatanaiḥ abhinava tvena pratīyate teṣām abhimāna mātram eva bhaṇiti kṛtam vaicitrya mātram atrā asti iti

original: tatrocyate-yat tūktaṃ sāmānya-mātrāśrayeṇa kāvya-pravṛttis tasya ca parimitatvena prāg eva gocarī-kṛtatvān nāsti navatvaṃ kāvya-vastūnām iti,
analyzed: tatra ucyate yat tu uktam sāmānya mātra āśrayeṇa kāvya pravṛttiḥ tasya ca parimita tvena prāk eva gocarīkṛta tvāt na asti nava tvam kāvya vastūnām iti

original: tad ayuktam ;
analyzed: tat ayuktam

original: yato yadi sāmānya-mātram āśritya kāvyaṃ pravartate kiṃ kṛtas tarhi mahā-kavi-nibadhyamānānāṃ kāvyārthānām atiśayaḥ /
analyzed: yatas yadi sāmānya mātram āśritya kāvyam pravartate kim kṛtaḥ tarhi mahā kavi nibadhyamānānām kāvya arthānām atiśayaḥ

original: vālmīki-vyatiriktasyānyasya kavi-vyapadeśa eva vā sāmānya-vyatiriktasyānyasya kāvyārthasyābhāvāt,
analyzed: vālmīki vyatiriktasya anyasya kavi vyapadeśaḥ eva vā sāmānya vyatiriktasya anyasya kāvya arthasya abhāvāt

original: sāmānyasya cādikavinaiva pradarśitatvāt /
analyzed: sāmānyasya ca ādi kavinā eva pradarśita tvāt

original: ukti-vaicitryān naiṣa doṣa iti cet-kim idam ukti-vaicitryam ?
analyzed: ukti vaicitryāt na eṣa doṣaḥ iti ced kim idam ukti vaicitryam

original: uktir hi vācya-viśeṣa-pratipādi vacanam /
analyzed: uktiḥ hi vācya viśeṣa pratipādi vacanam

original: tad-vaicitrye kathaṃ na vācya-vaicitryam ?
analyzed: tad vaicitrye katham na vācya vaicitryam

original: vācya-vācakayor avinābhāvena pravṛtteḥ /
analyzed: vācya vācakayoḥ avinābhāvena pravṛtteḥ

original: vācyānāṃ ca kāvye pratibhāsamānānāṃ yad rūpaṃ tat tu grāhya-viśeṣābhedenaiva pratīyate /
analyzed: vācyānām ca kāvye pratibhāsamānānām yat rūpam tat tu grāhya viśeṣa abhedena eva pratīyate

original: tenokti-vaicitrya-vādinā vācya-vaicitryam anicchatāpy avaśyam evābhyupagantavyam /
analyzed: tena ukti vaicitrya vādinā vācya vaicitryam an icchatā api avaśyam eva abhyupagantavyam

original: tad ayam atra saṅkṣepaḥ-
analyzed: tat ayam atra saṅkṣepaḥ

original: vālmīki-vyatiriktasya yady ekasyāpi kasyacit /
analyzed: vālmīki vyatiriktasya yadi ekasya api kasyacid

original: iṣyate pratibhārtheṣu tat tad ānantyam akṣayam //
analyzed: iṣyate pratibhā artheṣu tat tat ānantyam akṣayam

original: kiṃ ca, ukti-vaicitryaṃ yat kāvya-navatve nibandhanam ucyate tad asmat-pakṣānuguṇam eva /
analyzed: kim ca ukti vaicitryam yat kāvya nava tve nibandhanam ucyate tat asmad pakṣa anuguṇam eva

original: yato yāvān ayaṃ kāvyārthānantya-bheda-hetuḥ prakāraḥ prāg darśitaḥ sa sarva eva punarukti-vaicitryād dvi-guṇatām āpadyate /
analyzed: yatas yāvān ayam kāvya artha ānantya bheda hetuḥ prakāraḥ prāk darśitaḥ sa sarvaḥ eva punarukti vaicitryāt dviguṇa tām āpadyate

original: yaś cāyam upamā-śleṣādir alaṅkāra-vargaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa bhaṇiti-vaicitryād upanibadhyamānaḥ svayam evānavadhir dhatte punaḥ śata-śākhatām /
analyzed: yaḥ ca ayam upamā āśleṣa ādiḥ alaṅkāra vargaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa bhaṇiti vaicitryāt upanibadhyamānaḥ svayam evā anavadhiḥ dhatte punar śata śākhā tām

original: bhaṇitiś ca sva-bhāṣā-bhedena vyavasthitā satī pratiniyata-bhāṣā-gocarārtha-vaicitrya-nibandhanaṃ punar aparaṃ kāvyārthānām ānantyam āpādayati
analyzed: bhaṇitiḥ ca sva bhāṣā bhedena vyavasthitā satī pratiniyata bhāṣā gocara artha vaicitrya nibandhanam punar aparam kāvya arthānām ānantyam āpādayati

original: yathā mamaiva-
analyzed: yathā mama eva

original: maha maha iti bhaṇantaho bajjadi kālo jaṇassa /
analyzed: maha mahaḥ iti bajjadi kālaḥ jaṇassa

original: toi ṇa deu janaddaṇu goarībhodi maṇassa //
analyzed: toi ṇa maṇassa

original: [mama mama iti bhaṇato vrajati kālo janasya /
analyzed: mama mama iti bhaṇataḥ vrajati kālaḥ janasya

original: tathāpi na devo janārdano gocaro bhavati manasaḥ] // DhvA_4.7 //
analyzed: tathā api na devaḥ janārdanaḥ gocaraḥ bhavati manasaḥ

original: itthaṃ yathā yathā nirūpyate tathā tathā na labhyate 'ntaḥ kāvyārthānām /
analyzed: ittham yathā yathā nirūpyate tathā tathā na labhyate ntar kāvya arthānām

original: idaṃ tūcyate-
analyzed: idam tu ucyate

original: avasthādi-vibhinnānāṃ vācyānāṃ vinibandhanam /
analyzed: avasthā ādi vibhinnānām vācyānām vinibandhanam

original: yat pradarśitaṃ prāk-
analyzed: yat pradarśitam prāk

original: bhūmnaiva dṛśyate lakṣye . . . . . . . . . . .
analyzed: bhūmnā eva dṛśyate lakṣye

original: na tac chakyam apohitum /
analyzed: na tat śakyam apohitum

original: . . . . . . . . . . .tat tu bhāti rasāśrayāt // DhvK_4.8 //
analyzed: tu bhāti

original: tad idam atra saṅkṣepeṇābhidhīyate sat-kavīnām upadeśāya-
analyzed: tat idam atra saṅkṣepeṇa abhidhīyate sat kavīnām upadeśāya

original: rasa-bhāvādi-sambaddhā yady aucityānusāriṇī /
anvīyate vastu-gatir deśa-kālādi-bhedinī // DhvK_4.9 //
analyzed: anvīyate vastu gatiḥ deśa kāla ādi bhedinī

original: tatkā gaṇanā kavīnāmanyeṣāṃ parimitaśaktīnām /
analyzed: tat kā gaṇanā kavīnām anyeṣām parimita śaktīnām

original: vācaspati-sahasrāṇāṃ sahasrair api yatnataḥ /
analyzed: vācaspati sahasrāṇām sahasraiḥ api yatnataḥ

original: nibaddhā sā kṣayaṃ naiti prakṛtir jagatām iva // DhvK_4.10 //
analyzed: nibaddhā sā kṣayam nā eti prakṛtiḥ jagatām iva

original: yathā hi jagat-prakṛtir atīta-kalpa-paramparāvirbhūta-vicitra-vastu-prapañcā satī punar idānīṃ parikṣīṇā para-padārtha-nirmāṇa-śaktir iti na  #
analyzed: yathā hi jagat prakṛtiḥ atīta kalpa paramparā āvirbhūta vicitra vastu prapañcā satī punar idānīm parikṣīṇā para padārtha nirmāṇa śaktiḥ iti na

original: śakyate 'bhidhātum /
analyzed: śakyate bhidhātum

original: tadvad eveyaṃ kāvya-sthitir anantābhiḥ kavi-matibhir upabhuktāpi nedānīṃ parihīyate,
analyzed: tadvat evā iyam kāvya sthitiḥ anantābhiḥ kavi matibhiḥ upabhuktā api nā idānīm parihīyate

original: pratyuta nava-navābhir vyutpattibhiḥ parivardhate /
analyzed: pratyuta nava navābhiḥ vyutpattibhiḥ parivardhate

original: itthaṃ sthite 'pi
analyzed: ittham sthite pi

original: saṃvādās tu bhavanty eva bāhulyena sumedhasām /
analyzed: saṃvādāḥ tu bhavanti eva bāhulyena sumedhasām

original: sthitaṃ hy etat saṃvādinya eva medhāvināṃ buddhayaḥ /
analyzed: sthitam hi etat saṃvādinyaḥ eva medhāvinām buddhayaḥ

original: kintu-
analyzed: kintu

original: naika-rūpatayā sarve te mantavyā vipaścitā // DhvK_4.11 //
analyzed: na eka rūpa tayā sarve te mantavyāḥ vipaścitā

original: katham iti cet-
analyzed: katham iti ced

original: saṃvādo hy anya-sādṛśyaṃ tat punaḥ pratibimbavat /
analyzed: saṃvādaḥ hi anya sādṛśyam tat punar pratibimba vat

original: ālekhyākāravat tulya-dehivac ca śarīriṇām // DhvK_4.12 //
analyzed: ālekhya ākāra vat tulya dehi vat ca śarīriṇām

original: saṃvādo hi kāvyārthasyocyate yad anyena kāvya-vastunā sādṛśyam /
analyzed: saṃvādaḥ hi kāvya arthasya ucyate yat anyena kāvya vastunā sādṛśyam

original: tat punaḥ śarīriṇāṃ pratibimbavad ālekhyākāravat tulya-dehivac ca tridhā vyavasthitam /
analyzed: tat punar śarīriṇām pratibimba vat ālekhya ākāravat tulya dehi vat ca tridhā vyavasthitam

original: kiṃcid dhi kāvya-vastu vastv-antarasya śarīriṇaḥ pratibimba-kalpam,
analyzed: kiṃcid hi kāvya vastu vastu antarasya śarīriṇaḥ pratibimba kalpam

original: anyad ālekhya-prakhyam,
analyzed: anyat ālekhya prakhyam

original: anyat tulyena śarīriṇā sadṛśam /
analyzed: anyat tulyena śarīriṇā sadṛśam

original: tatra pūrvam ananyātma tucchātma tad-anantaram /
analyzed: tatra pūrvam ananya ātma tuccha ātma tad anantaram

original: tṛtīyaṃ tu prasiddhātma nānya-sāmyaṃ tyajet kaviḥ // DhvK_4.13 //
analyzed: tṛtīyam tu prasiddha ātma na anya sāmyam tyajet kaviḥ

original: tatra pūrvaṃ pratibimba-kalpaṃ kāvya-vastu parihartavyaṃ sumatinā /
analyzed: tatra pūrvam pratibimba kalpam kāvya vastu parihartavyam sumatinā

original: yatas tad-ananyātma tāttvika-śarīra-śūnyam /
analyzed: yatas tat ananya ātma tāttvika śarīra śūnyam

original: tad-anantaram ālekhya-prakhyam anya-sāmyaṃ śarīrāntara-yuktam api tucchātmatvena tyaktavyam /
analyzed: tad anantaram ālekhya prakhyam anya sāmyam śarīra antara yuktam api tuccha ātma tvena tyaktavyam

original: tṛtīyaṃ tu vibhinna-kamanīya-śarīra-sadbhāve sati sasaṃvādam api kāvya-vastu na tyaktavyaṃ kavinā /
analyzed: tṛtīyam tu vibhinna kamanīya śarīra sadbhāve sati sa saṃvādam api kāvya vastu na tyaktavyam kavinā

original: na hi śarīrī śarīriṇānyena sadṛśo 'py eka eveti śakyate vaktum // DhvA_4.13 //
analyzed: na hi śarīrī śarīriṇā anyena sadṛśaḥ api ekaḥ evā iti śakyate vaktum

original: etad evopapādayitum ucyate-
analyzed: etat eva upapādayitum ucyate

original: ātmano 'nyasya sad-bhāve pūrva-sthity-anuyāyy api /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ nyasya sadbhāve pūrva sthiti anuyāyi api

original: vastu bhātitarāṃ tanvyāḥ śaśi-cchāyam ivānanam // DhvK_4.14 //
analyzed: vastu bhātitarām tanvyāḥ śaśi chāyam iva ānanam

original: tattvasya sāra-bhūtasyātmanaḥ sad-bhāve 'nyasya pūrva-sthity-anuyāyy api vastu bhātitarām /
analyzed: tattvasya sāra bhūtasya ātmanaḥ sadbhāve nyasya pūrva sthiti anuyāyi api vastu bhātitarām

original: purāṇa-ramaṇīya-cchāyānugṛhītaṃ hi vastu śarīravat parāṃ śobhāṃ puṣyati /
analyzed: purāṇa ramaṇīya chāyā anugṛhītam hi vastu śarīra vat parām śobhām puṣyati

original: na tu punar-uktatvenāvabhāsate /
analyzed: na tu punarukta tvena avabhāsate

original: tanvyāḥ śaśi-cchāyam ivānanam // DhvA_4.14 //
analyzed: tanvyāḥ śaśi chāyam iva ānanam

original: evaṃ tāvat sa-saṃvādānāṃ samudāya-rūpāṇāṃ vākyārthānāṃ vibhaktāḥ sīmānaḥ /
analyzed: evam tāvat sa saṃvādānām samudāya rūpāṇām vākya arthānām vibhaktāḥ sīmānaḥ

original: padārtha-rūpāṇāṃ ca vastv-antara-sadṛśānāṃ kāvya-vastūnāṃ nāsty eva doṣa iti pratipādayitum ucyate-
analyzed: padārtha rūpāṇām ca vastu antara sadṛśānām kāvya vastūnām na asti eva doṣaḥ iti pratipādayitum ucyate

original: akṣarādi-racaneva yojyate yatra vastu-racanā purātanī /
analyzed: akṣara ādi racanā iva yojyate yatra vastu racanā purātanī

original: nūtane sphurati kāvya-vastuni vyaktam eva khalu sā na duṣyati // DhvK_4.15 //
analyzed: nūtane sphurati kāvya vastuni vyaktam eva khalu sā na duṣyati

original: na hi vācaspatināpy akṣarāṇi padāni vā kānicid apūrvāṇi ghaṭayituṃ śakyante /
analyzed: na hi vācaspatinā api akṣarāṇi padāni vā kānicid apūrvāṇi ghaṭayitum śakyante

original: tāni tu tāny evopanibaddhāni na kāvyādiṣu navatāṃ virudhyanti /
analyzed: tāni tu tāni eva upanibaddhāni na kāvya ādiṣu nava tām virudhyanti

original: tathaiva padārtha-rūpāṇi śleṣādi-mayāny artha-tattvāni / tasmāt-
analyzed: tathā eva padārtha rūpāṇi śleṣa ādi mayāni artha tattvāni tasmāt

original: yadapi tad api ramyaṃ . . . . . . . .
analyzed: yat api tat api ramyam

original: kāvya-śarīraṃ
analyzed: kāvya śarīram

original: . . . . . . . . yatra lokasya kiṃcit
yal lokasya kiṃcit /
analyzed: yat lokasya kiṃcid

original: sphuritam idam itīyaṃ buddhir abhyujjihīte /
analyzed: sphuritam idam iti iyam buddhiḥ abhyujjihīte

original: sphuraṇeyaṃ kācid iti sahṛdayānāṃ camatkṛtir utpadyate /
analyzed: sphuraṇā iyam kācid iti sahṛdayānām camatkṛtiḥ utpadyate

original: anugatam api pūrva-cchāyayā vastu tādṛk
analyzed: anugatam api pūrva chāyayā vastu tādṛś

original: sukavir upanibadhnan nindyatāṃ nopayāti // DhvK_4.16 //
analyzed: su kaviḥ upanibadhnan nindya tām na upayāti

original: tad-anugatam api pūrva-cchāyayā vastu tādṛk tādṛkṣaṃ sukavir vivakṣita-vyaṅgya-vācyārtha-samarpaṇa-samartha-śabda-racanā-rūpayā bandha-cchāyayopanibadhnan-nindyatāṃ  #
analyzed: tad anugatam api pūrva chāyayā vastu tādṛś tādṛkṣam su kaviḥ vivakṣita vyaṅgya vācyārtha samarpaṇa samartha śabda racanā rūpayā bandha chāyayā upanibadhnan nindya tām

original: naiva yāti /
analyzed: na eva yāti

original: tad itthaṃ sthitam-
analyzed: tat ittham sthitam

original: pratīyantāṃ vāco nimita-vividhārthāmṛta-rasā
analyzed: pratīyantām vācaḥ nimita vividha artha amṛta rasā

original: na sādaḥ kartavyaḥ kavibhir anavadye sva-viṣaye /
analyzed: na sādaḥ kartavyaḥ kavibhiḥ anavadye sva viṣaye

original: santi navāḥ kāvyārthāḥ paropanibaddhārtha-viracane na kaścit kaver guṇa iti bhāvayitvā /
analyzed: santi navāḥ kāvya arthāḥ para upanibaddha artha viracane na kaścid kaveḥ guṇaḥ iti bhāvayitvā

original: parasvādānecchā-virata-manaso vastu sukaveḥ
analyzed: para sva ādāna icchā virata manasaḥ vastu su kaveḥ

original: sarasvaty evaiṣā ghaṭayati yatheṣṭaṃ bhagavatī // DhvK_4.17 //
analyzed: sarasvatī eva eṣā ghaṭayati yathā iṣṭam bhagavatī

original: para-svādānecchāvirata-manasaḥ sukaveḥ sarasvaty eṣā bhagavatī yatheṣṭaṃ ghaṭayati vastu /
analyzed: para sva ādāna icchā virata manasaḥ su kaveḥ sarasvatī eṣā bhagavatī yatheṣṭam ghaṭayati vastu

original: yeṣāṃ sukavīnāṃ prāktana-puṇyābhyāsa-paripāka-vaśena pravṛttis teṣāṃ paroparacitārtha-parigraha-niḥspṛhāṇāṃ sva-vyāpāro na kvacid upayujyate
analyzed: yeṣām su kavīnām prāktana puṇya abhyāsa paripāka vaśena pravṛttiḥ teṣām para uparacita artha parigraha niḥspṛhāṇām sva vyāpāraḥ na kvacid upayujyate

original: saiva bhagavatī sarasvatī svayam abhimatam artham āvirbhāvayati /
analyzed: sā eva bhagavatī sarasvatī svayam abhimatam artham āvirbhāvayati

original: etad eva hi mahākavitvaṃ mahākavīnām ity om /
analyzed: etat eva hi mahā kavi tvam mahā kavīnām iti om

original: ity akliṣṭa-rasāśrayocita-guṇālaṅkāra-śobhā-bhṛto
analyzed: iti

original: yasmād vastu samīhitaṃ sukṛtibhiḥ sarvaṃ samāsādyate /
analyzed: yasmāt vastu samīhitam su kṛtibhiḥ sarvam samāsādyate

original: kāvyākhye 'khila-saukhya-dhāmni vibudhodyāne dhvanir darśitaḥ
analyzed: kāvya ākhye khila saukhya dhāmni vibudha udyāne dhvaniḥ darśitaḥ

original: so 'yaṃ kalpatarūpamāna-mahimā bhogyo 'stu bhavyātmanām //
analyzed: saḥ yam bhogyaḥ stu bhavya ātmanām

original: sat-kāvya-tattva-naya-vartma-cira-prasupta-
kalpaṃ manaḥsu paripakva-dhiyāṃ yadāsīt /
analyzed: kalpam manaḥsu paripakva dhiyām yadā āsīt

original: tad vyākarot sahṛdayodaya-lābha-hetor
analyzed: tat vyākarot sahṛdaya udaya lābha hetoḥ

original: ānandavardhana iti prathitābhidhānaḥ //
iti śrī-rājānakānanda-vardhanācārya-viracite dhvany-āloke caturtha uddyotaḥ /
analyzed: iti śrī rāja ānaka ānandavardhana ācārya viracite dhvanyāloke caturthaḥ uddyotaḥ
